column12: Data visualization display method and system
column13: The invention discloses a big data visualization display method and system, and the method comprises the following steps: collecting original data from different data sources; preprocessing the original data to obtain preprocessed data; key information of the data is analyzed from the preprocessed data, the key information comprises effective information and information dimensions, and an information architecture is constructed according to the effective information and the information dimensions; and determining a visual display mode of the big data visual page according to the information architecture. According to the method, big data is processed, the validity of the data is improved, key information is extracted from the processed data, an information architecture is constructed according to effective information and information dimensions, the information architecture is constructed from different information dimensions, and a visual page visual display mode is determined according to the information architecture. And the user can more accurately and quickly perceive the information transmitted by the big data.
column14: SHANGHAI VERTIV INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: System, method and apparatus for data interchange in clinically integrated networks
column13: Embodiments of the present disclosure relate to the interchange of data in clinically integrated networks (CIN). The interchange system and method described herein relates to the transfer of patient records for switching from one Electronic Health Record (EHR) vendor to another EHR vendor. The interconnection system and method allow for the concatenation of patient records from diverse EHR's for group reporting of clinical quality measures. The interconnection system also allows for transferring of clinical data from any government certified EHR to specific registry. The interconnection system further relates to the enablement of third party products to be used in conjunction with clinic EHR.

column12: Data Validation Systems and Methods
column13: A computer-implemented method is provided for validating input data from a third-party vendor. The method includes receiving, by a computing device, a plurality of prospectuses from a plurality of third-party entities and generating, by the computing device, a trained machine learning model using the plurality of prospectuses. The method also includes applying, by the computing device, the trained machine learning model on the input data to predict a classification label for the input data and generate a confidence level for the prediction.

column12: MACHINE LEARNING FOR RAPID AUTOMATIC COMPUTER-AIDED ENGINEERING MODELING
column13: A memory stores a representation of geometric features of an object, a machine learning model configured to identify one or more feature families of features of the representation, and feature-specific parameters defining how to mesh the one or more feature families. A processor recognizes and classifies features of the representation into the feature families utilizing the machine learning model, applies feature-specific mesh parameters to the recognized and classified features of the representation, and generates a mesh of the representation in accordance with the feature-specific parameters.

column16: XITADEL CAE TECHNOLOGIES INDIA PVT. LTD (2022-03-23)

column12: Educational training test system, method and computer readable medium based on augmented reality technology
column13: The invention discloses an educational training test system, method and computer readable medium based on augmented reality technology. An augmented reality content design tool subsystem loads an augmented reality education training material, and an expert end designs an exam question, a script and an answer according to the augmented reality education training material to save to a servo device, and then loads the exam question and the script from the servo device to the augmented reality mobile device. When the augmented reality mobile device recognizes a target object associated with the exam question, the augmented reality mobile device presents the exam question associated with the target object, and records an on-site real-time picture of test process when a student end performs the exam question on the target object and transmits it to the servo device, and then the servo device compares the change of a video characteristic on a time axis between the on-site real-time picture and the answer to calculate a test result of the exam question.

column12: Visual design platform for data collaboration chain
column13: The embodiment of the invention discloses a visual design platform for a data collaboration chain. The visual design platform includes a node arrangement module, an information storage module, an information interpretation module and an execution module, wherein the node arrangement module is used for receiving a design instruction of a user, performing arrangement setting on nodes in a data collaboration chain in a visual manner to obtain the data collaboration chain, and generating node information of each node and node relation information among the nodes according to the data collaboration chain; the information storage module is used for storing node information of each node and node relation information among the nodes; the information interpretation module is used for generating a data collaboration chain execution storage structure according to the node information and the node relation information; and the execution module is used for executing the storage structure according to the data collaboration chain and executing the nodes in the data collaboration chain. According to the embodiment of the invention, the technical problem that data cannot flow in time due to the fact that a data collaboration model cannot be quickly established in the prior art is solved.

column12: REAL-TIME RAN INTELLIGENT CONTROLLER ARCHITECTURE
column13: An Open Radio Access Network (O-RAN) may include an O-RAN Centralized Unit (O-CU), at least one O-RAN Distributed Unit (O-DU), at least O-RAN Radio Unit (O-RU), and a Real-Time (RT) RAN Intelligent Controller (RIC) coupled to the at least O-DU and configured to host at least one application for controlling the at least one O- DU over a real-time control loop with a latency of less than 10 ms. The O-RAN wireless system may include a Non-RT (Non-RT) RIC configured to manage resources and events having a latency of 1 second or greater, and may include a Near-RT RIC configured to manage resources and events having a latency of 10 ms to 1 second. In addition, O-RAN may include a Service Management and Orchestrator (SMO) platform, where the RT RIC is connected to at least one of the SMO, the Non-RT RIC, the Near-RT RIC, RAN network elements and the O-RU.
column14: ALTIOSTAR NETWORKS INC;;RAKUTEN SYMPHONY SINGAPORE PTE LTD

column12: USABILITY DATA ANALYSIS PLATFORM
column13: This disclosure describes a platform and taxonomy for analyzing the results of testing data, such as data generated through usability test of the User Experience (UX) of a software product or service. The analysis outputs actions that can be performed automatically to modify the software product or service under test. The usability test results that are analyzed can include qualitative data, such as words, sentences, phrases, comments, and or other (e.g., natural language) information that have been provided by end-users engaged in the usability testing. The platform and taxonomy described herein provided a framework through which a semantic analysis of results can be performed, with actions performed based on the semantic analysis.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING FIREFIGHTING TRAINING PROGRAM BASED ON USER-CENTERED DESIGN
column13: Disclosed are an apparatus and a method for providing a firefighting training program based on a user centered design. A method for providing a firefighting training program based on a user centered design according to one embodiment of the present application, may comprise: a step of receiving requirement data with respect to a firefighting training program, and generating an affinity diagram based on the requirement data; and a step of designing a virtual reality-based firefighting training program based on the affinity diagram. According to the present invention, an effect of the firefighting training program can be accurately verified in qualitative and quantitative manners.

column12: MACHINE LEARNING MODELING OF PROBE INTENSITY
column13: Systems, methods, and apparatus are described herein for training machine learning models to predict probe intensity values using sample-specific image data and/or applying the predicted probe intensity values. As described herein, sample-specific image may include a signal associated with a sample for a process probe in a microarray relating to a single individual. The machine learning model may be trained, using the sample-specific image data, to predict a probe intensity value. The probe intensity value may be a raw probe intensity value or a normalized probe intensity value. After being trained, the machine learning model may receive as input a probe sequence or probe features. The machine learning model may be used to predict a total probe intensity value based on the probe sequence or the one or more probe features.

column12: Full-life-cycle management system based on smart building
column13: The invention provides a full-life-cycle management system based on a smart building, and relates to the technical field of smart building management, and the system comprises: a background data management platform which separates characters, pictures and the like of related buildings on a website from components of the website, can connect all pages together, and can control the display of the pages; a project center unit which is used for the whole process of scheme planning of the construction project, project content design, project bid invitation, contract signing, bid invitation auditing, project implementation and project acceptance; a G asset center unit which is used for managing assets involved in each stage of construction of the construction project, performing category attribute state classification on the assets, performing internet-of-things management on the assets, displaying information such as life cycle positions of the assets through pictures and 3d graphs, and performing filing storage; and an H behavior center unit which is used for classifying various behaviors related to each stage of the construction project in construction.
column14: NANJING SMART BUILDING RES INSTITUTE CO LTD

column12: Method for providing of question and answer and computer program recorded on record-medium for executing method therefor
column13: The present invention proposes a method for efficiently providing questions and answers in a process of annotating data for learning. The method, in a work process in which an annotation apparatus performs annotation for the learning of an artificial intelligence (AI), comprises: a step in which the annotation apparatus receives an input of a command to notify that there exists a question from a worker through a user interface (UI); a step in which the annotation apparatus generates question data corresponding to the inputted command; a step in which the annotation apparatus searches the database of a learning data design apparatus which is preset based on the question data; and a step in which the annotation apparatus outputs the response data searched in the database through the UI.

column12: Oracle augmented reality content interaction system, method, device and terminal
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of electronic information technology and augmented reality interaction design, and discloses an oracle augmented reality content interaction system, method, equipment and terminal, which are used for sensing and measuring dynamic vector information of a user, a virtual plane and a real identification object, and acquiring environment image information; identifying and establishing a virtual plane according to the environment image information and the sensor data, identifying the characteristics of a real identification object, and dynamically matching a user interaction mode and virtual content under the user permission for the user according to the dynamic position characteristics of the real identification object and the corresponding relation; and displaying the dynamically matched user interaction permission and the virtual content, and displaying interaction feedback in real time. According to the method, the corresponding interaction authority is triggered through the matching relationship between the identification object and the model, so that the user has positive feedback and rich interaction in the registration link of the augmented reality content, the exploration interest of the user is improved, and the knowledge spreading effect and the interaction experience are improved.

column12: Method for confirming low water flow during non-data design drainage basin supplementary testing
column13: The invention relates to a method for confirming low water flow during non-data design drainage basin supplementary testing. The method comprises the steps that firstly, a data collection device in amonitor station collects data monitored by a rain gauge, a thermometer, a hygrometer and a flow speed meter, and the data are transmitted to a computer control terminal through an Internet-of-Things communication device; and then, according to the feature hydrologic year category to which design drainage basin supplementary testing data belong, the computer control terminal inputs the data collected in the first step into a low water flow mathematic model objective function corresponding to the feature hydrologic year, and the low water flow of the design drainage basin is obtained. By means of the method, hydrology and weather supplementary monitoring data of the design drainage basin can be directly adopted, the hydrology and weather attributes of the design drainage basin can be reflected better, more factors are considered, the actual condition is met better, data reliability is higher, parameters of the mathematic model are more accurate, and the low water flow during non-data design drainage basin supplementary testing can be calculated more accurately.

column12: UI interface verification method and device based on artificial intelligence, equipment and medium
column13: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a UI verification method and device based on artificial intelligence, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the UI verification method based on artificial intelligence comprises the following steps: constructing a standard design comparison table according to a preset UI design file; obtaining a to-be-tested element check set according to an application program corresponding to the UI design file; verifying corresponding elements in the to-be-tested element verification set based on the standard design comparison table to obtain an element verification correlation set; calculating an element score value in the to-be-tested element verification set based on the element verification correlation set to obtain a UI interface reduction degree; and evaluating the UI reduction degree according to a preset threshold value to obtain an evaluation result. According to the method and the device, the specific UI reduction degree can be evaluated in a quantitative form, and developers are helped to obtain the optimization levels of the elements according to the hierarchical relationship of the elements, so that the optimization efficiency of the UI is improved.
column14: CHINESE SAFETY LIFE INSURANCE STOCK LTD COMPANY

column12: Decisions with big data
column13: This invention presents a framework for applying artificial intelligence to aid with product design, mission or retail planning. The invention outlines a novel approach for applying predictive analytics to the training of a system model for product design, assimilates the definition of meta-data for design containers to that of labels for books in a library, and represents customers, requirements, components and assemblies in the form of database objects with relational dependence. Design information can be harvested, for the purpose of improving decision fidelity for new designs, by providing such database representation of the design content. Further, a retrieval model, that operates on the archived design containers, and yields results that are likely to satisfy user queries, is presented. This model, which is based on latent semantic analysis, predicts the degree of relevance between accessible design information and a query, and presents the most relevant previous design information to the user.

column12: System and method for identifying optimal effective communication channel for subject engagement
column13: A machine learning based recommendation model, including a supervised learning classifier configured to receive input training data that includes a plurality of behavioral determinants, a supervised learning model configured to receive subject input data that includes a plurality of behavior determinants, wherein the supervised learning model outputs a predicted behavior of a subject, and a channel selection module configured to receive the subject input data and the predicted behavior and to determine a recommended communication channel for the subject to follow to achieve the predicted behavior.

column12: Method and system for predictive modeling of consumer profiles
column13: A method, computer system, and computer program product that aggregates data regarding a plurality of factors correlated with demographic parameters; performs iterative analysis on the data using machine learning to construct a predictive model of purchasing propensity; populates, using the predictive model, a database with predicted values of spending propensity for selected demographic parameters; converts the predicted values of spending propensity in the database into percentages of observed values of spending propensity for a selected group of people within the selected demographic parameters over a specified time period to create indices of spending propensity; and rank orders the people within the selected group according to their indices of spending propensity.

column12: Method and device for checking UI (User Interface)
column13: The invention discloses a UI checking method and device which can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence, the field of block chains or the field of finance. The method comprises the following steps: extracting a first code in a UI design draft, wherein the first code is used for indicating UI image information corresponding to the UI design draft; identifying a second code in the front-end code through a pre-trained artificial intelligence model, wherein the second code is used for indicating UI image information corresponding to the front-end code; the first code and the second code are compared, a comparison result is generated, and the comparison result is used for checking the front-end code. Therefore, according to the UI checking method provided by the embodiment of the invention, by respectively extracting the first code in the UI design draft and the second code in the front-end code, whether the UI image realized by the front-end code is consistent with the UI image in the design draft or not can be quickly and accurately checked. Moreover, the checking method can be used for detecting different UIs, and special test case codes do not need to be written for different UIs.

column12: Method for behavior estimation using artificial intelligence and computer program recorded on record-medium for executing method therefor
column13: In accordance with the present invention, a behavior estimation method is suggested. The method includes: a step in which an annotation work object for artificial intelligence (AI) learning is collected; a step in which a learning data design device generates a three-dimensional object by identifying an object from the collected annotation work object; and a step in which the learning data design device extracts a plurality of key points of a two-dimensional image about the generated three-dimensional object, and compares the extracted key points with human body posture models stored in a pre-built human body posture model dataset, thereby extracting a human body posture model matched with the extracted key points from the stored human body posture model dataset to estimate behavior of the three-dimensional object. Therefore, the present invention is capable of increasing learning efficiency by selectively generating learning data.

column12: Circuit for realizing conversion from network port to serial port
column13: The utility model relates to the field of industrial automation control and Internet of Things communication, and discloses a circuit for converting a network port into a serial port, which comprises an RJ45 network port, a PHY (Physical Layer) chip and a microcontroller, the PHY chip is electrically connected with an RJ45 network port used for receiving data, the microcontroller is electrically connected with the PHY chip, and the microcontroller is electrically connected with a serial port used for sending data. And under the action of the PHY chip and the microcontroller, data are input from the network port and output from the serial port. The information architecture of traditional RS485 communication is replaced by network communication, so that transparent data transmission of TCP/UDP network data packets among nodes is realized, and a user can realize remote node control and data acquisition through a client.

column12: SYSTEM FOR STRUCTURING OBJECTS FOR OPERATION IN SOFTWARE ENVIRONMENTS AND METHODS FOR ITS IMPLEMENTATION
column13: FIELD: information technology. SUBSTANCE: invention relates to means of structuring objects for operation in software environments. System comprises a software and hardware system for inputting and setting a task, configured to interact with an external software environment; software and hardware complex for generating a genesis smart asset of an object; smart-division hardware and software system; software and hardware system for interaction of smart assets. Methods describe operation of said system. EFFECT: wider range of technical means, which provide higher security and reduced vulnerability of program elements of interaction and functioning in software environments, including in a blockchain medium.

column12: Data UE visual design system
column13: The invention provides a data UE visual design system, which comprises a data management module used for obtaining source data through a local file uploading mode or a far-end database extraction mode, selecting a database needing to be configured with data connection, generating new data connection information, and then storing the collected source data into the database; a visual tool design module used for designing a visual interactive chart editing tool to serve as a display board for displaying data; a billboard editing module used for importing a billboard installation package from theoutside and installing a corresponding billboard; and a visual presentation module used for receiving an operation instruction of a user on a visual tool, dragging the corresponding interactive chartediting tool according to the operation instruction, and carrying out real-time updating presentation on the created data in a designed billboard style. According to the method, the usability is ensured, meanwhile, powerful data visual analysis, visual exploration and display functions are provided, and all requirements of organizations for data processing and operation analysis are fully met.

column12: ANALYSIS DEVICE, ANALYSIS METHOD, AND ANALYSIS PROGRAM
column13: Provided are an analysis device, an analysis method, and an analysis program which predict the performance of a learning model when learning processing is executed using multiple algorithms. Using a predictive model produced by supervised learning using first shape information representing a global shape of a first loss function set for a prescribed problem and the performance of the learning model as learning data, an analysis device 10 predicts, for each of the multiple algorithms, the performance of a learning model when machine learning by the learning model is executed so that a second loss function has a reduced value on the basis of second shape information representing a global shape of the second loss function set for a new problem.

column12: ENTERPRISE AUTOMATION SYSTEM
column13: In one embodiment, a method comprises providing a set of a conversation blocks in a programming interface to an author; and constructing a conversation based on instantiation and configuration by the author of a plurality of conversation blocks of the set of conversation blocks, the conversation implementing an automation flow with respect to at least one backend system of an organization, wherein a first instantiated conversation block of the set of conversation blocks specifies a request, wherein the request is mapped to an extension comprising logic to interact with a backend system of the at least one backend system to effectuate an action described by a title of the request.

column12: Internet-based 3D visual design modeling platform
column13: The utility model discloses an internet-based 3D visual design modeling platform, which comprises a bin body, two-dimensional display windows are arranged on two sides of one end of the front surface of the bin body, electric telescopic rods are arranged at four corners of the top of the bin body, a three-dimensional display platform is arranged on the tops of the electric telescopic rods, and the three-dimensional display platform is arranged on the top of the bin body. A protective cover is arranged at the top of the three-dimensional display platform, a supporting plate is arranged in the middle of the top in the bin body, and a driving motor is arranged in the middle of one end of the back face of the supporting plate; according to the three-dimensional display platform, the driving motor, the gear B, the gear A, the incomplete gear, the rack, the supporting rod, the supporting top rod and the electric telescopic rod are matched with one another, so that the display platform can move up and down in a reciprocating mode during operation, a D display design structure at the top of the three-dimensional display platform is displayed at multiple angles, the display effect is improved, and the display effect is improved. The audience can observe conveniently, so that the practicability of the device is improved.
column14: WUHAN LUODI NETWORK TECH CO LTD

column12: SMT production line quality analysis platform based on digital twinning
column13: The invention discloses an SMT production line analysis platform based on digital twinning which is accurate in result and visual in process. According to the technical scheme, transmission of information and data is achieved between an SMT production line physical space and an SMT production line virtual space through a data bus, and a data layer divides the data into a design class, a process class, a quality class and an adjustment and measurement class according to data types and maps the data to a twinning layer in a virtual-real mode; the twinning layer organizes and couples the digitaltwinning bodies according to the functional relationship among the twinning bodies; wherein the analysis layer drives a quality prediction algorithm and a quality tracing algorithm through twinning bodies to perform tracing and quality prediction on the printing and welding quality of a production line, the system layer performs visual design based on the SMT production line digital twinborn library, the deep learning algorithm library and the quality prediction model and the quality tracing model in the model library; through an industrial prediction and quality tracing APP, the quality of the production line is visually displayed in real time in a three-dimensional space, and quality early warning is carried out in the product production process.

column12: Methods, systems, and articles of manufacture for determining optimal parameter settings for business initiative testing models
column13: A system, method, and article of manufacture is disclosed for determining optimal parameter settings for a business initiative testing model used for testing initiatives for business locations included in a business network. In one aspect, a method is disclosed that includes defining a first test type of a business initiative testing model having a set of parameter settings. Each parameter setting may include a set of one or more parameter setting options. The method may also include performing virtual tests on a set of virtual test sites based on the defined test type. Each virtual test site may reflect a selected business location in the business network. Also, the method may include determining a set of optimal parameter settings for the first test type of the business initiative testing model based on results from the virtual test. Moreover, the method may include configuring the business initiative testing model using the optimal parameter settings from the set for the first test type to test a business initiative to apply to the business network.

column12: IMAGE ANALYSIS-BASED ADAPTATION TECHNIQUES FOR LOCALIZATION OF CONTENT PRESENTATION
column13: Techniques for localization of a content presentation in an information processing system are provided. In one example, a method adapts translated content to accommodate an original content design structure (e.g., wireframe) when such translated content is inconsistent with the original content design structure. In another example, a method adapts the original content design structure when translated content is inconsistent with the original content design structure. In yet another example, an image analysis method is used to adapt translated content determined to be inconsistent with the original content design structure.

column12: Contextualized item reminder assitance
column13: Systems and methods for reminding a user or a group of users about one or more items related to an upcoming event. The upcoming event is identified based on user data and a context for determining a list of items useful for the upcoming event is obtained. The list of items for the identified upcoming event is determined, using the context, and item reminder enhancement factors are determined in response to the upcoming event and the determined list of items. Content selection models are determined based on the context, the user data, and the item reminder enhancement factors. Conversational content for engaging the user or group of users is generated by applying the content selection models to a plurality of potential content. A conversation trigger signal is determined, and the conversational content is presented to the user via a computing device in response to receiving the conversation trigger signal.

column12: Method for measuring sorbite rate of high-carbon steel wire rod
column13: The invention relates to a method for determining the sorbite rate of a high-carbon steel wire rod, and belongs to the technical field of metallographic determination methods. According to the technical scheme, the method comprises the steps that firstly, a representative high-carbon steel wire sample is selected for sample preparation, and a Tsai-level microscope is used for shooting a metallograph in a 500-time view field; then, the sorbite tissue is accurately marked manually, data expansion is carried out in a main body feature cutting mode, and finally a training set is formed; and inputting the training set image into the U-Net deep learning network model for self-learning, training the deep learning network model, testing by using test data, and continuously optimizing the accuracy of the recognition model. The method has the beneficial effects that sorbite recognition is carried out based on artificial intelligence, the sorbite rate is calculated, the problems of tedious detection, long time consumption and high standard sample cost of a traditional determination method are solved, the determination method is simple and high in accuracy, and thus the product quality of the high-carbon steel wire rod is ensured; and inspection and analysis of medium-high carbon steel wire rod products in the production process are facilitated.

column12: System and method for adjusting leaching operations based on leach analytic data
column13: The method may comprise receiving historical data (e.g., mineralogy data, irrigation data, raffinate data, heat data, lift height data, geographic data on ore placement and/or blower data); training a predictive model using the historical data to create a trained predictive model; adding future assumption data to the trained predictive model; running the forecast engine for a plurality of parameters to obtain forecast data for a mining production target; comparing the forecast data for the mining production target to the actual data for the mining production target; determining deviations between the forecast data and the actual data, based on the comparing; and changing each of the plurality of parameters from the forecast data to the actual data to determine a contribution to the deviations for each of the plurality of parameters.

column12: Manufacturing unit innovation platform building method based on digital twin industrial robot
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of industrial robot manufacturing, and provides a digital twin industrial robot-based manufacturing unit innovation platform building method, which comprises the following steps of S1, data collection and preparation: collecting and sorting data designed in a robot manufacturing process; s2, digital twinning modeling: simulating and optimizing a robot manufacturing process by establishing a digital twinning model; s3, resource scheduling: scheduling and allocating resources in the robot manufacturing process on the basis of the digital twin model; and S4, robot manufacturing execution is carried out according to a scheduling allocation result. According to the construction method of the industrial robot manufacturing unit innovation platform, the robot manufacturing process can be comprehensively simulated and optimized, the manufacturing efficiency and quality are improved, the cost is reduced, the visual technological process and resource scheduling are provided, and more efficient production line management is achieved.

column12: UI design acceptance method and device, equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to the field of computers, provides a UI design acceptance method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and can be applied to scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, smart traffic and Internet of Vehicles. The method comprises the following steps of: on the basis of a respective pixel value of each to-be-processed layer in a to-be-processed UI image, respectively acquiring an actual layer spacing set between each to-be-processed layer and other layers conforming to a set affiliation relationship; and comparing the actual layer spacing set corresponding to each to-be-processed layer with a target layer spacing set corresponding to the target layer in the target UI image to generate an acceptance result of the to-be-processed UI image. According to the UI design acceptance method and device, the layer size of each UI pattern does not need to be measured independently, whether the UI patterns and the layer spacing design of each to-be-processed layer are reasonable or not can be judged by comparing the actual layer spacing set of each to-be-processed layer with the target layer spacing set of the corresponding target layer layer, and the acceptance efficiency and the acceptance result accuracy rate are improved.

The invention relates to the technical field of space path finding and interactive design, and the method comprises the steps: building a virtual building space three-dimensional model based on research data, collecting materials, building a building guide identifier design library, and constructing a virtual reality scene; a path-finding eye movement experiment is completed in the virtual reality scene, and visual data and behavior tracks of experimenters are collected; performing a round of optimization based on a PSO particle swarm optimization algorithm; interactive design is completed in the virtual reality scene, subjective evaluation and design results of experimenters on the building guiding identification system are collected to perform two-round optimization on the building guiding identification design library, and a recommended design library is generated; and a final design result and a recommended design library are collected, labels are packaged and stored according to the identity information of experimenters and the experiment time, and data reference is provided for subsequent related design.

column12: Method and system for providing security features in a smart phone
column13: The present disclosure addresses the technical problems faced by a basic user or an emergent user while using a smart phone. For the basic users it is difficult to identify the threat on the smartphone. A system and method for enhancing the security features of a smartphone has been provided. Initially, the system classify the user of the smartphone as the basic user or non-basic user using a series of questions. The proposed method is only applicable to the basic user archetype. The present disclosure further describes the method for simplification of an information architecture and multimodal communication of the threats on the smartphone for a basic user archetype or emergent users. Specifically, this disclosure bridges the information communication gaps between the basic archetype user and the information system by surfacing the risks and optimizing their information hierarchy.

column13: The invention discloses a deep-buried tunnel groundwater seepage field evolution air-space-ground integrated monitoring method, relates to the technical field of deep-buried tunnel groundwater seepage field monitoring, and provides the following scheme that the method comprises the following monitoring processes: S1, system architecture; s2, deep-buried tunnel underground water seepage field space information is integrated; s3, carrying out 3D aquifer model transplantation and reconstruction; s4, pre-processing and designing underground water information; s5, analyzing the spatial data; and S6, carrying out virtual reality and visual design. According to the method, the visual deep-buried tunnel underground water seepage field model is constructed, and the deep-buried tunnel underground water seepage field is monitored by establishing the visual 3D model, so that real-time data is obtained, visual simulation can be performed on the seepage field, the geological data information expressive force is fully improved, and the real-time performance of the deep-buried tunnel underground water seepage field is improved. And a good guarantee is provided for deep prediction of regional groundwater evolution trend and development conditions.

column12: Data migration from a source system to a data schema of a medical study on a target system
column13: An embodiment of the present invention migrates data between source and target systems. Retrieved source data is mapped to corresponding data elements of a data design for a computer implemented scenario on a target system. One or more of the data elements of the data design are stored on the target system in a format different than a format of the retrieved data. Filters and transformations are generated based on the mapping and data design, and the retrieved data are converted to the format of the target system. One or more from a group of the mapping, filters, and transformations is adjusted in response to detecting at least one from a group of modifications to the data design and non-conforming data received from the one or more source systems. The converted data is stored for the corresponding data elements on the target system for use by the computer implemented scenario.

column12: Data line based on composite visual design
column13: The utility model relates to a data line based on composite visual design. The data line comprises a housing, a plug arranged at one end of the housing, a connecting sleeve arranged at the other end of the housing, a circuit board arranged in the housing and electrically connected with the plug, and a connecting line sleeved in the connecting sleeve and electrically connected with the circuit board. The data line further comprises a perspective area and a non-perspective area, the non-perspective area is formed on the connecting sleeve, the perspective area is formed on the shell, and the perspective area is suitable for the circuit board to be directly observed by the outside. The transparent area is arranged on the shell, so that the circuit board arranged in the shell is directly observed by the outside, a user can directly judge whether hardware faults exist in the data line or not by observing the circuit board, and the situation that the user wastes a large amount of time to troubleshoot the faults is avoided. Meanwhile, the non-perspective area is arranged on the connecting sleeve, so that the part, in the connecting sleeve, of the connecting line is prevented from being directly observed by the outside, and the attractive appearance of the product is kept.

column12: TRANSPORTATION NETWORK SPEED FOREEASTING METHOD USING DEEP CAPSULE NETWORKS WITH NESTED LSTM MODELS
column13: This application is a transportation network speed forecasting method using deep capsule networks with nested LSTM models. The method includes the following steps: (1) This method divides the transport network into road links, calculates average speeds of each road link, maps the average speeds into a grid system, and generate traffic images representing traffic state at time intervals; (2) the method uses a CapsNet to capture the spatial relationship between road links. The learn patterns are represented in vectors; (3) The vectors of CapsNet are feed into a NLSTM model to learn temporal relationships between road links; (4) The model is trained using and training dataset, and predicts future traffic states using testing dataset. This application uses a new and advanced CapsNet neural structure, while can more efficiently deal with complex traffic networks than CNN models.

column12: Visual design platform user experience data collection device
column13: The utility model provides a visual design platform user experience data collection device, which belongs to the technical field of information collection, and comprises a collector, the lower surface of the collector is fixedly connected with a fixed plate, the lower surface of the fixed plate is provided with a sliding chute, and the sliding chute is provided with a sliding groove. The inner wall of the sliding groove is movably connected with a sliding block, the lower surface of the sliding block is fixedly connected with a shell, the inner wall of the shell is provided with a groove, the inner wall of the shell is fixedly connected with a supporting plate, the lower surface of the supporting plate is fixedly connected with a heat dissipation column, and the upper surface of the heat dissipation column is fixedly connected with a driving motor. According to the visual design platform user experience data collection device, through cooperation of the sliding grooves, the sliding blocks, the telescopic legs, the non-slip mats, the shell and the handle, the sliding blocks and the sliding grooves on the fixing plate are moved by pulling the handle, maintenance is convenient, the height can be adjusted through the telescopic legs, and friction with a table top is increased through the non-slip mats, so that movement is reduced.

column12: SYSTEMS FOR INFRASTRUCTURE DEGRADATION MODELLING AND METHODS OF USE THEREOF
column13: Systems and methods of present disclosure provide a processor to receive a first dataset with time-independent characteristics of infrastructure assets of an infrastructural system, and a second dataset with time-dependent characteristics of the infrastructure assets. The processor segments the infrastructural system into the infrastructure assets having a variety of asset components. The processor generates data records for each infrastructure asset where each data record includes a subset of the first dataset and a subset of the second dataset. Using the data records, the processor generates a set of features which are input into a degradation machine learning model. The processor receives an output from the degradation machine learning model indicative of a prediction of a condition of a portion of the infrastructural system at a predetermined time and renders on a graphical user interface a representation of a location, the condition and a recommended asset management decision.

column12: PATIENT-SPECIFIC ADJUSTMENT OF SPINAL IMPLANTS, AND ASSOCIATED SYSTEMS AND METHODS
column13: A computer system receives readings from sensors embedded in a spinal implant implanted in a patient during surgery. The sensor readings are indicative of a load applied by a spine of the patient on the spinal implant. The load causes physical discomfort to the patient. A feature vector is extracted from the implant sensor readings using a machine learning module. The feature vector is indicative of the physical discomfort caused by the load. Electrical signals are generated using the machine learning module based on the feature vector. The machine learning module is trained based on patient data sets to generate the electrical signals to balance the load, such that the physical discomfort is reduced. The electrical signals are transmitted to one or more actuators embedded in the spinal implant to cause the one or more actuators to configure the spinal implant, such that the load is balanced.

column12: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR DETERMINING A TEMPERATURE OF A ROTOR
column13: The invention relates to an apparatus for determining a temperature of a rotor of an electric machine. The apparatus comprises an interface and a computing device. Input variables which are dependent on the operation of the electric machine are received via the interface. The computing device calculates, by means of a physical model, a first contribution to the heat transfer on the rotor on the basis of at least one of the input variables. In addition, the computing device calculates, by means of an artificial intelligence model, a second contribution to the heat transfer on the rotor on the basis of at least one of the input variables. The computing device calculates the temperature of the rotor on the basis of the first contribution and the second contribution to the heat transfer on the rotor.

column12: SHARED PREDICTION ENGINE FOR MACHINE LEARNING MODEL DEPLOYMENT
column13: There are provided systems and methods for a shared prediction engine for machine learning model deployment. A service provider may provide AI hosting platforms that allow for clients, customers, and other end users to upload AI models for execution, such as machine learning models. A user may utilize one or more user interfaces provided to a client device by the service provider to select machine learning models to perform predictive services based on input features provided in an input string. Thereafter, a machine learning engine may host and execute the models during an instance of the engine provided to the client device. The engine may then process the input features in a processing thread remotely from the client device during the instance so that machine learning predictions may be determined. Thereafter, an output string for the predictions and model explanations may be provided to the client device.

column12: Large screen index data design method

column12: BI-DIRECTIONAL QUANTUM ANNEALING IN MARKOV RANDOM FIELDS FOR MACHINE LEARNING IN IMAGE ANALYSIS
column13: Methods, systems, and apparatus for a bi-directional quantum annealing approach to Markov random field networks for machine learning in image analysis. In one aspect, a method includes obtaining training data comprising features extracted from a first set of images; training a deep quantum restricted Boltzmann machine (QRBM) comprising multiple layers using the training data, the training comprising layer-wise training of the multiple layers, wherein training each layer of the multiple layers comprises evaluating a restricted Boltzmann machine (RBM) probability distribution using bi-directional quantum annealing; and validating the trained deep QRBM using test data comprising features extracted from a second set of images.

column12: Automatic Image Conversion
column13: Techniques are disclosed for automatically converting a layout image to a text-based representation. In the disclosed techniques, a server computer system receives a layout image that includes a plurality of portions representing a plurality of user interface (UI) elements included in a UI design. The server computer system transforms, via executed of a trained residual neural network (ResNet), the layout image to a text-based representation of the layout image that specifies coordinates of bounding regions of the plurality of UI elements included in the UI design, where the text-based representation is usable to generate program code executable to render the UI design. The disclosed techniques may advantageously automate one or more portions of a UI design process and, as a result save time and computing resources via the execution of an image to text-based conversion ResNet machine learning model.

column12: System and method for detecting presence of illness symptoms
column13: A system and method for collecting symptomatic data to screen for a targeted disease. Testing hardware incorporates a plurality of testing units with corresponding indicators that can be altered to indicate whether a symptom is present or not. The resulting data from the testing use can then be analyzed to determine the likelihood of presence of a disease.

column12: System For Asynchronously Providing Content From One Or More Authors For Spaced Repetition
column13: An asynchronous content delivery system is provided that pushes messages or notifications of content designed for spaced repetition. Machine learning may be used to create, select and prioritize the messages/notifications. The asynchronous content delivery system may support asynchronous promotion of the content to the user. The asynchronously delivered content may be at least partially derived from a conversation agent operating on a user device. In another example, the content may be created or selected independently by a plurality of content providers and artificial intelligence algorithms. The content may be classified in sets according to a set of rules of combination. The content may be asynchronously delivered to end user devices according to a set of rules of delivery. The rules of delivery may influence a manner in which the content, or a representation thereof, is manifest on the end user devices.

column12: NETWORK-IMPLEMENTED COMMUNICATION SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column13: A network-based communication system that includes a dynamic attribution platform using Artificial Intelligence (AI), for identifying a state of a user, at a given moment, while the user is engaged in a product transaction or search journey. Based on analysis provided by the Artificial Intelligence, the system provides a series of gesture driven prompts to the user to capture the specific information from the user to allow for the product transaction to occur or journey to continue.

column12: Digital campus establishing method based on virtual reality technology
column13: The invention discloses a virtual reality technology-based digital campus establishment method. The method comprises the following steps of S1, demand analysis; s2, system design: carrying out the overall design of the virtual campus and the system, including the layout of the virtual campus, an interactive interface, a functional module and the like, and determining a virtual reality technology platform and equipment to be used; s3, virtual environment modeling: modeling a virtual campus environment by using a virtual reality software tool to ensure the fineness and reality sense of modeling; s4, designing a virtual character and a role; s5, adding a function module; s6, interaction elements are added; s7, performing user interaction design; s8, virtual reality equipment configuration; s9, testing and optimizing; s10, online training and propaganda are carried out; and S11, performing subsequent maintenance and updating. According to the invention, a flexible, personalized and innovative learning environment can be provided, the learning effect and education quality of students are improved, and a more efficient teaching and management tool is provided for teachers and school managers.
column14: TECH TRAINING BRANCH GUANGXI ZHUANG AUTONOMOUS REGION COMMUNICATION INDUSTRY SERVICE CO LTD
column15: LUO JIAN;;HE CHUANZHONG;;ZHOU YI;;NA WEINING;;LYU YASHENG

column12: Building special part construction drilling system based on virtual reality
column13: The invention discloses a building special part construction drilling system based on virtual reality. The system comprises a resource management module, a scene construction module, an interaction module and a positioning module. The resource management module is used for managing equipment and data; the scene construction module is used for constructing a virtual three-dimensional scene; the interaction module is used for acquiring user operation and performing operation analysis; and the positioning module is used for acquiring space coordinate data in real time when the user performs operation, and performing marking in the virtual three-dimensional scene. The virtual reality technology is adopted for three-dimensional modeling, the display effect is more excellent, and immersive effect experience is provided; various complex interaction functions are realized, and the interaction design requirements of special parts of a building are met; geological factors and position information are combined, and the rationality of a module construction scheme is considered more comprehensively; and the information is gathered to the resource management module to provide a basis for actual construction.

column12: Enterprise migration park investment attraction analysis method based on artificial intelligence algorithm
column13: The invention relates to an enterprise migration park investment attraction analysis method based on an artificial intelligence algorithm. Migration enterprise features are optimized and reconstructed based on an artificial intelligence algorithm, so that different features of an enterprise are better displayed from various different angles, and an investment attraction judgment basis is better provided for investment attraction personnel. The method comprises the following steps: 1) arranging and migrating an enterprise feature data set; 2) normalizing the migration enterprise feature data set, and processing the migration enterprise feature data set into numerical value type features which can be identified by an algorithm; 3) inputting the sorted data set into a PCA (principal component analysis) algorithm for feature optimization and dimension reduction; 4) dividing a feature set obtained through PCA processing into a training set and a test set; and 5) inputting the training set into an LSSVM classification model for training, training a distinguishing boundary of migrated and non-migrated enterprises, then testing the accuracy of the distinguishing boundary analyzed by the LSSVM model by using test data, obtaining a classification boundary of the migrated and non-migrated enterprises, and predicting and judging the migration trend of the enterprises.
column15: KANG QI;;WANG DONGQIANG;;ZHANG XU;;LIU XINYUE;;MA HUAN;;ZHAO FENGLI;;XU WENRUI;;WANG ZELIN

column12: PREDICTING FRACTIONAL FLOW RESERVE FROM ELECTROCARDIOGRAMS AND PATIENT RECORDS
column13: Computer-implemented systems and methods are provided for supplying electrocardiograms and identified patient information to an artificial intelligence engine comprising a neural network configured with a fractional flow reserve prediction model and that predicts a calculated fractional flow reserve for the patient, from which a predicted occurrence of one or more cardiac events is determined.

column12: AUTOMATED APPAREL DESIGN USING MACHINE LEARNING
column13: Aspects of the present disclosure provide systems, methods, and computer-readable storage media facilitating automated apparel design using deep learning techniques. For example, user instructions may be received as text data (or converted to text data from audio data representing user speech), and natural language processing (NLP) may be performed on the text data to interpret the user instructions. An apparel design may be generated in real-time/substantially real-time based on the user instructions. For example, the interpreted user instructions may be provided as input to at least one machine learning (ML) model that is configured to determine one or more visual apparel elements based on the user instructions and to generate the apparel design based on the visual apparel elements. One or more operations may be initiated based on the apparel design.
column15: AGARWAL PAYAL;;DAGA VAIBHAV KUMAR;;RANE PARAG;;RAO PRASANNA SRINIVASA;;PANJWANI RATAN YASHWANT

column12: Test bench for multi-type data information interaction design
column13: According to a test bed for multi-type data information interaction design provided by the invention, a processing unit records the total number of times of display by a display unit and the number of times of display of corresponding wrong wiring steps in the experiment. The total number of times of display by the display unit is recorded and can be used for evaluating the practical operation score of an experiment operator. The wrong wiring steps are recorded in the processing unit, so that a teacher can clearly know which experiment steps have high error frequency, and the teacher can conveniently and deeply explain the experiment steps with high error frequency in the later period. The recorded data are stored in a storage unit, so that the teacher can comprehensively know the overall experiment conditions of all experiment operators, clearly know experiment steps with higher error frequency, and explain the experiment steps to the experiment operators in accordance with individual needs, and the learning quality of the experiment operators can be better improved.

column12: Three-dimensional simulation method and system based on virtual reality
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a three-dimensional simulation method and a system based on virtual reality. The method comprises the following steps: creating an equipment initial model based on equipment basic information; optimizing the equipment initial model to obtain a model optimization result; rendering the equipment initial model to obtain a model rendering result; segmenting theequipment initial model to obtain a model segmentation result; importing the model optimization result, the model rendering instance and the model segmentation result into preset software to obtain preset model import information; performing simulation scene building on the preset model import information based on the environment elements to obtain a model simulation scene building result; and performing scene motion simulation interaction design on the model simulation scene building result by adopting a hybrid collision detection algorithm to obtain an equipment three-dimensional simulationresult. According to the embodiment of the invention, three-dimensional display is carried out by combining equipment with VR interactive operation, so that the authenticity of the equipment is improved, and the user experience is improved by using vivid simulation animation.
column14: WUHAN RELABO ENERGY TECH CO LTD

column12: Test bench for multi-type data information interaction design
column13: According to the test bed for multi-type data information interaction design provided by the utility model, the processing unit records the total number of times displayed by the display unit and the number of times displayed by corresponding wrong wiring steps in the experiment, and records the total number of times displayed by the display unit for evaluating the practical operation score of an experiment operator; each error wiring step is recorded in the processing unit, so that a teacher can clearly know which experiment steps have high error frequency, the teacher can conveniently and deeply explain the experiment steps with high error frequency in the later period, and the recorded data are stored in the storage unit. According to the technical scheme, a teacher can comprehensively know the overall experiment conditions of all experiment operators and clearly know which experiment steps make mistakes more, so that the experiment operators can be explained by teaching mistakes, and the learning quality of the experiment operators can be better improved.

column12: Electronic Zheng with artificial intelligence algorithm
column13: The invention provides an electronic Zheng with an artificial intelligence algorithm. Vibration and pressing of strings are captured through an electronic sensor, and sound is triggered in an electronic data mode, so the limitation of an existing electro-acoustic Zheng mainly based on pickup and sound amplification is broken through, and comprehensive digitization of Zheng musical instruments is achieved. According to the brand-new electronic Zheng, the pitches of the strings can be replaced immediately through a computer technology; tracking, analyzing and learning of preference fingering ofa player are carried out in an artificial intelligence operation mode, fingering conforming is made to the artistic thought of the player in real time, and a sound instruction of the player is triggered; the background accompaniment sound can be automatically analyzed and matched according to the sound layer relationship played by the player, music creation teaching is assisted, and the immediateplaying ability of the player is stimulated and cultivated; most audio working software on the market is compatible, so that the electronic Zheng becomes a tool for electronic music creation; and an open source data transmission protocol function is provided, man-machine interaction design is supported, and multiple data transmission modes are provided.

column12: Urban underground space development and construction platform based on geological big data
column13: The invention discloses an urban underground space development and construction platform based on geological big data. According to the method, multi-source data is spatialized, systematized and visualized on the basis of obtaining various basic information of a city through data collection, sorting, secondary development and supplementary exploration of the system, the intelligent analysis evolution ability is given to the multi-source data, design and construction of a city geological database and a visualized analysis platform are completed step by step, and the method has the advantages of being high in practicability and easy to popularize. Technical application research of geological big data in urban underground space development is promoted, and on the basis, a technical system integrating geological environment information input, spatial data output and management, large-area real-time monitoring and professional model evolution prediction analysis is established. And data reference and scientific basis are provided for urban underground space development and construction, urban safety, urban planning and function layout, environmental governance and the like.
column14: NANNING SURVEY & DESIGN INST GROUP CO LTD

column12: Digital twin modeling system capable of performing cooperative work
column13: The invention discloses a digital twinning modeling system capable of performing cooperative work, and relates to the technical field of digital twinning, and a system framework sequentially comprises a twinning designer module, a three-dimensional visual design module and a preview publishing module from bottom to top, the twinborn designer module comprises an application project management sub-module, a twinborn design sub-module, a twinborn business arrangement sub-module, a twinborn preview release sub-module and a third-party tool integration sub-module; the three-dimensional visual design module comprises a geometric model import and management sub-module, a scene primitive import and edit sub-module and an interaction control edit sub-module, and the preview release module comprises a preview sub-module and a release sub-module. According to the digital twinborn modeling system capable of performing cooperative work, the twinborn designer module, the three-dimensional visual design module and the preview publishing module are arranged to develop and construct a digital twinborn, so that the development process of a product is accelerated, and the effectiveness and economical efficiency of development and production are improved.

column12: Human-computer interaction method, device and equipment and computer readable storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a man-machine interaction method, device and equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps that a man-machine interaction object is obtained, and object attributes are set; the man-machine interaction object comprises a picture, a video, a man-machine interaction design prototype, a VR scene and/or AR; setting a switching mode based on the attribute of the man-machine interaction object and a user demand; and completing man-machine interaction based on the set switching mode. In this way, user-defined switching of the man-machine interaction objects is achieved.

column12: MACHINE LEARNING MOBILE DEVICE LOCALIZATION
column13: A machine-learning localization scheme is provided. Calibration data is received from a plurality of vehicles, the calibration data including wireless data indicative of locations of mobile devices within the plurality of vehicles, ground truth data with respect to the locations of the mobile devices, and contextual information with respect to one or more of operating system versions of the mobile devices or battery levels of the mobile devices. A machine-learning model is trained using the wireless data and the contextual information as inputs and the ground truth data as output. Responsive to an error rate for the machine-learning model being within an error target, the machine-learning model is provided to the plurality of vehicles.
column15: ELANGOVAN VIVEKANANDH;;HASSANI ALI;;ARADHYULA HEMANTH YADAV;;GOLGIRI HAMID M;;VAN WIEMEERSCH JOHN ROBERT

column12: PLAQUE DETECTION METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR IMAGING OF CELLS
column13: Method and apparatus for performing a plaque detection by using above focus and below focus images. Plaque is also detected by a method and apparatus using test and training data captured on an imaging system, building a new model for a specific virus/cell/protocol type to detect plaques, using the models in runtime systems to detect plaques and augmenting the models based on automatically calculated false positive and false negative counts and percentages taken from test runs and/or runtime data.

column12: Automatic user interface data generation
column13: Techniques are disclosed relating to automatically synthesizing user interface (UI) component instances. In disclosed techniques a computer system receives a set of existing UI elements and a set of design rules for the set of existing elements, where design rules in the set of design rules indicate one or more allowed states for respective UI elements in the set of existing UI elements. The one or more allowed states may correspond to one or more visual characteristics. Using the set of existing UI elements, the computer system may then automatically generate a plurality of UI component instances based on the set of design rules, where a respective UI component instance includes a first UI element in a first allowed state. The computer system may then train, using the plurality of UI component instances, a machine learning model operable to automatically generate UI designs.
column15: SCHOPPE OWEN WINNE;;ROHDE SÖNKE;;LONSDORF BRIAN J;;LUNDIN JESSICA;;WOODWARD DAVID J;;ROSS ALAN MARTIN;;SOLLAMI MICHAEL

column12: System and method for realizing data synchronization optimization processing in big data environment
column13: The invention relates to a system for realizing data synchronization optimization processing in a big data environment. The system comprises an initialization module used for performing database initialization and data platform configuration installation; a dynamic monitoring data design module used for monitoring logs of a database to obtain data in a mode of simulating a slave machine serving asthe database; a real-time task configuration module used for monitoring a data source in real time according to the configuration in the dynamic monitoring data design module; and a data change datasynchronization module used for realizing real-time update synchronization of the target database and the data source data in combination with the dynamic monitoring data design module. The inventionfurther relates to a data synchronization optimization processing method in the big data environment. By adopting the system and the method for realizing data synchronization optimization processing in the big data environment, data is acquired by simulating a mode of becoming master and slave equipment and monitoring logs of a source library, and timely synchronous change of the data is realizedby acquiring each executed adding, deleting and modifying script and data before and after modification.

column12: Particle beam treatment system, particle beam treatment management system and method
column13: According to an embodiment, a particle beam treatment system has: a CT device that is a three-dimensional image acquisition part installed in a treatment room for acquisition of a three-dimensional internal image on a day of treatment; a dose distribution display part that displays a dose distribution in the three-dimensional image acquired on the day of treatment and a dose distribution in treatment plan data designed in advance; a treatment management device that is a selection part to select whether or not to change the treatment plan data based on the dose distribution in the three-dimensional image acquired on the day of treatment and the dose distribution in treatment plan data designed in advance; and an irradiation part that irradiates an affected part with a particle beam according to the treatment plan data based on selection made by the treatment management device.
column32: Mori et al., “Patient Handling System For Carbon Ion Beam Scanning Therapy,” Journal Of Applied Clinical Medical Physics, vol. 13, No. 6, 2012.

column12: Graphite ore carbon grade prediction method based on deep learning
column13: The invention provides a graphite ore carbon grade prediction method based on deep learning, comprising the following steps: S1, randomly sampling ore samples in a graphite mine to obtain image data, and making a graphite ore carbon grade data set; s2, performing data preprocessing on the acquired image data; s3, a Pairwise-OfficientNet deep learning model is constructed, and the Pairwise-OfficientNet deep learning model is constructed; s4, training the primary ore training set and the oxidized ore training set by using the deep learning model; and S5, testing the trained primary ore model and the trained oxidized ore model by using test sets corresponding to the data sets, and performing grade prediction on a single graphite ore image. According to the method, grade prediction can be carried out on untrained graphite ore pictures by constructing a large graphite ore carbon grade data set training network model, and grade prediction of the graphite ore can be carried out by adopting a graphite prediction algorithm based on deep learning only by photographing and sampling a graphite ore with an unknown grade, so that the graphite ore grade prediction efficiency is greatly improved. And intelligentization of graphite ore carbon grade prediction is realized.
column14: LUOBEI YUNSHAN LONGXING GRAPHITE DEV CO LTD

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AUTOMATIC MODIFICATION OF A USER INTERFACE
column13: A system and method of user interface modification, and more particularly a system and method of automatically modifying a user interface to improve the quantitative evaluation of the user interface.

column12: DETERMINING DESIGN DATA FOR A JIG
column13: A computer-implemented method is disclosed. The method comprises receiving object data relating to a three-dimensional object generated or to be generated using an additive manufacturing apparatus, the object data including details of an aperture in a surface of the three-dimensional object; determining, based on the object data, design data for a jig to engage the object and to form a fluid communication channel between the aperture in the surface of the three-dimensional object and an interface of an airflow control mechanism, the airflow control mechanism to cause a flow of air through the aperture; and providing the design data for delivery to an additive manufacturing apparatus to generate the jig. A jig is also disclosed.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR THRUST DETERMINATION IN AN AIRCRAFT ENGINE
column13: Approaches are provided that evaluate overall engine thrust and potentially other engine operating parameters statically on the ground for an engine. The results of the evaluation are used to produce a correlated analytical model that accurately models engine performance. Once testing on the ground is complete and correlated model determined, the engine is placed aboard an aircraft and tested in flight. Thrust of the engine can be determined at least in part using the correlated model and this determined thrust is compared to the desired thrust.
column15: DRODOFSKY MATTHEW;;DREIKOSEN ANDREW J;;BLAKEMAN LANCE K;;MCCLAIN MICHAEL B;;OSTDIEK DAVID M;;SPRUILL JEFFREY S

column12: Curved surface model generation method and apparatus
column13: A curved surface model generation method and apparatus in a three-dimensional (3D) scenario are provided. The method includes obtaining a curved surface parameter inputted for a to-be-generated curved surface model; and obtaining two-dimensional coordinates of a plurality of sampling points. A first dimensional direction of each sampling point is a direction of a chord corresponding to an arc at a radial cross section of the curved surface model. A second dimensional direction is a curved-surface width direction of the curved surface model. The method also includes determining, for each sampling point, a coordinate value of the sampling point in a third dimensional direction based on the curved surface parameter, the third dimensional direction being perpendicular to the first dimensional direction and the second dimensional direction; and generating the curved surface model based on coordinate values of each sampling point in the first, second, and third dimensional directions.
