column12: Multi-platform pattern-based user interfaces
column13: Techniques are provided for encapsulating a user experience design for user interfaces of an application, where the user experience design comprises a look and feel of the application and a plurality of functional elements of the application. A plurality of rules for implementing the one or more user interfaces may be defined, and the rules may be based at least in part on the user experience design. Additionally, a pattern may be generated based at least in part on the plurality of rules. The pattern may be deployed to a distributed network of computing devices, and reused in the design of multiple other applications. The new user interfaces for those applications may be generated based at least in part on the pattern, where the additional applications comply with the look and feel and the plurality of functional elements of the other applications that share the pattern.
column32: U.S. Appl. No. 15/497,701, “Non-Final Office Action”, dated Feb. 20, 2019, 12 pages.;;U.S. Appl. No. 15/497,701, “Notice of Allowance”, dated Jun. 3, 2019, 6 pages.

column12: IoT Protocol converter for communication between IoT-based device and server and its protocol conversion method
column13: The present invention relates to a protocol converter for communication between an IoT-based device and a server and a protocol conversion method thereof. According to the present invention, the protocol converter for communication between a first IoT-based device and a server comprises: a protocol editor installed in the server or a front end of the server and defining and registering a data format corresponding to a communication protocol of the first device according to a predetermined format; and a semantics module installed in the server or the front end of the server, defining a communication protocol process between the first device and the server, which is performed by using the communication protocol of the first device defined by the protocol editor, and converting a protocol object and data received from the first device, which are performed by the communication protocol process, into a protocol object and data of a second device different from the first IoT-based device. Accordingly, the protocol converter provides effects immediately implemented by protocol definition, semantics definition, and UI design which are parts of a design stage. In addition, a separate link conversion program to link heterogeneous protocols is not required and automatic conversion programs are generated according to the protocol definition, thereby maximizing maintenance/maintenance efficiency.

column12: Automobile CMF model evaluation system and method based on VR technology
column13: The invention discloses an automobile CMF model evaluation system and method based on the VR technology, the evaluation system comprises a computer, a head display device, an evaluation platform and a seat system, and the seat system comprises a seat body, a seat sensing module and a seat control system. The evaluation method comprises the following steps: 1) adjusting the position of the seat body; (2) the relative position of a seat in the automobile 3D model coincides with the position of a seat body; 3) after entering the evaluation platform, an evaluator wears a head display device and carries out evaluation.According to the method, the evaluator can stay in the data model and observe the design and the structure of the vehicle so as to evaluate the visual design and the object shielding condition of the vehicle, and therefore the evaluation efficiency of the vehicle model is greatly improved.

column12: Currency reduction for predictive human resources synchronization rectification
column13: A method and system for repairing data with incongruent or incompatible types that detects anomalies in human resources data, and if anomalies are present in the data, then suggests to a user corrections and synchronizing actions that better match patterns in the data, specifically listing reasons why the data is potentially erroneous and justifies the suggestion based on objective data to aid the user in accepting corrections and synchronizing actions or performing further review and analysis on the data using the method and system.

column12: DATA-DRIVEN DOMAIN CONVERSION USING MACHINE LEARNING TECHNIQUES
column13: Optimizing seismic to depth conversion to enhance subsurface operations including measuring seismic data in a subsurface formation, dividing the subsurface formation into a training area and a study area, dividing the seismic data into training seismic data and study seismic data, wherein the training seismic data corresponds to the training area, and wherein the study seismic data corresponds to the study area, calculating target depth data corresponding to the training area, training a machine learning model using training inputs and training targets, wherein the training inputs comprise the training seismic data, and wherein the training targets comprise the target depth data, computing, by the machine learning model, output depth data corresponding to the study area based at least in part on the study seismic data; and modifying one or more subsurface operations corresponding to the study area based at least in part on the output depth data.
column32: Li, S., Liu, B., Ren, Y., Chen, Y., Yang, S., Wang, Y., & Jiang, P. (2019). Deep-learning inversion of seismic data. arXiv preprint arXiv:1901.07733. (Year: 2019)

column12: High-speed PCI (Peripheral Component Interconnect) Express switching driving unit for ATCA (Advanced Telecom Calculation Architecture)
column13: The invention discloses a high-speed PCI Express switching driving unit applied to an ATCA architecture, which comprises a pinch plate, two groups of sockets, one group of sockets and a processor blade, wherein the two groups of sockets are interconnected with a plug in a ZONE 3 on the processor blade, and the other group of sockets are connected with a plug in the ZONE 3 on a single board beforeswitching; and the switching front single board comprises a plug in the ZONE 3, a signal driving assembly, a PCI Express slot and a power supply assembly. According to the invention, various functional cards can be conveniently installed, used, tested and debugged in the ATCA architecture, and the application fields of various PCI Express functional cards are expanded. Meanwhile, the application field of the ATCA architecture is expanded, and the application cost is reduced, so that the ATCA architecture is not only applied to the traditional telecommunication field, but also can be applied tothe emerging fields of artificial intelligence, high-performance calculation, big data processing and the like.
column14: BEIJING HSERA TIMES TECH CO LTD

column12: Image adaptive generation method and system based on artificial intelligence
column13: The invention discloses an image self-adaptive generation method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining prototype drawing features of a high-fidelity visual design draft generated by a designer, inputting the prototype drawing feature information into a high-fidelity visual design draft style analysis module, obtaining a high-fidelity visual design draft style, and carrying out the recognition of the high-fidelity visual design draft. And the designer design and the high-fidelity visual design draft design are obtained and input into the generated image analysis module, and a generated image analysis result is obtained. And according to the image conception information and different generation areas, obtaining a key generation area and corresponding frame size and position information. And inputting the frame size and position information into a generation accuracy analysis module to obtain different pieces of generation accuracy requirement information. And automatically generating the high-fidelity visual design manuscript of the designer by adopting the high-fidelity visual design manuscript style analysis result, the generated image analysis result and different pieces of generation accuracy requirement information. According to the invention, the processing and generating efficiency of the high-fidelity visual design draft is improved.

column12: Buried point data design method and system
column13: The invention discloses a buried point data design method and system, and the method comprises the steps: detecting an operation behavior of a user, and generating extended data based on the operation behavior; expanding the HTTP protocol based on the expansion data to generate expansion protocol data; sending the HTTP request to an interface gateway server, wherein burying point data pre-generated by an extension protocol is attached in the HTTP request; extracting burying point data and service data in the HTTP request based on an interface gateway server, distributing the burying point data to a universal burying point analysis system, and distributing the service data to a service system; and analyzing a result returned by the service system, and completing data point burying operation. According to the embodiment of the invention, no extra SDK is introduced, the extended data is attached to the normal Http service request, and the data is stripped by the interface gateway, so that the intrusion of a service system is low; and batch industry data is supported, the debugging cost of the data point burying process is reduced, and the data delay is reduced.

column12: AUTOMATED MACHINE LEARNING PIPELINE DEPLOYMENT
column13: Techniques for self-serve machine learning are provided. A request to deploy a machine learning model is received, where the request specifies whether to deploy the machine learning model for batch inferencing or real-time inferencing. In response to determining that a deployment pipeline for the machine learning model is not available, a deployment pipeline is instantiated for the machine learning model, comprising: retrieving a machine learning model definition from a registry containing trained machine learning model definitions, validating the machine learning model definition using one more test exemplars, and instantiating an inferencing pipeline including the machine learning model. Input data is processed using the inferencing pipeline.
column15: LAMOUREUX PHILOMENA SCHLEXER;;ABID AHMED;;MELENCIO RONALD EVAN CATAIN;;CARPENTER JASON MATTHEW;;YONGSHAN YUAN;;SHUKLA PRAKHAR;;FLESCHE CHRISTOPHER BERNARD

column12: Auxiliary interlocking data design system and method based on station type identification
column13: The invention discloses an auxiliary interlocking data design system and method based on station type recognition, and belongs to the technical field of rail transit signal interlocking computer simulation. Comprising an input data processing step, a station yard topological structure diagram generation step, a general station type data editing and storage step, a special station type data editing and storage step and a matching query output step. Project data designers can conveniently carry out influence analysis, station types with safety risks and influence on operation efficiency can be found as soon as possible, and station type design is fed back and optimized, so that hidden dangers and influences are eliminated from the source; the situation that the data design auditing workload is additionally increased due to the fact that the influence brought by the special station type can only be eliminated through a special design means after discovery in the later interlocking data manufacturing stage is avoided.
column15: ZHANG GUORU;;YANG PING;;YANG FAN;;XIN FAN;;XIE LIN;;JIANG WENYAN;;HUANG HONGBO;;ZHANG GUOWEI

column12: Automatic template and logic generation from a codified user experience design
column13: An automated template and logic generator retrieves a codified user experience design having persona and outcome metadata and a finite state machine. An aggregation engine walks the finite state machine, identifies objects in each state, and selects components that correspond with the objects from a component library. Actions associated with the components are identified, and used to identify API calls that are required to be made to implement the actions. Corresponding APIs are aggregated to create a back-end for front-end (BFF) layer for the codified user experience definition. A pattern is created for a front-end layer for the codified user experience design based on the FSM. A code generator builds components to the objects of the codified user experience design to generate precompiled code, which is packaged with a node.js layer to allow local runtime. The generated precompiled code is versioned and placed in the user experience design repository.
column15: EAST PATRICK;;SATHAYE SUMEDH;;MINARIK JENNIFER;;KOVETZ REUT;;LISAI KELLY

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR CAPABILITY PACKAGES OFFERING BASED ON ANALYSIS OF EDITED WEBSITES AND THEIR USE
column13: A system for a website building system server, the server having at least one processor and a memory, the system includes: an analyzer and updater to construct a promotional package for a user of the website building system according to at least editing history and/or business intelligence of a website belonging to the user, a channel determiner to determine the best mode of interface to present the promotional package to the user and a marketer to modify the website building system interface for the user according to the best mode of interface.
column15: AMRANY ORLY;;YUNGER OMRI;;KAISI ELAD;;LAVIE SHAI;;SHMOOL ITAY
column32: www.webs.com, Website Maker Pricing and Packages - Start Free or Go Premium Webs, March 14, 2014, https://www.webs.com/plans, pgs. 1-4 (Year: 2014)

column12: Vehicle passenger entertainment interaction design method and related equipment
column13: The invention discloses a vehicle passenger entertainment interaction design method and related equipment, relates to the field of vehicle control, and mainly aims to solve the problem that a better design capable of providing entertainment interaction for passengers in a vehicle is lacked at present. The method comprises the following steps: determining predicted driving duration and personalized information of a user; and automatically playing multimedia data for the user based on the predicted driving duration and the personalized information. The method is used for the entertainment interaction design process of the vehicle passengers.

column12: Method for quantitatively predicting microblog forwarding breadth and depth
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of information and data processing, and discloses a method for quantitatively predicting microblog forwarding breadth and depth, which comprises the following steps: dividing extracted features into user features, microblog features and social features, and storing the user features, the microblog features and the social features into a file; reading all processed data, taking 70% of the data as a training data set, and taking 30% of the data as a test data set; extracting features useful for the training model in the training data set; establishing a model by using an improved random forest algorithm, and predicting the forwarding breadth and depth of each microblog; and testing the accuracy of the algorithm by using test set data, and calculating an average absolute percentage error and prediction precision. According to the invention, the propagation breadth and depth of user forwarding behaviors are predicted by using a machine learning algorithm; and the improved random forest algorithm is high in prediction precision, small in fluctuation, and insensitive to various characteristic changes, which indicates that the prediction result has a high reference value.
column32: 魏金太;高穹;: "基于信息增益和随机森林分类器的入侵检测系统研究", 中北大学学报(自然科学版), no. 01, pages 74 - 79;;李勇军;尹超;于会;刘尊;: "基于最大熵模型的微博传播网络中的链路预测", 物理学报, no. 02, pages 020501 - 1;;马晓峰;王磊;陈观淡;: "基于混合特征学习的微博转发预测方法", 计算机应用与软件, no. 11, pages 249 - 252;;周先亭;黄文明;邓珍荣;: "融合异常检测与随机森林的微博转发行为预测方法", 计算机科学, no. 07, pages 191 - 195;;袁得嵛;章逸钒;高见;孙海春;: "基于用户特征提取的新浪微博异常用户检测方法", 计算机科学, no. 1, pages 364 - 368

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR EXTRACTING USER-CENTERED DESIGN GUIDES OF PRODUCTS THROUGH BIG DATA ANALYSIS
column13: The present invention relates to a green kernel black bean paste manufacturing method and a manufacturing method thereof for increased antioxidant potency. According to an embodiment of the present invention, the green kernel black bean paste manufacturing method comprises: an ingredient preparation step of putting a composition for manufacturing soybean paste including 100 parts by weight of soybean paste, 15 to 65 parts by weight of green kernel black bean, and 5 to 25 parts by weight of shiitake mushroom powder into a sealed pouch, and sealing the same to prepare a sealed pouch with ingredients therein; a fermentation cooking step of obtaining a fermented ingredients by fermenting the pouch in which the ingredients are sealed in a fermentation aging method at a temperature of 60 to 95 ℃ for 2 to 10 hours; and a pulverization step of pulverizing the fermented ingredients to obtain a soybean paste sauce.

column12: CROSS-PLATFORM IMPLEMENTATION OF CLOUD-BASED APPLICATIONS UTILIZING NOODL PROGRAMMING
column13: An edge computing operating system (ECOS) computing system, utilizing an ECOS computing device implements cloud-based applications. The cloud-based applications are implemented based on one or more user-defined attributes, or schema, provided by users of the ECOS computing system. The cloud-based applications are implemented by the ECOS system using one or more neuron organic object data language (NOODL) extension files in combination with one or more NOODL data objects created using the received user-defined attributes, or schema. The NOODL extension files generate a mapping of a computer application usable on a user's device. Secure on-line communications are provided by the implemented applications in accordance with applicable privacy laws.

column12: Method and apparatus for recommending cluster UI design using distribution of design elements
column13: Embodiments relate to an apparatus for recommending a cluster user interface (UI) design using a distribution of design elements including an eye position detection unit to detect an eye position of a driver from an image captured through a camera in a vehicle, a visible area determination unit to determine a visible area in a cluster based on the detected eye position, a position of the cluster in the vehicle and a position of a steering wheel, a cluster UI design search unit to search for a cluster UI design related to a shape of the determined visible area in a database, and a cluster management unit to recommend the found cluster UI designs to the driver and apply a cluster UI design selected by the driver from the recommended cluster UI designs to the cluster in the vehicle.

column12: Data format transformation for downstream processing in a data pipeline
column13: A data pipeline configuration system allows industrial data pipelines to be configured using an intuitive visual interface. The pipeline configuration system allows graphical pipeline components representing data sources, data processing, analytic or machine learning models, and emitters to be selectively added to an industrial data pipeline application by selecting these components from a library. The pipeline configuration application is created by arranging and linking these selected pipeline components within a pipeline builder section of the configuration system's visual design interface. The design interface also allows analytic or machine learning models to be easily integrated into the pipeline application and mapped to incoming data items, such that the model is applied and scored against incoming data during pipeline operation. The configuration system also allows the user to configure destinations or data sinks for the pipeline data, including both the incoming industrial data and model scoring results.
column32: Non-Final Office Action received for U.S. Appl. No. 17/365,425 dated Feb. 17, 2022, 70 pages.;;“Solution Overview”, DFML_TWX Integration, retrieved on Mar. 22, 2021, 1 page.;;Final Office Action received for U.S. Appl. No. 17/365,425 dated Jul. 22, 2022, 83 pages.;;Non-Final Office Action received for U.S. Appl. No. 17/365,373 dated Sep. 8, 2022, 56 pages.

column12: RECOMMENDATION ENGINE GENERATION
column13: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on computer storage media, for generating a recommendation engine. One of the methods includes receiving, from a plurality of data sources, input data; generating, using each of two or more propensity models, output data by providing training data from the input data to the respective propensity model; determining, for each of the propensity models, a first accuracy of the respective propensity model using the respective output data; determining, for each of the two or more propensity models, a second accuracy of the respective propensity model using testing data from the input data; selecting, using the first accuracies and the second accuracies for the two or more propensity models, a propensity model from the two or more propensity models; and providing, to a system, the selected propensity model to enable the system to generate a recommendation using the selected propensity model.

column12: AI-based UI interface rapid alignment splicing method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of game development, and discloses an AI-based UI interface rapid alignment splicing method, which comprises element alignment and a hierarchical structure, the element alignment adopts an AI mode, the position where a cut picture should be located is automatically identified according to an effect picture, and the cut picture is autonomously adsorbed to the position where the cut picture belongs; according to the hierarchical structure, a background, a frame body, an icon, a button and a character element are classified from image cutting elements and an effect image result in an AI autonomous learning mode, and finally, the AI can directly output a UI splicing result with a reasonable hierarchical structure according to the effect image through large-scale learning. According to the AI-based UI interface rapid alignment splicing method, the UI design efficiency and accuracy can be greatly improved through the AI autonomous learning UI splicing interface; through the method, intermediate links of development can be effectively reduced, and the UI splicing effect and efficiency of program developers are improved.
column14: SHENZHEN ZIXIAO INTERACTIVE TECH CO LTD

column12: Method for checking visual design effect picture based on UI
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of VR terminals, and particularly relates to a method for checking a visual design effect picture based on a UI. The method is characterized in that training is carried out according to human eye visual feature parameters of a preset number of images and various preset subjective evaluation results to obtain a human eye visual evaluation model, and themodel is a function that the human eye visual feature parameters serve as input variables and quality evaluation results serve as output; the VR terminal acquires a visual design effect picture and extracts human eye visual feature parameters of the visual design effect picture; and the display state of the visual design effect picture is adjusted according to a preset environmental parameter template, and calculating is performed by using a human eye visual evaluation model according to the extracted feature parameters to obtain a quality evaluation result of the to-be-evaluated image and thequality evaluation result is displayed in the adjusted preview state. According to the invention, the visual design effect picture can be previewed conveniently without the help of a specific application and complex and tedious parameter setting and modification.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR EXTRACTING USER-CENTERED DESIGN GUIDES OF PRODUCTS THROUGH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
column13: 본 발명은 인공지능을 통한 사용자 중심의 제품 디자인 가이드 도출 방법 및 그 시스템에 관한 것으로, 기계학습과 같은 인공지능 기법을 통해 소비자의 제품별 디자인 만족도에 영향을 미치는 복수의 디자인 요소를 파악하고, 디자인 요소별 가중치를 산정하여 특정 제품을 사용하고자 하는 소비자가 중요하게 생각하는 디자인 요소를 미리 예측한 사용자 중심의 제품 디자인 가이드를 제공함으로써, 제품 디자인 설계 시 상기 제공한 디자인 요소를 반영하여 소비자의 니즈에 적합한 제품을 출시할 수 있도록 하는 인공지능을 통한 사용자 중심의 제품 디자인 가이드 도출 방법 및 그 시스템에 관한 것이다.

column12: UI generation method based on multi-modal AI
column13: The invention discloses a multi-modal AI-based UI (User Interface) generation method, which comprises the following steps of: acquiring a demand document of an official website of a target website, refining a demand according to the demand document to form a function section according to different functions of a specific UI interface, and performing different-dimension feature extraction on different function sections to form a feature section; carrying out fusion operation on feature sets provided by different function sections to establish a relation between features to form comprehensive demand coverage, and packaging a feature vector required by a neural network prediction model according to a fused feature set result; inputting the feature vector into a UI automatic generation tool with the core being a multi-mode AI technology as a drive to execute a UI image generation function, and predicting a UI image corresponding to a generation function demand; and reviewing the generated UI images with different function requirements, carrying out local optimization by referring to input parameter characteristics for secondary generation according to the defects, and finally delivering the generated different UIs for use. According to the method, the UI design time cost is effectively shortened.
column14: CHINA TELECOM FUFU INF TECH CO LTD

column12: Real-time AR content management and intelligent data analysis system
column13: Described is a real-time content management and data analytics system for AR-based platforms. The data management system described herein manages AR content and user interactions with the AR content. Additionally, a new multiple-stage information augmentation design based on real-time data analysis and live AR interaction is described. In this design, AR content design is very flexible and may be organized into one or more stages containing pre-defined content, on-line searched content, user generated content, other user generated content, real-time user interactively generated content, or some combination. The flexibility content structure brings allows for a high customizable AR experience for each user to maximize user relevance and stickiness. An example application of the system described herein is for interactive advertisements.
column32: Harrison et al., “Pseudo-3D Video Conferencing with a Generic Webcam,” Dec. 2008, IEEE, pp. 236-241 (Year: 2008).

column12: Intelligent Real-time Multiple-User Augmented Reality Content Management and Data Analytics System
column13: Described is an intelligent real-time multiplayer content management and data analytics system for AR-based social platforms. The data management system described herein manages AR content and multiple user interactions with the AR content. Additionally, a new multiplayer multiple-stage information augmentation design based on real-time data analysis and live AR interaction is described. In this design, AR content design is very flexible and may be organized into one or more stages containing pre-defined content, on-line searched content, user-generated content, other user-generated content, real-time user interactively generated content, or some combination. The flexible content structure allows for a highly customizable AR social experience to maximize the system performance and user experience.

column12: Prototype preview method, prototype preview device and readable storage medium
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of electronic digital data processing, in particular to a prototype preview method, prototype preview equipment and a readable storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: receiving an uploaded prototype design, and obtaining a prototype file format of the prototype design; according to a preset format conversion rule, converting the prototype design of the prototype file format into a prototype preview file of a target file format, and generating an online preview address of the prototype preview file; sharing the online preview address to a user side related to the prototype design; and when a user opens the online preview address through the user side, determining a preview permission of the user, and opening a corresponding preview function to the user according to the preview permission. Team cooperation, such as prototype management, prototype change, prototype comment and the like, can be realized when a prototype design team performs prototype design on line.
column14: SHENZHEN DAIMA BROTHER TECH CO LTD
column32: 汪海波 等: "《UI设计》", vol. 2019, 东南大学出版社, pages: 119

column12: Titanium alloy angle sheet part trimming data design method
column13: The invention relates to a titanium alloy angle sheet part trimming data design method, and belongs to the technical field of aircraft manufacturing. The titanium alloy angle sheet part trimming data design method comprises the following steps that 1, selecting a common-mode forming part; selecting parts which can be formed on the same die and have similar shapes and sizes by measuring a digital model of a titanium alloy angle sheet product; 2, respectively designing trimming data of single parts; 3, linearly arranging the trimming data; according to the principle that the parts are optimally arranged and materials are saved, keeping the relative positions of a web surface and a flange surface of each common mode part unchanged; 4, conducting trimming. The invention has the following advantages that the invention can be directly used for batch numerical control machining of the trimmed edges of the formed titanium alloy angle sheet parts with the small outer contour size, batch edge cutting operation of the titanium alloy angle sheet parts is greatly facilitated, and the design period of edge cutting data of the titanium alloy angle sheet parts is greatly shortened; and the manufacturing efficiency of the titanium alloy angle sheet parts is improved.

column12: National data circulation and data right confirmation method and platform based on blockchain
column13: The invention discloses a national data circulation and data right confirmation method and platform based on blockchain, relates to the technical field of data resource transaction, solves the problems of identity authentication and credit through a blockchain account book technology, and facilitates the break-through of an information island through a right confirmation identifier of data. Real-time data collection, credible circulation and clear responsibility are achieved, and it is ensured that data cannot be tampered at will; a digital certificate blockchain, a data circulation record blockchain and a data use record blockchain are provided; a data security house is established; through the blockchain technology, the data security encryption and decryption technology and the big datamodel algorithm technology, the data use test process and scientific research achievements are recorded and stored in the whole process, high-end test data and scientific research achievements are prevented from being lost, data use security is achieved, and a data aggregation and achievement unified management system and data use process traces are achieved.
column14: JUSFOUN BIG DATA INFORMATION GROUP CO LTD

column12: Vibration control and loss reduction interactive design method of high-performance amorphous/nanocrystalline alloy motor
column13: The invention provides a vibration control and loss reduction interactive design method for a high-performance amorphous/nanocrystalline alloy motor, and relates to the field of amorphous/nanocrystalline motor design, and the method comprises the steps: building a corresponding virtual prototype based on a physical prototype, and constructing a twinning data model through employing a digital twinning technology; based on a twin data model, the amplitude, loss composition and temperature rise distribution of the improved high-performance amorphous/nanocrystalline alloy motor are obtained, and state evaluation and redesign of the high-performance amorphous/nanocrystalline alloy motor are achieved; according to the method, a special experiment bench is built, the variable-speed and variable-load working conditions are simulated, the real-time monitoring result of multiple parameters of the high-performance amorphous/nanocrystalline alloy motor under the variable-load and variable-speed confinement working conditions is obtained, and bench experiment verification of the high-performance amorphous/nanocrystalline alloy motor prototype design optimization method is achieved through the real-time monitoring result. According to the method, the corresponding virtual prototype is established through the physical prototype, online real-time prediction of the amplitude, the loss and the temperature rise is realized, and the efficiency of production assembly, debugging and testing is improved.
column15: XU XUEPING;;LIU WEI;;SUN JINJI;;ZHENG SHIQIANG;;HAN BANGCHENG

column12: 3D PRINTED FOOTWEAR WITH IMPROVED COSMETICS, COMFORT AND VENTILATION
column13: The present invention is directed towards customized 3D printed footwear articles and methods for designing and manufacturing 3D printed footwear having improved cosmetics, comfort and ventilation. The improved footwear articles and methods provide greater integration and/or customization of different components. The method used to manufacture the 3D printed footwear can be conceptualized, prototyped, designed both physically and digitally and then finally designed with specific additive manufacturing processes in mind. Upon completion of printing, the components are cleaned and then in any combination, the components are bonded and coated, or coated and bonded to each other.

column12: PI Big data design and construction system of PI information
column13: 본발명은 오프라인 스타일 큐레이션 스튜디오에서 이루어지는 컨설팅 프로세스와 PI(퍼스널컬러, 퍼스널핏, 퍼스널페스 등의 태생적 정보) 정보 를 디지털라이징 할 수 있는 프로세스 정립하고, PI 빅데이터 설계와 구축 시스템으로서, PI(Personal Identity)정보의 취합과 디지털라이징 프로세스 정립단계와, PI 정보들의 빅데이터화를 위한 PI 빅데이터 설계별 정립단계와, 퍼스널컬러 정보측정/진단/스타일 큐레이션 큐레이션 컨설팅 과정 DT화 단계와, 퍼스널핏 퍼스널페이스 정보 측정/진단/결과/스타일 큐레이션 컨설팅 과정 DT화단계와, 온라인 플랫폼(1)의 온라인 컨설팅과 스타일 큐레이션 컨설팅 과정을 DT화하는 단계로 구성된 것을 특징으로 하며, PI빅데이터 구축채널을 통하여 글로벌 뷰티/패션 기업 대상 빅데이터 공급 및 분석할 수 있으며, 오프라인에서 컨설턴트 개인별 능력에 따라 정성적으로 이루어지고 있는 스타일 큐레이션컨설팅 서비스를 DT화 및 빅데이터로 구축하여 뷰티/패션 산업 분야 및 소비자 트랜드 분석에 필요한 PI 기반 스타일 큐레이션 데이터 정량화 및 표준화를 구축할 수 있고, PI 빅데이터는 관련 산업의 인공지능 개발에 필수적인 빅데이터 제공 및 기술개발에 필요한 어플리케이션 솔루션을 제공할 수 있는 효과가 있다.

column12: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR METHYLATION PROFILING OF PREGNANCY-RELATED STATES
column13: The present disclosure provides methods and systems directed to methylation profiling for cell-free identification and/or monitoring of pregnancy-related states. A method for identifying or monitoring a presence or susceptibility of a pregnancy-related state of a subject may comprise assaying a cell-free biological sample derived from said subject to detect a set of biomarkers, and analyzing the set of biomarkers with a trained algorithm to determine the presence or susceptibility of the pregnancy-related state.

column12: Atomic-force Microscopy for Identification of Surfaces
column13: A method comprises using an atomic-force microscope, acquiring a set of images associated with surfaces, and, using a machine-learning algorithm applied to the images, classifying the surfaces. As a particular example, the classification can be done in a way that relies on surface parameters derived from the images rather than using the images directly.

column12: Vehicle-mounted bus communication data design method and device and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to a vehicle-mounted bus communication data design method and device and a storage medium. According to the method, ordered management is carried out on structures, signals, messages and communication data of vehicle communication in four levels so as to achieve auxiliary vehicle-mounted bus communication data design, and the levels and management tasks thereof comprise the steps that a model structure tree of multi-level classification management is built and managed in a layer L1; the layer L2 is responsible for managing a signal database, and defining signal type attributes and signal attributes in the signal database; the layer L3 manages messages and referenced signals in a message database according to the function implementation requirement of the whole vehicle; and the layer L4 is responsible for managing communication data to generate a gateway routing database and exporting communication databases and communication matrixes of a whole vehicle level and a controller level. According to the invention, the problem of communication protocol version management in bus communication design can be solved, the working efficiency of network designers can be improved, and the occurrence rate of artificial low-level errors can be reduced.
column14: SINO TRUK JINAN POWER CO LTD
column15: LIU CHANGLIN;;LI ZHIQIANG;;JIANG WENTAO;;FENG JINDUN;;SHEN WEI

column12: AUTOMATED MACHINE LEARNING PIPELINE GENERATION
column13: Various embodiments of apparatuses and methods for an automated machine learning pipeline service and an automated machine learning pipeline generator are described. In some embodiments, the service receives a request from a user to generate a machine learning solution, as well as a dataset that comprises values with different user variable types, and mapping of the user variable types to pre-defined types. The generator can validate the dataset, enrich the values of the dataset using external data sources, transform values of the dataset based on the pre-defined types, train a machine learning model using the enriched and transformed values, and compose an executable package, comprising enrichment recipes, transformation recipes, and the trained machine learning model, that generates scores for other data when executed. The service can further test the executable package using testing data, and provide results of the test to the user.
column15: BHISE ADITYA VINAYAK;;BOTADRA HARNISH;;JANG JAE SUNG;;ZABLOCKI JAKUB;;LIU JIANBO;;KOLOTEY NIKOLAY;;GROVER PRINCE;;BHARGAVA TANAY;;GOES ARJONA THIAGO;;JOST CHRISTOPHER ZACHARIAH

column12: METHOD FOR SUPPORTING A USER IN THE CREATION OF A SOFTWARE APPLICATION AND COMPUTER PROGRAM USING AN IMPLEMENTATION OF THE METHOD AND PROGRAMMING INTERFACE WHICH CAN BE USED IN SUCH A METHOD
Metadata inspection method, device and equipment for big data platform and medium
column13: The invention discloses a metadata inspection method, device and equipment for a big data platform and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: collecting first running data of a metadata primary library by using test data when communication connection with the metadata primary library in a target big data platform is established; analyzing a running state of the metadata primary library by using the first running data to obtain a first analysis result; when the communication connection with a metadata standby library in the target big data platform is established, sending a target command to the metadata standby library to collect second running data of the metadata standby library by using the target command; and analyzing the running state of the metadata standby library by using the second running data to obtain a second analysis result. Through the method, metadata in a big data platform can be inspected at any time, and running states of a metadata primary library and a metadata standby library in the big data platform can be mastered in real time, so that the user experience can be remarkably improved when a user uses the big data platform.
column14: INSPUR ELECTRONIC INFORMATION INDUSTRY CO LTD

column12: Prototype design method suitable for high-power microwave source and related device
column13: The prototype design method suitable for the high-power microwave source comprises the steps that structural characteristics of a high-power microwave source device are analyzed, and structural description parameters are constructed; based on the structure description parameters, constructing a deep artificial neural network for describing the characteristics of the high-power microwave source device; constructing a training sample data set for training a deep artificial neural network and generating an abstract network model; constructing a prototype identification network model based on the abstract network model and the design target; training and generating a prototype generation network model based on the prototype identification network model; based on a prototype generation network model and a PIC numerical simulation verification method, prototype design of the high-power microwave source is realized. The prototype identification network model constructed by the invention is suitable for a type of high-power microwave source devices, and can be continuously updated and perfected along with the expansion of a training sample data set. According to the prototype design method provided by the invention, prototype design is realized only according to the design target, the design difficulty is reduced, and the design process is simplified.

column12: User interface design update automation
column13: Techniques are disclosed relating to determining a similarity of components of a current user interface (UI) to new UI components for use in automatically generating a new UI. A computer system may receive information specifying a current UI including a particular current UI component and information specifying a plurality of new UI components for a new UI. The computer system may then identify characteristics of the particular current UI component. Based on these identified characteristics, the computer system may score ones of the plurality of new UI components, where the scoring is performed to determine a similarity to the particular current UI component. The computer system may then select, based on the scores, a particular new UI component from the plurality of new UI components for use, in the new UI, for the particular current UI component. Such techniques may advantageously improve user experience by automatically providing up-to-date user interfaces.
column15: SCHOPPE OWEN WINNE;;LONSDORF BRIAN J;;ROSS ALAN MARTIN;;ROHDE SÖNKE;;WOODWARD DAVID JAMES;;LUNDIN JESSICA
column32: International Search Report and Written Opinion in PCT Appl. No PCT/US2021/013167 dated May 6, 2021, 11 pages.

column12: DESIGN TOOL FOR OBJECT PLACEMENT WITHIN A DEFINED ENVIRONMENT
column13: Techniques for providing a unique UI and backend service designed to improve item placement within a defined environment are described. The placement of an item within the UI is governed by rules. Measurement data detailing dimensions of an area is received. An item selection menu within the UI is populated with items in a database. A design layout area, which represents the measured area, is displayed. In response to an item being selected from the item selection menu and being placed at a location within the design layout area, a set of rules is triggered. The placement of the item either does not violate the rules or, alternatively, that placement does violate the set rules. If the rules are violated, then alternative suggestions are provided. If the rules are not violated, then the item is placed at the location.

column12: BIM visual design analysis management platform based on multi-dimensional feature data
column13: The invention discloses a BIM visual design analysis management platform based on multi-dimensional feature data, and the platform carries out the three-dimensional image collection of a designated constructional engineering, thereby constructing a BIM model corresponding to the designated constructional engineering, and further can visually display the connection condition of each bolt connection point on the designated constructional engineering structure. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages that manual climbing ladder observation is not needed, the defects of a manual observation monitoring mode in observation coverage and monitoring safety are effectively avoided, and in the process of monitoring and analyzing the connection quality corresponding to each bolt connection point on the specified building engineering, the connection quality of each bolt connection point is monitored and analyzed from the appearance defect degree and the connection strength dimension of each bolt connection point. According to the method, the appearance defect degree and the connection strength are monitored, and then the connection quality is analyzed by integrating the monitoring results, so that the multi-dimensional monitoring of the connection quality is realized, and the reliability of the connection quality can be effectively improved.

column12: Three-dimensional fluorescence spectrum rapid identification method based on machine learning method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of three-dimensional fluorescence spectrum recognition, in particular to a rapid three-dimensional fluorescence spectrum recognition method based on a machine learning method, and aims to solve the problems that an original PARAFAC analysis program is complex in step and long in consumed time, a large number of related 3D-EEM spectrums are needed to guarantee the accuracy of component classification, and PARAFAC is low in fluorophore analysis and identification efficiency. According to the scheme, the method comprises the following steps: S1, data acquisition and preprocessing: completing collection work of related water quality data according to different pollution source types; according to the method, the corresponding 3D-EEM spectrum is decomposed into the bottom layer fluorescence components by utilizing PARAFAC according to data subjected to three-dimensional fluorescence treatment, the convolutional neural network is selected, the limitation of a traditional chemical analysis method is overcome to the maximum extent, the application range is wide, consumed time is short, the steps are simple, the analysis and identification efficiency is greatly improved, and the method is suitable for large-scale popularization and application. The performance of the model is evaluated by using test data, and the accuracy of component classification is enhanced.
column15: XU XIANGEN;;ZHENG YONGCHUN;;HUAN JUAN;;CHEN LINA;;CHEN YU;;LIAO WENJIE;;SONG TAO

column12: High-rise building shock insulation damping life management method based on data design optimization processing
column13: The invention relates to a high-rise building shock insulation damping life management method based on data design optimization processing, and belongs to the technical field of electronic digital data processing. The method comprises the following steps: classifying each historical vibration moment in a historical vibration time period according to an external vibration degree; obtaining a seismic isolation efficiency sequence corresponding to each category according to the acceleration change degree sequence of the two adjacent floors corresponding to each historical vibration moment in each category; obtaining a target vibration degree sequence corresponding to each category according to the floor vibration degree sequence; according to the seismic isolation efficiency sequence and the target vibration degree sequence, obtaining a target seismic isolation efficiency sequence corresponding to each category; according to the target seismic isolation efficiency sequence, obtaining a data reliability degree corresponding to each historical vibration moment in each category; and according to the target seismic isolation efficiency sequence, the data reliability degree and the target prediction network, obtaining the service life of the high-rise building seismic isolation damper in the future time period. According to the method, the service life of the shock insulation damper of the high-rise building can be predicted in advance.
column14: JIANGSU NANTONG CROWN FIBER NEW MATERIAL SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY

column12: AN ALARM DETECTION SYSTEM
column13: There is provided an alarm detection system for a vessel comprising: one or more processing units each configured to detect one or more of sound, motion, electrical, and visual data and comprising machine learning software configured to accept the data as input and to classify the data as ambient class or alarm class data; a central control unit coupled to the one or more processing units, wherein the processing units are each configured to send an indication to the central control unit when alarm class data is detected. There is also provided a method for monitoring an alarm system on board a vessel.

column12: ADMINISTRATION SERVICES FOR GOALS PLATFORMS
column13: A method of generating customizable goal representation is disclosed. A request from a user to view a goal representation is received. A flexible goal ontology is accessed that comprises one or more goal entities, one or more goal relationships between the goal entities, or one or more goal properties, the one or more goal properties including one or more metadata attributes relating to the one or more goal entities. A set of mapping rules is obtained that defines mappings between one or more goals. The set of mapping rules is evaluated to assemble a customized goal representation tailored to the user. The customized goal representation is updated based on a revaluation of the mapping rules affected by changes to the one or more goal entities, the one or more goal relationships, or the one or more properties.

column12: Adaptive big data analysis method and system for integrated university performance management and personalized student support
column13: The present invention relates to an adaptive big data analysis model and an adaptive big data analysis system for integrated university performance management and personalized student support. With the present invention, a regular and comprehensive university performance management is possible by means of an adaptive data model and an adaptive method enabling linked management between a mid- to long-term university development plan and the budget planning, settlement, and performance of various financial support projects. In addition, it is possible to develop a policy for university core performance index improvement and a personalized student support program through big data analysis model application to student panel data. The system includes: a source data extraction/conversion/loading module (120) extracting data from a source data DB (110) including a university operating system DB, a document file, Internet/SNS data, and so on, converting the data, and loading the data onto a data mart DB (140); a data design module (130) designing the data mart DB (140); a table generation module (150) generating a table containing various indicator status analysis results for performance management from the data mart DB (140); a big data analysis module (160) deriving a meaningful analysis result by applying big data analysis to the data of the data mart DB (140); and a report generation module (170) automatically generating a report based on the table and the big data analysis result.

column12: Animation production system and method for visual art
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of animation production, and discloses an animation production system and method for visual art, and the system comprises an image collection and processing module, an animation generation and editing module, a special effect and rendering module, and a sound design and editing module. Step 2, generating and editing animations; 3, special effect application; step 4, audio synthesis and editing; and step 5, exporting and publishing. The technical threshold is reduced through the automation and real-time preview function, meanwhile, high customizability is provided, a user can freely select and edit image elements, special effects, audios and export settings according to the creative requirements of the user, personalized animation creation is achieved, and by means of the deep learning and image processing technology, the user experience is improved. According to the method, the high-quality visual artistic effect can be generated, the visual attraction of animation works is improved, in addition, time and resource cost are remarkably reduced through automatic and real-time previewing, and efficiency is improved.

column12: Visual rendering method for digital twinborn flood flow field
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of flood flow field rendering, in particular to a digital twin flood flow field visual rendering method, which comprises the following steps: S1, acquiring a flood grid model, and carrying out lightweight distribution on data in the flood grid model; s2, performing visual rendering on a multi-mode flood flow field according to data in the lightweight flood grid model; and S3, designing an interactive mode of the multi-mode flood flow field subjected to visual rendering. According to the method, a high-resolution flood inundation numerical model and a flood three-dimensional visualization rendering technology are coupled, a GPU cluster optimization strategy is brought into full play, visualization expression of multiple types of flood flow fields is achieved, meanwhile, flood details are fully expressed through multi-dimensional interaction design, the flood simulation accuracy is guaranteed, and meanwhile, the flood simulation efficiency is improved. The simulation precision and the visualization effect of flood simulation are improved, and the information bearing capacity of a flood simulation scene is expanded.

column12: System for visually diagnosing machine learning models
column13: Computer systems and associated methods are disclosed to implement a model development environment (MDE) that allows a team of users to perform iterative model experiments to develop machine learning (ML) media models. In embodiments, the MDE implements a media data management interface that allows users to annotate and manage training data for models. In embodiments, the MDE implements a model experimentation interface that allows users to configure and run model experiments, which include a training run and a test run of a model. In embodiments, the MDE implements a model diagnosis interface that displays the model's performance metrics and allows users to visually inspect media samples that were used during the model experiment to determine corrective actions to improve model performance for later iterations of experiments. In embodiments, the MDE allows different types of users to collaborate on a series of model experiments to build an optimal media model.

column12: UI design method and device, server and storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a UI design method and device, a server and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: displaying a canvas for UI design, and synchronizing a plurality of pre-designed basic UI components; the basic UI component comprises at least one UI atomic component in the UI area, and the basic UI component is provided with a configuration item and is pre-developed with a component code; selecting at least one target basic UI component, deploying the target basic UI component to the canvas, and deploying one target basic UI component in one area of the canvas; determining configuration data of configuration items of the target basic UI component; wherein the target basic UI component deployed by the canvas and the configuration data of the target basic UI component form a UI design draft; the UI design draft is used for being combined with a component code pre-developed by the target basic UI component to generate a page code. According to the embodiment of the invention, through the standardized basic UI component and the component code, support is provided for improving the reduction degree of the UI design draft.

column12: Verified templates
column13: A computing system that facilitates approval and validation of executable code between parties. A template including executable code and specifying certain operations and functions to be performed on protected data, as well as constraints thereto, may be verified and agreed upon by parties. The verified template and/or a hash of the verified template may be stored on a blockchain. Prior to execution of the code certain parameters within the template may be filled and validated by a system that will execute the code. A contract, which too may be agreed upon and stored on the blockchain, may also include other terms governing the parties. The filled template may also be validated, and compared against a blockchain version of the template, by the parties prior to execution of the code and prior to access being granted to protected data. Such verifications and validations ensure that data is only operated on, using a secure system, within the parameters as agreed upon by the parties.

column12: Fighting behavior detection method based on geographic video
column13: The invention discloses a fight behavior detection method based on a geographic video. The method comprises the following steps: firstly detecting a fight behavior in a video image through employing a behavior detection algorithm based on deep learning, and outputting the position information of a behavior main body in an image coordinate system; mapping position information in the image coordinate system to a world coordinate system, and mapping dynamic information obtained by the deep learning model to a static geographic space; and finally, automatically marking the position information of the behavior subject in the remote sensing image to complete visualization. Through fusion and visual design of fight behavior detection and geographic videos, position information in a monitoring picture can be accurately mapped to a geographic space, global mastering of the safety condition of a monitoring scene is facilitated, automatic detection of fight behaviors is achieved, detection information is mapped to the geographic space, and automatic plotting is achieved in a remote sensing image map.

column12: METHOD FOR MONITORING QUALITY OF AN INDUSTRIAL PROCESS
column13: The current disclosure describes a method for monitoring a quality associated with an industrial process. The method comprises providing a simulation model of the industrial process, generating a plurality of dataset associated with the plurality of output parameters by simulating the simulation model of the industrial process using test data, selecting a first set of acceptable datasets from the plurality of datasets associated with the plurality of output parameters using one or more predefined quality criteria, and determining at least one of an upper specification limit and a lower specification limit for at least one output parameter from the selected first set of acceptable datasets. The test data includes a second plurality of data sets associated with the input parameters, associated with various probability distributions of the input parameters.

column12: Big data-based usability test methods and devices
column13: 컴퓨터에 의해 수행되는, 빅데이터 기반의 사용성 검증 방법이 제공된다. 본 발명의 방법은, 사용성 테스트에 사용된 태스크에 관련된 정보를 태스크DB에 저장하고, 상기 태스크 DB에 저장된 제1 대용량 데이터를 분류하는 단계; 상기 사용성 테스트에 참여한 참여자 단말에 관련된 정보를 참여자정보DB에 저장하고, 상기 참여자정보DB에 저장된 제2 대용량 데이터를 분류하는 단계; 의뢰자 단말로부터 제품정보를 입력받는 단계; 상기 제품정보와 상기 제1 대용량 데이터를 조합하여, 상기 태스크DB에서 상기 제품정보와 관련된 적어도 하나의 태스크를 검색하 여 해당 태스크를 목록화하여 태스크 목록을 의뢰자 단말로 전송하는 단계; 상기 의뢰자 단말로부터, 상기 태스 크 목록에 포함된 상기 적어도 하나의 태스크에 대한 선택을 입력받는 단계; 상기 선택된 태스크와 제2 대용량 데이터를 조합하여 상기 선택된 태스크와 관련된 참여자 단말에 대한 정보를 분석하는 단계; 및 상기 분석 결과 를 기초로 참여자 조건을 결정하여 상기 의뢰자 단말로 전송하는 단계를 포함한다.

column12: Interaction operation system and method for bare hand and simulation touch screen interface in VR environment
column13: The invention relates to an interactive operation system and method for a bare hand and a simulation touch screen interface in a VR environment. The interactive operation system comprises a trigger, the simulation touch screen interface, a visual tracking unit and a central control unit. After the visual tracking unit tracks and identifies the fingertip position of an operator, the virtual trigger is generated at the fingertip position; the simulation touch screen interface is constructed in a VR environment and is used for displaying UI interface elements according to the received control message; when the central control unit detects that the trigger and the simulation touch screen interface have an intersection, a control message is generated according to the position of the intersection and sent to the simulation touch screen interface; the interaction behaviors of the user with various touch screens in the actual environment can be truly reproduced in the VR environment, and the verification of the interaction design of a multi-device complex scene based on the VR environment is realized.
column14: WUHAN YANGTZE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: System and method based on government grassroots data collection
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of big data information processing, in particular to a system and method based on government basic data collection, and the system comprises a data source management module, a demand management module, a template management module and a task management module. The system and the method based on government basic data collection have the beneficial effects that a series of visual design tools such as a form designer, a process designer, a page designer and the like are included on the basis of model-driven visual application building capability, rich and reusable component assets are built in, and characteristic functions such as one-key release and the like are provided; and grassroots streets or communities are assisted to quickly form the forms.
column14: INSPUR CLOUD INF TECH CO LTD
column15: YANG LEI;;TIAN ZHEN;;XUE QUAN;;LUAN PEIPEI;;CHEN ZHANGJIAN;;WANG XIAOBIN

column12: PREDICTIVE MAINTENANCE FOR TERMINALS
column13: Multiple types of machine learning models (MLMs) are trained on training data to provide predictions of terminal failures. The MLMs are tested on testing data and prediction scores are calculated for the MLMs based on the testing. An MLM having a highest prediction score is selected and deployed to a production environment for a current period of time to provide predictions of terminal failures. Current terminal data is provided as input to the deployed MLM, and the MLM's predictions are provided to an interface, system, or service of the production environment. The current terminal data is also provided to the non-selected MLMs, which generate candidate predictions during the current period of time. At the end of the current period of time, prediction scores of the selected and non-selected MLMs are calculated. A next MLM is selected for a next period of time for deployment based on the prediction scores.
column15: ZHU KUN;;CHEPURI RAJENDRA PRASAD;;MADUPU LAXMI ROHITH

column12: Transformer substation picture bird nest detection method combining ResNet50 + FPN + DCN
column13: The invention discloses a transformer substation picture bird nest detection method in combination with ResNet50 + FPN + DCN. The method comprises: collecting a transformer substation bird nest samplepicture and adding a label; establishing a deep learning network model by combining the ResNet50 network framework model and the Faster R-CNN detection network model with the FPN feature pyramid network model and the DCN deformable convolution kernel; randomly dividing into a training set and a test set; after data of the training set is enhanced, training a deep learning network model of a Faster RCNN + ResNet50 + FPN + DCN network structure, then using test set test adjustment, inputting a solidified bird nest detection model for an image to be detected, and outputting and obtaining a detection result. The method can achieve the automatic detection of the bird nest of the transformer substation, is higher in accuracy, is good in stability, is high in anti-interference capability, is high in universality, is good in robustness, and can be used for an intelligent robot inspection system of the transformer substation.
column14: UNIV ZHEJIANG;;HANGZHOU YUANJIAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AUTOMATED CONTENT CURATION USING SIGNATURE ANALYSIS
column13: Systems and methods are described herein for curating content that follows a narrative structure. A narrative structure comprises narrative portions that have a defined order. Signature analysis of known content that follows the narrative structure is used to train machine learning models for the narrative structure and the narrative portions that make up the narrative structure. Signature analysis of candidate content segments, along with machine learning models for the narrative portions, are used to identify candidate content segments that match the respective narrative portions. A candidate playlist is generated of the identified candidate content segments in the defined order. In one embodiment, the machine learning model for the narrative structure is used to validate the generated playlist.

column12: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR DETERMINING A PREGNANCY-RELATED STATE OF A SUBJECT
column13: The present disclosure provides methods and systems directed to cell-free identification and/or monitoring of pregnancy-related states. A method for identifying or monitoring a presence or susceptibility of a pregnancy-related state of a subject may comprise assaying a cell-free biological sample derived from said subject to detect a set of biomarkers, and analyzing the set of biomarkers with a trained algorithm to determine the presence or susceptibility of the pregnancy-related state.
column15: JAIN MANEESH;;NAMSARAEV EUGENI;;RASMUSSEN MORTEN;;SOLER JOAN CAMUNAS;;SIDDIQUI FAROOQ;;REDDY MITSU
column32: NGO ET AL.: "Noninvasive blood tests for fetal development predict gestational age and preterm delivery", SCIENCE, vol. 360, no. 6393, 8 June 2018 (2018-06-08), pages 1133 - 1136, XP055693729, DOI: 10.1126/science.aar3819;;See also references of EP 3924972A4

column12: Power station boiler ash generation amount online prediction method and system based on LSTM
column13: The invention provides a power station boiler ash generation amount online prediction method and system based on LSTM. The method comprises the steps that firstly, historical boiler ash generation amount and main influence parameters are collected to obtain relational data, and normalization processing is carried out; dividing the prepared data into a training set and a test set in proportion; establishing a boiler ash generation amount LSTM network model, and adjusting internal parameters of the network; lSTM model fitting is completed by using the training set data; performing overfitting evaluation on the model by using test data; and inputting the currently generated data subjected to online sampling into the verified LSTM neural network to predict the boiler ash generation quantity value in the future time. The LSTM neural network can reflect the main parameter weight influencing the generation amount of the boiler ash, so that the prediction of the generation amount of the boiler ash is more accurate. According to the boiler ash generation amount prediction method based on LSTM deep learning, required data can be recorded for a long time, online prediction can be achieved, the prediction period is long, precision is high, and the dynamic prediction requirement of power generation enterprises for the boiler ash generation amount is met.

column12: Software test data design method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a software test data design method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of software testing. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a test file, and inputting test data required to be set by a test case into the test file; configuring a calling label for the specific test data; reading test data required to be set by the test case to obtain a case object; performing attribute judgment on the composition structure of the use case object to obtain a judgment result; and determining a processing result of the use case object according to the judgment result and the calling tag, and outputting the processing result. According to the embodiment of the invention, the test data can be sequentially input, marked, read, judged and processed and integrated, so that the maintenance test time is shortened, the compatibility of a test program is improved, and the operation difficulty of a tester is reduced.
column14: PING AN LIFE INSURANCE CO CHINA LTD

column12: Method and Server for Creating Smart Modular Characters with Dynamic Variability
column13: The present invention relates to a method for creating a smart modular character with dynamic variability, which is performed by a server. The method includes the following steps of: a) generating and displaying center bridge data connecting a joint part separated into first and second elements of a character selected by a user terminal; b) generating and displaying first direction bridge data connecting the first and second elements of the character in a first direction or second direction bridge data connecting the elements in a second direction; and c) receiving a first or second element motion design individually corresponding to the center bridge data, the first direction bridge data or the second direction bridge data, selected by the user terminal, to match the element motion design with the character. Therefore, the present invention is expressing a character having a natural bridge.

column12: Antenna array verification, prototype design and optimization based on machine learning
column13: An example method of estimating angular resolution of an antenna array includes receiving a plurality of values of amplitude and phase of a radio frequency (RF) signal for each of a plurality of antenna elements included in the antenna array; performing a feature extraction operation through a machine learning model to transform the plurality of values of amplitude and phase into a plurality of data points in a dimensionality reduction space; clustering the plurality of data points into a plurality of clusters through a machine learning model; and calculating an angular resolution value of the antenna array based on the clustered data points.

column12: Automated Real-time Multi-dimensional Cybersecurity Threat Modeling
column13: A plurality of communicatively coupled, networked assets of an organization may be threatened or attacked by a cybersecurity attack or other form of attack. Control mechanisms may be installed and established to protect against specific cybersecurity attacks and other infiltrations. Machine learning and predictive analytics are used to more appropriately match specific attacks and threats against specific control mechanisms, accounting for dimensionality of control mechanisms. The matching of attack patterns and control mechanisms may use test scripts that operate on data pulled from the organization's systems of record. A factor analysis of information risk (FAIR) may be performed and visual threat models may be automatically generated that show the mapping between a threat actor, attack type, control environment including dimensionality, the targeted system, and the impact on the organization.

column12: Front-end code generation method and device and computer equipment
column13: The invention discloses a front-end code generation method and device and computer equipment, relates to the technical field of computers, and can solve the technical problems that the code generation efficiency is low and the workload is large due to the fact that an existing front-end code generation mode has a repeated labor part. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a UI design draft file, analyzing the UI design draft file according to a preset file analysis rule, and acquiring first front-end data of each component element in a UI interface; based on a depth-first algorithm and according to the first front-end data, generating first component structured data of each component element; and performing correctness verification on the first component structured data according to a preset verification rule, and if it is judged that the first component structured data passes the correctness verification, converting the first component structured data into a front-end code corresponding to the UI design draft file based on a preset code conversion rule. The invention is suitable for automatic generation of front-end codes.
column14: PING AN INT SMART CITY TECH CO LTD

column12: EXPLAINING ACCURACY DRIFT IN PRODUCTION DATA
column13: A computer-implemented method according to one embodiment includes identifying an occurrence of accuracy drift by a trained model; identifying data associated with the accuracy drift, utilizing a drift detection model (DDM) constructed for the trained model; applying the data associated with the accuracy drift to a decision tree to determine a feature space and specific subset of the data causing the accuracy drift; analyzing a distribution of features within the feature space for the specific subset of the data causing the accuracy drift to determine specific features of the data causing the accuracy drift; and returning the specific features of the data causing the accuracy drift.
column15: BHIDE MANISH ANAND;;LOHIA PRANAY KUMAR;;SAHA DIPTIKALYAN;;KATARI MADHAVI

column12: Human body real-time monitoring health data design life insurance scheme system
column13: The invention relates to the field of data acquisition, detection, analysis and modeling, in particular to a human body real-time monitoring health data design life insurance scheme system which takes an individual health model system and an individual disease prediction model as a core and is provided with a daily health data calling interface, a physical examination data calling interface and a human storage detection data calling interface. An insurance calling interface is arranged to provide life insurance data; and a historical data storage system is also arranged to store monitoring data, so that the data can be conveniently called at any time. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a personal health model based on daily monitoring and detection of a tailored health housekeeper robot; according to the comprehensive data and long-term historical accumulation of the user, intervention plan formulation is given, a data foundation and the accuracy of an individual health model are laid for customizing insurance products, parts which should be weighted and reduced during life insurance formulation are given, and a health insurance scheme suitable for the user is obtained in combination with life insurance actuarial content.
column14: BEIJING MINGXI WUPIN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD

column12: Method for generating data visualization billboard based on image recognition and positioning
column13: The invention discloses a data visualization billboard generation method based on image identification and positioning, and the method comprises the steps: receiving a prototype design drawing and a view type needing to be searched, and the prototype design drawing comprises at least one graph; determining a prediction result of each graph in the prototype design drawing, wherein the prediction result comprises the positioning information of each graph and the credibility probability of the corresponding view type; obtaining positioning information corresponding to the prediction result with the highest credibility probability of each graph; according to the positioning information, distributing each graph to a specified area so as to complete typesetting and layout; the invention further discloses a data visualization billboard generation device based on image recognition and positioning, electronic equipment and a storage medium so as to solve the technical problems that in the prior art, a fixed template is poor in flexibility, the modification effect cannot be confirmed in real time, the communication cost is high, and the working efficiency is low.
column14: BEIJING SMART STARLIGHT INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: LEARNING METHOD, EVALUATION DEVICE, AND EVALUATION SYSTEM
column13: To provide a learning method, an evaluation device, and an evaluation system capable of selecting an evaluation model in a short time.SOLUTION: A learning method for generating a database through machine learning using test data includes: an acquisition step of acquiring a plurality of determination results for the test data previously derived by a plurality of evaluation models; and a learning step of generating, through the machine learning using the plurality of pieces of learning data, a database storing association between the plurality of pieces of test data and a plurality of pieces of reference data based on the determination results, where the test data and the reference data are provided as a pair of pieces of learning data. The reference data has identification information related to the evaluation model which has derived the determination results.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1
