column12: Electric bicycle charging state monitoring method based on artificial intelligence
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of electric bicycle charging monitoring, and discloses an electric bicycle charging state monitoring method based on artificial intelligence, which comprises the following steps: collecting data related to the charging state of an electric bicycle; preprocessing the collected data, and performing feature extraction on the preprocessed data; constructing a charging state monitoring model according to the extracted data features and actual requirements, and training the monitoring model according to the data; evaluating the trained monitoring model by using test data to obtain an evaluation result; the evaluated or optimized monitoring model is applied to real-time data, and the charging state of the electric bicycle is monitored in real time. The accuracy and precision of the monitoring method for the charging state can be effectively improved, meanwhile, real-time monitoring is carried out on the charging state, abnormal conditions are handled, and the charging safety of the electric bicycle is improved.
column32: 胡秀园 等: "基于BP神经网络的电力通信用蓄电池健康状态评价模型", 广西电力, vol. 41, no. 2, pages 44 - 47

column12: C2M-based three-dimensional down jacket decoration personalized customization system and use method
column13: The invention discloses a C2M-based three-dimensional down jacket decoration personalized customization system and a use method, and is suitable for the field of clothing customization. The system comprises a hardware platform, and the hardware platform comprises a touch screen and is used for visually inputting customized information of a product; the hardware platform is connected with the assembly line production node through RFID and is used for pushing customized information and template value data of a product to the assembly line production node; reading/writing equipment is arranged beside the assembly line production nodes and used for reading product machining state information. According to the invention, three-dimensional visual personalized customization interface design, automatic price generation, order pool generation, Internet of Things production node information pushing and DBR production node early warning control are realized. Through three-dimensional visual human-computer interaction design, instant updating of the Web page three-dimensional model is realized according to the body measurement data of the key part input by the customer.

column12: System, Method, and Program Product for Creating and Awarding Tokenized Credentials
column13: The present invention relates to a method, system, and program product related to creating and issuing digital credentials that represent an accomplishment and are linked to one or more digital assets on a peer-to-peer network, such as a blockchain. The method and system combine the features of micro-credentials, scholarships, and digitalization of assets into a single utility.

column12: Data design method and system for track traffic engineering contact rail system
column13: The invention provides a data design method and system for a rail transit engineering contact rail system, and belongs to the technical field of contact rails, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the line fitting according to line data, and obtaining a three-dimensional line and a two-dimensional line; calculating a plane point corresponding to the span of the contact rail to be arranged on the two-dimensional line; projecting the plane points to the three-dimensional line to obtain projection points; obtaining a coordinate transformation matrix of the projection points according to a relation between the coordinate system of the projection points and a world coordinate system; setting a preset insulator model at the corresponding projection point according to the coordinate transformation matrix; and generating a contact rail model according to the arranged insulator model. According to the method, the relative position relation data of each part is obtained according to the line data of the contact rail, and meanwhile, the position relation data obtained through calculation is given to the corresponding contact rail BIM component, so that the workload of BIM design of the contact rail component is greatly reduced, and the working complexity of BIM design is reduced.
column14: BEIJING URBAN CONSTR DESIGN & DEV GROUP CO LTD

column12: House wall 3D printing wall structure, printing house and printing method
column13: The invention belongs to the field of house construction, and discloses a house wall 3D printing wall structure, a printing house and a printing method. Based on house prototype design of a 3D printing technology, adaptive adjustment is performed according to conditions such as a base area, a family structure, terrain and climate on the basis of giving full play to the advantages of the 3D printing technology, and the flexible unit space combination potential is achieved, so that various living requirements are met. The characteristics and advantages of the 3D printing technology are fully applied, the C-shaped wall body serves as a mother question, the openness of the C-shaped wall body is controlled so as to limit different internal functions, furniture, equipment and the C-shaped wall body are integrated, and courtyard space is implanted in the C-shaped wall body so as to further improve the living quality and experience. According to the 3D printing residence, on the basis of structural heat preservation integration, materials, working hours and manufacturing cost are saved, and the 3D printing residence further has unit change adaptability and is a low-carbon sustainable residence product.
column15: ZHU YUAN;;PAN JINLONG;;ZHANG YAMEI;;LUO ZIXIN;;XU JUAN;;WANG HAO;;ZHU BINRONG;;MA LEI;;WANG XIANGGANG

column12: System and Methods for Developing and Deploying Oil Well Models to Predict Wax/Hydrate Buildups for Oil Well Optimization
column13: A method and system for estimating wax or hydrate deposits is desirable for the oil industry and important for assuring flow conditions and production, avoiding downtime, and reducing or preventing costly interventions. The method and system disclosed herein use artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques combined with oil well historical operational sensor data and historical operational event records (such as diesel hot flush, slick line, coil tubing, etc.) to build an oil well model. The method and system enable oil well practitioners to test and validate the built model and deploy the model online to estimate and/or detect wax or hydrate deposition status. By using one or more such models in operating an oil well, users can monitor and/or detect the status of wax of hydrate deposits in an oil well and can optimize production, maintenance, and planning for oil wells.
column15: RAO ASHOK;;CASTILLO PEDRO ALEJANDRO CASTILLO;;ZHAO HONG;;KHAN MIR;;HARMSE MAGIEL J

column12: Heat pipe reactor virtual simulation system
column13: The invention provides a virtual simulation system for a heat pipe reactor, and the system comprises a communication module which is used for obtaining data transmitted by an external system; the data processing module is used for executing different processing steps according to data types so as to optimize the data; the real-time interaction module is used for receiving the driving of the data processing module or the design comparison verification module, importing the original 3D model data/design data, and intuitively presenting the original 3D model or the design data in a multi-dimensional form; and the design comparison verification module is used for carrying out comparison verification on the optimized original 3D model data or design data according to a user instruction. According to the heat pipe reactor virtual simulation system provided by the invention, the visualization link in the implementation process is enhanced, the research and development difficulty is reduced, and the cost is low.
column14: CHONGKARYOTIC WUHAN NUCLEAR POWER OPERATION TECH CO LTD

column12: Electronic delivery of information in personalized medicine
column13: According to an aspect of an embodiment, a computer-implemented method of delivering information-enabled personalized health care with respect to early Alzheimer's disease in a clinical, non-research setting, comprising a social network, may include capturing one or more data streams where each of the data streams relates to health care of a patient, wherein the one of the data streams is captured from testing for certain genetic variations including single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs). The method may further include integrating the data streams to generate integrated diagnostic data and analyzing the integrated diagnostic data to generate analyzed diagnostic data. The method may further include curating the analyzed diagnostic data and generating an integrated report for presentation to a physician of the patient based on the curated analyzed diagnostic data.

column12: Method for creating damage figure using the deep learning-based damage image classification of facility
column13: The present invention relates to a method for generating a damage figure using deep learning-based facility damage image classification, which comprises: (a) augmenting, by an image data augmentation module, the number of acquired image data of a facility; (b) training, by a map learning module, a convolutional neural network (CNN) by using damage image data and non-damage image data, which complete labeling to designate the presence or absence of damage by class and pixel, as training data; (c) automatically classifying, by a damaged image classifier which is a CNN completing map learning, the damaged images by using test image data or arbitrary image data to acquire a damage figure as input data; (d) pre-processing, by a damage image data pre-processing module, the data classified as the damage image, which is output data through the damaged image classifier, to efficiently detect a damage area; (e) detecting, by a damage area detection module, the damage image area to increase accuracy of the damage figure and extract a damage shape pattern for the damage image completing the pre-processing operation; and (f) automatically generating, by a damage figure generating module, the damage figure by repeatedly using a feature vector and short line segment for the damage. Accordingly, since a deep learning technology is applied to detailed inspection of facilities, a method that has been carried out by manpower for a long time is replaced, and thus damage can be recognized objectively, promptly, and automatically.

column12: Route prediction based on adaptive hybrid model
column13: A method, system, and computer program product for obtaining a first route traversed by a target object, performing at least one prediction for a second route to be traversed by the target object based on the first route, the at least one prediction being performed with at least one of an object-specific prediction model, an object group-specific prediction model, and an object-independent prediction model, and determining, according to a decision rule, a prediction result of the second route based on the at least one prediction.

column12: Product operation and maintenance virtual display system based on Internet of Things
column13: The invention discloses a product operation and maintenance virtual display system based on Internet of Things, which relates to the technical field of data processing and comprises a monitoring platform, a database, a material library, a data design module, a finished product evaluation module, an online adjustment module and a scene selection module. The finished product evaluation module is arranged, and expert scoring and system scoring are performed by the finished product evaluation module, so that a designer can obtain an expert scoring result or a system scoring result and also has corresponding scoring rules, the designer can adjust the design process of a designed finished product, and the design efficiency is improved. Therefore, the efficiency of the product design process can be improved, the product can be correspondingly evaluated before being displayed, and the quality of the product during formal display is improved.

column12: Product prototype design method and system based on main drawing board and auxiliary drawing board, medium and equipment
column13: The invention relates to a product prototype design method and system based on a main drawing board and an auxiliary drawing board, a medium and equipment, and the method comprises the steps: when a page is created, a background automatically generates unique main drawing board data with a main drawing board identifier for the current page, and returns the unique main drawing board data to a front end along with the page data; after the current page is created, the background creates corresponding auxiliary drawing board data for the current page according to an auxiliary drawing board creation request sent by the front end and returns the auxiliary drawing board data to the front end; needed components are added to the main drawing board and the auxiliary drawing board, the auxiliary drawing board serves as an interaction target of the components in the main drawing board to make an interaction effect, and product prototype design is completed. The limitation that only a single drawing board exists in one page in a prototype design tool is broken through, and a plurality of drawing boards can be created in one prototype page according to requirements; the interaction effect is made through the auxiliary drawing board, so that primary and secondary contents in the page can be distinguished more clearly; and the content of the main drawing board is not shielded when the interaction effect is made, so that the content in each drawing board can be visually checked and modified.

column12: Front-end code generation method and device, equipment and storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a front-end code generation method and device, equipment and a storage medium. In the method, a UI design file can be obtained, structured data in the UI design file can be analyzed to obtain a first layer tree, and the first layer tree comprises a plurality of original layer elements and an original hierarchical relationship among the original layer elements; according to the first attribute information of the plurality of original layer elements, performing layer reconstruction on the plurality of original layer elements to obtain a second layer tree, the second layer tree comprising a plurality of target layers and a hierarchical relationship among the plurality of target layers; generating style information according to the second attribute information of the multiple target layers, and adjusting the layout among the multiple target layers; and generating an HTML front-end code corresponding to the target page according to the style information of the plurality of target layers and the layout information and hierarchical relationship information among the plurality of target layers. In this way, the UI design file can be converted into the front-end code so that front-end developers can check the UI design file conveniently.

column12: Tray data design method and system for outfitting iron outfitting piece outside ship
column13: The invention provides a tray data design method and system for outfitting an iron outfitting piece outside a ship. The method comprises the following steps: S1, acquiring tray data of ship iron outfitting pieces, and performing primary classification on the iron outfitting pieces based on the tray data and according to ship types; and S2, carrying out secondary classification on the tray data of the iron outfitting piece based on the type of the iron outfitting piece. And S3, the number of the iron outfitting pieces in each type is obtained in sequence, and the proportion of the iron outfitting pieces in each type is obtained based on the number. And S4, determining the mainstream specification of the steel outfitting piece according to the proportion, combining the specifications of the steel outfitting piece according to the mainstream specification, and obtaining and outputting the optimized tray data. According to the method, the tray data of the iron outfitting piece is optimized, the specifications of design, purchase and construction of the iron outfitting piece are standardized according to the optimized tray data, standardized manufacturing of manufacturers is facilitated, meanwhile, the mainstream specifications can be purchased in batches, the types of the material storage specifications are reduced, the steel purchasing period is shortened, and the production efficiency is improved. Therefore, the ship construction period is shortened.

column12: Image design visual communication system based on big data
column13: The invention discloses an image design visual communication system based on big data, and the system comprises a client which is used for assisting a user in carrying out the development of a related system structure, and carrying out the butt joint with a data transmission server through simple parameter filling and function calling; and a design module which is used for calling the design object image from the object database as a basis, calling the corresponding design material from the material database to carry out design in the target object image, and obtaining a corresponding design effect picture. Visual design and transmission can be carried out on the image, the method can be used for field design and effect display, daily design requirements of designers and design teams are met, multiple security encryption mechanisms are adopted in big data transmission, manual configuration of file fragments can be carried out at a sending end, and a service end adopts an instant forwarding strategy; in other words, the server side receives file fragment information, does not integrate the file fragment information and directly pushes the file fragment information to the receiving end, the server side records file transmission, and file integration is carried out at the receiving end.

column12: Virtual sensor for estimating online unmeasurable variables via successive time derivatives
column13: Provided is a processor-implemented method and a processor in a vehicle for estimating the value of a quantity for which a physical sensor is not available for measurement. The method includes: receiving a plurality of measured signals representing values of measurable variables; computing, in real-time, time derivatives of the measured signals; and applying a trained feedforward neural network, in real-time, to estimate values for a plurality of unmeasurable variables, the unmeasurable variables being variables that are unmeasurable in real-time, the feedforward neural network having been trained using test data containing time derivatives of values for the measurable variables and values for the unmeasurable variables; wherein the vehicle uses the estimated values for the unmeasurable variables for vehicle operation.

column12: Facial expression recognition system based on shallow convolutional neural network
column13: The invention discloses a facial expression recognition system based on a shallow convolutional neural network, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence and mode recognition. The system comprises a hardware part and a software part. The hardware part is composed of an intelligent end device, a network transmission device and an image acquisition device, provides support for operation of the system and provides conditions for interconnection and intercommunication of data. The software part comprises a Python module, an OpenCV module and a UI module which are respectively responsible for the functions of model training, image detection, visual design and the like. The invention is inspired by an Xception network, a residual module and depth separable convolution are combined, and meanwhile, a Squery-and Excitation module is introduced to be fused with the network. The fine-tuned network structure is simple, the model is small, and the operation speed and the model precision are considered at the same time. And an expression recognition system calls the model to classify and recognize the captured image, and feeds back the used time, the prediction result, the expression intensity and other information to a system interface to complete one-time facial expression recognition.

column12: System and method for transformer control
column13: A method for controlling operation of transformer system includes receiving, by a controller unit, transformer data corresponding to a transformer. The transformer data includes a plurality of transformer input parameters and a plurality of transformer output parameters. The method further includes receiving, by a digital transformer unit, the plurality of transformer input parameters from the controller unit. The digital transformer unit is a real-time operational model of the transformer. The method also includes generating, by the digital transformer unit, a plurality of transformer output parameter estimates corresponding to the plurality of transformer output parameters. The method further includes controlling operation of the transformer, by the controller unit, based on at least one of the transformer data and the plurality of transformer output parameter estimates.

column12: SYSTEMS, METHODS, AND DEVICES FOR LOW-POWER AUDIO SIGNAL DETECTION
column13: Systems, methods, and devices detect wake signals included in audio signals. Methods include receiving a dataset including raw audio data, the raw audio data comprising a plurality of audio samples and associated metadata, and generating, using one or more processing elements, an augmented dataset based on the raw audio data, the augmented dataset comprising a plurality of annotations identifying types of raw audio data. Methods further include generating, using the one or more processing elements, a feature dataset by extracting features from the augmented dataset based, at least in part, on the plurality of annotations, and generating, using the one or more processing elements, a wake signal detection model based, at least in part, on the feature dataset, the wake signal detection model being a machine learning model trained based on the feature dataset.

column12: Static aesthetics design method for headlamp of passenger car
column13: The invention relates to a passenger car headlamp aesthetic design method, which comprises the following steps: carrying out statistics on dimensions with relatively large influence on the headlamp static aesthetic design, and carrying out priority ranking according to importance; according to the priority and an aesthetic design principle, conceiving an aesthetic design scheme of the headlamp, and determining positions, size and shape boundaries, matching modes and material textures of main parts; 3D data design is conducted according to the position, the size, shape and boundary, the matching mode and the material texture in the automobile lamp design specialty; carrying out aesthetic design verification on the 3D data; the 3D data is optimized; carrying out aesthetic design verification on the real vehicle/sample piece; the static aesthetic design of the headlamp is completed; in the data design stage and the real vehicle/sample piece verification stage, on the premise that the illumination performance requirement is met, the reasonable headlamp static attractiveness design method is formulated, and the forward headlamp static attractiveness design method and process for detailed scheme design are output.

column12: UI design method based on intelligent interaction
column13: The invention provides a UI design method based on intelligent interaction. The UI design method comprises the following steps: collecting user data; constructing a user portrait according to the user data; analyzing the front and back operation information; prompting a user to provide information; processing by adopting a natural language processing method to obtain a processing result; analyzing a user intention according to the processing result; searching related contents to obtain search contents; corresponding services are provided according to the search content; and generating response content, and presenting a response result. The user demand can be better understood, and the more intelligent response service is provided, so that the intelligent interaction efficiency and the interaction quality are improved.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AUTOMATED CONVERSATIONS WITH A TRANSACTIONAL ASSISTANT
column13: Systems and methods for an automated conversation with a transactional assistant are provided. This conversation relies upon initially a set of exchanges being defined. Each exchange connected to every other exchange by bidirectional edge transitions. A response from the conversation target is received, and is processed for natural language understanding (NLU) generate intents and entities. After the NLU, a determination is made which bidirectional edge transition applies, as a function of the intent and the source exchange. Subsequently, the exchange may be transitioned to a new exchange based upon the determined bidirectional edge transition, and a response is formulated using natural language generation (NLG) for the new exchange.

column12: Robot office system
column13: The invention provides a robot office system. The office system comprises an activity control module, a main window module, a function control module and an attribute editing module. The system is based on a .Net technology development platform and a python automation office technology. A visual design module in the system can completely record the process of simulating manual operation in a mainwindow module in a dragging mode; meanwhile, different variables and parameters can be defined in the main window module to declare flows of different logics and algorithms; after the complete processis developed, the process can be executed 24 hours a day to the maximum extent according to the requirements of actual business volume. According to the invention, an automatic computer operation business process can be realized, and visual design and development of different business scenes, business requirements, operation processes, algorithms and logics are completed through a development program set by a client, so office automation of computer operation which originally needs to be completed manually is realized.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR BUILDING THERMAL MODEL OF POWER LITHIUM-ION BATTERY BASED ON ELECTROCHEMICAL MECHANISM
column13: A method and system for building a thermal model of a power lithium-ion battery based on an electrochemical mechanism. The method includes: discretizing a second order partial differential heat conduction equation of a power lithium-ion battery according to a finite differential method, thereby building a thermal model of the power lithium-ion battery; carrying out a dynamic working condition test by using a cylindrical power lithium-ion battery selected as an object, thereby acquiring experimental data such as a temperature, a current, a voltage, and a temperature of a surface of the battery; identifying an electrochemical parameter of the power lithium-ion battery according to an optimal parameter algorithm by using test data acquired in a dynamic working condition, thereby building a thermal model of the power lithium-ion battery; and verifying accuracy of the thermal model of the power lithium-ion battery by using test data acquired in another dynamic working condition.

column12: METHOD OF DETERMINING DISTRIBUTION OF FLUID VOLUME FRACTIONS ALONG WELL BORE
column13: FIELD: geophysical survey.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to field-geophysical research and is intended for determination of volume fractions of fluids along well bore. In compliance with proposed method of determining volume distribution of fluids in well bore for at least one well at least once, training and test data sets are formed for machine learning algorithm, containing distribution of acoustic signals along well bore, structural parameters of well, affecting shape of spectrum of radial resonance modes in acoustic signal, as well as values of volume fractions of fluids corresponding to depth and time of registration of said acoustic signals along well bore. At least one machine learning algorithm is selected with the teacher. At least once, based on the formed training data set, features are generated for the selected machine learning algorithm, containing information on distribution of spectral density of power of acoustic signals along the wellbore, and generating responses containing information on values of volume fractions of fluids along well bore. Specifying the training quality metric. At least once the selected machine learning algorithm is trained on the basis of the formed training set of data, formed features and responses. Then the trained machine learning algorithm is checked for compliance with the specified quality metric using the generated test data set. Acoustic noise is recorded in the wellbore at a given depth interval for given structural parameters of the well and features are formed, which contain information on distribution of spectral density of power of acoustic signals along the length of the well, similar to features used for machine learning algorithm, after which distribution of volume fractions of fluids along well bore is determined using tested trained algorithm of machine training.EFFECT: technical result of invention is high accuracy, veracity and reliability of determining volume fractions of fluids along well bore.10 cl, 6 dwg, 2 tbl

column12: Product prototype automatic design method, system and equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention provides a product prototype automatic design method, system and device and a storage medium, the product prototype automatic design method comprises the following steps: S1, collecting and selecting prototype matching data, and newly establishing a prototype; s2, constructing a system structure of the prototype; s3, setting page functions and structures of all levels of pages based on the constructed system structure; and S4, automatically generating a prototype design after the page function setting of each level of page is completed. Through prototype matching of the newly-built prototype, construction of a prototype system structure and setting of page functions and structures, prototype design can be automatically generated.

column12: MULTITASK DISTRIBUTED LEARNING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON LOTTERY TICKET NEURAL NETWORK
column13: A distributed learning system and method comprises the steps of: obtaining an initial global weight broadcast and applying the initial global weight to a local model; performing a simulation test on a local model using test data obtained in advance according to a pre-designated task to be performed by the distributed learning device;when the local model to which the global weight is applied passes the simulation test according to a pre-designated test pass criterion, pruning in a pre-designated manner for a plurality of elements of the global weight; initializing values of unpruned residual elements in the global weight; locally training the local model to which the initialized weight is applied using learning data prepared in advance according to the task, and transmitting a local weight to the central server; and receiving the updated global weight for the next round according to the local weight in the central server.

column12: User interface for visualizing search data
column13: A user interface (UI) for visualizing search data provides techniques for grouping and organizing aggregate data that shows the categories of topics included in search queries from a large number of individual users. Raw search queries are categorized into one of a number of topical categories. The search queries are assigned to a geographic location based on geolocations of computing devices generating the search queries. The UI presents a map that shows the number of search queries per topical category for each geographic location displayed in the current UI view. As a result of this UI design, a user can easily understand the interaction between geographic location and frequency of search query topics. Trends in the geographic distribution of searches and in the categories of topics searched are also easily understood from this UI design by changing the time range of the search queries displayed.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR USER INTERFACE AUTONOMOUS TESTING
column13: Provided is a system and method capable of automatically testing a website or application for an error in a user interface without human intervention. As an example, in a system for testing an error in a user interface of an application or website, a user interface system that includes a testable action recognizer that obtains a screenshot of a screen of the application or website, manages a layout and a test action based on user interface (UI) configuration and text recognition information from the screenshot, and a test action generator that receives the layout, selects a test scenario corresponding the layout, and performs a test action according to the test scenario, and in which the testable action recognizer manages whether or not a test is progressed for each screen layout according to the test scenario, is disclosed.
column15: HWANG JAE JUN;;PARK HYUN JIN;;LEE JU HYEON

column12: FAILED PHOTOGRAPH IMAGE MANAGEMENT DEVICE, METHOD FOR OPERATING FAILED PHOTOGRAPH IMAGE MANAGEMENT DEVICE, PROGRAM FOR OPERATING FAILED PHOTOGRAPH IMAGE MANAGEMENT DEVICE, AND RADIOGRAPHIC IMAGE CAPTURING SYSTEM
column13: An imaging failure image management apparatus includes a processor that executes data set acquisition processing of acquiring a data set including the radiation image input to a first imaging failure determination device, which is configured by a machine learning model and is mounted on the radiography apparatus, and a determination result output from the first imaging failure determination device, display control processing of performing control of displaying the data set on a display screen, correction processing of performing a correction for the determination result in a case in which a correction instruction for the determination result of the displayed data set is input, and training processing of training a second imaging failure determination device, which is replaceable with the first imaging failure determination device, by using a data set selected from among the displayed data sets as training data.

column12: AN INTEGRATED HEALTH DATA CAPTURE AND ANALYSIS BASED DEVICE FOR EVALUATION, DIAGNOSIS AND PROGNOSIS OF HEART FAILURE
column13: An integrated health data capture and analysis device for assessing heart failure comprises (a) Multipleconfounders adjusted algorithm (b) a device having embedded algorithm for collecting, processing and storing the data from multiple sources to derive and interpret corresponding values of diagnosis (b) connect with central processing unit for personalized care by patient centric -personalized disease management and adverse event prevention counselling system. The present invention relates to the field of diagnostics and more particularly, relates to a device for determining a patient's risk of suffering from heart failure based on the detection of BNP that is adjusted for effect of confounders and hence expected to be accurate. Also disclosed are methods for improving both the accuracy and speed of heart failure risk models by incorporating biomarker data from patient samples.

column12: SEARCH SYSTEM AND SEARCH METHOD
column13: To provide a search system that can easily select a trained model in which an appropriate prediction result is calculated.A prediction unit executes a prediction by each of a plurality of trained models using test data. A similarity calculation unit calculates similarities between prediction results of the trained models as similarities of the trained models. A grouping unit divides the trained models into groups based on the similarities of the trained models. A summary unit acquires features of the groups based on the prediction results of the trained models belonging to the groups. A selection unit presents information according to the features of the groups.

column12: Qt interface and style automatic generation method and system based on HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) file format
column13: The invention relates to the field of Qt interface application program development, in particular to a Qt interface and style automatic generation method and system based on an HTML file format.The method comprises the steps that HTML file data exported by interface prototype design software and resource file data corresponding to the HTML file data are obtained; analyzing the HTML file and the file association relationship thereof to obtain a pre-compilation generation interface; performing class file analysis on the primitives, the primitive attributes and the logic relationship between the primitives in the pre-compilation generation interface to obtain interface primitive list data; constructing a mapping relation between a primitive and a control type of the Qt interface to obtain mapping relation data of the primitive and the control; and automatically generating a Qt interface file and a Qt interface style file based on the pre-compilation generation interface, the interface primitive list data and the primitive and control mapping relation data. Through automatic analysis of the HTML format file exported by the prototype design software, tedious interface layout and interface style debugging are reduced, and the development efficiency of Qt interface application software is greatly improved.
column14: AVIC CHENGDU UAV SYSTEMS CO LTD

column12: Polar meteorological equipment fault detection method based on density peak value and abnormal isolation
column13: The invention provides a polar meteorological equipment fault detection method based on a density peak value and abnormal isolation. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, removing noise data of electric signals of polar meteorological equipment through a density clustering-based method; secondly, mining an electric signal working mode during normal operation of polar meteorological equipment from non-noise data through a density peak value; and finally, performing real-time fault diagnosis on the polar region meteorological equipment through a method of jointly constructing an isolated forest through the real-time electric signal data of the polar region meteorological equipment and the electric signal characteristic data during normal operation. And meanwhile, when the isolated forest is constructed, the isolated tree is selectively constructed through the segmentation proportion, so that the efficiency of the algorithm is improved to a certain extent, and the algorithm can better meet the real-time requirement of digital twinning. And finally verifying the effectiveness and certain advancement of the model by using test data of a rainfall instrument in different low-temperature environments.
column15: ZHU YIAN;;REN JIE;;LI LIAN;;ZHONG DONG;;ZHANG LIXIANG

column12: Coal yard surcharge simulation experiment method and system
column13: The invention discloses a coal yard surcharge simulation experiment method, and the method comprises the steps: selecting a model pipe for simulating a pile foundation used in a coal yard prototype; arranging a model box according to the prototype design result of the coal yard, wherein the design result of the coal yard prototype comprises the material of a pile foundation used in the coal yard prototype and the section size of the pile foundation; hoisting the model box to a centrifugal machine, and hoisting the arranged model box to a hanging basket of the centrifugal machine; starting thecentrifuge and operating the centrifuge for a certain time, and operating the centrifuge for a certain time to simulate the working condition that the coal yard prototype is fully loaded for a certainperiod of time; obtaining simulation data, and verifying a coal yard prototype design result according to the simulation data. The invention further discloses a coal yard surcharge simulation experiment system. Through the method and the system, the design result of the coal yard prototype can be simulated and verified, and the safety of the designed coal yard prototype in the operation period isensured.

column12: System for predicting taking-over cognitive behavior of driver of automatic driving vehicle
column13: The invention discloses an automatic driving vehicle driver takeover cognitive behavior prediction system. The system comprises a takeover alarm signal detection module, a remote point selection module, a non-driving task execution module, an environment supervision decision module, a dual coding cognitive module, a situation awareness recovery module, a lane changing decision module, a takeover control module and a data interaction module. According to the invention, through real-time interaction between a QN-ACTR architecture-based autonomous vehicle driver take-over cognitive behavior prediction system and a virtual driving environment, the take-over cognitive behavior of an autonomous vehicle driver facing a take-over alarm signal under a dangerous working condition is quantified and predicted; therefore, support is provided for rapid prototype design and performance evaluation of the autonomous vehicle. And on the other hand, the takeover cognitive behavior of the driver is predicted through the automatic driving vehicle driver takeover cognitive behavior prediction system, and the driving environment factors influencing the driver cognitive behavior can be deeply analyzed, so that the environment design is better guided, and traffic accidents are avoided.
column15: WANG XU;;GUO LIE;;XU LINLI;;GUAN LONGXIN;;ZHAO YIBING

column12: METHODS AND SYSTEMS FOR DETERMINING A PREGNANCY-RELATED STATE OF A SUBJECT
column13: The present disclosure provides methods and systems directed to cell-free identification and/or monitoring of pregnancy-related states. A method for identifying or monitoring a presence or elevated risk of a pregnancy-related state of a pregnant subject may comprise assaying a cell-free biological sample derived from said pregnant subject to detect a set of biomarkers, and analyzing the set of biomarkers with a trained algorithm to determine the presence or elevated risk of the pregnancy-related state.

column12: Method for creating a colored laser marking
column13: A method (1) for preparing a laser marking system (100) to create a colored laser mark on a specimen comprising the following steps: a) Providing a laser marking system (100) and a specimen (105) comprising a surface layer (105a), wherein the laser marking system comprises a preset number of laser parameters (12); b) Performing an exploration of a first gamut (2) specified by the laser marking system (100) and the specimen (105) comprising a surface layer (105a) including the following steps: aa) Creating (3) a design space (10) with a preset number of design points (11), wherein each design point (11) represents a combination of the preset number of laser parameters (12); bb) Performing (4) a marking of a sample on the specimen (105) for each design point (11); cc) Measuring (5) the sample using at least one detection device (106) and deter-mine for each design point a performance point (14), wherein the measured performance points (14) define a performance space (13); dd) Evaluating (6) the performance space (13) with regard to preset performance criteria using an evaluation device (107), wherein a Pareto front is determined comprising a subset of performance points; ee) Generating (7) an offspring design space (10a) with offspring design points (11a); ff) Creating (8) a first gamut (2) using the subset of performance points forming the Pareto front; wherein the steps bb) to dd) are iterated (9) for a preset iteration number, wherein in each iteration (9) the offspring design space (10a) of the previous iteration is used in step bb), wherein in each iteration the measured performance space is combined (15) with the performance space of the previous iteration (9) such that in step dd) the combined performance space (13a) is used.
column14: MAX PLANCK GESELLSCHAFT;;UNIV DELLA SVIZZERA ITALIANA USI;;MAX PLANCK GES ZUR FOERDERUNG DER WISSENSC
column16: UNIVERSITÀ DELLA SVIZZERA ITALIANA (USI) (2023-01-30);;MAX-PLANCK-GESELLSCHAFT ZUR FÖRDERUNG DER WISSENSCHAFTEN E.V (2023-01-31)

column12: Method for automatically proofreading UI
column13: The invention relates to a method for automatically proofreading a UI. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring and analyzing a UI design draft provided by a designer; obtaining original layer information, wherein the original layer information at least comprises an original layer name; starting a to-be-proofread App, and switching to an actual UI interface corresponding to the UI design draft; starting an automatic proofreading App, receiving original layer information, and forwarding the original layer information to the to-be-proofread App; enabling the to-be-proofread App to extract actual layer information from a current actual UI interface, wherein the actual layer information at least comprises an actual layer name; traversing the actual layer name according to the original layer name, and further comparing other contents in the layer information when a layer matched with the name is found; and enabling the automatic proofreading App to generate an annotation file according to the comparison result information. According to the method and the device, the proofreading work is completed by matching the automatic proofreading App and the to-be-proofread App, the proofreading process is high in automation degree, the complexity and omission of manual comparison are avoided, the prompt is more visual, and the efficiency is higher.
column14: YEELION ONLINE NETWORK TECH BEIJING CO LTD

column12: IMAGE CREATION SUPPORT DEVICE AND IMAGE CREATION SUPPORT METHOD
column13: An image creation support device includes an image input unit that reads a design image P to create input screen data ID, a database that stores pieces of parts data designed in the past, and a screen data creation unit that creates the candidate screen data CD corresponding to the display screen from the pieces of parts data. The database also stores the types of the pieces of parts data and group definition information GI that is based on a combination of the pieces of parts data. The screen data creation unit includes a type identification unit that identifies the type PT of each input part, and an additional information creation unit that creates additional information AI to be combined with the type PT based on the group definition information GI.

column12: Three-dimensional process visual design method based on webgl technology
column13: The invention provides a three-dimensional process visual design method based on a webgl technology, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out a three-dimensional visual scene building step and a three-dimensional visual scene interaction step through a 3D cloud platform based on the webgl technology, carrying out the data connection of a three-dimensional visual scene, a database, and an on-site monitoring system, presetting a plurality of scene models, mounting functional scripts of the corresponding scene models, issuing a three-dimensional visual scene to a three-dimensional human-computer interaction interface, and performing secondary disassembling on the data obtained by classifying and disassembling field data by the 3D cloud platform to obtain the three-dimensional visual scene, and loading and displaying the three-dimensional visual scene; and driving a scene model to perform synchronous field state action according to the field data. The method is convenient to operate and use, real-time data three-dimensional visual monitoring in the whole process is achieved, fault data retrieval and tracing are facilitated when storage exception occurs, and the fault debugging rate and the production efficiency can be improved.

column12: Penetration depth prediction method based on multi-partition model integration
column13: The invention discloses a penetration depth prediction method based on multi-partition model integration. The method comprises the following steps: dividing an evaluation interval for evaluating an engineering algorithm; selecting a plurality of better engineering algorithms; performing batch sample calculation by adopting the selected engineering algorithm to obtain engineering calculation simulation data; in each evaluation interval, using test data and engineering calculation simulation data to establish a dimensionless penetration depth prediction model based on a random forest and a BP neural network; carrying out weighted integration by adopting K adjacent partition model fusion output to form a fusion model; enabling the input features to generate a partition prediction result through a plurality of prediction models, and finally, generating dimensionless penetration depth prediction output through a fusion model. According to the method, the accuracy of data is ensured, and meanwhile, the influence of lack of experimental data on the deep learning model is avoided; models are established in different intervals, the modeling range is reduced, it is guaranteed that the models can reflect physical characteristics and rules of local areas, small prediction errors are generated, and a prediction model with higher accuracy is obtained.

column12: Method for smart conversion and calibration of coordinate
column13: A smart conversion and calibration of the defect coordinate, diagnosis, sampling system and the method thereof for manufacturing fab is provided. The intelligent defect diagnosis method includes receiving pluralities of defect data, design layout data, analyzing the defect data, design layouts, by a Critical Area Analysis (CAA) system. The method utilizes the precisely calibrated coordinate, the defect layout pattern, and the higher accurate calibrated defect size value. So, a more precise killer defect index can be generated with calibrated coordinate deviation calibration and defect size deviation calibration. When judging a defect relating to short circuit or open circuit failure probability, the defect failure result is more accurate and less incorrect judgment.

column12: Method of optimizing wire RC for device performance and reliability
column13: A method of tailoring BEOL RC parametrics to improve chip performance. According to the method, an integrated circuit design on an integrated circuit chip is analyzed. The analysis comprises calculating Vmax for vias and metal lines in the integrated circuit design over a range of sizes for the vias and the metal lines. Predicted use voltage for applications on the integrated circuit chip is determined. The size or the location of at least one of the vias and the metal lines is tailored based on performance parameters of the integrated circuit chip.

column12: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR PROTECTING A MOBILE APPLIANCE UNDER MACHINE OR AUTOMATIC CONTROL, AND SENSOR TILE
FAST ANNOTATION OF SAMPLES FOR MACHINE LEARNING MODEL DEVELOPMENT
column13: Computer systems and associated methods are disclosed to implement a model development environment (MDE) that allows a team of users to perform iterative model experiments to develop machine learning (ML) media models. In embodiments, the MDE implements a media data management interface that allows users to annotate and manage training data for models. In embodiments, the MDE implements a model experimentation interface that allows users to configure and run model experiments, which include a training run and a test run of a model. In embodiments, the MDE implements a model diagnosis interface that displays the model's performance metrics and allows users to visually inspect media samples that were used during the model experiment to determine corrective actions to improve model performance for later iterations of experiments. In embodiments, the MDE allows different types of users to collaborate on a series of model experiments to build an optimal media model.

column12: Credit scoring and pre-approval engine integration
column13: Embodiments of systems and methods using integrated credit scoring and pre-approval tools are described. A credit score tool may obtain a user's credit score and associated credit information for display to the user. A credit pre-approval tool may assemble credit-related information for evaluation by a predictive model to determine whether a pre-approved offer of credit should be presented to the user along with the credit score.

column12: Attractive design method for engine compartment of passenger car
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of automobiles, and relates to an aesthetic design method for an engine compartment of a passenger car. Comprising the following steps of: 1, counting parts with relatively large influence on the attractiveness of an engine compartment, and performing priority ranking according to an evaluation model; 2, carrying out region division on the cabin, carrying out cabin overall layout scheme conception according to a priority and aesthetic arrangement principle, and determining positions and size shape boundaries of main parts; step 3, performing part 3D data design according to positions and boundaries by each part design specialty; step 4, performing aesthetic evaluation optimization on the 3D data of the special parts for part design; 5, evaluating and optimizing the aesthetic property of the cabin of the real vehicle; and step 6, cabin attractiveness design is completed. According to the method, in the data design stage and the real vehicle verification stage, on the premise that the requirements of maintenance, clearance and the like are met, a reasonable cabin attractiveness design scheme is formulated, and the forward cabin attractiveness design method and process for detailed scheme design are output.

column12: System for selection of regulated products
column13: A system for categorizing, visualizing, and recommending cannabis products based on objective data of the chemical composition of products is described. This system allows cannabis products to be visualized and compared based on their chemical composition, even by laypeople with little or no knowledge of the underlying objective data. A recommendation system is built upon this which can recommend products for consumption, including a user interface for receiving user input, which includes at least one of demographic data, desired level of psychoactivity, or prior experience with the product, a merchant interface for receiving merchant input, including at least one of general data descriptive of the regulated product, lab data descriptive of the regulated products chemical composition, and user data descriptive of subjective effects of the regulated product on a user; and a decision engine making a recommendation of product according to correlation of the lab data with the user data.

column12: Automatic visual design method for parallel mechanism topology
column13: The invention discloses an automatic visual design method for parallel mechanism topology. The automatic visual design method comprises the following steps: building a three-dimensional simulation environment; creating a component library; expressing the to-be-visualized parallel mechanism topology in a matrix; establishing a conversion relation between topology and constraints; establishing a parallel mechanism in a three-dimensional simulation environment; performing constraint correctness detection on the topological structure; effective three-dimensional display of the parallel mechanism is carried out; and completing the topological three-dimensional visual design of the parallel mechanism. The method does not need to depend on existing commercial software, is high in expansibility, can carry out dragging operation on the parallel mechanism, and has good interactivity; mechanism rod pieces can be stored in a parameterized mode, the complex axis geometrical relation between the rod pieces is described in a common spatial orientation mode, and the method is suitable for a common mechanism. The automation degree is high, the whole visualization process is independently completed by the system without guidance of professionals, the design difficulty of the parallel mechanism can be effectively reduced, the design period of the parallel mechanism is shortened, and the development cost of the parallel robot is reduced.
column15: SUN TAO;;JIANG CHONGYANG;;HUO XINMING;;WANG LIANG;;SONG YIMIN

column12: Driving assistance control system of vehicle
column13: A driving assistance control system of a vehicle includes a needed information acquisition unit configured to acquire needed information for calculating a target path, a target path deciding unit configured to decide the target path based on the needed information, a vehicle traveling controller configured to perform a path following control for controlling a traveling device of the vehicle such that the vehicle follows the target path, and a system limit identification unit configured to identify a likelihood of reaching a system limit at which the path following control becomes unsuccessful. The system limit identification unit includes a determination model that learns a relationship between a plurality of vehicle feature amounts and the likelihood of reaching the system limit by machine learning in advance, and outputs an identification result of the likelihood of reaching the system limit corresponding to the input vehicle feature amounts using the determination model.

column12: Magic gluco-wrist watch (MGW)
column13: The Magic Gluco Wrist Watch (MGW) is a time wrist watch with a capability to measure the blood glucose level. The fix watch clasp plays a role of a lancing device, and is attached to the end of a left strap of the MGW. The movement of a holding member from the left strap to a right strap causes new electric current test strip to be driven in to the test strip port. A test strip port is located in the lug. By opening the valve, the MGW turns from time watch into a blood glucose meter.

column12: Robot process automation implementation system and method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of machine intelligence, and discloses a robot process automation realization system and method, and the system comprises a data design terminal, a control terminal, a work cluster, a data transfer mechanism, a data uploading and downloading terminal, and a data summarization terminal. A plurality of RPA robots are deployed in the working cluster, the data transfer mechanism transfers and collects a data storage component in each RPA robot in the working cluster, and the data uploading and downloading terminal is used for receiving data in the data storage component in the RPA robot on each task node and uploading the data to the data summarization terminal. According to the robot process automation implementation system and method, the influence of network bandwidth and signals on remote network transmission can be avoided, the upgrading speed of the robot can be increased, data information transmission can be more stable, and the situation that subsequent normal operation is affected by crash of the RPA robot due to incomplete program downloading caused by factors such as network fluctuation is avoided.

column12: Method for designing cloud service user center
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of cloud services, in particular to a method for designing a cloud service user center, which comprises the following steps of: constructing a service architecture; designing an interface; carrying out library division, table division and Token flexible degradation; data security and monitoring; the beneficial effects are that according to the cloud service user center design method provided by the invention, the user center design method involving multiple systems, cross platforms and multiple business events based on cloud service is good, the user center design method can bring stability to business, and the research and development and operation maintenance cost can be greatly reduced.
column14: INSPUR CLOUD INF TECH CO LTD

column12: DEEP LEARNING-BASED MICRO-SEISMIC SIGNAL CLASSIFICATION AND IDENTIFICATION METHOD
column13: A deep learning-based micro-seismic signal classification and identification method, comprising the following steps: step 1, establishing a sample database of micro-seismic signals and blasting signals; step 2, extracting features of dominant frequency, post-peak attenuation coefficient and energy centroid coefficient of sample signals, so as to form a sample feature data training set and a test set; step 3, using the sample feature data training set to train a deep neural network classification and identification model, using test set data to verify a classification and identification effect of a signal classification and identification model, and continuously improving the classification accuracy by means of cross training; and step 4, extracting a feature vector of a signal to be identified, and inputting same into the signal classification model to obtain an identification result. The method has the characteristics of simple algorithm, high adaptability and real-time performance, and high identification accuracy, and can effectively classify coal mine micro-seismic signals and blasting signals.

column12: Industrial internet intrusion detection method based on improved whale algorithm optimized DELM
column13: The invention relates to an industrial internet intrusion detection method based on improved whale algorithm optimized DELM, and belongs to the technical field of industrial internet of things security, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, obtaining and preprocessing sample data of industrial internet intrusion detection, and splitting a training set and a test set; s2, constructing a DELM classification model, and initializing model parameters; s3, optimizing an initialization method of the whale WOA by using a reverse learning mechanism, introducing a nonlinear curve to update a linear convergence factor, and forming an improved whale optimization algorithm IWOA; s4, taking an error between an actual output result of DELM and an expected output result as a fitness function of IWOA, and obtaining an optimal weight and an optimal threshold of the deep extreme learning machine through iterative optimization of an improved whale optimization algorithm; and S5, constructing an IWOA-DELM classification model, and testing the model by using test set data to obtain a classification result.

column13: The present disclosure provides methods and systems directed to cell-free identification and/or monitoring of pregnancy -related states. A method for identifying or monitoring a presence or susceptibility of a pregnancy-related state of a subject may comprise assaying a cell- free biological sample derived from said subject to detect a set of biomarkers, and analyzing the set of biomarkers with a trained algorithm to determine the presence or susceptibility of the pregnancy -related state.

column12: RAPID PROTOTYPING OF USER EXPERIENCE COMPONENTS AND RELATED APPLICATION FUNCTIONALITY
column13: Methods, computer readable media, and devices for rapid prototyping of both user experience and technical features in a combined approach. One method may include creating a set of known user experience (UX) components including a user interface element representing at least one of a data element and a data interaction, creating a UX screen including a set of UX elements within a UX prototyping tool, translating the UX screen into a set of standardized UX components, publishing the set of standardized UX components by mapping the set of standardized UX components to synthetic data, and validating a technical aspect of the published set of standardized UX components based on user interaction with the published set of standardized UX components.

column12: Learning to search user experience designs based on structural similarity
column13: Embodiments are disclosed for learning structural similarity of user experience (UX) designs using machine learning. In particular, in one or more embodiments, the disclosed systems and methods comprise generating a representation of a layout of a graphical user interface (GUI), the layout including a plurality of control components, each control component including a control type, geometric features, and relationship features to at least one other control component, generating a search embedding for the representation of the layout using a neural network, and querying a repository of layouts in embedding space using the search embedding to obtain a plurality of layouts based on similarity to the layout of the GUI in the embedding space.

column12: METHOD OF MANUFACTURING AN IMPLANT AND AN IMPLANT WITH TWO COATINGS
column13: A medical implant for cartilage and/or bone repair at an articulating surface of a joint is provided. The implant includes a contoured implant body and at least one extending post. The implant body has an articulating surface configured to face the articulating part of the joint and a bone contact surface configured to face the bone structure of a joint, where the articulating and bone contact surfaces face mutually opposite directions and the bone contact surface is provided with the extending post. A cartilage contact surface connects the articulating and the bone contact surfaces and is configured to contact the cartilage surrounding the implant body in a joint. The articulating surface has a layer that is formed of titanium nitride (TiN) as the wear-resistant material. The cartilage contact surface has a coating that is formed of a material having chondrointegration properties.

column12: Fan cabin vibration fault diagnosis system and method based on naive Bayesian algorithm
column13: The invention provides a fan cabin vibration fault diagnosis system and method based on a naive Bayes algorithm, and relates to the technical field of fault diagnosis. According to the fan cabin vibration fault diagnosis system based on the naive Bayesian algorithm, cabin vibration fault related historical operation data collected by a bottom layer are taken from a big data HIVE database; a calculation server for storing the data through api is called to analyze and calculate the data, generate a corresponding calculation result, and store the calculation result in the database; and a Web server is used for carrying out service display, and the Web server carries out corresponding service display on a calculation result through visual design and integrates the calculation result in a centralized monitoring control platform. According to the method, the degradation trend of the engine room can be effectively checked before the vibration fault of the fan engine room in combination with business cognition and evaluation scores, the engine room is regulated and controlled in advance, the fault frequency of the engine room is reduced, the operation and maintenance cost of the engine room is reduced, the operation state is stabilized, and the production economic benefits are guaranteed.

column12: METHOD OF CREATING A CERTIFIED DIGITAL PART FILE
column13: A method of printing a certified part using a certified digital part file, the method comprising the following steps: a. Using a 3D printing apparatus and a certified digital part file to print a part in accordance with a print process, the certified digital part file comprising geometry, parameters and a check data set, the check data set comprising criteria defining acceptable and non-acceptable levels of anomalies for successful printing of the certified part, b. During the print process, comparing print data generated by the apparatus with the check data set to indicate where a part of the printing process contains a non- acceptable anomaly. c. Where a non-acceptable anomaly is detected, using the apparatus to recover the print process by taking corrective action if possible to remove the anomaly or reduce the anomaly to an acceptable level or, where the print process is not recoverable, abandoning the print process.

column12: Insufficient funds predictor
column13: Certain aspects of the present disclosure provide techniques for improving a prediction of whether a non-sufficient funds fee will be incurred by a user utilizing machine learning techniques. For example, a predictive model may be trained using machine learning techniques based on historical data and derived data for a plurality of users. The predictive model may then be used to predict a probability of a particular user incurring an insufficient funds fee. The probability of the particular user may be used to generate an alert and suggestion to be presented to the particular user to avoid incurring the insufficient funds fee.

column12: Unmapped region visualization
column13: A method, including capturing, from an imaging system, a three-dimensional (3D) image of a body cavity, and using the captured 3D image to construct a simulated surface of the body cavity. A probe having a location sensor is inserted into the body cavity, and in response to multiple location measurements received from the location sensor, multiple positions are mapped within respective regions of the body cavity so as to generate respective mapped regions of the simulated surface. Based on the simulated surface and the respective mapped regions, one or more unmapped regions of the simulated surface are delineated, and the simulated surface of the body cavity is configured to indicate the delineated unmapped regions.

column12: A SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PROTECTION PLANS AND WARRANTY DATA ANALYTICS
column13: Different examples for a server and methods for providing actionable insights based on warranty analytics related to usage of a protective apparatus with an electronic device by a customer are described herein. In some cases, the method comprises: receiving an electronic query, at a server, from a user device; accessing, at the server, at least one of risk profile data and test data from a multidimensional data structure, where the at least one risk profile data and test data include data needed to respond to the electronic query; determining, at the server, a response to the electronic query using the accessed data; an sending an electronic message from the server to the user device, the electronic message including data for answering the electronic query.

column12: Piezoelectric linear driving device simulating sliding plate motion design and control method
column13: The invention relates to a piezoelectric linear driving device simulating sliding plate motion design and a control method, and belongs to the field of precision machinery. The driving device comprises a guide rail, a driving unit, a pre-tightening force adjusting unit and a moving unit; the pre-tightening force adjusting unit is installed on the driving unit through screws; the driving unit is connected with the moving unit through screws; and a pre-tightening force between the guide rail and the driving foot of the driving unit is finely adjusted through the pre-tightening screw of the pre-tightening force adjusting unit. The driving device, continuous linear motion is realized through periodic sawtooth-shaped driving voltage waveforms; and the step pitch and speed of the driving deviceare adjusted by controlling the amplitude and frequency of the driving voltage waveforms. The device has the advantages of simple structure, convenience in control, small back-off displacement and high moving speed, and is capable of achieving theoretical infinite strokes when the guide rail is infinitely long. The method has a good application prospect in the fields of precision machining, precision measurement, precision optics, biomedical engineering and the like which require large-stroke and high-precision positioning.

column12: Visual design intelligent display method and system
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of visual design, and particularly discloses an intelligent display method and system for visual design. The visual design type is analyzed and determined by receiving the visual design requirement; real-time design operation is received through the visual design window, and a visual design image is updated and generated; matching a visual display base body, fusing the visual display base body and the visual design image, and generating an attachment display image; monitoring shooting is displayed, identity recognition is carried out on monitoring shooting data, and monitoring identity information is obtained; and according to the monitored identity information, carrying out hiding adjustment on the attached display image, generating an adjusted display image, and carrying out dynamic display. According to the visual design type, the visual display base body is matched, the visual display base body and the visual design image are fused, so that details of a specific application are displayed, monitoring shooting, identity information recognition and monitoring and corresponding hiding adjustment are performed, leakage of key information is avoided, and safety is improved.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR EXCHANGE OF PACKETS PERTAINING TO AN INSTRUMENT
column13: The present disclosure relates to a method and system for exchanging packets of information pertaining to an instrument. Data pertaining to the instrument is obtained from internal and external sources, which may be governmental or non-governmental. The obtained data undergoes a process of clustering and dimensional reduction to arrive at cleaned and optimised data attributes. A predictive model is built using those data attributes. A testing provision is included in the proposed method and system that allows for validation of the constructed model by using test data and comparing the predictions with actual values. Upon validation, the model predicts one or more packets of information that can have a bearing on the exchange of packets pertaining to the instrument.

column12: Credible visual traceability system construction method for enhancing pasteurized crab meat HACCP plan
column13: The invention discloses a credible visual traceability system construction method for enhancing a pasteurized crab meat HACCP plan, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the semantic understanding of a pasteurized crab meat HACCP plan text, and obtaining an enhanced HACCP plan for execution; designing a data grading mode, a data storage structure and an uplink smart contract for a quality traceability application system to be constructed; knowledge representation design is carried out on visual map display, static entities and dynamic entities are divided, and a map structure is designed; collecting data generated in the execution process of the HACCP plan, and storing the data in a corresponding database in a hierarchical manner; and S3, acquiring the collected data from each database, and constructing visual data and rendering a final front-end visual map based on the visual design made in the step S3. An HACCP plan table is adjusted and expanded from the angle of different data requirements of data monitoring and tracing at different levels; and optimizing the uplink data to form a hierarchical uplink mode of the quality risk data.

column12: Mining safety product detection and inspection comprehensive application management platform
column13: The invention discloses a mining safety product detection and inspection comprehensive application management platform which comprises a data template design system which is used for editing and designing a data form template and displaying and editing data visual design, and a data calculation engine which is carried on the data template design system and is used for assisting data calculation and providing a data binding service at the same time. The method is used for assisting later data statistics. According to the method, the detection and inspection business process is solidified, so that the detection data generation period is greatly shortened, the effects of data sharing, convenient query, statistics and inspection result tracing are achieved, the laboratory management automation level and the detection and inspection mechanism business informatization level are effectively improved, and the work efficiency is improved. Standardized management and informatization construction of detection and inspection institutions in the mine field are guided and promoted, solid technical support is provided for industry supervision, and effective service support is provided for customer decision making.

column12: User interface stencil automation
column13: Techniques are disclosed for automatically generating stencils for content of a user interface (UI) to be rendered. A computer system receives information specifying content of a user interface (UI) to be rendered. Based on this information, the computer system identifies one or more bounding regions of content within the UI, including analyzing metadata and a rendered version of the UI. The computer system then automatically generates, one or more UI stencils based on the identified bounding regions, that are displayable as progress indicators prior to rendering corresponding UI content. Once it has generated the stencils, the computer system stores information specifying the one or more UI stencils for use in the UI. Automatically generating stencils for UIs may advantageously reduce the time gap from development to deployment of these UIs while improving their perceived performance and, by extension, improving user experience.
