column12: Software adaptive testing method based on data integration prediction
column13: The invention provides a software self-adaptive testing method based on data integration prediction, which comprises the following steps of: establishing a global defect predictor by using external data selected by filtering, carrying out training learning, dividing tested software into a plurality of use cases, carrying out defect probability prediction on the plurality of use cases, sorting obtained defect probability prediction results from large to small, and carrying out data integration prediction on the sorted defect probability prediction results. Selecting the first k cases as a test set for testing; and adding a test result as feedback input into training data of a global defect predictor, establishing and training a local defect predictor by using test result data, and performing integrated prediction on results of the global defect predictor and the local defect predictor according to a weight adjustment scheme. According to the method, more software defects can be found earlier, the defect prediction precision and effect are improved, the software testing efficiency is improved, the problem of software testing resource constraint can be solved, the testing cost is reduced, and the method has important engineering application value.
column15: YIN YONGFENG;;LIU JIAKANG;;SU QINGRAN;;SONG YI;;YIN RUI

column12: Dialogue interaction design method and system for mental health assessment
column13: The invention discloses a dialogue interaction design method and system for mental health assessment. The method comprises the following steps: S1 collecting a dialogue of a user through a smart phone terminal part, screening the information of the user, and uploading the screened information of the user to a cloud platform; S2 receiving information data of the user on the cloud platform, and judging the mental health condition of the user according to the data of the user and a constructed mental health knowledge map; and S3 processing the mental health condition of a mental sub-health user on the cloud computing platform, and transmitting an analysis result to the mental sub-health user. The method has the beneficial effects that a knowledge extraction model combining a conditional random field model and rule extraction is designed, extracted key information is subjected to entity unification and then stored in a database together with diagnosis standard data, so that construction of the mental health assessment map is completed in a map database, an auxiliary diagnosis result is given, and the assessment map is visualized.

column12: Efficient virus detection system for ambient atmosphere based on Internet of Things and detection method thereof
column13: The invention discloses an efficient virus detection system for ambient atmosphere based on Internet of Things and a detection method thereof, and belongs to the technical field of virus detection. An efficient virus detection system for ambient atmosphere based on the Internet of Things comprises a detection box, an air suction and exhaust assembly is arranged in the detection box, the two ends of the air suction and exhaust assembly are connected with an air inlet pipe and an air outlet pipe respectively, the inner wall of the detection box is rotationally connected with a supporting column, and the outer wall of the supporting column is fixedly connected with a first connecting plate and a second connecting plate; the first connecting plate and the second connecting plate are provided with a plurality of matched placing grooves, the inner wall of each placing groove is provided with a reagent bottle, the bottom of the detection box is provided with a groove, the inner wall of the groove is fixedly connected with a converging pipe, the converging pipe is provided with an indentation assembly, and the input end of the converging pipe is connected with a liquid outlet pipe; the device is simple in structure, time-saving and labor-saving, used test paper and reagent bottles do not need to be manually replaced after one-time virus detection work, the virus detection efficiency is improved, and the device is convenient to popularize.

column12: FOAM-MOLDED BODY AND METHOD FOR PRODUCING FOAM-MOLDED BODY
Constant-water-loss tobacco shred drying method and device and tobacco shred manufacturing method and system
column13: The invention belongs to the field of tobacco processing, and particularly relates to a tobacco shred drying method for subsequent tobacco shred winnowing. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a temperature measurement value and a humidity measurement value of a winnowing environment, a moisture content design value of the winnowed tobacco shreds and a tobacco shred water loss ratedesign value in a drying stage; substituting the temperature measurement value and the humidity measurement value of the winnowing environment and the moisture content design value of the winnowed tobacco shreds into a prediction model for calculation to obtain a moisture content prediction value of the dried tobacco shreds; summing the predicted value of the moisture content of the dried tobaccoshreds and the designed value of the moisture loss rate of the tobacco shreds in the drying stage to obtain a predicted value of the moisture content of the tobacco shreds before drying; and drying the tobacco shreds according to the tobacco shred moisture content predicted value before drying and the tobacco shred moisture content predicted value after drying. The invention further relates to a tobacco shred drying device for subsequent tobacco shred winnowing and a method and system for manufacturing tobacco shreds. The method can improve the sensory quality stability and physical-chemical property stability of the tobacco shreds, and the tobacco shreds can be dried according to the design value of the tobacco shred water loss rate in the drying stage.

column12: Method and device for identifying abnormal behavior of elevator car based on artificial intelligence(AI)
column13: This invention provides method and device for identifying abnormal behavior of elevator car based on AI. The invention not only studies that data collection and storage in the cross-media elevator car, but also includes system architecture, intelligent collection and filter of audio and video data, cross-domain integration of audio and video data and status data; but also studies the learning and reasoning of elevator car passenger behavior recognition model, including labeling of cross-media data, design of behavior recognition model and algorithm, and iterative optimization of model training; this invention also studies the real-time deployment of inference engine in terminal and server, including network compression and sparseness, adaptation optimization of terminal platform deployment network and virtualization deployment of server-side shared services. Through the above research, the invention can continuously, timely and accurately monitor the abnormal situation in the video picture and give an early warning signal and reminder

column12: LAYER-BASED CONVERSION WITH FUNCTIONALITY RETENTION
column13: A digital image imported into a target application that provides a functionality with respect to digital images may be rendered to obtain a rendered digital image. The digital image may be parsed to obtain asset metadata characterizing the digital image. Position information identifying a position of an image element within the digital image may be used to overlay a virtual layer onto a rendition image element of the rendered digital image corresponding to the image element, within a graphical user interface (GUI) of the target application. In this way, the functionality may be provided within the GUI and with respect to the virtual layer, to thereby provide the appearance of providing the functionality with respect to the rendition image element.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR GENERATING DIALOG TREES
column13: A dialog tree generation system is provided, including a processor, and a memory storing instructions that, when executed by the processor, cause the system to receive documents, parse the documents into raw blocks, extract visual design elements from the raw blocks, generate a content structure from the extracted visual design elements, generate at least a dialog decision tree based on the extracted content structure, the dialog decision tree comprising a plurality of nodes organized into a hierarchy, and output the dialog decision tree.

column12: DEVELOPING A SOFTWARE PRODUCT IN A NO-CODE DEVELOPMENT PLATFORM TO ADDRESS A PROBLEM RELATED TO A BUSINESS DOMAIN
column13: A method is provided for developing a software product in a no-code development platform (NCDP) to address a problem related to a business domain. The method includes designing the software product in the NCDP. This includes receiving design instructions composed in a semi-structured grammar of a domain-driven design (DDD) natural language for the business domain, and generating a metamodel from the design instructions and according to the DDD natural language. The metamodel incorporates logic and data to implement software features, and the software product has an event sourcing architectural pattern in which the logic in the form of aggregate services are invoked by commands, and the data as events that describe changes in state of the software product are generated. The method includes automatically implementing the aggregate services, commands, and events to build the software product from the metamodel, using an event sourcing framework as a programming model.

column12: UI evaluation processing method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention discloses a UI evaluation processing method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining to-be-tested UI data, wherein the to-be-tested UI data comprises a target project identifier and a to-be-tested UI file; performing code recognition on the to-be-tested UI file, and obtaining at least one to-be-tested element and an element design code corresponding to each to-be-tested element; obtaining a target UI design specification based on the target project identifier, and obtaining an element design specification corresponding to the to-be-tested element from the target UI design specification; adopting the element design specifications corresponding to the to-be-tested elements to perform specification verification on the element design codes corresponding to the to-be-tested elements to obtain specification verification results corresponding to the to-be-tested elements; and obtaining a UI evaluation result based on the standard verification result corresponding to the at least one to-be-tested element, and executing a target processing flow corresponding to the UI evaluation result. According to the method, the targetUI design specification is utilized to perform unified verification on all the element design specifications, so that design detail processing of the to-be-tested elements is reduced, and the UI evaluation efficiency is improved.

column12: Front-end page development system and method, equipment and medium
column13: The invention discloses a front-end page development system and method, equipment and a medium, and the system comprises: a document obtaining interface which is used for obtaining a first demand document; a data binding module which is used for identifying a data field key name in the first demand document; a UI decoration module which is used for obtaining a UI design command and replacing the target content with the UI design command to obtain a second demand document; a document specification module which is used for obtaining a target document specification command and carrying out corresponding specification setting to obtain a target demand document; a document transcoding module which is used for analyzing the target demand document to obtain an abstract decision tree and converting the abstract decision tree into a corresponding target code; and a code execution module which is used for executing the target code to obtain the front-end UI. Therefore, the system can enable thedemand document to accord with the preset specification, so that the demand document can be converted into the corresponding code to run to obtain the front-end UI, the front-end page development timeis shortened, and the front-end page development efficiency is improved.

column12: CHEMICAL IMPACTS ON A LEACH STOCKPILE
column13: The system may include a secondary irrigation feature that determines a percent of overlap of each of a plurality of submodules in a first lift over each of a plurality of submodules in a second lift and adjusts at least one of leaching operations or a leaching model based on the total tonnage weighted average of metal in the second lift. The method may further comprise determining an acid gap based on a difference between total acid given and total acid consumption; and further adjusting at least one of the leaching operations or the leaching model based on the acid gap. The method may further comprise determining a percentage of compacted material based on the material that is compacted and irrigated divided by the material that is irrigated; and further adjusting at least one of the leaching operations or the leaching model based on the percentage of compacted material.

column12: Large screen output method and device based on data visualization and medium
column13: The invention discloses a large screen output method and device based on data visualization and a medium, belongs to the technical field of data visualization, and is used for solving the problems that in an existing data visualization system, the development cost of the front end and the rear end of data is high, data visualization customization is difficult to easily and quickly carry out, and the data visualization efficiency is high. And overall beautiful layout of data visualization and accurate data display are not facilitated. The method comprises the following steps: according to pre-acquired design data, carrying out classified design on a visual large-screen report to obtain a visual design report; performing component configuration on the visual design report, and determining a global layout of the visual large-screen platform; according to the data flow corresponding to each component in the global layout, performing corresponding data configuration on the visual design report to obtain global configuration data; according to the global layout and the global configuration data, performing website data packaging on the visual large-screen platform to obtain a visual page; and carrying out page sharing on the visual page.

column12: TECHNOLOGY FOR ENABLING ELASTIC GRAPHIC DESIGN
column13: Systems and methods for facilitating product design by an electronic device are described. According to certain aspects, an electronic device may present a design having a set of design elements, and may detect a modification to one or more of the set of design elements. The electronic device may determine, based on a set of characteristics, how remaining design elements can be modified based on the detected modification. The electronic device may determine and present a modified design according to the modified design elements, for review by a user of the electronic device.

column12: Teaching behavior data source establishing method and system supporting cross-application
column13: The invention discloses a method and a system for establishing a cross-application-supported teaching behavior data source, and belongs to the technical field of teaching. According to the method, a teaching activity behavior data structure is defined, teaching activity behavior data with educational significance is designed, a behavior data source is designed on educational application, the teaching activity behavior data is associated, and original multi-source heterogeneous universal teaching activity behavior data is converted into multi-source isomorphic behavior data. According to the method, a unique identifier of a cross-application and cross-page behavior data carrier is realized for various sources of the behavior data, and combination and decomposition of the behavior data are realized in cooperation with a self-defined dynamic behavior and object sequence, so that the educational significance of the data is improved. Various teaching activities and links are well described according to the education and teaching behavior data designed for application scenes in the education field, and therefore the problems that multi-source heterogeneous education big data lacks education significance, standards are not uniform, data are difficult to integrate, data migration and data comprehensive analysis are difficult to carry out and the like are solved.
column14: WUSHI LIANCHENG SHANGHAI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: Connecting structure capable of being combined and separated through connection and mutual rotation of object blocks
column13: The invention provides a set of super-block buckles which are innovatively constructed based on a tenon-and-mortise structure, a multi-connected-order and multi-element controllable and fused super-block connecting structure system which can be connected, mutually rotated, combined and separated is formed, the super-block connecting structure system can be applied to end, edge, surface and three-dimensional combination and mutual fusion of multi-configuration blocks, systematic construction of connection, rotation and separation and combination control is achieved, and the construction efficiency is improved. Serialized multi-version hyperblock entity product design or prototype design and suite are presented. The hyper-block connection structure system inherits tradition, innovates an object-object connection mode, can be expanded and applied to multiple fields and multiple scenes in multiple directions, and realizes productization, serialization and modularization. Production of multiple sets of multi-order and multi-version solid products based on a hypersquare set composed of 24 regular trilateral hyperblocks and 6 equilateral isomorphic regular tetragonal hyperblocks is achieved, content connotation innovation, hyperlink human-based smart visualization and hypertotem thinking systematization are fused, and a smart exploration, exploration, innovation and experience system based on a third superpart is formed.
column14: GUANGZHOU XINRUI CONSULTANT SERVICE CO LTD

column12: Detection system and method for computer software detection
column13: The invention discloses a detection system and method for computer software detection, and relates to the technical field of software detection, the detection system comprises a data test module, a security test module, a test case module and a defect management and analysis module; wherein the data test module is used for detecting the correctness of software during data processing, constructing a test case of a data type and carrying out comprehensive test on the software; the security test module is used for detecting vulnerabilities of the software in the aspect of security, simulating a possible attack scene and testing the software; the test case module is used for generating a test case through machine learning, detecting software in a mode of combining manual testing and automatic testing, generating the test case in the test case module, and storing the test case in a test case library; the data test module and the security test module can use test cases in a test case library or redesign test cases for use, and the test result is more accurate through defect display of combination of the two test cases.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AN INTELLIGENT SOURCING ENGINE FOR STUDY PARTICIPANTS
column13: Systems and methods for sourcing participants for a usability study are provided. In some embodiments the systems and methods receive study parameters including the type of study, time-to-field of the study, required number of participants, and required participant attributes. Additionally, a set of business rules for the study are received. These business rules may be received from a client, extrapolated from a service contract with a client for which the study is being performed, or generated based on the monitored outcomes of sourcing of previous studies. Next, panel sources for potential participants and pricing data are queried, and a set of the sources are selected based upon the pricing data. Participants are then received from these sources, which are then fielded in the study and monitored for outcomes.

column12: Steel low-magnification digital detection method based on machine vision
column13: The invention provides a steel low-power digital detection method based on machine vision, which belongs to the field of ferrous metallurgy, and has the characteristics of miniaturization, automation, safety, high efficiency and real-time man-machine interaction design by integrating the functions of sample preparation and conveying, image acquisition, defect identification and rating and data analysis and arrangement. Highly-automatic and standardized control operation of operators is realized, and the working intensity of the operators and the harm of the working acid environment to the bodies of the operators are reduced. And the automation, intelligence, precision and safety degree of the detection process are improved. According to the method, steel macroscopic defects are detected and classified on the basis of an image processing technology, defect information is digitalized, a steel macroscopic structure quality evaluation system can be efficiently, accurately and objectively established, technical support is provided for short-process, automatic and intelligent development of product quality detection in the iron and steel industry, and economic benefits of enterprises are improved. The method has important significance in realizing green, low-carbon and high-quality development.

column12: Megawatt permanent magnet direct drive wind driven generator stator fault diagnosis method
column13: The operation state of a generator set determines the key of safe and stable operation of a power grid, and a stator of a wind driven generator has an important influence on the stability of a power system. In order to solve the above problems, the invention provides a fault diagnosis research method of an initial expansion convolutional neural network (IDCNN) based on fusion of an initial network and expansion convolution. According to the method, firstly, an initial expansion convolution layer is constructed to enlarge a receptive field so as to enable learned fault features to be richer; then, in order to facilitate enriching of signal input information, a preprocessing method of converting a one-dimensional original signal sequence into a two-dimensional matrix is adopted; and finally, inputting the generated two-dimensional signal into the IDCNN for model training, and evaluating the model by using test data. The proposed IDCNN method is high in precision in fault diagnosis of the wind driven generator stator, and the diagnosis precision of the proposed method is higher than that of a traditional deep learning method in comparison results.

column12: Traffic jam intelligent visual analysis and early warning method fusing multi-source heterogeneous big data
column13: The invention relates to a traffic jam intelligent visual analysis and early warning method fusing multi-source heterogeneous big data, which belongs to the technical field of electric digital data processing, considers the influence of multiple factors on road speed, and adopts a multi-source heterogeneous information fusion technology to carry out vectorization expression on each road speed influence factor, so as to improve the traffic jam intelligent visual analysis and early warning efficiency. A road speed prediction model fusing multi-source influence factors is provided, and meanwhile, the concept of speed performance indexes is introduced to divide urban traffic states and extract congested road sections. And providing instance level explanation for the road speed prediction model, and mining key factors of road congestion. The visual analysis system designed and realized by integrating the method comprises a plurality of linked views and novel visual design, senses the spatial dependency relationship of traffic congestion and the evolution rule of time, can quickly identify the congestion reason, helps field experts to intervene as early as possible and formulate reasonable road planning, and improves the traffic congestion quality. And unnecessary traffic congestion is avoided.

column12: High-performance light field display simulator
column13: A simulator for light field displays. A high-performance simulator that can operate in real-time, allowing for VR-based evaluation of display designs. These capabilities allow for rapid exploration of display parameters (e.g. angular and hogel resolution, field of view, etc.), the visualization of how the angular spread of the rays that can affect quality and the evaluation of artifacts from light field processing. Additionally, the high-throughput nature of the simulation makes it amenable for use in the evaluation of light processing procedures such as those involved in light field rendering and compression contexts. The speed and ease with which one can explore light field display parameters makes this simulator the ideal tool for light field content design and evaluation.

column12: TRAINING DATA GENERATION APPARATUS
column13: A training data generation apparatus uses spatial data of an actual object and thereby trains a generative model to perform conversion from the spatial data to a feature vector and conversion from the feature vector to spatial data. Moreover, the training data generation apparatus generates a sample of the feature vector as a realization value of a probability distribution defined by a set of parameters. Moreover, the training data generation apparatus generates training data used in training for an object recognition model based on the spatial data output from the generative model when the generated sample of the feature vector is input into the generative model.

column12: Turning equipment predictive maintenance method and system based on LSTM algorithm
column13: The invention provides a turning equipment predictive maintenance method and system based on an LSTM algorithm. The turning equipment predictive maintenance method comprises the steps that a control sensor collects operation parameter information of turning equipment in real time, and the operation parameter information is preprocessed to obtain effective operation parameter information; using the effective operation parameter information to train the LSTM prediction model to obtain a trained LSTM prediction model; and testing the trained LSTM prediction model by using test data to obtain index parameters output by the LSTM prediction model, and optimizing the LSTM prediction model according to the index parameters. The system comprises modules corresponding to the steps of the method.

column12: Method for function definition and interactive design of vehicle remote control function
column13: The invention discloses a method for performing function definition and interactive design on a vehicle remote control function. The method mainly comprises the following steps: 1) constructing an equipment model; 2) defining a cloud virtual gateway, and constructing an association relationship of the equipment model; 3) creating applications and functions; 4) selecting an application and a cloud virtual gateway for the vehicle type, and associating services and functions; (5) low-code development of the selected function is carried out; and 6) configuring functions of the mobile phone end program. According to the invention, the device model of the vehicle-end device is defined and managed through the Internet of Things platform, the remote control function is associated with the device model of the vehicle-end device, and low-code interface interaction design is carried out at the cloud end, so that a mobile phone end program can directly obtain a renderable remote control function interaction interface; definition, configuration management and interactive design of the remote control function are achieved in a one-stop mode at the cloud end, and the effects of reducing the development workload of a mobile phone end program and improving the remote vehicle control function configuration management depth and efficiency are achieved.

column12: Apparatus and Method for Automatic Visual Design
column13: According to an embodiment of the present invention, provided is an image-only visual design automation device, which comprises: an image processing unit which receives an image and determines a property of a subtitle in the image using a first neural network; a sound processing unit which receives the image and generates text according to the sound included in the image by using a second neural network; and an execution unit which executes the subtitle in the image by reflecting the property of the subtitle in the text.
column15: PARK KYUNG HWA;;MOON HYE SOOK;;SIM JAE HOON

column12: Serverless inference execution across a heterogeneous fleet of devices
column13: Systems and methods are described for providing for serverless inferences against a trained machine learning (ML) model. Rather than obtaining one or more dedicated devices to conduct inferences, users are enabled to create a task on a serverless system that, when invoked, passing input data to a trained ML model and provides a result. To satisfy varying user requirements for inference speed, the system includes a variety of hardware configurations. The system can efficiently allocate resources between different tasks by invoking the task on a particular hardware configuration that is selected based on a current availability of the selected hardware configuration to host an execution environment in which the task is implemented and an expected time to invoke the task on the individual hardware configuration. The system can therefore efficiently allocate resources among inferences using a variety of different ML models.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR GENERATING DIALOG TREES
column13: A dialog tree generation system is provided, including a processor, and a memory storing instructions that, when executed by the processor, cause the system to receive documents, parse the documents into raw blocks, extract visual design elements from the raw blocks, generate a content structure from the extracted visual design elements, generate at least a dialog decision tree based on the extracted content structure, the dialog decision tree comprising a plurality of nodes organized into a hierarchy, and output the dialog decision tree.

column12: Optimized intelligent allocation decision-making method and system for hospital red blood cells
column13: The invention discloses a hospital red blood cell optimization intelligent decision-making method and system, which are used in the medical field, and are used for acquiring a patient blood transfusion effect data set, constructing a blood transfusion effect prediction model, and constructing a red blood cell optimization intelligent distribution decision-making model by adopting a prediction-decision-making model construction method based on the blood transfusion effect prediction model. And inputting the output result of the blood transfusion effect prediction model, the characteristic data of the patient applying for blood use and the actual allorable red blood cell quantity of the hospital into a red blood cell optimization intelligent allocation decision-making model, and outputting the optimal blood transfusion quantity of the patient applying for blood use. The hospital red blood cell decision based on big data and an algorithm model has the characteristics of accuracy and high efficiency, can improve the effective utilization rate of red blood cells which are scarce resources, can be applied to guidance of clinical science and reasonable blood use and alleviation of blood resource shortage or waste conditions, and is suitable for ward blood use scenes of various hospitals; the modularized and visual design is convenient for hospital blood distribution decision makers to understand, analyze and verify, and assists the hospital blood distribution decision makers to make decisions.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR RECEIVING A DEBT PAYMENT
column13: A method of determining a likelihood that a debt payment will be made or received, the method comprising sending a message to a debtor mobile computing device comprising a link to a debtor portal; displaying on the debtor mobile computing device an indication of the debt owing; displaying on the debtor mobile computing device a proposed payment plan for settlement of the debt; and receiving an indication that the debtor accepts the proposed payment plan is disclosed. The method may use Next Best Action (NBA) modelling. The message sent may be a SMS message and it may include an indication of the debt owing. The method may further comprise offering a discount to the debtor if the discounted amount is paid that day. The offer of a discount may initiate an automated negotiation process with the debtor.

column12: Method for carrying out human body behavior recognition by using WiFi data based on attention mechanism
column13: The invention provides a method for recognizing human body behaviors by using WiFi data based on an attention mechanism. According to the invention, a behavior identification method based on the amplitude and phase characteristics of channel state information (CSI) is firstly used, so that the problem of characteristic loss in the process of performing behavior identification by using the CSI canbe effectively solved. Then, multipath data between minimum multipath time delay differences which can be obtained by WiFi equipment is calculated by utilizing a principle that channel frequency response (CFR) and channel impulse response (CIR) can be mutually converted through Fourier transform and inverse transform, and a time delay interval range of multipath signals which are reflected and refracted by a human body and reach a receiver is determined; related multipath signals are extracted; and finally, an attention mechanism model for CSI behavior recognition is used, and the principle that learning weights can be allocated to different features by utilizing an attention mechanism is utilized, so that high-robustness motion sequence cutting and high-precision WiFi data-based human body behavior recognition are achieved. The behavior recognition algorithm in the complex environment based on WiFi data designed by the invention is effective and reliable, solves the problems that a traditional algorithm cannot extract multipath signals influenced by a human body and cannot fully utilize characteristics, and also solves the problem that a traditional cutting algorithm is poor in robustness; and the identification precision and the application potential of the system in various complex environments are improved by using the deep learning network.

column12: IMPROVED COPOLYETHERESTER
column13: The invention provides a copolyetherester compositions that are resistant to burning and which show reduced smoke production when exposed to heat or flame.

column12: DYNAMIC TEST AUTOMATION PRIORITIZATION
column13: Large and complex software projects may be distributed over multiple repositories and may use test automation of equivalent scale in continuous integration frameworks to maintain quality of the project. Such test automation often has significant hardware and time costs to run, which may mean that a failure of the software in the test automation takes longer to detect. Delay in fixing the software may increase the chance of more failures getting checked into the software repositories and perpetuating software failures. To address this issue, a ranking of historical test data is determined based on a number of failures for each test and a test configuration is determined based on the ranking such that tests that are ranked higher are performed before tests that are ranked lower. The test may be exited upon detection of failure instead of continuing.

column12: MUSIC REACTIVE ANIMATION OF HUMAN CHARACTERS
column13: Example methods for generating an animated character in dance poses to music may include generating, by at least one processor, a music input signal based on an acoustic signal associated with the music, and receiving, by the at least one processor, a model output signal from an encoding neural network. A current generated pose data is generated using a decoding neural network, the current generated pose data being based on previous generated pose data of a previous generated pose, the music input signal, and the model output signal. An animated character is generated based on a current generated pose data; and the animated character caused to be displayed by a display device.

column12: CONTEXTUALIZATION OF CODE DEVELOPMENT
column13: The disclosed technology is generally directed to code transparency. In one example of the technology, raw input data that includes version information that is associated with code is received. The version information includes pull requests associated with the code. Extracted key phrases are provided by performing a key-phrase extraction on the raw input data. A list of documents and a list of people are determined based at least in part on the extracted key phrases. A relevance ranking is performed on the list of documents and the list of people. Based on the relevance ranking, relevant documents and relevant people are determined, such that the relevant documents and the relevant people are relevant to the code. To a developer environment that is associated with the code, information associated with the relevant documents and/or the relevant people is provided.

column12: Digital prototype and joint optimization method thereof
column13: The invention relates to a digital prototype and a joint optimization method thereof. Comprising a display control module, a basic model library, a basic database, a real-time module and a joint optimization module, the display control module issues an instruction to the basic model library and the joint optimization module, receives simulation data and displays an optimization result; the basic model library calls a model stored in the basic model library to perform simulation calculation; the basic database receives and stores the simulation data and transmits the simulation data to the display control module or the real-time module; the real-time module calls the model to carry out real-time processing or train simulation data; and the joint optimization module calls a real-time model in the real-time module based on an instruction issued by the display control module to carry out global joint optimization. The problems of difficulty in multi-dimensional multi-field data interaction, different time scales and optimization limitation in a digital prototype design process are solved.

column12: Systems and methods for partial digital retraining
column13: Provided herein is an integrated circuit including, in some embodiments, a hybrid neural network including a plurality of analog layers, a digital layer, and a plurality of data outputs. The plurality of analog layers is configured to include programmed weights of the neural network for decision making by the neural network. The digital layer, disposed between the plurality of analog layers and the plurality of data outputs, is configured for programming to compensate for weight drifts in the programmed weights of the neural network, thereby maintaining integrity of the decision making by the neural network. Also provided herein is a method including, in some embodiments, programming the weights of the plurality of analog layers; determining the integrity of the decision making by the neural network; and programming the digital layer of the neural network to compensate for the weight drifts in the programmed weights of the neural network.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR OPERATING A SYSTEM
PRE-PRINTED POSTAGE APPLICATION
column13: Aspects of the technology described herein provide a pre-printed postage. As an initial step, the pre-printed postage is printed on a media, such as an envelope or sticker. Each instance of pre-printed postage comprises a unique identifier encoded in a machine-readable format. Postage is paid for through a payment process. In order to pay for an individual instance of pre-printed postage, the unique identifier encoded in the pre-printed postage needs to be provided to the payment application. At the end of the payment process, a central database is updated to associate the unique identifier with a postal value calculated during payment. When the Postal Service receives an item with pre-printed postage it validates the pre-printed postage and then indicates usage of the pre-printed postage by updating the central database.

column12: MCAD and ECAD interaction design method
column13: The invention provides an MCAD and ECAD interaction design method. The MCAD and ECAD interaction design method comprises the following steps that S31, importing Emn file input streams; S32, reading arow, judging whether the data is empty, if yes, ending, and otherwise, entering S33; S33, judging whether the keyword is a start keyword of the data block, if yes, entering S34, and otherwise, returning to S31; S34, reading a row, judging whether the row is an end keyword of the data block, if yes, returning to S1, and otherwise, entering S35; and S35, reading and storing the data block information. According to the method, the design data exchange of the PCB between MCAD software and ECAD software can be realized, the problem of interference between PCBs and mechanism space can be solved, theinterference problem of electronic components of the PCBs is reduced, and the working efficiency and correctness in the design process are improved.

column12: Architecture method and device for store visitor information, equipment, medium and program product
column13: The invention discloses an architecture method and device for store visitor information, terminal equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: receiving encrypted video data of store visitors accessing a sales store; capturing pictures of the store visitors based on the encrypted video data, and determining the access time of the store visitors to access the sales store; identifying attribute information of the store visitor according to the picture; obtaining store visitor information associated with the store visitor according to the access time and the attribute information architecture. According to the invention, the cost of the information architecture can be reduced, the problem of inaccurate store visitor information caused by information collection lag can be avoided, and the overall efficiency of accessing the store visitor information of the sales store by the architecture is improved. On the other hand, encryption transmission is performed based on the video data of the store visitors, and the data is safe and reliable, so that the privacy of the store visitors is ensured not to be lost to generate negative effects.

column12: MODEL UPDATE SYSTEM, MODEL UPDATE METHOD, AND RELATED DEVICE
column13: This application disclose a model update system, which may be applied to the network control field. The system includes a site analysis device (102, 502, 602) and a first analysis device (101, 501, 601). The site analysis device (102, 502, 602) is configured to: receive a first model sent by the first analysis device (101, 501, 601); train the first model by using a first training sample to obtain a second model, where the first training sample includes first feature data of a network device (103, 603) in a site network corresponding to the site analysis device (102, 502, 602); obtain differential data between the first model and the second model; and send the differential data to the first analysis device (101, 501, 601). The first analysis device (101, 501, 601) is configured to: send the first model to the site analysis device (102, 502, 602); receive the differential data sent by the site analysis device (102, 502, 602); and update the first model based on the differential data to obtain a third model. The first analysis device (101, 501, 601) in the system can improve privacy on the basis of updating the first model.

column13: The invention relates to a design method of a full-covering decorative cover of an engine compartment. The method comprises the following steps: 1, carrying out statistics on maintenance items of an engine compartment, carrying out priority ranking according to a full-coverage trim cover design evaluation model, and formulating a functional structure design idea of the full-coverage trim cover according to the priority of the maintenance items; 2, formulating a conceptual design scheme and boundary data of the full-coverage trim cover, wherein the conceptual design scheme comprises a partitioning scheme; 3, outputting the full-coverage decoration concept design method and boundary data in the step 2 to a model; 4, performing conformity checking on the CAS surface of the full-coverage trim cover according to the concept design requirements in the step 3; 5, outputting the CAS data meeting the design requirements to a part design professional for 3D data design of decorative cover parts; 6, performing conformity checking on the 3D data of the full-coverage trim cover part; and 7, completing the whole design process of the cabin full-coverage trim cover. The reasonable design method for the full-coverage decoration cover is formulated from the aspects of maintenance requirements and cost control in the conceptual design stage.

According to the invention, full-working-condition simulation of an operation pipeline of the intelligent pipeline plugging robot is realized, and functions and characteristics of plugging, pipe cleaning, speed regulation, step crossing, turning, in-pipe telescopic fine adjustment, slip anchoring force measurement, pressure test, bidirectional wireless communication, failure protection and the like of intelligent pipeline plugging robots of different models and structures are tested; a test platform is provided for prototype design of the intelligent pipeline plugging robot, and safety and reliability in the actual operation process are effectively guaranteed.

column12: Page generation method and device and computer equipment

column12: Early test breakage detection using presubmit runs
column13: The technology employs a micro-scheduler arrangement to detect and correct issues relating to software code testing. The micro-scheduler uses test results from unsubmitted branches to predict test breakages, test fixes, and to identify which changes have broken certain tests. This arrangement is high beneficial in large-scale software systems that have millions or billions of lines of code, and can be used to supplement an existing test automation platform. In response to receipt of a new presubmit or postsubmit test result, the system evaluates the recent test history in relation to milestone tests in order to determine whether or not to schedule a particular test for one or more change list identifiers. Different test conditions, such as currently failing and currently broken, in conjunction with stored presubmit information, help the system determine the range of changes that could be the culprit for a test breakage.

column12: Constant-processing-strength tobacco shred drying method and device and tobacco shred manufacturing method and system
column13: The invention belongs to the field of tobacco processing, and particularly relates to a method for drying tobacco shreds with constant processing strength. The method comprises the following steps: step 1, obtaining a tobacco shred moisture content measured value before drying, a drying processing strength design value and a tobacco shred moisture content design value after drying; step 2, lookingup a table from a corresponding relation table of the drying processing strength value and the tobacco shred drying water loss according to the drying processing strength design value to obtain a tobacco shred drying water loss design value; step 3, substituting the tobacco shred moisture content measured value before drying, the tobacco shred drying water loss design value and the tobacco shredmoisture content design value after drying into a formula M=Y*(1-S2)/(S1-S2) for calculation to obtain a tobacco shred drying feeding amount predicted value; and step 4, drying the tobacco shreds according to the predicted value of the tobacco shred drying feeding amount. The invention further relates to a tobacco shred drying device and a tobacco shred manufacturing method and system. According to the method, the tobacco shreds can be dried according to constant processing strength, and sensory quality stability and physical-chemical property stability of the tobacco shreds are improved.

column12: Simulation condition setting method based on image recognition
column13: The invention relates to a simulation working condition setting method based on image recognition, in finite element simulation analysis, an image recognition method is adopted to recognize a loading point and a constraint point in a model to realize full automation of working condition setting, and the method comprises the following steps: establishing a finite element model; performing multi-angle screenshot on the model, and identifying a loading point and a constraint point of a certain specific working condition by using an image identification algorithm; a Hypermesh finite element pre-processing software interface is utilized to transmit information of the identified loading points and constraint points, then Hypermesh secondary development is utilized to complete automatic loading and constraint of the model, and loading of the working condition is completed. According to the method, multi-angle screenshot is carried out on the simulation model, the positions of the loading points and the constraint points in the model are recognized by adopting an image recognition method, then complete automatic loading is completed, and the simulation analysis efficiency is improved. And support is provided for realizing full automation of the whole simulation process from data design to report analysis.

column12: Distance measuring method for submarine cable fault
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of cable fault point distance measurement, and particularly relates to a submarine cable fault distance measurement method, which comprises the steps of establishing a power transmission line simulation model based on a power circuit simulation environment, performing analog simulation on a line and a fault, and obtaining signal data; performing wavelet transform on the signal data to obtain sample data; constructing a back propagation neural network model, and training the back propagation neural network model by using the training sample data; using test sample data to perform prediction accuracy test on the model; and the fault data is input into the back propagation neural network model passing prediction accuracy test to obtain a predicted fault distance, thereby realizing accurate fault distance measurement of the submarine cable, providing guarantee for stable operation of direct-current power transmission equipment, and having great significance for the stability of a power system.

column12: Multi-unit wind power prediction method based on particle swarm optimization algorithm
column13: The invention relates to a multi-unit wind power prediction method based on a particle swarm optimization algorithm. The method specifically comprises the following steps: acquiring numerical weather forecast data, fan operation data and actually measured power data within a certain time; processing the abnormal data, and dividing the abnormal data into a training set and a test set; defining a particle swarm optimization algorithm objective function and optimization variables; selecting weather forecast and operation data as input data and actually measured power as output data; training an initial particle long-short-term memory network under a variable generated by an initial particle swarm, and obtaining a target function value by using test set data; sending the target function value to a particle swarm optimization algorithm to obtain an updated variable; further training the long short-term memory network, updating the target function value until the optimization is finished, and obtaining an optimal variable and the long short-term memory network; predicting the plurality of units one by one, and adding to obtain the predicted total power of the plurality of units; the method has the advantages that global optimization and parameter optimization are utilized, and the prediction precision is improved.

The system also includes a solenoid valve (112) configured for actuation by a solenoid (146) and for selectively actuating the bypass valve (110) from the first position (126) to the second position (128). The system (100) also includes a pressure sensor (114) configured for sensing pressure in the system (100).

column12: Creation method for generating and operating function model based on automatic verification environment
column13: The invention relates to a creation method for generating and operating function models based on an automatic verification environment, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a plurality of function models according to a preset architecture scheme; according to an input/output data structure of the functional model, defining a general data structure matched with the input/output data structure and storing the general data structure in at least one package; defining an interface conversion function between the input/output data structure and the general data structure; and configuring the function model in a preset automatic verification environment, and calling the interface conversion function according to the data structure type to complete format conversion among different function models. The starting time of verification work can be advanced from the time point of providing a design technology document to the time point of giving a prototype design by an architecture engineer. After the data structure of the model interface is unified, cascading of front and rear models is facilitated, the problems of interface matching and the like do not need to be additionally paid attention to, and the multiplexing difficulty of the model is reduced.

column12: MODEL-INDEPENDENT FEATURE SELECTION
column13: Systems and methods implement a Swiss tournament to determine which of a plurality of candidate feature variables provide the best predictive ability for a target variable. The Swiss tournament is advantageous when there are so many candidate feature variables that it is computationally infeasible to test all combinations of these candidates. Each candidate feature has an aggregate score that identifies how well it contributes to a model's prediction accuracy. With each iteration, or “round” of the Swiss tournament, the candidates are ranked and divided into subsets. All of the candidates within each subset are then used to train the model. Model-independent permutation techniques determine each candidate's contribution to the model's predictive accuracy, from which each candidate's score is then updated. Low-performing candidates may be removed from consideration, thereby speeding up subsequent iterations. At the end of the Swiss tournament, the highest-ranked candidates are the most-relevant for constructing a predictor.

column12: Systems and methods for managing distributed database deployments
column13: Various aspects provide for implementation of a cloud service for running, monitoring, and maintaining cloud distributed database deployments and in particular examples, provides cloud based services to run, monitor and maintain deployments of the known MongoDB database. Various embodiments provide services, interfaces, and manage provisioning of dedicated servers for the distributed database instances (e.g., MongoDB instances). Further aspects, including providing a database as a cloud service that eliminates the design challenges associated with many distributed database implementations, while allowing the client's input on configuration choices in building the database. In some implementations, clients can simply identity a number of database nodes, capability of the nodes, and within minutes have a fully functioning, scalable, replicated, and secure distributed database in the cloud.

column12: Interface structure extraction method and device, medium and electronic equipment
column13: The invention relates to an interface structure extraction method and device, a medium and electronic equipment. The method comprises the steps that a target canvas object is searched for in the compiling period of interface codes; recording code automatic injection is carried out according to the code position of the target canvas object in the interface code; when the interface code is executed, obtaining a target drawing operation executed by the target canvas object through the record code; and traversing the target drawing operation according to a preset data conversion rule and the execution sequence of the target drawing operation, and converting the target drawing operation into a target data structure and outputting the target data structure. Thus, the interface structure information can be extracted from the interface code constructed in any construction mode, a user can conveniently check and judge the interface code according to the interface prototype designed in design software, and acceptance of the interface code is facilitated.

column12: Gradient laminated structure resin-based composite casing containment design method
column13: The invention provides a containment design method for a gradient laminated structure resin-based composite casing. The method comprises the following steps: S1, analyzing containment design requirements of the casing; s2, a composite material system meeting the requirement for containing the design temperature is constructed; s3, constructing a composite material system suitable for containing and designing impact resistance requirements; s4, constructing a composite material containing case; s5, obtaining the dynamic mechanical property of the composite material; s6, a containing laying scheme is selected; s7, determining a rotation impact critical containment failure mode; s8, establishing a dynamic simulation model suitable for engineering; and S9, carrying out inclusion analysis on the composite material casing. The inclusive design method is provided for the gradient laminated structure resin matrix composite material casing, the problem that the inclusive design method of the composite material casing applicable to the current engineering is lacked is solved, and the inclusive capacity of the composite material casing is finally determined.

column12: Simulation use test platform

A testing body is fixedly connected to the end, away from the vertical plate, of the fixing plate, a water pipe is inserted into the testing body, a water tank is fixedly connected to the end, away from the testing body, of the water pipe, a driving plate is arranged on the side wall of the top of the bottom plate, and linkage columns are rotationally connected to the positions, close to the two ends, of the side wall, opposite to the testing body, of the driving plate; the utility model has the advantages that the motor drives the two ends of the driving plate to move back and forth, so that the two linkage columns are driven to move back and forth, the two supporting legs are driven to move back and forth, the function of simulating walking of the two legs is realized, the adsorption force of hygienic products in the moving process is tested, and whether leakage occurs or not is observed.

column12: Interactive UI design searching method and system based on convolutional self-encoding network
column13: The invention discloses an interactive UI design search method and system based on a convolutional self-encoding network. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a Rico data set and performing convolutional neural network analysis to obtain reference feature data; collecting a user demand, judging the user demand to obtain a user demand data type, and if the user demand data is a frame graph type, performing frame graph UI search matching on the user demand; if the user demand data is of a color type, performing color UI search matching on the user demand; a corresponding UI page obtained through matching is displayed; according to the frame graph UI search, the frame graph of the UI page in the reference feature data is matched according to the size and position relation of the frame graph drawn by the user; the color UI search is to judge and read the color, the position area and the size of a color map drawn by a user, and match the color map with a color histogram in the reference feature data through a quadtree algorithm. The method has the effect of improving the search efficiency and the matching accuracy.

The method and device for determining motion parameters solve the technical problems of long time consuming and low efficiency in setting motion parameters in related technologies.

column12: Systems and methods for generating strategic competitive intelligence data relevant for an entity
column13: Strategic competitive intelligence data generation systems and methods are provided. The system stores internal intellectual property data of an entity, receives external technology development data from predefined sources and intellectual property data from the internal portfolio database of the entity, stores a set of relevant rules, executes them, filters the technology development data and the intellectual property data, based on the rules executed by the rule engine. It stores in one of an entity aligned cluster database, the filtered technology development data and the intellectual property data. The entity aligned cluster databases are created against predefined entity aligned clusters. The system executes an input query, determines one relevant entity aligned cluster database for executing the search query, and populates relevancy scores in two matrices, aggregates the relevancy scores through multiplication of the matrices. The system then analyses the resultant matrix based on set of rules and displays results of the analytics.

column12: Three-dimensional finite element modeling method for rigidity-adjustable vibration table shearing soil box
column13: The invention discloses a rigidity-adjustable vibration table shear soil box three-dimensional finite element modeling method, which comprises the following specific steps of: respectively establishing a rectangular steel pipe frame lamination layer and a square section energy consumption rod part through finite element software, and endowing corresponding material attributes with the rectangular steel pipe frame lamination layer and the square section energy consumption rod part; assembling the reasonably divided parts into a geometric model according to a soil box prototype design scheme; establishing contact between the energy consumption rods and the frame lamination, reasonably setting constraints for each part, and completing establishment of a three-dimensional finite element model of the laminated shear soil box; according to the physical and mechanical properties of test soil in the box, the rigidity of the finite element model of the soil box can be accurately adjusted according to needs by adjusting model parameters such as the number, the sectional area and the rigidity of the energy dissipation rods on the periphery of the frame lamination and the arrangement number and the arrangement mode of the fixing keys. The method provided by the invention can provide a reference basis for prototype design optimization and processing and manufacturing of the soil box, which is of great significance for carrying out test research on the earthquake simulation vibration table of the deeply-buried underground structure.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SELF-AGGREGATION OF PERSONAL DATA AND CONTROL THEREOF
column13: A method includes receiving, by a logic layer processor, over a communication network, from a plurality of electronic resources, initial user personal identifiable information (PII) of a user of a plurality of users. The user PII includes a plurality of data elements. The plurality of data elements of the initial PII of the user are classified to populate a profile map data structure having a standardized predefined data schema of a plurality of vector elements so as to form a user-specific profile map data structure of the user. Additional user personal identifiable information (PII) of the user is iteratively received from the plurality of electronic resources. The additional user PII of the user is iteratively classified to update the user-specific profile map data structure of the user. A plurality of user-specific data management software functions is enabled based on the user-specific profile map data structure.

column12: Modeling method of catalytic converter conversion efficiency model
column13: The invention discloses a modeling method of a catalytic converter conversion efficiency model, which comprises the following steps: obtaining test data of an automobile engine under a test working condition, the test data comprising a catalytic converter temperature, and the catalytic converter temperature is obtained by performing zoning measurement on a catalytic converter; and establishing a catalytic converter conversion efficiency model by using test data. And the temperature of the catalyst is measured in a partitioned manner, so that a more accurate temperature range in the operation process of the catalyst can be obtained. The method not only facilitates the subsequent debugging of the catalytic converter conversion efficiency model, but also further improves the accuracy of the catalytic converter conversion efficiency model, so that the catalytic converter conversion efficiency model can predict the conversion efficiency of the catalytic converter within the error range.

column12: AUTOMATIC BULLDOZER BLADE CONTROL SYSTEM AND CONTROL METHOD
column13: Provided in the present invention are an automatic bulldozer blade control system and control method. The control system comprises a RTK dual-antenna module, a data receiving and resolving module, an algorithm calculating module, a display module, and a bulldozer blade control module. The RTK dual-antenna module comprises a three-axis sensor and a positioning system; the data receiving and resolving module is configured to receive and resolve data acquired by the RTK dual-antenna module; the algorithm calculating module is configured to analyze the received and resolved data; said data is then displayed by means of the display module; the bulldozer blade control module controls a bulldozer blade according to the analyzing and resolving results. The present invention is of user-centered design, and achieves accurate control to upper and lower amplitudes of a bulldozer blade during a working process of a bulldozer, thereby reducing errors in human judgment, improving the project construction quality, and improving the construction technology level.

column12: Neural network water quality parameter prediction modeling method based on AdaBoost improvement
column13: The invention relates to a water quality parameter modeling method, in particular to a neural network water quality parameter prediction modeling method based on AdaBoost improvement, and solves the technical problems that an over-fitting phenomenon exists in an existing BPNN neural network for water quality parameter modeling, and network training fails due to the fact that the BPNN neural network is prone to falling into a local extreme value. The neural network water quality parameter prediction modeling method based on AdaBoost improvement comprises the following steps: 1) pre-processing measured water quality sample data; dividing the preprocessed sample set into a training set and a test set; 2) after initializing the sample weight of the training set, obtaining a water quality parameter concentration strong predictor; and (3) evaluating the prediction effect of the strong predictor by using test set data to obtain a water quality parameter concentration prediction model, and combining the prediction results of a plurality of BPNN models according to a proportion to complement each other, thereby reducing errors and improving the stability of the model.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR REALTIME MONITORING AND FORECASTING OF FOULING OF AIR PREHEATER EQUIPMENT
column13: This disclosure relates generally to a method and system for real time monitoring and forecasting of fouling of an air preheater (APH) in a thermal power plant. The system is deploying a digital replica or digital twin that works in tandem with the real APH of the thermal power plant. The system receives real-time data from one or more sources and provides real-time soft sensing of intrinsic parameters as well as that of health, fouling related parameters of APH. The system is also configured to diagnose the current class of fouling regime and the reasons behind a specific class of fouling regime of the APH. The system is also configured to be used as advisory system that alerts and recommends corrective actions in terms of either APH parameters or parameters controlled through other equipment such as selective catalytic reduction or boiler or changes in operation or design.

The opening angle of the transverse supporting rod is limited, when the longitudinal supporting rod is obliquely opened, the elastic supporting rod elastically supports the mounting bracket and the supporting legs through reverse elasticity, it is guaranteed that the supporting legs make contact with the ground stably all the time, the longitudinal supporting stability of the whole longitudinal supporting rod is guaranteed, and the inclination angle of the longitudinal supporting rod can be adjusted.

column12: Distributing online ads by targeting online ad requests
column13: Techniques for distributing online ads by targeting online ad requests using test data to predict performance. The techniques can target ad requests in automated online advertising systems in which ad requests are generated by an ad exchange server and bids are placed by marketer devices in real time. The techniques aggregate bid units and compare bid unit characteristics to select bid units to target in ways that address data sparsity, variance, and volume issues. Data sparsity issues are addressed by aggregating bid units to avoid using bid units having insufficient data. Data variance issues are addressed by computing stability metrics for bid units that enable discounting the effect of outliers. Data volume and processing efficiency issues are addressed by grouping similar bid units based on similar metrics (e.g., normalized ROI) and/or similar stability scores, and then ranking the bid units and selecting the top ranked bid units to target.
