column12: ABNORMALITY DETERMINATION DEVICE FOR TRANSPORT REFRIGERATION APPARATUS, TRANSPORT REFRIGERATION APPARATUS PROVIDED WITH ABNORMALITY DETERMINATION DEVICE, AND ABNORMALITY DETERMINATION METHOD FOR TRANSPORTATION REFRIGERATION APPARATUS
column13: To provide an abnormality determination device for a transport refrigeration apparatus, a transport refrigeration apparatus provided with this abnormality determination device, and an abnormality determination method for the transportation refrigeration apparatus, in which accurate determination of abnormality in the transport refrigeration apparatus may be realized.SOLUTION: An abnormality determination device 60 comprising a determination unit 67 for determining an abnormality of a transportation refrigeration apparatus attached to a container acquires, upon pre-use test before installation of a transportation refrigeration apparatus on transportation equipment where a test operation for at least one test operation mode is carried out, at least a part of a time series test data related to the same test operation mode among a plurality of test operation modes. A determination unit 67 determines the presence or absence of an abnormality in the transportation refrigeration apparatus from the change tendency in the time-series test data related to the same test operation mode among the plurality of test operation modes during the multiple pre-use tests. When there is no abnormality, the determination unit predicts the time when the abnormality occurs.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

column12: Video playing method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention provides a video playing method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: defining a universal SDK protocol, and defining an interface to establish the connection between a client display interface and a server media player; the client receives and renders a video stream picture through a TextureView control and sets the video stream picture to a server media player by displaying a texture monitoring function callback interface; and after receiving the interface setting instruction, the server displays a media player data source loading and playing process, and displays video playing control and a video list on the client. Through the scheme, the separation of the UI interface and the function can be realized, the customized design of the UI component is facilitated, the diversified UI design requirements of a user are met, and the flexible control of video playing is realized.
column14: WUHAN YANGTZE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
column15: WANG JUNDE;;WEN SHIMIN;;YUN XIAOHUI;;SU JUNJIE;;ZUO DAMAN

column12: Cloud computing product demand priority ranking method and system
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of cloud computing, and provides a cloud computing product demand priority ranking method and system, and the method comprises the steps: extracting hierarchical demand indexes from obtained original demand information, and constructing a demand index information architecture table; generating a sub-problem for a secondary demand index in the constructed demand index information architecture table, and performing data acquisition on a target user of a sample size; carrying out demand index classification on the collected data through quality distribution analysis, and carrying out priority initial sorting on demand indexes in each classification through satisfaction analysis; constructing an analytic hierarchy structure model according to the demand indexes, and calculating importance sorting weights of the demand indexes; and adjusting the importance ranking weight of the demand indexes according to a demand index classification result, and correcting the initial priority ranking of the demand indexes in each classification according to the adjusted importance ranking weight. The method can guide a product research and development end to focus and improve key functions, and reasonably distributes design and development resources.
column14: CLP CLOUD COMPUTING TECH CO LTD

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR GENOMIC PREDICTION
column13: In variants, a method for genomic association can include: determining observed variable values and observed phenotype values for each organism in a population, removing information from variables of interest, determining a phenotype-variable association model, identifying causal variables associated with a phenotype, and/or any other suitable steps.

column12: Digital all-in-one guide plate for odontoless jaw implantation and manufacturing method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a digital all-in-one guide plate for edentulous jaw implantation and a manufacturing method of the digital all-in-one guide plate. The manufacturing method comprises the steps:acquiring a radiation guide plate, wearing the radiation guide plate in the step S1 in the oral cavity, scanning by using CBCT equipment to obtain CBCT data of the oral cavity, scanning the radiationguide plate by using an optical scanner, fitting the CBCT data and the optical scanning data to obtain implantation data, determining model specifications of the implant and the retention nail according to the implantation data, designing three-dimensional positions of the implant and the retention nail in the jaw bone, exporting data of an implant guide catheter and a retention nail catheter,designing an implant guiding part plug-in according to the data of the implant guiding catheter, designing a retention part plug-in according to the data of the retention nail catheter obtained in the step S3, performing 3D printing on the implantation guide part plug-in and the retention part plug-in according to the data designed in the step S4, and assembling the implantation guide part plug-in, the retention part plug-in and the radiation guide plate to obtain the three-in-one guide plate. The method has the advantages of high operation efficiency, good repairing effect and the like.

column12: Figure image scene generation system based on AI interaction
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of image generation, in particular to a figure image scene generation system based on AI interaction, which comprises a user interaction design module, a figure image shooting module, a figure image analysis processing module, a figure image processing module, an image integration correction module, an image generation module and a management database. According to the system, a corresponding scene theme is matched for a user according to a keyword selected by the user through a voice recognition interface, meanwhile, age evaluation is carried out on a shot user static image, layer-by-layer screening is carried out on the basis, the most appropriate hair style and clothes are matched for a user figure image, the defect that in the prior art, the age attention degree is not high is overcome, and the user experience is improved. According to the method and the device, choices which better conform to age features and aesthetic preferences are provided, the standard of personalized customization of user demands and preferences is achieved, the visual effect and the reality sense are improved, the fidelity and the quality of the generated image are enhanced, and the generated image is made to better conform to the expectation of the user.
column14: FEIWU SHANGHAI CREATIVE DESIGN CO LTD

column12: Design method and device of false tooth 3D printing support and storable medium
column13: The invention discloses a design method and device of a false tooth 3D printing support and a storable medium, and is applied to the technical field of false tooth design, the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a three-dimensional tooth jaw model, and carrying out normal position processing on the three-dimensional tooth jaw model to obtain a normal position three-dimensional tooth jaw model; a false tooth support boundary model corresponding to the normal position three-dimensional tooth jaw model is obtained, and physiological anatomical features corresponding to the false tooth support boundary model are extracted according to the false tooth support boundary model. According to the method, excessive manual interaction design operation in existing design software can be greatly reduced, the design level and the design efficiency of operators are rapidly improved, and the design precision of the operators is improved.
column15: SUN YUCHUN;;CHEN HU;;LI CHENG;;TANG BAO;;PANG ENLIN;;ZHAI WENRU

column12: Method for predicting derogatory users in tariff package based on user data
column13: The invention relates to a charge package derogatory user prediction method based on user data, and the method specifically comprises the following steps: S1, data collection: extracting indexes related to the individual behavior characteristics of a user from the user data; S2, carrying out data cleaning and sample division; S3, training and testing a derogatory user prediction model: verifying the effect of the derogatory user prediction model by using test set sample data, and storing a result after feature screening; S4, training a derogatory user attribution analysis model; S5, predicting total users: inputting total user data into the derogatory user prediction model to obtain potential derogatory users. The individual consumption behavior characteristics of the user are analyzed from mass data, and the potential derogatory users are efficiently mined at low cost through the multi-dimensional characteristics of the user, so that the user perception is pertinently improved, and the brand image of an operator is improved.

column12: Design and processing method of force application component of scoliosis traction bed
column13: The invention provides a designing and processing method for a force application component of a scoliosis traction bed, and belongs to the technical field of traction beds, the designing and processing method for the force application component of the scoliosis traction bed is characterized by comprising the following steps: scanning the body surface of a patient by using a 3D scanner to obtain body surface data; importing the body surface data of the patient and the X-ray film into software for body surface data design; exporting the designed body surface data into a file, and engraving a male mold by using a blank; a plastic plate is heated and then attached to the male mold to be formed; the formed force application part is cut and polished; a connecting piece is installed on the polished force application component; the force application component is customized and designed according to factors such as the scoliosis type and the degree of the patient, the force application component is better attached to the body of the patient, when the patient uses the scoliosis correction device, positioning is easy, the situation that the force application position is not accurate is avoided, the correction position is easy to determine, and the scoliosis correction device has a more obvious improvement effect on the back of the razor while scoliosis correction is conducted on the patient.

column12: Visual multi-modal data acquisition, transmission and processing method
column13: The invention provides a visual multi-modal data acquisition, transmission and processing method, belongs to the technical field of data governance, and aims to realize component model description and extension, multi-modal acquisition component construction, Flink-based stream batch integrated transmission, and data encryption and decryption in the transmission process to ensure data security. And providing a processing component for data cleaning, data extraction and data identification, arranging a component to realize visual design of a data processing task model, and constructing a model language converter to support completion of data processing. The data processing task is rapidly constructed through visual component arrangement, and efficient data processing is achieved.

column12: Turbofan engine inclusiveness evaluation integration platform
column13: The invention discloses a turbofan engine inclusiveness evaluation integration platform. An inclusiveness design module provides design specification management and design model management for a turbine casing, a fan casing and a gas compressor casing; the inclusiveness test module provides test data management and simulation calibration model management for a turbine casing, a fan casing and a gas compressor casing; the inclusive simulation module performs simulation-related management on a turbine casing, a fan casing and a gas compressor casing, can manage a template of a simulation process, and can create and generate an input data file of inclusive simulation according to the template of the simulation process; and the inclusiveness evaluation module calls an inclusiveness evaluation software tool, creates a corresponding inclusiveness evaluation task, carries out inclusiveness analysis work on the turbine casing, the fan casing and the gas compressor casing, and generates an inclusiveness evaluation report. An engineering platform integrating an inclusive empirical formula and a simulation test is provided, the design efficiency can be effectively improved, the design process is standardized, and intellectual assets of enterprises are reserved.

column12: Clutch system simulation use test bench
column13: The utility model discloses a clutch system simulation use test bench, which comprises a fixed frame for installing a clutch and a fixed seat, the fixed seat is positioned on one side of the fixed frame for installing the clutch, a movable seat is arranged on the fixed seat in a sliding manner, and a first driving device for driving the movable seat to be close to or far away from the fixed frame is arranged on the fixed seat; a rotation driving device is mounted on the moving seat through a first lifting device; a measuring seat is arranged between the movable seat and the fixed frame, a pressure measuring device is installed on the measuring seat through a second lifting device, one side of the pressure measuring device is detachably connected with the rotation driving device, and the other side of the pressure measuring device is provided with a release bearing seat which can be detachably connected with a clutch release bearing. The first driving device, the rotation driving device, the first lifting device, the pressure measuring device and the second lifting device are connected with a controller, and the controller is connected with a display device. The device is high in test efficiency, convenient to operate and capable of avoiding waste.

column12: Sanitary product simulation use testing device
column13: The utility model discloses a sanitary product simulation use testing device which comprises a human body model, the human body model is provided with a body part and a lower limb part which can moverelatively from top to bottom, a mouse part is formed between the body part and the lower limb part, a pressing device is installed at the top of the body part, and an infusion tube leading to the mouse part is installed in the body part. A to-be-tested sample is placed on the mouse, the human body model can simulate various states of a real person, such as standing, sitting, walking and running,the states of human bodies with different weights during sitting can be simulated through the pressing device, the state of discharging body fluid (menstrual blood or urine) of the human bodies is simulated through connecting the infusion tube, and the human body model can simulate the state of discharging the body fluid. The device is simple in structure and convenient to test and operate, and the absorption and side leakage conditions close to reality are tested, so that the permeability test and the leakage-proof performance test are more in line with the actual use.

column12: SOUND DESIGN SYSTEM
column13: To provide a sound design system that identifies human sensitivity with respect to target sound.SOLUTION: A sound design system 1 is equipped with: a calculation section 11 that calculates a physical quantity 22 of sound 21 transmitted from a user who wishes to specify auditory impression; and a specifying section 12 that has correlation information 24 that indicates correlation between the physical quantity 22 of the sound 21 and sensitivity data 23 based on the auditory impression of a person who heard the sound 21, and specifies the human auditory impression for the sound 21 transmitted from the user by applying the correlation information 24 to the physical quantity 22 calculated by the calculation section 11.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

column12: Oil meter drawing design method and system and electronic equipment
column13: The invention discloses an oil meter drawing design method and system and electronic equipment; the method comprises the steps: carrying out the average segmentation of an arc, and determining a score interval corresponding to each segment of equally-divided arc; according to the score interval of the real score, determining the radian corresponding to the real score; constructing a chart component based on the radian so as to draw an oil meter chart; and rendering the chart component to a page, and displaying the oil meter chart. According to the invention, after the radian corresponding to the real score is determined through the real score and the score interval, the chart component is constructed and rendered, and the oil meter chart is displayed, so that the problems that the UI design style cannot be completely realized when the chart is drawn and the chart display is easy to exceed when the actual data is drawn in the prior art are solved.

column12: System and method for the creation and use of visually- diverse high-quality dynamic visual data structures
column13: A system implementable on a computing device having a processor and a memory, including a visual design system to generate a single visual data structure based on a hierarchy of components; a database to store at least one visual data structure and an associated signature where the signature represents at least a semantic composition of the at least one visual data structure; a signature comparer to match a signature of the single visual data structure to an associated signature of at least one visual data structure stored in the database and to present multiple versions of alternate visual data structures for the hierarchy of components for selection by a user; and where the alternate visual data structures are visually different and semantically similar to each other.

column12: Model-based spacecraft complex data visualization system
column13: The invention discloses a model-based spacecraft complex data visualization system. The system comprises a data display layer, a public component layer, a data service layer and a data storage layer. The invention is suitable for the technical field of visual design and simulation. The whole visualization system can comprise all subsystem modules of the spacecraft; the integration and centralization of on-orbit operation data of the spacecraft can be improved to a great extent, and the operation and maintenance cost is reduced; through traction of a spacecraft three-dimensional simulation model, data generated by each subsystem of the spacecraft can be visually and clearly checked, and visualized analysis is carried out on the data, so that the visualization degree is improved; according to the design mode of visualization engine modularization, visualization of various complex types of data can be supported, operation can be simplified, the usability degree of the whole system can be improved, and the data processing efficiency can be improved.

column12: Method for collecting discrete event data in simulation process
column13: The invention discloses a discrete event data collection method in a simulation process, and the method comprises a simulation framework which comprises a plurality of simulation models and a data collection service module, and the data collection service module is used for collecting the data of each simulation model in the simulation process; the data acquisition service module is used for providing a visual interface and configuring a situation data acquisition item of the data acquisition service module based on the visual interface, so that the data acquisition service module acquires corresponding situation data in a simulation process after configuration, and the situation data is a situation data acquisition item in computer simulation. The execution time of the event is discontinuous and is discrete event data triggered by different simulation models; and the data storage module is used for receiving and storing the data acquired by the data acquisition service module. According to the embodiment of the invention, multi-dimensional visual design of the collected data is provided, and information interaction among multiple application programs is met.

column12: Polar meteorological equipment health degree prediction method based on logistic regression and grey theory
column13: The invention relates to a polar meteorological equipment health degree prediction method based on logistic regression and a grey theory. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, converting real-time data for measuring the health of the polar meteorological equipment into the health degree of the polar meteorological equipment through a logistic regression function, wherein parameters of the logistic regression function are solved by adopting a gradient descent method through a maximum likelihood function; secondly, a grey theoretical model is adopted, the future middle and short term health degree of the equipment is predicted through recent health degree data of the equipment, before the grey theoretical model is constructed, the background value of the constructed grey model is modified through density clustering based on the mahalanobis distance, and the prediction precision of the grey model is improved to a certain degree. And finally verifying the effectiveness and certain advancement of the model by using test data of a rainfall instrument in different low-temperature environments.
column15: ZHU YIAN;;REN JIE;;LI LIAN;;ZHONG DONG;;ZHANG LIXIANG

column12: Construction method of reservoir dispatching rule base with expansibility and structuralization
column13: The invention discloses a construction method of a reservoir dispatching rule base with expansibility and structuralization. The method comprises the following steps: 1, extracting characteristic values of a reservoir scheduling rule, including elements such as a control object, a starting opportunity, a scheduling mode, a corresponding reference site, a reference condition and the like; 2, carrying out prototype design on the scheduling rule base according to a logic relation between the characteristic values; 3, based on the selected network data exchange format with expansibility and structuralization, constructing a reservoir scheduling rule base system framework; and 4, carrying out numerical instantiation on the scheduling rule base by using the extracted reservoir scheduling rule characteristic value, and providing data support for model calling. Digital description and construction of the reservoir group joint scheduling rule are achieved, the method has the advantages of being universal, practical, easy to expand and the like, workers can read and compile the rule easily, meanwhile, machine analysis and generation are easy, the method conforms to the operation mode of actual scheduling, and the expansibility and applicability of the reservoir scheduling rule are improved.

column12: SENSOR COMPRISING PATTERN ILLUMINATION-BASED ANNEALED COATED SUBSTRATE AND ONE OR MORE FUNCTIONAL MOLECULES AND PROCESS OF USING SAME
column13: The present invention relates to sensors comprising pattern illumination-based annealed coated substrate and one or more functional molecules and process of using same. Such process yields components that can have one or more electronic and/or optical functionalities that are integrated on the same substrate or film and to which one or more functional molecules can be attached to yield a sensor. In addition, such process does not require large- scale clean rooms and is easily configurable. Thus, rapid device prototyping, design change and evolution in the lab and on the production side is realized. The resulting sensors provide a sensing capability that is as good as or better than current sensors and can be tailored to sense specific biomaterials and/or chemicals.

CPS S/W Angle and flat bar plasma processing system linking CPS-based processing information management S/W
column13: The present invention provides a system for plasma-processing an angle and a flat bar in association with a cyber physical system (CPS)-based processing information management S/W, in order to perform member input, transfer, encoder length control, laser marking (member information), plasma processes (cut-off/hole/snip/cutting) and member discharge sequentially through an automation step in association with the CPS-based processing information management S/W, comprising: a control server operating management data (management S/W) for managing processing information of members based on the CPS; a design server operating design data (design S/W) for designing a processing state to form design information data at members, and transmitting the design information data to the control server; a plasma processing apparatus provided on a manufacturing site, and driven according to processing data set in the processing server provided to receive processing information data on a member processing method through the control server, to sequentially perform input and transfer of a member material, encoder length control, laser marking, plasma processing and member discharge; and a communication network configured to form a virtual space for exchanging information based on the CPS with respect to the control server, the design server, and the processing server.

column12: PCBA dynamic function detection method and device based on digital twinborn behavior model modeling
column13: The invention discloses a PCBA dynamic function detection method and device based on digital twinborn behavior model modeling. The PCBA dynamic function detection device comprises a model test system, a test board, special test equipment and automatic test equipment. PCBA dynamic function detection is carried out in combination with digital twinborn behavior model modeling, a power supply part is tested, whether a power supply works normally or not is detected, and the voltage of each point is tested and a comparator is used; testing a port and an interface to determine whether abnormities are caused by short circuit and open circuit conditions; testing the read-write function of the integrated circuit module IC and I/O, wherein the test content comprises Flash test, EEPROM test, CPU test, SDRAM test and Logic IC test; according to the PCBA dynamic function detection method, the PCBA dynamic function detection device and the PCBA dynamic function detection system, a special function test is adopted, an infrared element and an external receiver of the PCBA are detected, the advantages of the digital twin technology are utilized to avoid turnover time prolonging and cost increasing caused by circuit board redesign and redesign, and the efficiency of the PCBA dynamic function detection process is improved.

column12: System and method for exploring immersive content and immersive advertisements on television
column13: A system for navigating, exploring, and controlling immersive content and immersive advertisements provided on one or more OTT television applications using connected digital media players and/or user computing devices is presented. Immersive content and immersive advertisements are content and advertisements that can be viewed in 360 degrees so as to change the point of view and view the same content or advertisement from different angles. The user is enabled to control the playback, navigation, and exploration of the 360-degree immersive content and immersive advertisements using a digital trackpad in a downloadable 360-degree media player that can be applied as a separate application integration on a user's smartphone or other device or that can be integrated into the OTT mobile application. Other connected streaming devices can also integrate the 360-degree media player to allow for 360 degree exploration and viewing of the immersive content and immersive advertisements.

column12: Electric power material demand prediction method based on spatial-temporal clustering
column13: The invention discloses an electric power material demand prediction method based on spatial-temporal clustering, and the method comprises the steps: calling and cleaning historical demand data of electric power materials; extracting new features of cleaned data samples in the time dimension; carrying out replacement processing on noise in the cleaned historical demand data of the electric power materials, and smoothing data noise; clustering the data subjected to replacement processing in time and space dimensions, and dividing the clustered data into a training set and a test set; obtaining reference materials adjacent to new materials according to the new features by using a k-nearest neighbor algorithm, and updating intra-class points; training the training set by using a plurality of training models, and predicting by using test set data; measuring the prediction precision of the training models in the target class by using model precision evaluation indexes, and selecting the training model with the highest precision to carry out electric power material demand prediction; according to the invention, batch analysis of electric power materials can be realized, and the demand rule of the materials can be accurately grasped.
column14: SHANGHAI HUANENG E COMMERCE CO LTD;;HUANENG ENERGY & COMMUNICATIONS HOLDING CO LTD

column12: Liquid crystal instrument irregular virtual pointer display method and liquid crystal instrument
column13: The invention provides a liquid crystal instrument irregular virtual pointer display method and a liquid crystal instrument. The method comprises the steps: obtaining an instrument data pre-display range, and determining a rotation angle corresponding to an instrument pointer according to an instrument interface UI design effect; establishing a first table based on a corresponding relationship between a pre-display numerical value in the instrument data pre-display range and an instrument pointer angle; establishing a second table based on the corresponding relationship between the instrumentpointer angle and the pointer picture; and calculating animation drawing times between the pre-displayed numerical value and the current value, and after animation drawing is started, sequentially displaying the pointer pictures within the animation drawing times according to a corresponding relationship among the pre-displayed numerical value, the instrument pointer angle and the pointer picturesin the first table and the second table. Based on the scheme, accurate display of instrument pointers on instrument panels of different shapes can be achieved, the dynamic display effect of the liquid crystal instrument pointers is improved, and the user experience is improved.

column12: Geographic information architecture and content forming method
column13: The invention provides a geographic information architecture and a content forming method. The method comprises the following steps of: obtaining a plurality of source map table data through a data processing device, and integrating the plurality of source map table data into basic map table data; defining a to-be-planned complete region boundary range corresponding to the basic drawing table datain the basic drawing table data through the data processing device; defining a reference longitude and latitude interval range in the basic drawing table data through the data processing device; defining a unit grid boundary range in the basic drawing table data through the data processing device, wherein the unit grid boundary range and the longitude and latitude interval range have a default proportional relation; and dividing the to-be-planned complete region boundary range corresponding to the basic drawing table data into a plurality of unit grid boundary ranges through the data processing device.

column12: Improved WOA-GRU-based flood flow prediction method and system
column13: The invention discloses an improved WOA-GRU flood flow prediction method and system, and the method comprises the following steps: (1) carrying out the preprocessing of original data obtained in advance, and converting the processed data into matrix data according to a time sequence; (2) establishing a random forest model to perform feature selection, training related data and performing importance measurement; (3) performing normalization processing on the data, and dividing sample data into a training set and a test set according to a time sequence; (4) constructing a GRU model, and initializing parameters of the GRU model; (5) optimizing the hidden layer unit number and the learning rate of the GRU model by using the improved WOA algorithm; and (6) establishing an improved WOA-GRU flood flow prediction model, predicting the flood flow by using test set data and the model, and outputting an error and a prediction result. According to the invention, the improved WOA-GRU model is used for flood flow prediction, and the method has the characteristics of high convergence speed, high generalization ability and high prediction precision, and is more suitable for flood flow prediction.
column15: JI CHUNLEI;;PENG TIAN;;ZHANG CHU;;SUN NA;;ZHAO HUANYU;;XIA XIN;;SUN WEI;;LI YIMAN;;WANG ZHEN
column32: SUN W: "Analysis and forecasting of the carbon price using multi—resolution singularvalue decomposition and extreme learning machine optimized by adaptive whale optimization algorithm", 《APPLIED ENERGY》, vol. 231, pages 1354 - 1371;;牛培峰;吴志良;马云鹏;史春见;李进柏;: "基于鲸鱼优化算法的汽轮机热耗率模型预测", 化工学报, no. 03, pages 257 - 265;;周有荣;王凯;: "改进WOA-指数幂乘积模型在基坑变形预测中的应用", 水资源与水工程学报, no. 03, pages 235 - 241

column12: Webpage table display method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of UI design, and discloses a webpage table display method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: responding to a click event in a currently displayed webpage table clicked by a user, responding to a target cell determined by the click event, and extracting the target content information of the target cell; traversing remaining cells except the target cell in the webpage table, extracting content information of the remaining cells, calculating a correlation degree between the target content information and the content information of the remaining cells, and screening out information with the correlation degree with the target content information greater than a preset value from the content information of the remaining cells as correlation information; and determining an associated cell corresponding to the associated information and a non-associated cell corresponding to the non-associated information from the remaining cells, performing associated display on the target cell and the associated cell, and distinguishing display of the non-associated cell to visually understand a data associated party and a data associated source of the clicked target cell so as to improve a display effect.
column14: PING AN PUHUI ENTERPRISE MAN CO LTD

column12: Method and system for generating multi-terminal table data display page
column13: The invention provides a multi-terminal table data display page generation method and system, and the method comprises the steps: building a table data display page, and storing table data display information into a browser localStorage attribute; based on a pre-constructed standardized table data component, corresponding components are selected and arranged in a table data design area, and the standardized table data component and the table data design area are set based on a browser and arranged on the same page; based on a table display requirement, selecting a language type of the required source code; performing table data row and column quantity and type configuration on table data contents of the table data design area; configuring parameters of the table data component to obtain all configurations of the required table data display page; and acquiring the configuration information of the rows and columns of the whole table data and the source code type from the localStorage attribute of the browser, and generating the source code of the corresponding language type based on the character string templates corresponding to different language types.

column12: Electronic product life cloud chart and life uncertainty visualization method based on three-dimensional digital model
column13: The invention relates to an electronic product life cloud chart and life uncertainty visualization method based on a three-dimensional digital model. The method comprises the following steps of: firstly, constructing and simplifying the three-dimensional digital model of an electronic product; according to life data, carrying out visual design of a life mean value and a health degree based on an RGB color mode; determining a unit life distribution type and a corresponding geometrical shape, and combining the RGB color mode to carry out life distribution and dispersity degree visual design; andselecting and determining an RGB color mode to complete the construction and display of the circuit board product service life cloud chart. An expression form is provided for the electronic product life analysis result, and the life, the life distribution and the dispersity can be clearly expressed. On the basis, an engineer can quickly identify a weak link of life and better perform electronic product reliability design.
column15: WANG ZILI;;XIA QUAN;;SUN BO;;REN YI;;YANG DEZHEN;;FENG QIANG

column12: Motor reliability modeling and life prediction method based on multi-performance parameter degradation
column13: The invention discloses a motor reliability modeling and life prediction method based on multi-performance parameter degradation, and the method comprises the steps: firstly analyzing the relation between a failure mechanism and performance degradation of a motor, designing an experiment scheme, and collecting experiment data; the method comprises the following steps of: selecting related performance parameters, respectively establishing a performance degradation model of a Wiener process based on a time scale transformation-mixing effect with a measurement error for the selected related performance parameters, estimating model parameters by using test data, and finally establishing a degradation model of multiple performance parameters based on a Copula function to predict the service life of the motor. The invention provides a motor reliability modeling and service life prediction method based on multi-performance parameter degradation from the angle of operation performance of a motor by aiming at the problems that a motor failure mode is relatively complex and integral modeling is difficult, considering the heterogeneity problem of a motor individual and the measurement error interference problem at the same time, and aiming at solving the problem of the motor reliability modeling and service life prediction method based on multi-performance parameter degradation from the angle of operation performance of the motor. And the service life of the motor can be effectively predicted.

column12: Page request method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of UI design, and discloses a page request method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps: traversing callback functions of all page requests being processed by Native and establishing arrays of all the callback functions and the corresponding page requests; in response to a target page request, receiving a target request result of the target page request sent by the background server, and extracting a callback function mark from the target request result; and querying a target array corresponding to the callback function mark from the arrays, returning the target request result to a target callback function of the target array, analyzing the received target request result by utilizing the target callback function according to a preset rule, and displaying an analysis result on a display interface, so that the problems that the data requrested to be returned by the Native is not displayed on the corresponding page and the page display is disordered in the Native calling process are solved.
column14: PING AN PUHUI ENTERPRISE MAN CO LTD

column12: Ocean element data visualization system supporting multi-type data processing
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of ocean data analysis, and relates to an ocean element data visualization system supporting multi-type data processing. Comprising the steps of ocean element data acquisition and storage, data processing, visual design, data analysis, visual display and interaction, visual chart storage and system optimization and maintenance. The ocean element visualization system supports processing of multiple types of data including sea surface temperature, salinity, wind field and density, and is simple, convenient, easy to use, high in customizability and good in visualization effect, so that a user is helped to better understand and perceive ocean elements and change trends thereof, and powerful support is provided for research of climate change and an ocean ecosystem.

column12: ANALYTICS PLATFORM FOR REMOTE VEHICLE ONBOARD DIAGNOSTICS (OBD) AND INSPECTION MAINTENANCE (I/M)
column13: Remote diagnoses of a vehicle comprises periodically receiving, by one or more servers, vehicle metrics transmitted wirelessly over a communication network from a remote data logger device in the vehicle. The vehicle metrics are analyzed by the server to determine at least one of i) whether the vehicle is compliant with predefined emissions standards, and ii) whether a component of the vehicle is progressing towards a failure based on predictive analytics. Results of the analysis are electronically communicated to a user by the server.

column12: Development system of visual low-code platform
column13: The invention provides a development system of a visual low-code platform, which comprises an application management subsystem used for creating applications according to user requirements and providing editing, previewing, publishing and deleting functions for the applications; the data source management subsystem is used for creating data sources for applications and performing unified management on the data sources; the visual design subsystem is used for converting the data source into an image and carrying out interactive processing; the arrangement engine is used for generating JSON description; and the rendering engine is used for realizing conversion from the JSON to a real application. Through the method provided by the invention, the rapid construction of the dynamic interactive application is realized.
column15: E HAIHONG;;SONG MEINA;;KANG WENJUN;;CONG LIJING;;LIANG YUEMEI;;WANG HONGMAN

column12: ARRANGEMENT FOR TESTING VEHICLE COMPONENTS AND A METHOD FOR SETTING UP AN ARRANGEMENT FOR TESTING
column13: There is provided an arrangement for testing vehicle components, said arrangement comprising a test system and at least one test chamber (111-116) for components to be tested. In the invention, the arrangement comprises an infra structure module (221) comprising a transportable container (231) for accommodating test system equipment, and at least two test modules (121-126) each comprising a trans-portable container (131) comprising the test chamber (111) for the vehicle components to be tested. Infra structure module is between the test modules. The arrangement further comprises test system connection element for operatively connecting the test system equipment at the infra structure module (221) to the test module (121).

column12: Functional double-page layout UI design method based on Android system
column13: The invention discloses a functional double-page layout UI design method based on an Android system, which comprises the following steps: modifying a default UI layout, realizing display of a left UI and a right UI by utilizing a linear layout, a laminated layout and a basic control, and taking the display of the left UI and the right UI as the layout of a basic window; modifying an onCreate method of a SetingsActivity class to obtain information displayed in double pages, then displaying data in a page manner, meanwhile, copying an onPreferceStartFragment method, and processing menu click logic; rewriting an onPreferceTreeClick method and an onPreferceStartFragment method by using a SetingsPreferceFragment, and realizing the response control on the menu click of the page in the two methods, so that the response control on the menu click of the page can be realized by using the SetingsPreferceFragment method and the onPreferceStartFragment method; and transforming SubSetingLauncher, adding necessary information of double-page display, and meanwhile, transmitting data needing to be displayed to the SetingsActivity through the transformed SubSetingLauncher. The design is reasonable, rapid jump between menus can be realized, the operation is natural and smooth, the right animation loading effect can be customized, and the problems of alternate display of single-page display data and operation redundancy are solved.

column12: FRAMEWORK AND METHODS OF DIVERSE EXPLORATION FOR FAST AND SAFE POLICY IMPROVEMENT
column13: The present technology addresses the problem of quickly and safely improving policies in online reinforcement learning domains. As its solution, an exploration strategy comprising diverse exploration (DE) is employed, which learns and deploys a diverse set of safe policies to explore the environment. DE theory explains why diversity in behavior policies enables effective exploration without sacrificing exploitation. An empirical study shows that an online policy improvement algorithm framework implementing the DE strategy can achieve both fast policy improvement and safe online performance.
column14: UNIV NEW YORK STATE RES FOUND
column16: THE RESEARCH FOUNDATION FOR THE STATE UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK (2019-02-08)

column12: Test question bank system based on environmental data
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of test question banks, and further discloses a test question bank system based on the environmental data. The test question bank system includes: an environmental data test library; the environmental data test library comprises test content design and test data production. The test content comprises a test subject, test content and an evaluation criterion; the test subject comprises a unit technology test subject design system and a comprehensive function test subject design system. The test subject and the test content match test content design and test data production, so that test subjects are divided in detail, and a unit technology test subject design system and a comprehensive function test subject design system are divided. Sixteen sub-subjects are divided from unit technology testing and comprehensive function testing respectively, and quantitative evaluation is performed on the difficulty degree of the examination question data incooperation with the aspects of environment complexity, key technology indexes, technical support difficulty and the like, so that whether each set of examination question data meets the difficulty requirement required by the scheme or not can be accurately tested.

column12: Voice Interaction Tool for Voice-Assisted Application Prototypes
column13: A voice interaction tool for voice-assisted application prototypes is described. A visual page of an application prototype is displayed in a design interface. The design interface is controlled to provide an interaction interface to receive a trigger and an associated action for the visual page of the application prototype. The trigger may correspond to one of a voice command, a user gesture, or a time delay, and the action may correspond to one of a speech response, a page transition to an additional visual page of the application prototype, or playback of a media file. User input is received to provide the trigger and the action, and associated interaction data is generated to include the trigger, the action, and the visual page of the application prototype. The associated interaction data is stored to enable testing of the trigger and the action during a testing phase of the application prototype.
column15: WEBSTER MARK C;;JENSEN SUSSE SOENDERBY;;WERNER SCOTT THOMAS;;CUNDIFF DANIEL CAMERON;;SAWYER BLAKE ALLEN CLAYTON

column12: Stainless steel pipe concrete axial compression bearing capacity prediction method based on extreme gradient algorithm
column13: The invention discloses a stainless steel tube concrete axial compression bearing capacity prediction method based on an extreme gradient algorithm, which comprises the following steps: based on the mechanical mechanism analysis of a stainless steel tube concrete compression member, creating data related to the compression bearing capacity of circular and square cross-section members by using test and numerical simulation results; dividing the data set into a training set and a test set by using ten-time cross validation; and by utilizing the training set, respectively establishing extreme gradient lifting regression models of the compression bearing capacities of the circular section and the square section, and performing prediction iteration on the models by adopting the data set until the network meets a convergence condition. Inputting the test set into a compression bearing capacity regression model to obtain a compression bearing capacity predicted value; and finally, the prediction precision of the regression model is analyzed by using an error evaluation index, and comparison with an actual bearing capacity test value and an existing related standard calculation value shows that the method can calculate the bearing capacity of the stainless steel pipe concrete more quickly and more accurately, and the prediction result is closer to the real situation.

column12: 3D surrounding sleeping pool
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of surrounding sleeping pools, in particular to a 3D surrounding sleeping pool which comprises a fabric layer, a bridging layer is fixedly connected to the inner wall of the fabric layer, a sponge layer is fixedly connected to the top of the bridging layer, a fixing layer is fixedly connected to the top of the sponge layer, and a magnetic matrix layer is fixedly connected to the top of the fixing layer. The top of the magnetic matrix layer is fixedly connected with a functional fabric layer. The utility model has the beneficial effects that the functional fabric layer adopts high-tech environment-friendly fabric: stone needle fibers which contain thirty-two microelements and mineral substances beneficial to a human body and act on the skin surface of the human body to generate far-infrared radiation, and zinc oxide polyester fibers are added, so that the antibacterial and deodorizing health-care fabric has efficient and lasting antibacterial and deodorizing functions, and is environment-friendly and energy-saving. The visual design of the functional fabric layer simulates real magnetic induction line distribution, and gives a user an immersive feeling of a bath magnetic field.
column14: SHENZHEN MAXYPRO IND PRODUCT SCHEME CO LTD

column12: Manipulation interaction design method based on user behavior research and control device
column13: The invention discloses a manipulation interaction design method based on user behavior research and a control device in the technical field of vehicle control. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring user behavior data; performing button screening and area arrangement based on the user demand target and the acquired user behavior data; based on button screening and area arrangement results, buttons and an interactive interface being arranged and designed for the control panel; performing simulation verification on the arrangement and design of the buttons and the interactive interface, and generating a verified digital-analog scheme; and performing entity verification based on the verified digital-analog scheme to generate a final scheme. The attention on user experience in the design process is improved, the design efficiency is improved, the design of product manipulation interaction is more reasonable, and the user experience is more excellent.
column14: JIANGSU XCMG ENGINEERING MACHINERY RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
column32: M.G. STEVENSON ET AL.: "Assessment, re-design and evaluation of changes to the driver\'s cab in a suburban electric train", 《APPLIED ERGONOMICS》;;亢净: "基于司机作业特性的地铁驾驶界面优化设计研究", 《中国优秀硕士学位论文全文数据库 工程科技Ⅱ辑》;;吴思翊等: "基于扭转模块的新型板材滚弯加工方法", 《造船技术》

column12: - METHOD APPARATUS AND COMPUTER-READABLE MEDIUM OF PROVIDING STRUCTURED RECORDING FILE
column13: The present invention relates to a method for providing a structured recording file. More specifically, the method includes: a recording step of recording audio data inputted through a microphone provided in a user terminal by activating a recording application installed in the user terminal to provide a recording file creation and reproduction service; a listener registration step of registering a listener for audio focus signal processing in an API of the recording application at the moment when a camera application is activated in the user terminal while the audio data is being recorded through the recording application; a listener processing step of receiving, if the activated camera application starts image recording, an audio focus signal through the listener registered in the API, and stopping the recording of the recording application from the moment of receiving the audio focus signal and then, resuming the stopped recording of the recording application at the moment where the image recording is terminated; and a recording file providing step of providing a recording file, which is made by time-serially structuring the audio data recorded through the recording application, to the user terminal. Therefore, the method is capable of providing improved recording service user experience to a user through a user experience design-based user interface.

column12: Strength analysis method and device for vehicle door armrest and computer readable storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of automobiles, and provides an automobile door armrest strength analysis method and device and a computer readable storage medium. The automobile door armrest strength analysis method comprises the steps that firstly, a finite element model of a target object is established, then, the finite element model of the target object is analyzed, and the finite element model of the target object is obtained; according to the technical scheme, in the data design stage of the vehicle door armrest, CAE simulation analysis is utilized to analyze the performance parameters of the vehicle door armrest, and therefore the performance parameters of the vehicle door armrest are analyzed in the data design stage of the vehicle door armrest, and the performance parameters of the vehicle door armrest are analyzed in the data design stage of the vehicle door armrest. And determining an analysis result of the vehicle door armrest, so that the vehicle door armrest meeting the strength performance is designed, the work of repeated mold repairing, loading, verification and the like is avoided, the design rectification period of the vehicle door armrest is shortened, and the mold repairing cost of a vehicle door armrest assembly is saved.

column12: Method and system for designing an optical filter
column13: A method for designing an image filter, the method being executed by a machine learning algorithm (MLA), the method comprising: receiving unfiltered images, a desirable visual task and an undesirable visual task; for each unfiltered image, receiving a first label indicative of whether the desirable visual task is accomplishable and a second label indicative of whether the undesirable visual task is accomplishable; filtering the unfiltered image using a virtual filter model representative of the image filter; using the filtered images, training the MLA to perform the desirable visual task and prevent the undesirable visual task to be performed; using test images, determining a first efficiency for the MLA to perform the desirable task and a second efficiency for the MLA to prevent the undesirable task; adjusting a parameter of the virtual filter model based on the first and second efficiencies; and outputting the adjusted parameter.
column32: Winkler et al., Security and privacy protection in visual sensor networks: a survey, ACM Computing Surveys (CSUR) 47, No. 1: 1-42:2014.;;Padilla-López et al., Visual privacy protection methods: a survey Expert Systems with Applications 42, No. 9: 4177-4195:2015.;;Schiff et al., Respectful cameras: Detecting visual markers in real-time to address privacy concerns Protecting Privacy in Video Surveillance, pp. 65-89 :2009.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DESIGNING AN OPTICAL FILTER
column13: A method for designing an image filter, the method being executed by a machine learning algorithm (MLA), the method comprising: receiving unfiltered images, a desirable visual task and an undesirable visual task; for each unfiltered image, receiving a first label indicative of whether the desirable visual task is accomplishable and a second label indicative of whether the undesirable visual task is accomplishable; filtering the unfiltered image using a virtual filter model representative of the image filter; using the filtered images, training the MLA to perfoun the desirable visual task and prevent the undesirable visual task to be performed; using test images, determining a first efficiency for the MLA to perfoun the desirable task and a second efficiency for the MLA to prevent the undesirable task; adjusting a parameter of the virtual filter model based on the first and second efficiencies; and outputting the adjusted parameter.

column12: System and method for deployment and performance detection of distributed software storage system
column13: This invention relates to a system and a method for deployment and performance detection for distributed software storage system. The system comprises an automatic deployment module and a performance detection module. The automatic deployment module includes a hardware device performance detection unit for performing hardware performance and possibility testing on each node of the distributed software storage system; the automatic deployment unit automatically deploys each node of the distributed software storage system; and a storage service automation performance tuning unit calculates the appropriate tuning values for the hardware performance and usability test data to automatically tune the service to the optimal configuration. The performance detection module includes a user interface (UI) detection deployment unit, and provides storage service detection and deployment functions at each node.

column12: Hub decorative cover simulation use test device
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of wheel hub decorative cover inspection, and provides a wheel hub decorative cover simulation use testing device. Comprising a test box with openings in the front side and the rear side, a mounting plate is arranged in the middle of the interior of the test box, the front side of the mounting plate is rotationally connected with multiple sets of rotating discs, the rotating discs are connected with driving motors, the driving motors are fixed to the rear side of the mounting plate, the rotating discs are fixedly connected with simulation hub discs through screws, and a decorative cover to be tested is inserted and fixed through the simulation hub discs. The front side of the test box is fixedly connected with a door frame, the door frame is provided with a cabinet door at the front side of each group of simulation hub discs, one side of the test box is connected with an air inlet pipe, and temperature-controlled gas is introduced into the test box through the air inlet pipe. The utility model has the beneficial effects that the use state of the decorative cover in the high-speed running process of the hub can be simulated, the high-temperature use environment can be simulated, the raining use environment can be simulated, and the limit performance of the decorative cover can be tested through various simulated use environments.

column12: APPLICATION PRIVACY SCANNING SYSTEMS AND RELATED METHODS
column13: An application privacy analysis system is described, where the system obtains an application and analyzes it for privacy related data use. The system may determine privacy related activities of the application from established sources of such data and/or may decompile the application and analyze the resulting code to determine the privacy related activities of the application. The system may execute the application and monitor the communications traffic exchanged by the application to determine privacy related activities of the application. The system may store the results of such analyses for future reference.
column15: JONES KEVIN;;DEWEESE WILLIAM;;DEVENISH JUSTIN;;PITCHAIMANI SARAV;;BRANNON JONATHAN BLAKE

column12: Aircraft process digital prototype design method based on measurement
column13: The invention relates to a method for designing an aircraft process digital prototype, and belongs to the technical field of aircraft design. The invention discloses a measurement-based aircraft process digital prototype design method. The method comprises the following steps of: 1, constructing an aircraft digital prototype; 2, determining an aircraft original manufacturing coordination basis; 3, detecting an airplane digital prototype; 4, measuring an aircraft manufacturing coordination basis; 5, determining a common reference point of the digital prototype and the measurement system; step 6, fitting the measured data with the airplane digital prototype; and 7, airplane digital prototype compensation design. The method has the following advantages that the method can be directly used for digital redesign and manufacturing of assembly process equipment without a digital model machine, the copying problem of an aircraft assembly production line without a digital model is solved, and the optimization and reconstruction period of the assembly production line without the digital model machine is greatly shortened.
column15: LI RENHUA;;LIU YANGYANG;;FANG BAOLIN;;ZHANG WENJUN;;XU TAO;;LIU QIN;;LEI YURU;;DENG WENWEN;;WANG HENG;;ZHANG HUIHUA;;XIONG GUOCUI

column12: Direct-current charging cable simulation use testing device
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of cables, and discloses a direct-current charging pile cable simulation use testing device. The device comprises a base, a stand column, a driving motor and a cable fixing device, the driving motor is fixed to the bottom of the base, the output end of the driving motor is connected with a ball screw, and the ball screw is in threaded connection with ascrew nut. The base is provided with a through strip-shaped groove, the base is connected with a support in a sliding mode through the strip-shaped groove, the bottom of the support is in sliding fitwith the strip-shaped groove and penetrates through the strip-shaped groove to be connected with the lead screw nut, the stand column is fixed to the base, and the stand column and the support are each provided with a cable fixing device, and are respectively used for fixing two ends of the cable. The charging cable fixing device has the advantages that the two ends of the charging cable can be well fixed, the fixing mode of the two ends of the charging cable simulates the mode in actual use, and then the charging cable fixing device can adapt to charging cables of different models.

column12: Visualization system based on sea ice concentration forecast result analysis
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of ocean data analysis, and relates to a visualization system based on sea ice concentration forecast result analysis. Comprising the steps of ocean element data acquisition and storage, data processing, visual design, data analysis, visual display and interaction, visual chart storage and system optimization and maintenance. column12: Low-code business form design system based on data visualization
column13: The invention provides a low-code business form design system based on data visualization, and the system comprises a request generation module which is used for obtaining a business form generation request, carrying out the analysis of the business form generation request, and determining the form attributes of a to-be-displayed business form; the collaborative logic determination module is used for determining low-code modules corresponding to the business form to be displayed and target collaborative logic between the low-code modules based on the form attributes; the visual editing module is used for obtaining a visual editing interface, performing visual editing on the low-code module based on the target collaborative logic, and completing visual design of the to-be-displayed business form based on an editing result; the intelligence and effectiveness of visual design of the to-be-displayed business form are effectively guaranteed, different modes of application of the low-code module are achieved based on different business forms, and the efficiency and applicability of business form design are improved.
column15: FAN HENG;;LIU HAO;;WANG PENGFEI;;XIAO XIAOLI;;ZHOU XUNYOU

column12: Network maintenance platform intelligent customer service robot and maintenance method
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent customer service robot of a network maintenance platform and a maintenance method. The maintenance method comprises the steps that the network maintenance platform stores a standard coding network description model and standard network support data; the data information architecture layer obtains user network data and enables the user network data to correspond to the standard coding network description model to generate a user network data architecture; the knowledge graph support layer constructs a user network knowledge graph based on a standard coding network description model, standard network support data and a user network data architecture; the multi-round man-machine dialogue engine generates network maintenance related demand description information through multi-round man-machine dialogues on the basis of a user network knowledge graph; and the network maintenance strategy matching engine matches a network maintenance strategy based on the standard coding network description model, the user network data architecture and the network maintenance related demand description information, generates a network maintenance instruction based on the network maintenance strategy, and sends the network maintenance instruction to the user network. The system performs network maintenance in real time.

column12: Operation and riding data collection device, and connectivity platform, for powersports vehicles
column13: A vehicle operation and riding data collection device includes a housing defining an internal cavity, a power source supported by the housing in the internal cavity, a communications element supported by the housing in the internal cavity, a global positioning element supported by the housing in the internal cavity, at least one sensor supported by the housing in the internal cavity, and a processor configured to manage the power source, the communications element, the global positioning element, and the at least one sensor, to perform functional features corresponding to providing vehicle operation and riding data to, and receiving input from, a user.

column12: Turbine blade pre-twist simulation design method and device based on finite element analysis
column13: The invention provides a steam turbine blade pre-twisting simulation design method and device based on finite element analysis. The method comprises the steps that a steam turbine blade finite element simulation model is built; calculating a blade pre-twist data design value according to the data of the turbine blade finite element simulation model under the shroud ring initial installation pressure; according to the first blade aerodynamic configuration data and the blade pre-twist data design value, second blade aerodynamic configuration data are obtained through calculation; whether the deviation value of the third blade aerodynamic configuration data and the second blade aerodynamic configuration data is within a preset deviation range or not is judged; and if the deviation value is within a preset deviation range, outputting the aerodynamic configuration data of the first blade so as to manufacture the turbine blade according to the aerodynamic configuration data of the first blade. The method has the effect of improving the calculation efficiency and simulation accuracy of the finite element simulation model of the turbine blade.

column12: Theatrical lightning simulator

column12: Intelligent identity authentication method based on mouse track and wireless signal
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of computers, and particularly relates to an intelligent identity authentication method based on mouse tracks and wireless signals. Comprising the following steps: 1, data collection and noise removal: a user draws a set mouse track, and a CSI measurement value is collected and stored in a CSI file; performing noise removal by adopting a Butterworth band-pass filter; 2, data dimensionality reduction: reducing the dimensionality of CSI measurement by adopting a PCA (Principal Component Analysis) algorithm; 3, extracting features: extracting statistical features and multi-scale space energy features; 4, performing feature selection by using a ReliefF algorithm; 5, performing identity authentication and recognition by using an SVM: firstly, selecting an LIBSVM to establish a classification model by using training data; and testing in the classification model by using test data to obtain a predicted final result, and completing user identity authentication and recognition. The accuracy of identity authentication and recognition is divided into 97.3% and 93.9%, the precision is high, the influence of human activities on wireless signals is difficult to copy, the authentication time is short, and the robustness is high.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ANALYZING PARTICIPANT'S BEHAVIOR IN METAVERSE-BASED USABILITY TESTS
column13: A system for analyzing motions of test participants in a metaverse-based usability test according to one embodiment of the present invention comprises: a supervisor terminal in which a usability test, including test information, is registered; a participant terminal including an input and output device to receive participant log data including the gaze information, voice information and control information of the participant while the participant accesses the metaverse environment to execute the usability test; and a central server which communicates with the supervisor terminal and the participant terminal. The central server comprises: a data collecting unit which is configured to collect the participant log data received in the input and output device while the usability test is executed according to the selected test template; a motion pattern analyzing unit which is configured to analyze the participant log data collected in the data collecting unit to extract the common motion pattern of at least one participant; and a feedback unit which, when the usability test is finished, provides result data which compiled the execution data of each participant with respect to the usability test while providing information with respect to the common motion pattern of the participants in a feedback type. Therefore, a reliable test result may be acquired.

column12: METAL DECO DIGITAL PROOFING PROCESS
column13: The described herein is a method for identifying a best match to a metal deco target color and distributing the best match to interested parties for ongoing validation. The method creates a digital proofing database that matches, for example, PantoneLIVE™ target colors and sets a defined digital inkjet standard to within desired tolerances. Also described is a system that implements the method.

column12: METHOD OF TUNING SENSORS FOR IMPROVED DYNAMIC RANGE AND SENSOR ARRAY
column13: The present invention relates to sensor arrays that are more accurate, more sensitive, and more specific with respect to the material that is detected and capable of detecting one or more materials over a wide range. Such sensor arrays can comprises sensors comprising pattern illumination-based annealed coated substrate and one or more functional molecules and process of using same. The method of designing and process of making the sensors for such sensor array yields components that can have one or more electronic and/or optical functionalities that are integrated on the same substrate or film and to which one or more functional molecules can be attached to yield a sensor. Such processes when coupled with the design methods provided herein, allow for the rapid, efficient device prototyping, design change and evolution in the lab and on the production side.

column12: Cognitive improvement clock with bimodal interaction design
column13: The invention relates to a cognition improvement clock with a bimodal interaction design, and belongs to the technical field of memory cognition equipment. The cognition improvement clock with the bimodal interaction design comprises the following components: a display assembly, a voice assembly, and a main control assembly. The display assembly comprises a display panel, a nixie tube, and a digital display control panel; the voice assembly comprises a loudspeaker, and the loudspeaker is located on the rear portion of the display panel; and the main control assembly comprises a main control board, behavior reminding modules, and detection modules, and each detection module comprises an iron block located on the inner surface of each behavior reminding module, a magnet located on the outersurface of a dial plate, and a Hall sensor located on the main control board. According to the cognition improvement clock with the bimodal interaction design, the behavior reminding modules and the clock are combined to remind dementia old people of behaviors; the contents of the behavior reminding modules are recognized through a magnet unit and a Hall unit and are broadcasted through voice; anda visual recognition and voice recognition dual-mode interaction mode is used for reminding the dementia old people of behavior actions on a time axis, so that the efficiency and the accuracy of theinteraction of the dementia old people and the clock are improved.

column12: Categorization using organizational hierarchy
column13: Disclosed are various examples for categorization using an organizational hierarchy. In some examples, a client device receives an enterprise map comprising a plurality of user identifiers, each being associated with a hierarchy level of an enterprise hierarchy. Enterprise content is received. The enterprise content includes data associated with a user identifier from the enterprise map. The enterprise content is associated with a category based on a hierarchy level of the user identifier. A user interface is generated to include the enterprise content and a visual design element based on the category.

column12: Business expansion multipath informatization identification method
column13: The invention provides a multi-path informatization identification method for business expansion. The informatization platform technology development is carried out for solving the problems of business expansion operation obstruction point loss or error and/or other data information flow caused by asynchronous system work order information circulation and actual engineering operation implementation in power business expansion operation and operation data loss. According to the method, a data source end platform, a database network and a data collaborative optimization three-in-one executable data information architecture which are matched with one another are constructed, so that the two-dimensional and multi-oriented operation and maintenance efficiency of a power grid and a power consumer and the power utilization experience are improved. According to the invention, the related data of the monitored object can be timely and accurately obtained, the work order circulation process of the business expansion system is ensured to be synchronous with the actual business handling or engineering implementation, and the operation data flow is real.

column12: FRACTURE DENSITY MODEL SYSTEM, METHODS, AND APPARATUSES
column13: A fracture density model (FDM) system may predict the fragmentation size distribution for a blast. The FDM system may generate a model comprising a plurality of volume elements. The FDM system may determine pre-existing joint fractures in the volume elements. The FDM system may also simulate blasts and track fractures, for each of the volume elements, caused by the shock wave of the blast and a shock wave reflected off of a free face of the model. The FDM system may combine the pre-existing joint fractures and the blast induced fractures to determine a predicted fragmentation size for the distinct elements.
