column12: Visual application development system based on low codes
column13: The invention discloses a visual application development system based on low codes. The visual application development system comprises a development base system which is used for loading, analyzing, rendering and constructing pages and components and realizing event control of interaction of the pages and the components and data communication between the components; the standard component library is used for providing standard components for the development base system; the user-defined component design module is used for providing a user-defined component for the development base system; the theme design module is used for providing themes for the development base system; the development base system comprises a component analyzer, a component renderer, a page builder and an event-driven control module, wherein the event-driven control module is used for realizing event control and component communication of page and component interaction. According to the method, through flexible user-defined component visual design and highly customizable theme visual design, in combination with a standard application version specification, a personalized page application is quickly constructed through a graphical user interface.

column12: Simulation data transmission method, electronic system and storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a simulation data transmission method, which comprises the following steps: caching simulation data designed by a logic system, the simulation data comprising a plurality of data units; grouping the plurality of cached data units into at least one data packet; processing the at least one data packet; and storing the processed at least one data packet in a simulation database. Therefore, the plurality of data units can be grouped into the data packets, and the simulation data can be efficiently written into the simulation database.

column12: Visual interaction analysis method for high-dimensional spatio-temporal data
column13: A visual interaction analysis method for high-dimensional spatio-temporal data comprises the following steps: acquiring air quality high-dimensional spatio-temporal data and related influence factor data thereof, and establishing an air quality high-dimensional spatio-temporal data set; visual design of multi-angle air quality high-dimensional spatio-temporal data is carried out; and interactive analysis design is added for multi-angle visualization. According to the method, multiple visual channel visualization technologies are used, and spatial and temporal change characteristics, development trends, potential influence factors and the like of the air quality are comprehensively analyzed from multiple perspectives; abundant interactive analysis means are provided, and the accuracy, comprehensiveness and analysis efficiency of air quality high-dimensional data analysis are greatly improved.

column12: Visualization method based on natural environment factor data
column13: The invention discloses a visualization method based on natural environment factor data. A visual display system is built through the combination of a time sequence change model and a space change model. Mapping from a data space to a graphic space is carried out by utilizing a 2.5-dimensional surface visual design idea and three coordinate conversions, visual display of natural environment factordata is realized, and a function of visually and clearly displaying key environment factor data display is achieved. Meanwhile, the visualization method realizes that multiple views display data frommultiple angles at the same time, and the views are linked, that is, when the views are modified and inquired in one view, information displayed in other views can also be correspondingly changed, sothat the visualization method has timeliness, accuracy and clarity, and is convenient for researchers to evaluate.

column12: Pre-training model based on continuous and discrete mixed representation and training method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a pre-training model based on continuous and discrete mixed characterization and a training method thereof, the pre-training model is composed of a plurality of novel Transform architectures supporting continuous and discrete characterization, and the architectures comprise a continuous semantic characterization acquisition module used for acquiring continuous semantic characterization; the discrete semantic representation acquisition module is used for acquiring discrete semantic representation; the fusion module is used for fusing the continuous semantic representation and the discrete semantic representation to obtain a mixed semantic representation; and the output module is used for outputting the three semantic representations. The problem that an existing pre-training model is sensitive to data noise can be solved; the parameter space of the large-scale pre-training model is reduced through discretization representation, and a new thought is provided for prototype design of the large-scale pre-training model; meanwhile, a new direction is provided for application of a large-scale pre-training model, structured knowledge graph representation is output, the interpretability of the model is improved, and development of logical reasoning based on discrete representation is promoted.

column12: Insurance service platform and management method
column13: The invention discloses an insurance service platform and a management method, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining an insurance demand of a customer, and generating an insurance scheme according to the insurance demand of the customer; detecting a claim report application submitted by a client, and obtaining claim data of the client; checking the claim settlement data of the customer, and judging whether the claim settlement data is complete or not; if the claim settlement data is complete, judging that the claim settlement data is checked correctly, and entering a fund compensation process; and if the claim settlement data is incomplete, reminding the client to supplement the data, after it is detected that the client uploads the supplementary data, obtaining the claim settlement data supplemented by the user, auditing the claim settlement data, and executing corresponding operation according to an auditing result. According to the embodiment of the invention, a good man-machine interaction design is adopted, a user can conveniently and quickly input services, manage services and carry out statistical analysis, the working efficiency of the user is improved, and great convenience is brought to a customer for the whole insurance service.

column12: Task-oriented virtual aircraft cockpit modeling simulation verification system and method
column13: The invention generally belongs to the field of aviation cockpit display control design and virtual simulation, and particularly relates to a task-oriented virtual aviation cockpit modeling simulation verification system and a task-oriented virtual aviation cockpit modeling simulation verification method. Existing simulation design is only limited to static design concept demonstration and does not have simulation verification capability facing a task process. According to the invention, a digital prototype task simulation module, a man-machine auxiliary intelligent decision module, a virtual display control simulation module, a task visual simulation display module, a data recording and task evaluation module and a user interaction module are integrated, so that rapid prototype modeling of a cabin interface and a display control system can be realized; and carrying out system simulation verification and evaluation on the cabin virtual display control system and the man-machine auxiliary intelligent decision-making software. Rapid prototype design is carried out on the display control system through a digital design method, and a user can carry out immersive task real-time interaction and evaluation and carry out rapid iterative optimization design and verification, so that the system design and verification period is greatly shortened, and the research and development cost is reduced.

column12: Robot and flexible carrying manipulator thereof
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of workpiece carrying, and discloses a robot and a flexible carrying manipulator thereof. A first shaft motion unit is connected with a second shaft motion unit and a floating head; an opening and closing clamping jaw is connected to the second shaft movement unit and used for grabbing a workpiece. The floating head is an elastic unit used for adjusting the position and force of the contact workpiece. The utility model further discloses a robot. The robot is connected with the flexible carrying manipulator. And a robot interface piece is arranged on the flexible carrying manipulator. The flexible carrying manipulator adopts a multi-degree-of-freedom motion design at the same time, actions can be controlled at the same time or independently, and the assembling efficiency and the diversity of compatible product types are improved; and the automation degree is improved, and the carrying efficiency is high. Besides, the floating head in elastic design is adopted, so that the condition of hard collision in the carrying process is avoided, the assembly quality is ensured, and the possibility of appearance damage such as collision and scratching in the carrying process is reduced. The flexible carrying manipulator is reasonable in layout and compact in structure.

column12: Using media information for improving direct marketing response rate
column13: Embodiments of the invention relate to improving direct marketing response rate through use of media information. One embodiment includes extracting samples of language usage in one or more social media activities. Language usage features comprising relationships to products are derived by analyzing the extracted samples for relevant language terms. The language usage features are mapped to one or more of personality traits, emotional state and personal features. The mapped language usage features and personal features are stored in a repository. Customers are segmented for direct marketing using the mapped language usage features and the personal features.

column12: Interaction system for exploring video set by using embedded visualization
column13: The invention discloses an interactive system for exploring a video set by using embedded visualization. The interactive system comprises a video view module, a query view module and a data view module, wherein the video view module is used for displaying a video and extracting data, providing an interaction function with the video, and carrying out interactive query through a specified attribute; the query view module performs hierarchical division according to video interaction query and displays a division result; and the data view module displays detailed information of the video data selected from the query view module. Through the interactive system, a user can interactively manipulate video elements, and through a series of embedded visual interactions designed for different video elements, the user can conveniently and quickly specify query conditions, generate query results, query and select video data meeting the conditions from a data set, and finally quickly position a target typical video.

column12: Cooperative distance measurement prototype design method
column13: The invention discloses a collaborative ranging prototype design method, and relates to the technical field of high-precision time synchronization. The method comprises the following steps that a computer controls a master node to transmit signals according to designed time slots, and slave nodes enter a network access mode until master node signals are captured and locked, and initial time synchronization information is obtained; the computer controls the synchronized slave nodes to enter a networking working mode; and the computer controls each node to carry out data transmission and measurement signal transmission in the own time slot. According to the invention, a broadband spread spectrum system is adopted, a wireless time transfer link with high anti-interference and covert communication is established, the anti-interference capability of the system is improved in combination with an anti-interference data processing algorithm, safe and reliable communication service is provided through the broadband spread spectrum system, the anti-interference performance and the covert communication performance are further improved, and a non-coherent delay locked loop is adopted, so that the anti-interference performance and the covert communication performance are improved. And under the condition of the same signal-to-noise ratio, the code loop correlation window width is reasonably reduced, so that the jitter of the code loop is effectively controlled.

column12: FEATURE SELECTION USING TESTING DATA
column13: An approach is provided in which a method, system, and program product perform a distribution test on a plurality of datasets corresponding to a plurality of predictive features. Each of the plurality of datasets comprises a set of training entries corresponding to a selected one of the plurality of predictive features and a set of testing entries corresponding to the selected predictive feature. The method, system, and program product partition the plurality of predictive features into a differential feature set and a consistent feature set based on their corresponding distribution test. The method, system, and program product generate a final feature set based on the differential feature set and the consistent feature set.
column15: HAN SI ER;;XU JING;;ZHANG XUE YING;;XU JING JAMES

column12: Mobile terminal interface arrangement method and device, equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to the field of UI design, and discloses a mobile terminal interface arrangement method and device, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: retrieving a first layout file of a mobile terminal interface through a preset reflection method every preset period; monitoring each module component in the first layout file, and calculating monitoring data corresponding to each module component to obtain user operation information corresponding to the mobile terminal interface, so as to perform preference analysis on a user operation habit corresponding to the mobile terminal interface to obtain a user preference analysis result; adjusting the first layout file according to the user preference analysis result to obtain a second layout file of the mobile terminal interface corresponding to the user operation habit; and reflecting the second layout file to the mobile terminal interface so as to rearrange the module components on the mobile terminal interface. The flexibility of mobile terminal interface arrangement is improved, the interface layout is adjusted according to the use habit of the user, and the user experience is improved.
column14: KANGJIAN INFORMATION TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD

column12: Rigid body rotation motion design method based on unit quaternion spline curve
column13: The invention discloses a rigid body rotation motion design method based on a unit quaternion spline curve. The rigid body rotation motion design method comprises the steps of setting rigid body attitude data of N + 2 interpolation moments in a rigid body rotation motion process; obtaining a cumulative sum form of a quartic spline curve deployment function in the Euclidean space; further obtaining a unit quaternion spline curve with continuous second-order parameters; and according to the unit quaternion spline curve, obtaining a rotational motion track of any point on the rigid body so as to complete the design of the rotational motion of the rigid body. According to the method, the problem that a spline curve in the prior art cannot perform overall regulation and control on the curve is solved, the calculation process is simple, the calculation process is simplified, and motion control is more flexible. Therefore, the method has a wider practical application value.

column12: Method and system for rapidly generating front-end project based on advanced component library
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of Web project development, in particular to a method and system for rapidly producing front-end projects based on an advanced component library. The method comprises the steps that S1, a developer develops and maintains a single-component UI library in advance according to a component design drawing; s2, a UI designer visually configures a presented project overall interface, a single component interaction effect and jump logic between pages through a front-end Canvas, selects to output an initialized project or a single page or selects a development framework and submits the project or the single page; and S3, according to the data configured and submitted in the step S2, in combination with the corresponding template code, through an fs module of a NodeJs running environment, generating a corresponding development environment overall project framework file or a single page file for front-end developers to use. The method has the advantages that the development cycle can be shortened, UI design and front-end development are parallel, meanwhile, the development quality is improved, and cost is saved.
column14: HANGZHOU INTELLIGENCE INDEED TECH CO LTD

column12: Novel intelligent access control system
column13: A novel intelligent access control system is characterized in that an inspection robot, a WIIF-based access controller, a small base station and a server form a network communication system. The robotreports the coordinate position to the server in real time through the network communication system, the server remotely controls ascending or descending of the roller shutter door according to the coordinate position of the robot, and the function of intelligently controlling the roller shutter door through the far-end server is achieved. The core of the system is the data interaction design among the inspection robot, the access controller, the small base station and the server, the server can more accurately control the roller shutter door to ascend or descend according to the position information of the robot, and safety and convenience are brought to users.

column12: ADAPTIVE SOUND CONTROL SYSTEM AND METHOD OF ACTIVE SOUND DESIGN SYSTEM
column13: The present invention relates to an active sound design (ASD) system for adjusting and controlling a volume of a virtual engine sound/synthetic engine sound according to a vehicle speed, and to an adaptive sound control system and method of an ASD system capable of keeping driving sound quality constant by actively controlling the ASD sound in consideration of the in-vehicle noise level since an in-vehicle noise (background noise) level varies according to different conditions (road surface noise, wind noise, etc.) even with the same vehicle speed.

column12: Glove compartment welding reinforcing rib range design method combining dummy arrangement and CAE calculation
column13: The invention discloses a glove compartment welding reinforcing rib range design method combining dummy arrangement and CAE calculation. The method comprises the following steps: in a product development process, introducing 50 percent of arrangement data of a whole vehicle dummy, determining a target area according to the arrangement data, and avoiding a high-strength glove compartment structurein the target area; therefore, the arrangement of the welding reinforcing ribs is canceled in the determined target area, and meanwhile, the CAE calculation is utilized to verify whether the data design result meets the collision requirement or not in the design stage. According to the method, the one-time passing rate of data design can be improved, the possibility of product data change in the later period is avoided to the maximum extent, and the purposes of saving cost and shortening the period are achieved.

column12: - METHOD APPARATUS AND COMPUTER-READABLE MEDIUM OF TESTING ADJUSTING BALANCING OF AIR CONDITIONING FOR PERFORMANCE IMPROVEMENT OF AIR CONDITIONING EQUIPMENT
column13: The present invention relates to a method for testing, adjusting, and evaluating for performance improvement of air conditioning equipment by using testing, adjustment, and evaluation. More specifically, the method comprises: a design book review step of receiving design information of a field, in which air conditioning equipment is constructed, and a design book including design information of the air conditioning equipment from a design personnel terminal to review the design book; an evaluation model generation step of generating a virtual space corresponding to a physical space of the field, in which the air conditioning equipment is constructed, based on the review-completed design book by using digital twin technology and generating an evaluation model for performance evaluation of the air conditioning equipment, in which a design value for each device forming the air conditioning equipment is set as a reference value; a design appropriateness evaluation step of providing the evaluation model to a field inspection personnel terminal to collect an actual performance measurement value according to the driving of devices forming the air conditioning equipment constructed in the field from the field inspection personnel terminal and evaluating design appropriateness of the air conditioning equipment by calculating the error in the reference value and the measurement value; and a feedback step of calculating the correction value of a device to be corrected, in which the error of the reference value and the measurement value exceeds a threshold allowable error, as a result of the evaluation of the design appropriateness and guiding the field inspection personnel terminal for correction for the device to be corrected to feedback information for performance optimization of the air conditioning equipment.

column12: Ship ventilation system design method based on integrated interaction
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of ship ventilation system design, and discloses a ship ventilation system design method based on integrated interaction, and the technical scheme is as follows: designing air conditioner partitions, calculating the air volume and air pipes of each air conditioner partition, and marking air ports according to a general plan map; ship body structure modeling and air pipe system modeling are synchronously carried out, and 3D interactive design of a branch pipe system and a structure is achieved; shipyard drawings are output through interference check and sent to a ventilation manufacturer, and the ventilation manufacturer supplements and details the shipyard drawings; and performing final interference check on the detailed drawing and the ship body structure, outputting a final drawing, and generating BOM of the air duct system and the ventilation accessories thereof. An integrated interaction design communication mode is adopted, original ventilation design manufacturer leading is changed into shipyard designer leading, the original production design coordination stage is advanced, the production period of the whole ventilation system is shortened, the design efficiency and quality are improved, and the design cost is reduced.

column12: Operation timestamp-oriented industrial cloud data storage model
column13: The invention relates to an operation timestamp-oriented industrial cloud data storage model. Industrial enterprise operation data needs to satisfy full-life or permanent storage for a time length. For time intervals, sampling timestamps are involved, the temporal scale to be met is within the operation and maintenance personnel professional ability awareness coverage, and the sampling time is between about 100 milliseconds and 10 minutes. The invention definitely provides a serialized data storage and compression method around a running timestamp, and the method comprises the steps: buildinga storage data information file based on a special micro-service program, forming a running timestamp pedigree of a data storage model, and storing a real-time data set with the running timestamp; theoperation timestamp-oriented industrial cloud data storage model can meet the requirements of enterprises for monitoring, storing and analyzing massive operation data in an industrial Internet scene,provide open sources and plain codes of a basic platform and storage access under the condition of using low-price resources, and promote the industrial data cloud information technology to achieve distributed replacement, reconstruction and expansion of an enterprise information architecture.

column12: Genetic algorithm-based tolerance optimization method
column13: The invention provides a genetic algorithm-based tolerance optimization method, which comprises the following steps: introducing a tolerance vector to describe the influence of fluctuation of various tolerances such as parts, process equipment and assembly matching on aircraft performance in a manufacturing process, and proposing a concept of dynamic tolerance. On the other hand, on the basis of real-time data, a size chain and a dynamic size chain, a multi-target constraint dynamic tolerance updating method is designed, the diversity of solutions is considered in the method, the algorithm precocity is avoided, and the problem of small probability disqualification existing in a traditional tolerance distribution method is solved. Finally, via comparing an interaction method with a traditional method by taking the aircraft leading edge-slat manufacturing process as an application object, the average manufacturing cost of the interaction method is reduced by 9.1% compared with the manufacturing cost of a traditional tolerance method; and compared with the manufacturing precision of a traditional tolerance method, the average manufacturing precision is improved by 0.04 mm (44%).

column12: Processing and assembling interaction method based on dynamic tolerance
column13: The invention provides a processing and assembling interaction method based on dynamic tolerance, which comprises the following steps: introducing a tolerance vector to describe the influence of fluctuation of various tolerances such as parts, process equipment and assembling cooperation on aircraft performance in a manufacturing process, and proposing a concept of dynamic tolerance. On the other hand, on the basis of real-time data, a size chain and a dynamic size chain, a multi-target constraint dynamic tolerance updating method is designed, the diversity of solutions is considered in the method, the algorithm precocity is avoided, and the problem of small probability disqualification existing in a traditional tolerance distribution method is solved. Finally, the manufacturing process of the leading edge-slat of the airplane is used as an application object; by comparing an interaction method with a traditional method, the average manufacturing cost of the interaction method is reduced by 9.1% compared with the manufacturing cost of a traditional tolerance method; and compared with the manufacturing precision of a traditional tolerance method, the average manufacturing precision is improved by 0.04 mm (44%).
column15: TIAN WEI;;LIAO WENHE;;QI ZHENCHAO;;WANG CHANGRUI;;HU JUNSHAN

column12: System, method, and computer program product for distributed learning in an electronic design
column13: The present disclosure relates to embodiments for collaborative electronic design. Embodiments may include receiving a baseline model at a computing device associated with each of a plurality of geographically dispersed electronic design teams. Embodiments may further include applying environmental data from each of the plurality of geographically dispersed electronic design teams to the baseline model. Embodiments may also include generating a plurality of training changes, based upon, at least in part, the applied environmental data from each of the plurality of geographically dispersed electronic design teams. Embodiments may also include encrypting the plurality of training changes to create a plurality of encrypted training changes. Embodiments may further include providing the plurality of encrypted training changes to a centralized host configured to aggregate the plurality of encrypted training changes.

column12: Systems and methods for custom and real-time visualization, comparison and analysis of insurance and reinsurance structures
column13: Computing systems and methods of visually creating and visually analyzing proposed insurance or reinsurance constructs by providing an overall insurance or reinsurance structure creation and analysis system that includes an insurance/reinsurance visual design structure interface displayed to a user on a design construction user interface display presented to a user via a display of a user computing device having a user input device and the display having a plurality of coverage layer types visually illustrated on the design construction user interface display outside of a graphical diagram. The graphic diagram depicts at least one rectangular-shaped coverage structure layer that creates a proposed insurance or reinsurance construct and corresponds to one of the plurality of coverage layer types visually illustrated on the design construction user interface display outside of the graphical diagram.

column12: System and method for distributed design of a variable data publication
column13: A method for collecting information useable in creating a Web form through which data for variable portions of a printable document is entered is disclosed herein. The method includes receiving layout information relating to a template document having one or more fields. The method further includes receiving form definition information relating to a design of a Web form for the template document, wherein the Web form includes one or more entries corresponding to the one or more fields. The layout information and the form definition information are then collected for storage within a file, and the file is transmitted to a server capable of generating the Web form using the file.

column12: Modeling system and method based on domain-driven design, electronic equipment and storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides a modeling system and method based on domain-driven design, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The system comprises a data processing module, a graphic rendering module and a visual editing module. The data processing module is coupled with the graphic rendering module through a first type interface so as to send first graphic data to the graphic rendering module; and the visual editing module is coupled with the graph rendering module through a first type interface and is used for responding to drawing operation and calling the graph rendering module to realize drawing of a first graph. By adopting the visual editing module, the relationship among various data can be clearly displayed, errors existing in the module can be efficiently checked and repaired, stock model data can be conveniently displayed and updated, the visual design operation process is simple, decoupling use is facilitated, and extremely simple user operation experience is provided.

column12: Information interaction design test bed
column13: The invention discloses an information interaction design test bed, and the test bed comprises an operation design system and an operation element; the operation design system comprises an operation data detection system, a data analysis system and an operation system, the operation data detection system collects communication data of the operation element and sends the data to the data analysis system, the data analysis system comprises a basic action selection module and an adjustment action selection module, and the basic action selection module adopts the conditional probability of communication data and communication strength of the operating elements as weights, takes the operating elements as m nodes, and generates a rough action selection according to the conditional probability; and the adjustment action selection module performs learning adjustment by adopting a neural network model according to the relationship enhancement matrix of the dependency relationship between the rough action selection. According to the method, exploratory change attempts are continuously performed through the reinforcement learning model, and the enhancement relation is determined according to the attempt result, so that continuous exploration of the experiment is realized, and the optimal design effect is completed.

column12: Seismic thermal anomaly fine extraction method based on heating kernel
column13: For solving the problems in the prior art, the invention discloses a seismic thermal anomaly fine extraction method based on a heating kernel. The method comprises the following steps: 1), carrying out the recognition of a thermal anomaly signal through a time series analysis method, obtaining a suspected thermal anomaly signal, and numbering suspected thermal anomaly plaques; step 2) then removing a part of suspected thermal anomaly plaques which are not generated by the earthquake through a 'heating kernel' filter, and determining the thermal anomaly of the earthquake; 3) training and checking the sub-regions, and extracting and checking global consistent parameters and a region optimal model by calculating indexes such as an alarm success rate and an event missing report rate in a target region in combination with a 3D Molchan diagram; and 4) adopting a training-test mode, setting different parameter groups, selecting a result with the minimum Loss as an optimal parameter model according to scores in the training process, then using test data for testing optimal parameters, and finally obtaining a refined extraction result.
column14: AEROSPACE INFORMATION RESEARCH INSTITUTE CHINESE ACADEMY OF SCIENCES

column12: Comprehensive energy load optimization scheduling method and system based on cloud network side-end integration
column13: The invention provides a comprehensive energy load optimal scheduling method and system based on cloud network side-end integration, and relates to the technical field of comprehensive energy load optimal scheduling. According to the invention, a cloud network edge-end integrated information architecture is constructed based on a cloud side, a network side, an edge side and an end side, the collaborative advantages of cloud computing, edge computing and a 5G mobile network can be fully utilized, the problem of comprehensive energy load optimization scheduling can be solved together, self-adaptive optimization scheduling of the comprehensive energy load can be realized, the optimization decision is more accurate, the cloud data processing and communication pressure can be reduced, optimization decision solving efficiency is improved, data processing is performed by utilizing an edge side, and information security and privacy security of users in different microgrids can be protected.

column12: ELK-based slope acoustic emission monitoring data analysis method
column13: The invention discloses a slope acoustic emission monitoring data analysis method based on ELK. The method comprises the following steps: step 1, designing data content; data content is designed according to business characteristics and analysis requirements of slope acoustic emission monitoring; step 2, log structure design; designing a log structure according to the data content designed in the step 1 to obtain monitoring data; step 3, data acquisition and processing; acquiring, analyzing, converting and processing the monitoring data in the step 2 by utilizing Logstash; step 4, data storage; the data processed in the step 3 are stored in Elasticsearch; 5, statistical analysis and visualization are carried out; and 6, exporting and sharing the data. The method has the advantages of being efficient, accurate, reliable, real-time, diversified and the like.

column12: Unmanned aerial vehicle arresting landing real-time simulation method based on rapid prototype
column13: The invention discloses an unmanned aerial vehicle arresting landing real-time simulation method based on a rapid prototyping technology. Firstly, a six-degree-of-freedom model of an unmanned aerial vehicle is built and assisted by a steering engine and a sensor model to complete aerial stage modeling, ground landing stage modeling is completed according to arresting landing characteristics of theunmanned aerial vehicle, and a rapid prototype is designed on the basis of aerial and ground models; a code automatic generation technology is designed from three aspects of model multi-sampling frequency, manual codes and target machine configuration according to the model characteristics and the VxWorks operating system environment, and the rapid prototype is converted into standardized codes;and finally, a reasonable task scheduling mechanism and a reasonable resource interaction mechanism are designed to compile the manual code and the rapid prototype code in a crossed mode to generate an executable file adapting to the VxWorks target machine platform. According to the simulation method, the difficulties of long development period and high human error rate of traditional manual modeling coding are overcome, and digital closed-loop simulation verification at the initial stage of rapid prototype design is facilitated.

column12: System for generating multi-dimensional data billboard by customizing configuration chart
column13: The invention discloses a system for generating a multi-dimensional data billboard by customizing a configuration chart, which comprises the following steps: demand investigation and survey: communicating with a user to confirm demands, including data types, data classification and the like; data structure design processing: sorting and classifying data provided by a client, sorting out a perfect front-end page architecture, and preparing for subsequent chart generation; visual design: designing different types of charts according to customer requirements, giving visual styles and color schemes, and forming a chart library; and developing the configuration component and generating a billboard: freely selecting different types of charts, data sources and data dimensions according to customer requirements, and matching to generate a multi-dimensional data billboard. According to the method, a user can perform self-defined configuration, select different chart types, data sources and data dimensions according to own requirements and generate a data board meeting the own requirements, and meanwhile, a data visualization system based on a Web technology is adopted, so that the user can access the system through a browser without installing any software.

column12: Nuclear power plant control logic design verification system and method
column13: The invention aims at disclosing a system and a method for verifying control logic design of a nuclear power plant. The system comprises a client computer, a control logic design verification data storage server, a data structure decomposition server and a database for storing design data and required specification data, the client computer is in communication connection with the control logic design verification data storage server and the data structure decomposition server through a network, and all requests and actions in the control logic design verification process are sent and executedby the client computer. The data structure decomposition server is in communication connection with the database; compared with the prior art, according to different design requirements, the control logic design data can be decomposed according to the corresponding design verification method, different design verification processes are executed, automatic, batched and visual design verification functions are achieved through automatic judgment of a computer, the control logic design verification efficiency and quality are remarkably improved, and the control logic design verification efficiency and quality are improved. The purpose of the invention is achieved.

column12: ESG-based role-data interaction method, apparatus and device, and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to a data processing technology, and discloses an ESG-based role-data interaction method, device and equipment for comprehensively evaluating an enterprise, and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of performing tagging processing on a data approval process in a pre-constructed ESG system to obtain an approval link index set; identifying a link index corresponding to the to-be-approved data and sending the link index to a processing interface of the link index; and receiving approval information of a processing interface, recording an operation node state of the to-be-approved data in the approval link index set, and sending visual template information formed by the approval information and the operation node state to different role interfaces of an enterprise according to a role-index mapping relation table pre-configured by the enterprise. According to the method, the problems of complex link processing logic and long approval link of the ESG system can be solved through coarse-grained flow division and fine-grained man-machine interaction design, so that the efficiency of a financial institution during large-batch index data processing is improved.

column12: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR AUTOMATICALLY CREATING CARTOON IMAGE BASED ON INPUT SENTENCE
column13: The present disclosure relates to a method for automatically creating a cartoon image based on an input sentence, performed by a device, the method including: recognizing a sentence when at least one sentence is input; identifying each of at least one word included in the recognized sentence; identifying a type of punctuation mark located at least one of a start point and an end point of the recognized sentence; determining the sentence as any one of a general expression sentence, a dialogue expression sentence, and an emotional expression sentence based on the type of the identified punctuation mark; automatically creating a cartoon image based on a word included in the general expression sentence when the sentence is the general expression sentence; understanding a subject of the dialogue expression sentence or the emotional expression sentence when the sentence is the dialogue expression sentence or the emotional expression sentence; and inserting the dialogue expression sentence or the emotional expression sentence in a form of a speech bubble on a character corresponding to the understood subject among at least one character in the cartoon image.

column12: Map page display method and device, storage medium and computer equipment
column13: The invention discloses a map page display method and device, a storage medium and computer equipment, and relates to the technical field of page interaction design. The method comprises the following steps: in response to a view request of a map page, receiving a selected geographic region, a region type and a data index, and displaying the map page corresponding to the geographic region; displaying an area fence of each local area corresponding to the area type on the map page, and displaying an interface element corresponding to the data index in the local area in the area fence; and in response to an opening operation of the local mode, receiving a selected target local area and a target data type, and displaying an area fence of the target local area and waybill data corresponding to the target data type and having a delivery starting point in the target local area on a map page. According to the method, the interaction mode and the data dimension of the map page can be improved, an operator can conveniently and finely plan the transport capacity boundary of a local area, and therefore the operation efficiency of logistics distribution is improved.

column12: Automatic testing method based on ultrasonic software
column13: The invention provides an automatic testing method based on ultrasonic software, which comprises the following steps: designing a standby test case data table based on data processing software, and generating a standby test case database; obtaining a to-be-used test case in a to-be-used test case database; based on the to-be-used test case, automatically testing the to-be-tested software; and generating test report information according to an execution result of the automatic test. According to the method, the to-be-tested test case data table is designed based on the data processing software, and the to-be-tested software is automatically tested; the testing efficiency, the testing accuracy and the testing reliability of a software testing place can be improved, meanwhile, the special requirements of ultrasonic software testing can be met, and therefore the quality and the stability of software are improved.

column12: System and method for detecting presence of illness symptoms
column13: A system and method for collecting symptomatic data to screen for a targeted disease. Testing hardware incorporates a plurality of testing units with corresponding indicators that can be altered to indicate whether a symptom is present or not. The resulting data from the testing use can then be analyzed to determine the likelihood of presence of a disease.

column12: Analysis for framework assessment
column13: Design analysis for framework assessment is described. In one or more example embodiments, a file including a designed image is obtained from a storage device, and a guide structure is extracted from the file. The guide structure, for instance, includes multiple guide lines, and the guide lines are analyzed to determine column-related data, such as at least relative widths or positional orders, a total number of columns, groups of column widths, a combination thereof, and so forth. From multiple frameworks, a framework is ascertained that substantially matches the guide structure based at least partially on a comparison of column-related data to each framework of the multiple frameworks. Ascertainment of a framework, for example, is indicated to an end-user. The ascertained framework is applicable to facilitate development of a coded functional version of at least a visual design of the image.

column12: Architecture method and device for store visitor information, equipment, medium and program product
column13: The invention discloses an architecture method and device for store visitor information, terminal equipment, a storage medium and a computer program product. The method comprises the following steps: receiving encrypted video data of store visitors; capturing pictures of the store visitors based on the encrypted video data, and determining the access time of the store visitors to access the sales store; uploading the picture and the access time to a cloud end, so that the cloud end recognizes attribute information of the store visitor according to the picture, obtaining visitor information associated with the store visitor according to the access time and the attribute information architecture, wherein the cloud end is connected with the edge device. According to the invention, the resources of the cloud and the edge device are cooperatively utilized, the network bandwidth requirement is reduced, the problem that the accuracy of the store visitor information is affected by information collection lag caused by data processing delay is effectively avoided, and the overall efficiency of accessing the store visitor information of the sales store by the architecture is improved.

column12: Generation of WBS model data
column13: A method and system for generating a work breakdown structure (WBS) model data. Design model data is received. The design model data is parsed to extract WBS metadata from the design model data. A WBS template corresponding to the design model data is determined. The WBS model data is generated using the determined WBS template and the extracted WBS metadata. The WBS model data includes data entries. Each data entry is associated with a respective work task.

column12: Plug-and-play integrated data center type informatization management system
column13: The invention discloses a plug-and-play integrated data center type informatization management system, relates to the technical field of information management, and aims to solve the problems that existing informatization management causes too high investment in office software of a company, the software is attributed to a template and cannot be deepened and optimized and is limited by a platform, and further a large number of technologies are needed for data migration later. column12: SQL visual design generation method and system based on business metadata
column13: The invention discloses an SQL visual design generation method and system based on business metadata, and belongs to the technical field of data query. The method comprises the steps: performing metadata entity packaging; S2, packaging a metadata field and a dictionary; S3, carrying out the visual dragging of the data; S4, performing data operation packaging; S5, operating entity analysis; and S6, carrying out SQL conversion on the business entity object. In the step S1, the metadata entity information comprises an entity primary key, a name and child node information; and in the step S2, the entity attribute information of the metadata entity comprises an attribute primary key, an attribute name and an attribute code. According to the operator resource data model, a set of visual service entities and topological relation diagrams is constructed, meanwhile, entity query information is configured through dragging of the service entities, physical view statements are finally generated through data entity query and metadata matching for data query operation, and the method is worthy of being popularized and used.

column12: Visual monitoring platform for digital power grid service
column13: The invention discloses a visual monitoring platform for digital power grid business, and the platform comprises a data bus which is used for transmitting power grid business data transmitted by a data center to a visual playing module; the visual design module is used for generating an interface specification file according to an input interface customization command and sending the interface specification file to the visual playing module; and the visual playing module is used for determining an interface playing format according to the interface specification file, playing the power grid service data according to the interface playing format, and uploading abnormal data to a user side for remote playing. According to the invention, the comprehensive monitoring of the digital power grid service can be realized without the operation of a user, and the abnormal condition found by the monitoring can be displayed in all directions through the visual detection platform, so that the monitoring work of the user on the digital power grid service is greatly reduced; and the system has the capabilities of automatically intervening data processing and manually and remotely intervening and processing abnormal data, so that the whole data supervision process is simplified.

column12: Design method of mobile performance assessment system
column13: The invention discloses a design method of a mobile performance appraisal system, which comprises the following steps of: 1, opening the mobile performance appraisal system, entering a login module, inputting a login account of the mobile performance appraisal system and entering an operation page, and 2, clicking the performance ranking of an operator in a ranking list from the operation page, clicking the performance ranking of the operator in the page, and completing the performance appraisal of the mobile performance appraisal system. Entering an attendant performance ranking score list, clicking the details of the score list, and entering an institution attendant performance detailed list; according to the mobile performance assessment system, a plurality of operation sub-modules are distributed on a ranking list in the second step in a card mode, it is guaranteed that related content can be displayed in a centralized mode, the page expansibility is particularly high, the loading form of data streams is met, meanwhile, the design method and specification of the mobile performance assessment system provide a UI design methodology, and the user experience is improved. Unification of styles of products and projects is guaranteed, special requirements of the silver industry are met, and rapid iteration of the products and the projects is met; and various individual requirements of the project can be met in a great range.

column12: Visual large-screen platform with multi-dimensional technology fusion
column13: The invention discloses a visual large-screen platform for multi-dimensional technology fusion. The visual large-screen platform comprises a data docking analysis layer, an infrastructure service layer, a data visual design layer and a visual business application layer which are connected in sequence, the data docking analysis layer is used for providing data access and management functions; the infrastructure service layer is used for providing business data acquisition and cleaning, data scheduling, control service and unstructured storage functions; the data visualization design layer is used for providing scene scheduling, script execution, synchronous control, component animation, data binding, event binding and resource scheduling functions; and the visual business application layer is used for providing industry business application display, component display and uniform resource display functions. Through cooperation of different layers, a traditional data large screen can be endowed with the capacity of three-dimensional rendering loading and two-dimensional topology and data chart fusion, finally a multivariate data fusion visual large screen is formed, rapid modification is supported so as to meet variable requirements, and the application prospect is quite wide.

column12: Automatic mapping method for embedded part of double-block ballastless track simply supported beam bridge floor
column13: The invention discloses an automatic drawing method for an embedded part of a double-block ballastless track simply supported beam bridge floor. The method comprises the steps: 1, performing drawing parameterization on all parts of an embedded part design drawing; 2, designing a layout scheme on the bridge and automatically counting the number of embedded parts; 3, performing parameterized drawingof a complete set of drawings based on programming language. Beneficial effects are that each calculation drawing module is embedded into an AutoCAD system based on a programming language, and an AutoCAD man-machine interaction design process is pertinently expanded by adding menu bars required by designers, so as to realize automatic drawing of a design drawing of the CRTSI type double-block ballastless track embedded part of the simply supported beam section of the high-speed railway. According to the method, the drawing efficiency and precision are greatly improved, manual calculation is avoided, the distribution diagram of the simply supported beam bridge deck embedded parts with different lengths can be drawn quickly and accurately, the labor intensity of designers is reduced, and the drawing parameterization, automation and informatization levels are enhanced. The automatic mapping function is achieved, and reference can be provided for modernization and intelligent constructionof railway design.

column12: Visual recommendation analysis method and device based on interpretable graph neural network
column13: The invention discloses a recommendation interpretation visual analysis method and device based on an interpretation graph neural network, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the cleaning and preprocessing of data, and calculating a feature correlation score according to the film watching data; taking the processed data as input, and training by using a representative graph neural network model to obtain a high-dimensional embedded representation and recommendation result of the entity; the embedded space distribution is converted into a classification task, an optimized user recommendation path graph is obtained, and a graph mode important for recommendation prediction is extracted; designing a data visualization view to display the interpretation process, and verifying the reliability of the interpretation model through a preference analysis comparison view and an interpretation evaluation view; understanding of recommendation results is provided for analysts through model calculation and visual design, a visual solution is obtained accordingly, and the recommendation performance of the model is improved through iterative interaction analysis, so that the reliability of the analysis method is verified.

column12: Transformer visual fault diagnosis method and system based on refined three-dimensional model
column13: The invention discloses a transformer visual fault diagnosis method based on a refined three-dimensional model. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring physical data and operation data of a target transformer; establishing a refined three-dimensional model of the transformer according to the physical data of the target transformer, and adding a fault processing guidance library and a fault diagnosis algorithm library in the refined three-dimensional model of the transformer; performing visual design on the transformer refined three-dimensional model of the fault processing guidance library and the fault diagnosis algorithm library to obtain a transformer refined three-dimensional model with a visual interface; according to the operation data of the target transformer, using the transformer refined three-dimensional model with the visual interface to carry out real-time visual fault diagnosis; a fault diagnosis algorithm and a fault processing guidance library are built in the system, so that the quality of fault diagnosis and processing can be improved, and the operation error of personnel is effectively reduced.

column12: Personnel safety reporting management method applied to pine wood nematode disease prevention and treatment construction management software
column13: The invention discloses a personnel safety reporting management method applied to pine wood nematode disease prevention and treatment construction management software, which comprises the following steps of: filling in a safety report, calling a locally maintained construction group personnel list based on mobile equipment, enabling safety reporting data to comprise a construction group photo, a user selfie and an equipment photo, and performing data acquisition through a local data acquisition terminal; enabling the construction personnel to upload safety reporting data through mobile equipment, wherein the data comprises a construction group attendance list, a construction combination photo, safety equipment and fire-fighting equipment photos and geographic information, the uploaded data is uploaded to a cloud database through wifi, a 4G network or a 5G network to be processed, and statistics and arrangement are carried out through the cloud database. Through the interface and interaction design of the data acquisition terminal, before safety reporting, prevention and treatment construction data is not allowed to be acquired, so that constructors are reminded to pay attention to wearing safety equipment such as safety helmets and safety ropes and carrying fire-fighting equipment such as fire extinguishers, and safety accidents are avoided.

column12: Populating visual designs with web content
column13: Techniques are described for populating visual designs with web content. In implementations, a document design is generated via a digital media application. The document design includes a layout of repeating design elements, such as a grid or table of repeating areas each having various design elements. Web content having a structured arrangement of data elements is accessed through a data panel exposed via the application. The web content data may be linked to the document design to populate elements of the document design with “real-world” data. To do so, the web content is to detect semantically similar repeating data elements by based on element positions, node types, style types, and node hierarchies reflected by structured data defining the web content. Design elements in the layout of the document design are then auto-populated with content of the semantically similar repeating data elements to produce a preview linked to “real-world” data.

column12: ON-SKIN CIRCUIT ASSISTANCE
column13: A computer-implemented method for designing a user-specific electronic tattoo that comprises obtaining a user-input is provided. The user-input includes one or more desired functions of the electronic tattoo and a desired appearance of the electronic tattoo. The method further comprises generating a design of the electronic tattoo based on the user-input. The generation of the design of the electronic tattoo includes determining an electronic circuit design which is capable of achieving the one or more desired functions. The generation further includes designing a final image of the electronic tattoo that mimics the desired appearance and incorporates the electronic circuit design.

column12: AUTO DISINFECTANT PASSAGE SYSTEM
column13: The COVID-19 worldwide pandemic has greatly affected every nation and it became a great burden for the economy of the Philippines. The country's government declared a state of public health emergency in the country since 17 March to at least, slow down the transmission and to allot more time for the healthcare providers to prepare. Due to the wide range of possibilities for the predicted decline of the economy, they gradually reopen, making sure that social distancing remains. The government across the world are studying ways to restart economies while minimizing the risk of virus infections to its population. The gradual restart of the Philippine's economy leads to an urgent necessity for a preventive solution to lessen the possibility of virus transmission, without compromising the health of others. Common prevention practice of hand sanitizing, temperature check and whole-body disinfectant is performed and monitored by authorized personnel risking their health may result to possible transmission. Transmission happens due to person to person contact, supermalls as an example, practice temperature check and sanitation which are performed by on-duty security guards. As an Architect/Designer it is both a privilege and duty to shelter and protect people with a flexible design solution for every situation. The solution for designing a machine operated passage system (Automatic Disinfectant Passage System) will not only save service providers (front liners) but also, immediately kill any virus people are carrying before they even enter any establishment. The prototype design will no longer require person to person contact for temperature check, hand sanitation, and body disinfectant. The use of standard dimensions (1.2m x 2.0m x 2.4m) was intended to adapt to every establishment's setback. This should be placed in every entrance of the buildings and structures, this way it can at least minimize the spread of viruses before entering our homes, offices, government buildings, malls, hospitals, and even train stations.

column12: Artillery fire control system information interaction method, artillery fire control system and terminal
column13: The invention discloses an artillery fire control system information interaction method, an artillery fire control system and a terminal. The method comprises the following operation steps: receiving control information input by a user; processing the input control information to obtain a response result; wherein the response result comprises changing the internal parameter state of the window body part model and carrying out information interaction on the data processing equipment configured with the application logic program, and the information interaction is that information interaction with the application logic program of the data processing equipment is carried out through the data distribution service real-time Ethernet middleware and by following the ARINC661 specification. The user interface and the user application are separated, when an artillery fire control system application program is designed, designers only need to upgrade the user application without changing the user interface program after the user interface requirement changes, and interface interaction design of the designers and the user terminal is more convenient.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR GENERATING AND CORRECTING CLASSIFICATION MODELS
column13: Data having some similarities and some dissimilarities may be clustered or grouped according to the similarities and dissimilarities. The data may be clustered using agglomerative clustering techniques. The clusters may be used as suggestions for generating groups where a user may demonstrate certain criteria for grouping. The system may learn from the criteria and extrapolate the groupings to readily sort data into appropriate groups. The system may be easily refined as the user gains an understanding of the data.

column12: Low-code application development platform

column12: Recording medium on which instruction program or program set is recorded, and drawing system
column13: A drawing system (7) is provided with a design terminal (2), a drawing device (1), an intermediate storage unit (3), and an instruction terminal (4). The design terminal (2) is used for designing design data of a pattern. A drawing device (1) draws a pattern on a photosensitive material on a substrate on the basis of design data designed by a design terminal (2). The intermediate storage unit (3) stores design data designed by the design terminal (2). An instruction terminal (4) is used for instructing a drawing device (1) to perform drawing processing. A drawing system (7) performs: a step in which a single piece of design data for drawing is acquired from an intermediate storage unit (3) by executing an instruction program by an instruction terminal (4); a step for generating drawing instruction information indicating the content of a drawing process to be executed by the drawing device (1) on the basis of the one piece of design data; and a step for transmitting the drawing instruction information from the instruction terminal (4) to the drawing device (1). Therefore, the efficiency of pattern drawing can be improved.

column12: Authentication data initialization method based on yaml file
column13: The invention provides an authentication data initialization method based on a yaml file, and belongs to the technical field of authentication data initialization. In order to complete data injection, firstly, corresponding initialization configuration needs to be designed, and yaml serves as a configuration file language with high conciseness and richness and becomes the first choice format of initialization data design. Therefore, the authentication data initialization based on the yaml format can be automatically injected into a corresponding system to realize the security management of the system.

column12: Method for improving coupon hole drilling precision
column13: The invention provides a method for improving the coupon hole drilling precision, which comprises the following steps of: designing engineering data, and carrying out fool-proofing through the engineering data design; inner layer management and control: reducing the difference between the layers of the inner layer core plate by managing and controlling the expansion and contraction of the inner layer; pressing control is carried out, parameters are adjusted through the function of a target drilling machine, and the expansion and shrinkage pile separation accuracy is improved; and drilling control is carried out, and the drilling precision is improved by optimizing production parameters. According to the method, the four aspects of engineering data design, inner layer, pressing and drilling process parameters are improved, the interlayer alignment degree and the drilling precision are improved, the coupon inner short rejection rate is reduced to 0.03% from original 0.06%, the product quality is improved, and the production cost is reduced.

column12: Design device for cloud data
column13: The utility model relates to a cloud data design device which comprises a base, anti-skid blocks are arranged at the positions of the four corners of the base, a design plate is connected to the base in a sliding mode, a containing groove is formed in the front side of the top of the base, supporting frames are fixedly connected to the two ends of the top of the base, and a containing plate is fixedly connected to the supporting frames. The device comprises a placement plate, a ventilation groove is formed in the middle of the placement plate, a cooling fan is installed below the ventilation groove, and clamping mechanisms are arranged on the two sides of the placement plate. The notebook computer is fixed through a clamping block of the clamping mechanism, use of the notebook computer is facilitated, the design plate is arranged, the design plate can be pulled out during design, cloud data calculation and drawing are conducted through the design plate, the notebook computer is assisted in use, cloud data design is facilitated, and convenience and practicability are achieved.

column12: Atmospheric ecological environment analysis method based on data fusion
column13: The invention provides an atmospheric ecological environment analysis method based on data fusion. The atmospheric ecological environment analysis method comprises the steps of collecting and treating atmospheric environment data of an atmospheric environment and a task monitoring mode; classified compiling management of information resource directories, and management of public attributes, metadata and standard tables; a data resource management mode and a quality monitoring rule design method; diagnosis of the health degree of atmospheric environment data, design of a data mart and a data analysis, research and judgment scheme. According to the invention, data sources and data of a service system database, a data center, a network, an application system, a terminal and a sensor are fused, a display cloud picture of atmospheric environment data and an analysis, research and judgment report of a future development trend are generated through data management, a data directory and data resources, and an ecological environment department is helped to timely and effectively master the urban atmospheric ecological current situation.

column12: Motor fault prediction method and system based on transfer learning and time sequence
column13: The invention provides a motor fault prediction method and system based on transfer learning and a time sequence. The method comprises the following steps: respectively collecting test signals, live signals and application verification signals of vibration of a plurality of motors; preprocessing the acquired test signal, the actual condition signal and the application verification signal; building an LSTM-DaNN network, and training the LSTM-DaNN network by using the preprocessed test signal as source field data to obtain a source network suitable for a test; inputting the features of the source domain and the target domain and the RUL value of the source domain, and retraining a source network structure to obtain a target network; and inputting the preprocessed application verification signal into the trained target network to obtain a residual service life RUL predicted value. The LSTM-DaNN network model is adopted to carry out fault prediction on the motor, the transfer learning thought is adopted, the model is trained again by using test signals and live signals, and a target field suitable for actual working conditions is obtained, so that the application adaptability of fault prediction in actual production is improved.

column12: Control system capable of automatically balancing turbidity in real time
column13: The invention discloses a control system capable of automatically balancing turbidity in real time. The system comprises a turbidity standard liquid cup, a coral jar, a PLC (Programmable Logic Controller), a man-machine interaction touch terminal, a peristaltic pump and a stirring pump, the peristaltic pump is used for conveying the turbidity standard solution to the coral jar; the stirring pump is used for circulating the liquid in the turbidity standard liquid cup; the PLC is used for being connected with the turbidity probe, the peristaltic pump and the stirring pump; and the PLC communicates with the man-machine interaction touch terminal and is used for receiving an operation instruction of the man-machine interaction touch terminal and controlling the peristaltic pump and the stirring pump to act according to a flow. The system is suitable for laboratory operation; compared with an existing system of the same type, the system has the advantages that (1) manual turbidity measurement is replaced, turbidity control liquid is added as required, and real-time constant turbidity control is realized by using an automation technology; (2) simple and easy-to-master man-machine interaction design is adopted, and the turbidity control range can be set as required; (3) a process recording function facilitates tracing; and (4) the system has networking capability, and remote operation or related setting can be carried out at any time.

column12: OSG-based ecological restoration treatment three-dimensional planning design platform and method
column13: The invention discloses an OSG-based ecological restoration treatment three-dimensional planning design platform and method. The design platform comprises a project management module, a three-dimensional model construction module, a tool module, a treatment engineering design module and a result output module. The open source OSG technology is adopted, and function limitation and background code potential safety hazards can be effectively avoided. The invention provides a three-dimensional model construction module, through a multi-source data import interface, mining area high-resolution oblique photography data (OSGB), elevation data, vector data, geological drilling and other data acquired by aerial survey of an unmanned aerial vehicle can be seamlessly fused, a mining area true three-dimensional scene is constructed, the three-dimensional visual design of an ecological restoration and treatment project is realized, the three-dimensional effect is more visual, and the construction efficiency is improved. A bridge for comprehensive decision making of a treatment scheme design party, a mining area party and an ecological environment management party is built, and decision making efficiency is improved.

column12: Resin hole plugging aluminum sheet two-in-one manufacturing method
column13: The invention relates to a resin hole plugging aluminum sheet two-in-one manufacturing method, which is suitable for resin hole plugging of a PCB (Printed Circuit Board) drilled with a through hole and a back drilling hole, and is a hole plugging method for enabling hole plugging aluminum sheets on a back drilling surface and a non-back drilling surface of the PCB to be two identical plates. Comprising the following steps that S1, aluminum sheet engineering data design is conducted, specifically, aluminum sheet drilling engineering data design is conducted on the basis of back drilling; s2, aluminum sheet manufacturing is conducted, specifically, drilling is conducted according to the aluminum sheet engineering data designed in the step S1 to produce aluminum sheets, and two same aluminum sheets are directly produced at a time when the aluminum sheets are produced; and S3, resin hole plugging: the two same aluminum sheets prepared in the step S2 are respectively pasted on the back drilling surface and the non-back drilling surface of the PCB, and then the back drilling surface and the non-back drilling surface of the PCB are synchronously subjected to resin hole plugging towards the back drilling hole. The resin hole plugging aluminum sheet two-in-one manufacturing method has the advantages of being good in product quality, simplified in production process, high in production efficiency and the like.
