column12: TARGET PROGRAM TESTING METHOD AND APPARATUS, AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column13: A target program testing method and apparatus, and a device and a storage medium. The method comprises: displaying a user interface of a simulator, wherein the simulator loads a target program, and the user interface displays a program page of the target program (302); in response to an enable operation of an accessible mode, enabling the accessible mode in the simulator (304); and in the accessible mode, displaying accessible design information on a page element in the program page of the target program (306). In the present application, a target program does not need to be run on a real user terminal, and an accessibility test can be directly realized on a simulator in a visual manner.

column12: Visual design method for paging display and inter-page animation
column13: The invention relates to a visual design method for paging display and inter-page animation. The method comprises the following steps: 1, newly establishing a template, and newly establishing a plurality of pages according to decomposition conditions of data and scenes; 2, designing components in each page and the overall layout of the page; 3, assigning the same name to the components of the different pages to enable the components of the different pages to become associated components; and 4, publishing and previewing the template, adopting a smooth transition animation for transition of the associated components during page switching, and adopting appearance and disappearance animations set for the components in advance for transition of the non-associated components during page switching. The method has the beneficial effect that the display effect is good.

column12: Online shop portrait construction method and system
column13: The invention provides an online shop portrait construction method and system, and belongs to the technical field of information data analysis, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the basic data of a to-be-portrayed shop, and building an original data set; analyzing and processing the original data set according to a to-be-portrayed shop portraying target, and constructing a portraying index system; in combination with a correlation theory, processing the portrait index system, and constructing a final association index of the portrait; and constructing an online shop portrait according to the final association index of the portrait, and completing portrait visualization by using the word cloud. According to the method and system, the model feature extraction accuracy is improved, the concept of using the shop portrait is extended on the basis of the user portrait, a multi-dimensional comprehensive shop portrait is constructed, a decision maker is helped to focus on a service object, the service standard is improved, and precise marketing is realized; furthermore, the shop can be assisted to solve the problems of commodity renewal, activity promotion, shop visual design and the like. A decision maker is helped to comprehensively recognize the level and the development trend of the shop, decision making is assisted, and the decision making risk is reduced.

column12: Production system discrete event simulation optimization method and system based on M language
column13: The invention provides a production system discrete event simulation optimization method and system based on an M language, and the method comprises the steps: receiving a triggering operation for a plurality of space templates through a terminal, and generating a control layer corresponding to a production element in a layer generation canvas on a UI design interface, layer relation information and interaction rules among the control layers are determined; generating a target file used for generating a UI interface; calling a modeling interface in the UI interface, generating a corresponding M language code from the operation instruction, converting the M language code into an executable instruction, and transmitting the executable instruction to an execution engine; after receiving the instruction, the execution engine analyzes and compiles the instruction and transmits the instruction to an instruction factory; the execution engine executes the instructions in the instruction queue, and simulates various operations and events in the production system according to the order of the instructions; the system comprises an interface generation module, a code conversion module and an instruction execution module. The production system can be better known and managed, and the production efficiency is improved.

column12: Method for monitoring data exchange over a network of the H link type implementing a TDMA technology
column13: A method for monitoring data exchange over a network of the H link type implementing a technology of the TDMA type includes transmitting a monitoring agent from a remote server to a communication server, installing the monitoring agent on the communication server, launching the monitoring agent on the communication server, the monitoring agent implementing an interface for receiving and for transmitting data designed and arranged to receive the data received by the communication server and transmit the data received by the monitoring agent to the remote server, transmitting the data received by the monitoring agent to the remote server, the transmission of the data received being carried out by the monitoring agent.

column12: Renewable energy cluster output distributed coordination control method considering uncertainty
column13: The invention discloses a renewable energy cluster output distributed coordination control method considering uncertainty, and belongs to the field of power system optimization control. In order to cope with the adverse effect of wind and light energy uncertainty on regulation and control precision, aiming at the problem that the uncertainty of a traditional cluster output optimization model cannot be fully considered, an optimization model and strategy considering output uncertainty are constructed based on TSL distribution; meanwhile, in the aspects of information architecture and implementation mode on which coordination control depends, aiming at the defects of high calculation complexity, long data acquisition period, high communication pressure and the like existing in a traditional centralized mode, the invention provides a method for better adapting to the characteristics of frequent data interaction, high communication timeliness requirement and the like of a proposed optimization model considering uncertainty, distributed calculation solution is realized based on a multi-agent system theory, so that the calculation scale and the communication pressure are reduced, and fault separation and risk dispersion are realized. On the whole, the renewable energy cluster control precision, robustness and flexibility can be improved.

column12: Frying oil quality rapid detection method based on spectrum technology
column13: The invention discloses a frying oil quality rapid detection method based on a spectrum technology. The method comprises the following steps: collecting training set samples and measurement data, establishing a correction model, detecting the correction model by using test set data, and detecting certain frying oil. The method comprises the following specific steps: collecting the training set samples and the measurement data, and establishing the correction model; detecting the correction model by using test set data; and detecting certain frying oil. According to the invention, spectrum scanning is carried out on a frying oil sample with unknown components, so that quality detection of the frying oil is realized. column12: Magnetic force excitation bolt joint vibration failure experiment device and test method
column13: The invention discloses a magnetic force excitation bolt joint vibration failure experiment device and a test method. The experiment device comprises a supporting base, a vibration excitation device, a test device and an acquisition and analysis device. The excitation device can drive a movable magnet to operate by a driving motor and generate periodic magnetic force to act on the bolt to be tested so as to enable the bolt joint to generate vibration failure; a displacement sensor, an acceleration sensor and a strain sensor on the testing device can respectively obtain three response signals of displacement, acceleration and strain of the bolt joint; and the acquisition and analysis device can be used for researching various failure conditions such as thread looseness of the bolt joint, slippage and vibration fatigue of a connected piece and the like by analyzing the obtained response signals. Various kinds of vibration excitation in engineering are effectively simulated through reasonable design, the diversity of experiments is increased by accurately controlling various variables, vibration failure experiment effects of different connection modes are compared, and the method has important value in research on the aspects of bolt joint vibration failure dynamics reliability and the like.

column12: Control device for robot performing mastering through torque or force control
column13: A control device for a robot according to the present invention controls a drive motor for one specific drive shaft of the robot such that the torque output by a torque detector matches a torque setting value when rotation of a component member is inhibited by a rotation inhibiting unit. The control device acquires a rotational position output by a rotational position detector of the specific drive shaft once the torque matches the torque setting value. The control device generates mastering data in response to output by the rotational position detector on the basis of the rotational position of the drive motor output by the rotational position detector and predetermined mastering data design values.

column12: Method for testing networks using test data flows
column13: A method for testing a network that comprises multiple devices includes sending, by a first device that is a regular participant of the network, on a path through the network, a test data flow to a second device that is another regular participant of the network; sending, by the second device, the received test data flow, and/or at least one diagnostic metric derived from this received test data flow, to a diagnostic entity; and determining, by the diagnostic entity, based at least in part on the test data flow, and/or on the diagnostic metric, received from the second device, whether the path through the network is performing according to at least one predetermined criterion.

column12: Electronic magazine interface material replacement method and related equipment thereof
column13: The embodiment of the invention belongs to the technical field of UI design, is applied to the field of electronic magazine interface material replacement, and relates to an electronic magazine interface material replacement method and related equipment thereof.The electronic magazine interface material replacement method comprises the steps that an initialization request instruction is received and analyzed, and an acquisition path of an initialized interface material is acquired; obtaining an initialized interface material according to the obtaining path, and rendering the initialized interface material in a reserved display area of the electronic magazine interface; receiving a calling updating instruction sent by a user on the electronic magazine interface in a click mode; and analyzing the calling and updating instruction, and calling a corresponding updating function to call and update the initialized interface material according to an analysis result. By means of interface screen splitting and H5 implementation, after interface materials are rendered to a reserved display area, convenient development and display of the electronic magazine are achieved, a left-right page turning function and a picture zooming function are set, dynamic updating of left-right page turning of a simulated book is achieved, and the experience degree of an electronic magazine reading user is improved.
column14: CHINA PING AN PROPERTY INSURANCE CO LTD

column12: PROGRAMMABLE LOGIC CIRCUIT DEVICE AND IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE
column13: To ensure that, when abnormality occurs, the abnormality is eliminated without initializing the whole of a reconfiguration region including a circuit that is reconfigured by a change of an inter-element connection.SOLUTION: The sequence processing which is executed upon occurrence of abnormality is a sequence processing ID "S08." In the sequence processing of the sequence processing ID "S08," reconfiguration data of reconfiguration data IDs "R03," "G05," and "W03" are designated as reconfiguration data for use at abnormality time. The reconfiguration data designed in this sequence processing for use at abnormality time, is reconfiguration data that designates connection between elements so as to not perform the sequence processing that was being executed when abnormality occurred.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

column12: Construction method of intelligent fabricated building
column13: The invention relates to the field of prefabricated building construction, and discloses an intelligent prefabricated building construction method which comprises the following steps: step 1, model design: designing a prefabricated building structure model according to demand data and environment data; step 2, building model generation: building models are combined according to the building model data designed in the step 1, and a simulation building model is generated; and 3, carrying out model optimization design, carrying out analogue simulation on the actual condition of the building according to the simulated building model generated in the step 2, detecting and analyzing the data of the building model in the simulation process, and optimizing the building structure model in the step 1 according to the analysis result. The method has the beneficial effect that the matching degree of the fabricated building construction content and the actual situation is high.

column12: Intelligent multi-target distinguishing method based on vector sound field characteristics
column13: The invention discloses an intelligent multi-target distinguishing method based on vector sound field characteristics, and relates to the technical field of underwater target detection and positioning. The distinguishing method comprises the steps of simulation of training data of the deep neural network, design and preprocessing of input data, preprocessing of label data, design and training of the deep neural network, judgment of multiple targets according to output of the network and the like. Vector sound field data are generated through KRAKEN simulation to train a deep neural network, frequency domain complex sound intensity serves as input of the deep neural network, and DOA in a normal distribution form serves as a label of the neural network. And more comprehensive vector sound field information is comprehensively utilized, so that the method has better performance in weak target detection and multi-target resolution.
column14: THE 715TH RES INSTITUTE OF CHINA SHIPBUILDING INDUSTRY CORPORATION

column12: Pupil-cornea reflex technology-based eye movement control automatic wheelchair system
column13: The invention discloses a pupil-cornea reflex technology-based eye movement control automatic wheelchair system, which is developed by using a software development kit(SDK) of a Tobii eye tracker and is used for scanning, modeling and analyzing the head through a pupil-cornea reflex technology. A sensor emits infrared light to both eyeballs, measures a gazing direction and controls a wheelchair motor, so that the application that the eyes control the wheelchair is achieved. The system comprises a signal collection module, a signal processing module, a wheelchair mechanical control module and an interaction module. The system collects eye movement signals by mainly using an eye tracker, and collects position signals by using a gyroscope. A computer calculates a wheelchair position and the human eye gazing direction in real time by means of the signal processing module, then wheelchair control signals are generated to meet the requirements, and in addition, a UI design of an operation interface is optimized, functions of dialing, alarming and the like are added, and the building and appearance design is improved, so that the wheelchair is more comfortable and private. Based on the system, a user can easily and comfortably control the wheelchair through the eyes.

column12: Interactive hierarchical topic modeling visual analysis method and device based on BERTopic
column13: The invention discloses an interactive hierarchical topic modeling visual analysis method and device based on BERTopic. The method comprises the steps that a data set corpus is cleaned and processed; carrying out BERTopic topic modeling training; taking a data set which is preprocessed into a vector as input, carrying out dimension reduction on the high-dimensional vector, and then carrying out clustering to obtain theme and document distribution; calculating theme representation to obtain corresponding words and weights of all themes; automatically generating a title for each theme by using chatGPT, and using theme consistency and theme diversity as evaluation indexes; a local theme editing algorithm; after the BERTopic is determined to obtain an initial theme, designing local editing algorithms with different granularities to optimize a model result with errors; through three different interaction types of themes, documents and words, the reliability of a model result is enhanced; carrying out visual design and implementation; and designing a corresponding visual chart according to the obtained data result. Visual analysis based on BERTopic topic modeling is achieved through a system with the front end and the rear end connected, and a user can visually mine and analyze the topic.

column12: Double-end service information architecture based on front-end acquisition-back-end menu type generation
column13: The invention discloses double-end service information architecture based on front-end acquisition-back-end menu type generation. The architecture comprises two parts: energy point location plug-in acquisition and platform strategy menu type production. The energy point location plug-in acquisition comprises a full-quantity acquisition intelligent instrument and an integrated intelligent switch, wherein the full-quantity acquisition intelligent instrument and the integrated intelligent switch both adopt a micro-power wireless broadband carrier communication mode. The platform strategy menu type generation is that energy data points acquired by a full-quantity acquisition intelligent instrument are subjected to solidification configuration according to the characteristics of the data points. On the basis of the adoption of inherent inter-line auxiliary signal transmission, an additional power supply is not needed, and a micro-power wireless broadband carrier communication mode is matched, so that the energy consumption can be greatly reduced; and on the basis of a menu type production matching strategy of a rear end, independent strategy generation can be effectively carried out on each front-end acquisition device, so that the applicability is improved.

column12: Modal analysis method, device and equipment for auxiliary fascia console assembly and storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of automobiles, and provides a modal analysis method, device and equipment for an auxiliary fascia console assembly and a storage medium, the modal analysis method for the auxiliary fascia console assembly comprises the following steps: establishing a finite element model of a target object, then analyzing the finite element model of the target object to obtain a modal value of a tail mounting bracket, and calculating the modal value of the tail mounting bracket according to the modal value of the tail mounting bracket; and finally, determining a modal analysis result of the auxiliary instrument panel assembly according to the modal value of the tail mounting bracket. By applying the technical scheme of the invention, in the data design stage of the auxiliary instrument panel assembly, the modal value of the tail mounting bracket is analyzed by using CAE simulation analysis, so that the modal analysis result of the auxiliary instrument panel assembly is determined in the data design stage of the auxiliary instrument panel assembly. And determining a modal analysis result of the auxiliary fascia console assembly, so that the auxiliary fascia console assembly meeting the design requirements is designed, the work of repeated mold repairing, loading, verification and the like is avoided, the design rectification period of the door plate handrail is shortened, and the mold repairing cost of the auxiliary fascia console assembly is saved.

column12: Molecular dynamics computing method and system based on cloud computing technology
column13: The invention discloses a molecular dynamics computing method and system based on a cloud computing technology. The molecular dynamics computing system comprises a preprocessing subsystem used for defining and packaging a core component of molecular dynamics software, classifying parameters of the software and automatically matching force field parameters; an interaction and control subsystem, which is used for respectively carrying out interaction design and result interaction processing on the molecular dynamics process by utilizing a workflow design interaction module and a result interaction processing module; a job management and control subsystem which is used for creating calculation jobs and submitting the calculation jobs to the super computer for calculation; and a result processing subsystem, which is used for automatically acquiring a track file after calculation of the software is finished, carrying out analysis and calculation according to preset requirements and carryingout physical property data extraction on data obtained by analysis. By adopting the method and the system, the technical difficulty threshold requirement for calculation by applying the software canbe reduced by utilizing an automatic matching technology of cloud computing and force field parameters, and the use process is simplified.

column12: Parametric design method for fan coil unit based on BIM
column13: A parametric design method for a fan coil unit based on BIM (Building Information Modeling) includes steps of: determining a basic sample; parametrically modeling; setting pipe connection locations and connection sizes of a two-pipe fan coil and a four-pipe fan coil; setting component visibility; completing control settings of left-right one-click selection for the fan coil; arranging an air pipe behind an air outlet of the fan coil; producing air duct flexible connectors; producing diffusers; adding parameter controls of a “yes or no” type to a return air box, a lower return air flange, and a back to return air flange; completing production of pipes and connectors, and naming. In a heating and ventilation BIM design of building engineering, with the above method, efficiencies of designing, modeling and plotting are obviously increased.

column12: Low-code report realization method based on SIS production operation data
column13: The invention discloses a low-code report realization method based on SIS production operation data. According to the method, a data warehouse is constructed based on SIS production operation data, design is carried out according to a hierarchical concept, the action range and data positioning of a data table are defined, a data access port is standardized and unified, a B/S structure is adopted, and data binding of a report data set and a form grid is achieved through a Web visual form designer; besides, zero coding and dragging operation are achieved, and Chinese type complex data reports can be easily completed; in addition, the method can be operated without a technical developer, wherein online visual report design is provided for users, so that the report generation efficiency is improved, and report configuration learning cost is reduced.

column12: Electronic contract dynamic generation and signing method, system and device and storage medium
column13: The embodiment of the invention discloses an electronic contract dynamic generation and signing method, system and device and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring protocol content and service data corresponding to a service scene; generating a protocol table according to protocol content design, and filling the service data into the protocol table; generating a table picture from the protocol table; and synchronizing the protocol content and the table picture to a third-party electronic signing platform to obtain a signable electronic contract. By implementing the method provided by the embodiment of the invention, the defects in the prior art are overcome through the custom language description and dynamic table technology, and the requirements of business scenes are met. Project landing of the electronic signature is realized, the signature efficiency is improved, and the operation cost of a company is reduced.

column12: Method for testing dental implant surgical guide apparatus thereof
column13: Disclosed are a guide verification method for an implant surgery and a device thereof. The guide verification method for the implant surgery and the device thereof according to one embodiment, after a vertical structure is implanted in the oral cavity, verify whether or not the guide is suitable through a comparison between the guide design data designed according to the pre-operation surgical plan of a patient and the data for verification obtained after fastening the guide to the oral cavity. Therefore, the present invention is capable of improving an accuracy of the guide surgery.

column12: Wiper system design method based on DMU technology of CATIA V5
column13: The invention discloses a wiper system design method based on the DMU technology of CATIA V5. The method comprises the following steps: building a kinematic pair through the DMU technology, and building the position relation between all structures in a wiper system; on the premise of establishing constraints, modifying a certain size parameter, automatically retrieving and calculating a new required parameter quantity, and driving to modify the geometric model; related sizes in other related modules can be changed by modifying size parameters; the geometrical shapes of a glass surface and a vertical plane of a mechanism rotating shaft are defined as characteristics, the sizes of the glass surface and the vertical plane are stored as adjustable parameters to form an entity, and complex geometrical body construction is carried out on the basis of the entity. According to the method, a large amount of data does not need to be collected and concluded, the digital model can be analyzed visually, the visual design method and real-time parametric modification and simulation have the advantages which cannot be compared with a traditional design method, and the method has certain practical significance in improving design efficiency and accuracy.

column12: Software visualization rapid development system
column13: The invention discloses a software visualization rapid development system. The system comprises a custom component library construction module which is used for constructing a packaging component forsoftware visualization development, and forming a custom component library, a first designer, a second designer, a third designer, and an execution engine. The packaging component comprises each designer, a development data component of the execution engine and a data component of an object model generation database; the first designer is used for constructing an object model in a user-defined manner; the second designer is used for customizing a development interface; the third designer is used for customizing a design page; and the execution engine is used for responding to instructions of the first designer, the second designer and the third designer. The invention discloses a software visualization rapid development system which is a platform for rapidly constructing software based onpage visualization configuration engine. The custom component library is the basis of the platform, and the designer and the execution engine are the core components of the platform. The platform canrealize low-code and even zero-code software development through visual design and engine type compiling.

column12: Metadata dynamic form generation method and system
column13: The invention provides a metadata dynamic form generation method and system, and the method comprises the steps: S1, building a service metadata object model, and building a corresponding relation between metadata and a UI element through a metadata type, so as to form a service object; S2, setting a service object associated with the dynamic form through a dynamic form designer, and dragging the metadata dynamic attribute to a form visual design interface of the dynamic form designer to complete the design of the form UI; S3, selecting a form main metadata object, dragging the main metadata object into the form designer, loading page elements according to the field data type of the main data object, and modifying and setting element attributes and page time; and S4, setting a form access role and an access management permission of the form access role so as to control the form use permission. According to the method, the dynamic adaptation of the metadata and the form UI can be realized, so that the dynamic adaptation of the metadata of a service model is realized, and the applicability and interactivity of the method are improved.

column12: Atomic power interface aggregation method, device and equipment based on pipeline model
column13: The invention discloses an atomic power interface aggregation method, device and equipment based on a pipeline model, and the method comprises the steps: receiving an atomic power aggregation request of a visual design interface, obtaining model parameters configured through the design interface, and constructing a pipeline type data model according to the model parameters; wherein the pipeline type data model comprises a plurality of step units for serial processing, each step unit comprises a plurality of parallel calling request basic subunits, and each calling request basic subunit and each atomic power interface are in a one-to-one mapping relationship; a path parameter mapping mode is adopted among the step units, so that a processing result of the previous step unit becomes an input parameter of each calling request basic subunit in the next step unit. According to the method, the aggregation mode of the atomic power is simplified, the aggregation capability interface is quickly formed, the software development efficiency is improved, the code complexity is reduced, customized aggregation implementation codes are not needed, and the number of servers is reduced.

column12: System and method for diagnosing state of hydraulic station of wind turbine generator
column13: The invention provides a state diagnosis system and method for a hydraulic station of a wind turbine generator, and relates to the technical field of operating mechanisms of hydraulic actuators. The state diagnosis system for the hydraulic station of the wind turbine generator comprises a computing server and a web server, the computing server stores the data to the computing server through api calling, the computing server analyzes and computes the data to generate a corresponding computing result, and the corresponding computing result is stored in a database; and the web server is used for carrying out business display, carrying out corresponding business display on a calculation result through visual design, and integrating the calculation result in the centralized monitoring control platform. According to the method, the deterioration trend of the hydraulic station can be effectively checked before the hydraulic station breaks down in combination with business cognition and evaluation scores from the economic significance, the hydraulic station is regulated and controlled in advance, the number of times that the hydraulic station breaks down is reduced, the operation and maintenance cost of the hydraulic station is reduced, the operation state of the hydraulic station is stabilized, and the production economic benefits are guaranteed.

column12: Value distribution system in digital economy mode
column13: The invention relates to a value distribution system in a digital economic mode, and the system comprises a client module which is used for enabling a participant to enter a platform, participate in a creation module, and carry out the interaction and transaction; the creation module is used for shaping an economic and commercial value model of a creator from links of digital content design, material collection, content creation, content release and content promotion, redistributing rights among role parties, creating contents by the creator, and distributing all and control and agreement performance rights and interests; and the digital module is used for building a digital economic and commercial value model and the like from node data acquisition, data arrangement, data analysis and data application links. The method has the advantages that an operable distributed decentralized value distribution model is provided, creation flows with more commercial values under digital economy in the future are brought into a value distribution system, all participants can obtain more direct and diversified benefits, and the overall commercial value is improved.

column12: Rigid body rotational motion design method based on spherical spline curve
column13: The invention relates to the field of inertial navigation and computer animation design, and provides a rigid body rotational motion design method based on a spherical spline curve, which comprises the following steps: step 100, setting attitude data of rotational motion of a rigid body at N key moments in a motion process; step 200, fitting a tangent vector, a unit tangent vector, a curvature vector and a second-order conjugate vector of the rotary motion at each key moment; step 300, constructing a spherical spline curve with continuous second-order parameters by utilizing a quintic spherical Bezier curve on the basis of the rotary motion data fitted in the step 200; and step 400, calculating a rotational motion track of any point on the rigid body by utilizing the spherical spline curveobtained in the step 300 to finish the design of the rotational motion of the rigid body. The method is simple and convenient, limitation on known conditions is reduced, and motion control is more flexible.

column12: Full data space construction system based on industrial chain metadata model
column13: The invention discloses a full-amount data space construction system based on an industrial chain metadata model, which is composed of enterprise data nodes and an industrial chain data space, the enterprise data nodes collect and integrate data of different links, the industrial chain data space integrates various data designed in an industrial chain, and the enterprise data nodes collect and integrate data of different links. According to the industrial chain management system and method, the industrial chain is established, and a unified access interface and data service are provided, so that the relationship and data flow among all links in the industrial chain can be better known, planning and management can be better performed, comprehensive control and management of the industrial chain are realized, and enterprises can be helped to optimize processes, improve production efficiency and reduce operation cost, thereby enhancing competitiveness of the enterprises.

column12: Expansion force prediction method for lithium ion battery module or battery pack
column13: The invention discloses an expansion force prediction method for a lithium ion battery module or a battery pack, which comprises the following steps of carrying out cyclic expansion force test on a single battery cell under the same condition by using test fixtures with different non-deformability; calculating the rigidity of the test fixtures with different non-deformability when the single-cell expansive force is applied; acquiring corresponding expansive forces under different clamp rigidities when the single cell circulates to an EOL state; fitting a relation curve of different clamp rigidities and corresponding expansive forces in the EOL state of the single cell; calculating the rigidity of the lithium ion battery pack, substituting the rigidity into the relational expression, obtaining the expansive force of the battery pack in the EOL state under the rigidity condition of the battery pack, inputting the expansive force into modeling analysis software, and obtaining the expansive force prediction result of the battery pack. According to the method, the expansion force of the battery pack system can be accurately and effectively predicted, the expansion force of the system can be predicted at the initial stage of the design of the battery pack system, and the system needs to be tested again after the design scheme of the system is changed.
column14: XIAMEN HITHIUM NEW ENERGY TECHNOLOGY CO LTD

column12: Control device
column13: The utility model provides a control device, which is applied to industrial equipment and comprises a power supply, an industrial switch, a main control cabinet, a control module group and a man-machine interaction unit connected with the control module group, and the main control cabinet comprises a PLC (programmable logic controller) control system; the man-machine interaction comprises an interaction interface and an operation button; the control module group comprises a network adapter, a communication module used for debugging and de-debugging data, a safety input module used for receiving safety signals, a field input module used for receiving input signals and a field output module used for receiving output signals. According to the utility model, the safety input module, the integrated industrial switch, the interactive interface, the warning lamp, the operation button and the like are adopted to form a flexible control unit, and data communication transmission with upper and lower layer systems (equipment and intelligent elements) is realized and realized through an EtherNet/IP protocol. And meanwhile, real-time display of equipment state information can be realized through a man-machine interaction design.
column15: GU XIAOQIANG;;LI LIJUN;;MIAO MINGANG;;WANG LIAN;;XI JIAMEI

column12: Testing autonomous cars
column13: Systems and methods are disclosed for determining the efficacy of an autonomous vehicle driving system in exhibiting safe driving behavior during test track scenarios. Testing parameters eliciting autonomous vehicle driving system behavior may be chosen for the test track scenario. The autonomous vehicle driving system may be tested in the test track and autonomous vehicle driving system behavior may be observed in response to the presentations of testing parameters. A safe driving score may be calculated for the autonomous vehicle driving system based on measured autonomous vehicle performance and operational data generated responsive to the presentation of testing parameters in the test track. A benchmark insurance premium may be calculated for an autonomous vehicle driving system based on the calculated safe driving score.
column32: Hevelke, A., & Nida-Rümelin, J. (2015). Responsibility for Crashes of Autonomous Vehicles: An Ethical Analysis. Science & Engineering Ethics, 21(3), 619. (Year: 2015).

column12: Flexible test board to improve sensor i/o coverage for autonomous driving platform
column13: Systems and methods are disclosed for performing manufacturing testing on an autonomous driving vehicle (ADV) sensor board. A sensor unit of the ADV includes a plurality of sensor I/O channels that provide information to the ADV perception and planning module, to navigate the ADV. An array of sensors is emulated on a sensor unit test board. The sensor unit includes a small software that manages the flow of testing the sensor unit. The sensor unit test board provides emulated sensor data for, e.g., GPS, LIDAR, RADAR, inertial measurement, one or more cameras, humidity, temperature, and pressure, and throttle, braking, and steering inputs. Each emulated sensor includes its own data validity checker to ensure that each sensor I/O channel of the sensor unit is tested. The sensor unit test board can include an LED for each I/O channel that indicates a pass/fail status of the test for the I/O channel.

column12: AUTOMATICALLY RECONFIGURING A PERFORMANCE TEST ENVIRONMENT
column13: Described herein is a system for automatically reconfiguring a test environment. As described above, performance testing can be a time-consuming and error-prone resulting in the use of unnecessary computational resources. The system may use machine-learning to determine whether the test environment, test data, and/or test script is to be reconfigured to optimize the performance test. The system may iteratively reconfigure the test environment, test data, and/or test script, and re-execute the performance test, until an optimal performance test of an application is executed based on a specified performance requirement.

column12: Manned spaceflight launching quality control method and device
column13: The invention provides a manned spaceflight launching quality control method and device, and relates to the technical field of manned spaceflight, and the method specifically comprises the steps: carrying out corresponding inspection test items according to a manned spaceflight launching test launching technological process, and obtaining related manned spaceflight launching quality control available data; the manned spaceflight launching quality control available data comprises field data, design acceptance data, other task data, successful data envelope, historical data and spaceflight standard data; and sequentially comparing the field data with the design acceptance data, the other task data, the success data envelope, the historical data and the spaceflight standard data according to a preset working process and constraint conditions, and taking corresponding quality control measures according to comparison results. According to the invention, the reliability of manned spaceflight launching is improved.

column12: MANAGEMENT APPARATUS, MANAGEMENT SYSTEM, INFORMATION GENERATION METHOD, AND PROGRAM FOR MANAGING RECORD OF PROCESS
column13: A management apparatus that manages records of a predetermined process carried out sing test paper, the test paper having a discoloration area that changes color in accordance with an achievement degree of the predetermined process, is presented. The management apparatus includes: holding means for holding, for each predetermined process, a record in which information that, indicates a date/time at which the predetermined process was carried out and a determination result of the predetermined process determined based on the color of the discoloration area of the test paper is recorded; and generating means for generating information for determining transition of quality of the predetermined process based on the information recorded in the records.

column12: Configurable relevance service test platform
column13: In general, embodiments of the present invention provide systems, methods and computer readable media for a configurable test environment within which a relevance service can be invoked to execute one or a combination of test scenarios, each test scenario respectively being configured to exercise one or a combination of features of the relevance service. In embodiments, a test scenario may be configured to use test data that can be simulated and/or be derived from one or a combination of user models and promotion models, and/or be based on aggregated data that has been collected from previous production runs of the relevance service. In embodiments, each test scenario is described as a set of test configuration data. In some embodiments, the test configuration data are represented in a data interchange format that is both human and machine-readable, e.g., JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

column12: METHOD FOR DETERMINING AT LEAST ONE QUALITY PARAMETER OF CREAM CHEESE
column13: The invention relates to a method for determining at least one quality parameter of cream cheese. The method comprises at least the following steps: determining a plurality of process variables of the cream cheese before and/or during and/or directly after a foaming of the cream cheese by introducing nitrogen into the cream cheese (2); removing a plurality of samples of the cream cheese after the filling of the cream cheese is complete (5); determining at least one quality parameter of the cream cheese for each sample of the cream cheese using test people (6); and calculating a model for predicting the at least one quality parameter of the cream cheese based on the determined plurality of process variables, wherein the determined at least one quality parameter of the cream cheese correlates with the determined plurality of process variables of the cream cheese (7).

column12: Data verification device, data verification method, and data verification program
column13: This data verification device (10) generates a test code by embedding, in a referenced portion of a source code which is a referenced portion for reference to definition data, a log output code for outputting a log. The data verification device (10) instructs a test execution device (20) to execute the test code using test data as an input. The data verification device (10) refers to a log output as a result of the execution of the test code. Then, the data verification device (10) determines whether the referenced portion has been executed when the test data was used as the input.

column12: Methods for creating automated dynamic workflows of interoperable bots and devices thereof
column13: Methods, devices, and non-transitory computer readable media that add interoperable BOTs to a stored BOT inventory. Each of the BOTs is associated with a BOT type, has a common structure, and automates at least a portion of an enterprise process. Assembly rules are obtained. Each of the assembly rules includes one or more constraints for inclusion of one or more of the BOTs in one or more of a plurality of workflows based on the one of the BOT types associated with each of the one or more of the BOTs. The workflows are assembled based on one or more the assembly rules. Each of the workflows comprises a subset of the BOTs and each BOT of the subsets of the BOTs is included in one or more of the workflows based on at least one of an associated functionality, performance, or service level.

column12: Novel efficient industrial data storage optimization technology

column12: Ultrasonic directional sound test system and method
column13: The invention provides an ultrasonic directional sound test system and method, and the method comprises the steps of: acquiring a plurality of sound sensors, and enabling the plurality of sound sensors to be distributed into a sound sensor array located on the same plane; acquiring ultrasonic directional sound production equipment used for emitting a test sound source, wherein the ultrasonic directional sound production equipment is perpendicular to the plane where the sound sensor array is located, and a distance exists between the the plane where the ultrasonic directional equipment is located and the plane where the sound sensor array is located; changing the distance between the plane where the ultrasonic directional equipment is located and the plane where the sound sensor array is located, and recording the test data of the ultrasonic directional equipment when the ultrasonic directional equipment sends out the test sound source at different distances through the sound sensor array. According to the invention, quantitative directional sound design can be realized, so that more precise sound directional management is realized; meanwhile, rich application possibility can be provided; moreover, the data can be used as a key index of the ultrasonic directional sound production equipment, so that a core key role can be played in technology research and development and productproduction detection.

column12: Spacecraft safety critical data efficient storage method based on flow mechanism
column13: A spacecraft safety critical data efficient storage method based on a flow mechanism adopts the principle of 'data self and data processing decoupling', solidifies data processing logic, realizes that the change influence of safety critical data is limited to only maintain a safety critical data summary sheet, and reduces the maintenance workload and complexity of the safety critical data. Based on a bit stream and byte stream maintenance mechanism, the information storage density is remarkably improved for a compression storage mode of Boolean type data items, batch processing of safety critical data storage and recovery operation is achieved, and safety critical data storage and recovery consistency is efficiently guaranteed. According to the method, the problems of safety key data design and realization of high-reliability and high-efficiency maintenance on the premise that a storage protocol of a GNC subsystem of a spacecraft changes frequently and storage resources are limited are effectively solved.

column12: MEANS FOR THE QUANTITATIVE DETERMINATION OF SODIUM CONCENTRATION AND CREATININE CONCENTRATION
column13: The present invention relates to a single-use test-strip for the quantitative determination of sodium concentration and creatinine concentration and for the subsequent determination of their ratio, and to a non-invasive point-of-care (POC) device for detecting sodium depletion and/or sodium overload in a patient's body. Furthermore, the present invention relates to a method for simultaneously and quantitatively determining sodium concentration and creatinine concentration in a patient's urine sample and to a method of detecting sodium depletion and/or sodium overload in a patient's body.

column12: DETECTION OF REMOTE FRAUDULENT ACTIVITY IN A CLIENT-SERVER-SYSTEM
column13: Detecting unauthorized access to a device is detected in embodiments of the disclosed technology. After downloading a webpage, code is executed in a browser to scan network ports and determine which ports are open. Further webpage content sent from a web server is determined and/or modified in embodiments of the disclosed technology based on which ports are open. In some embodiments, when a particular port or ports are already in use it is determined that a malfeasant actor has access to the end user device and as such, sensitive data or secure data which is intended for a specific user is no longer sent to the end user device.

column12: Systems and methods for mainframe batch testing
column13: Methods and systems for performing mainframe batch testing and/or property-based validation testing using a finite-state machine are provided. According to certain aspects, a validation server may receive a set of batch data designed to validate a property under test, such as during mainframe batch testing. A validation server may validate that the set of batch data is in a proper format. The validation server may then cause a finite-state machine to process instructions contained within the set of batch data. Once the finite-state machine processes the set of batch data, the validation server may then validate that the finite-state machine adheres to the property under test. If the validation fails, the validation server may generate an error report describing the failure.

column12: method for testing data quality of activity reports in city-wide logistics industry
column13: The invention discloses a method for testing the data quality of activity reports in the city-wide logistics industry. The method comprises the steps of getting familiar with the whole project process, and getting familiar with the whole data processing process; calculating a caliber by each index; processing abnormal data and the like. determining the correctness of the data according to the six design points of the test case; controlling the authority of the report; displaying a report format; using a report function; performance; data validity; designing effective data in three major directions aiming at the test data; invalid data; abnormal data; finally, paying attention to six key points of data design, namely report null values; realizing the data diversity; designing numerical values; designing historical data; comparing different reports; and testing the independence of data between scenes. The relation between a single module and the whole project is considered in a penetrative thinking mode, and a high-quality test case is designed.

column12: Multi-source risk control data cleaning processing method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of risk control data processing, in particular to a multi-source risk control data cleaning processing method. The method comprises the steps of collectinghistorical data and enabling a system to import risk control historical data in a full import mode; carrying out real-time data acquisition: enabling the system to acquire increment change based on adatabase log analysis mode to realize real-time data synchronization; performing pattern matching: performing pattern matching on the data on the basis of the similarity of the attributes; making semantic conversion: converting the attribute data of each heterogeneous data source into standard data; filtering invalid information and recognizing and eliminating wrong data and repeated data; encrypting data: encrypting original data; and making data compression: carrying out lossless compression processing on the original data. The data designed by the invention adopts a multi-source acquisition mode, and meanwhile, unification of the data is realized, data processing is facilitated, invalid data can be reduced, and the data processing efficiency is improved.

column12: Intelligent field air source cabin
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of gas source cabins, and discloses an intelligent field gas source cabin for efficiently and continuously providing high-purity hydrogen for high-altitude meteorological detection equipment under the field unattended condition. The system automatically completes the processes of start and stop, material supplement, hydrogen production, hydrogen storage, hydrogen supply, waste discharge and the like through intelligent control. The system is high in reliability, high in environmental adaptability and unattended, the monitoring system adopts a module-level monitoring unit to monitor the running state of the hydrogen preparation, storage and supply system, the running state of the system and fault monitoring data are fed back to a terminal system in real time, and a user can look up the working state of the system according to terminal software and quickly position problems. A hardware system of the whole machine considers a closed design, an anti-explosion design, an interlocking design, a severe environment resistance design, a built-in real-time monitoring design, a failure design and the like. The software considers redundancy design, data stability design, standardized interface design, man-machine interaction design and the like, so that the intelligent field gas source cabin is safe and reliable.

column12: MEANS FOR THE QUANTITATIVE DETERMINATION OF CATIONIC ELECTROLYTE CONCENTRATION AND CREATININE CONCENTRATION AND OF THEIR RATIOS
column13: The present invention relates to a single-use test strip for the quantitative determination of a concentration of a cationic electrolyte which is not sodium, and of creatinine concentration, and for the subsequent determination of their ratio, and to a non-invasive point-of-care (POC) device for detecting a disorder of electrolyte balance in patient's body. Furthermore, the present invention relates to a method for simultaneously and quantitatively determining a cationic electrolyte concentration and creatinine concentration in a patient's urine sample and to a method of detecting a disorder of electrolyte balance in a patient's body.

column12: Processing method of integrated circuit layout data
column13: The invention discloses a processing method of integrated circuit layout data. The method comprises the following specific steps of S1, design of a classification algorithm, S2, classification processing of integrated circuit data, S3, design of integrated circuit layout, S4, safety evaluation of integrated circuit data design rules, and S5, integrated circuit process processing. The invention relates to the technical field of integrated circuit layout data processing. According to the processing method of integrated circuit layout data, an intelligent classification unit can be established ina data processing system, the design is performed according to the quantity of the data types required by a user, a worker can well classify programs according to required types of data, the purposeof directionally identifying, classifying and arranging the process data is achieved, the situation that a system is blocked or waiting time is long during processing is well avoided, processing of the integrated circuit layout data is guaranteed, and therefore great convenience is brought to integrated circuit process layout work of workers.

column12: Creating multiple use test case
column13: An approach to create a multiple use test case when one or more computer processors receive a first test case from a test generator. The approach includes the computer processors evaluating each instruction in the first test case to determine that an instruction meets a set of conditions for creating a multiple use test case. The method includes one or more computer processors generating a set of rules for each instruction meeting the one or more conditions to create the multiple use test case. Furthermore, the method includes one or more computer processors creating the multiple use test case by adding the set of rules to each instruction meeting the one or more conditions to create the multiple use test case.

Power energy storage system management method and system
column13: The invention discloses an electric energy storage system management method and system. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring related operation data of an energy storage system and a storage battery from a data source; performing data processing on the operation data, judging the data and a result, performing internal logic analysis on the operation data, performing comparative analysis on state data, design parameters and an initial value, and performing judgment and early warning on an analysis result; and information notification and pushing are carried out based on analysis result classification. column12: Risk control strategy test method and device, electronic equipment and readable storage medium
column13: The invention discloses a risk control strategy testing method and device, electronic equipment and a readable storage medium. In response to a test instruction for the target risk control strategy, configuration information of the target risk control strategy is obtained, and the configuration information comprises node description information of the target risk control strategy and a screening condition of test data needing to be used; test data are obtained from historical data stored in the mirror image system based on the configuration information, and each piece of test data comprises historical input parameter data and a historical execution result; for each piece of test data, taking historical input parameter data in the test data as input parameter data of the target risk control strategy to obtain a simulation execution result; generating a comparison result based on the simulation execution result and the historical execution result; and generating a test result of the target risk control strategy based on the comparison result. Based on the scheme disclosed by the invention, the reliability of the risk control strategy and whether the expected business effect is achieved can be determined.

column12: Vehicle-mounted display screen mounting angle correcting device
column13: The utility model discloses a vehicle-mounted display screen installation angle correction device, which overcomes the problems that in the prior art, a vehicle-mounted display instrument is adjusted through real object verification in a later vehicle manufacturing stage, and sunlight is weakened by adding a light shield or adding a reflective film on the surface of a screen after sunlight irradiation intensity. An angle correction unit for reading angle data and a light source simulation unit for simulating solar illumination radiation intensity are mounted on the base, and a display unit is mounted on the angle correction unit. The detection device can simulate an application scene of real sunlight irradiation in a data design stage, and meanwhile, equipment comparison detection is added, so that the problems of relatively low overall brightness, low recognition degree and the like of a display screen due to sunlight irradiation in a later stage can be effectively solved.

column12: CIRCUIT CHECK APPARATUS, CIRCUIT CHECK METHOD, AND CIRCUIT CHECK PROGRAM
column13: To reduce the time required for checking circuits for multiple circuit patterns of a wire harness, while reducing omission of the check.SOLUTION: A circuit check apparatus includes a control unit which determines whether production data designed for connection of a wire harness is correct or not on the basis of specification data including information on specifications of connections of circuits between auxiliary machines mounted on a predetermined apparatus. The control unit sets connections between multiple terminals included in the production data and connected to each other, to a connection group, to be stored in a storage unit, extracts two terminals, first and second terminals, included in the specification data and connected to each other, and determines whether the connection group in the production data is correct or not on the basis of whether the first terminal and the second terminal are included in the same connection group stored in the storage unit.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

column12: Three-dimensional caching method for test data
column13: The invention relates to a three-dimensional caching method for test data, and belongs to the field of data storage. For multiple test data, a data storage area is established from three dimensions of'test times-test parameter number-single parameter test result sequence '. During use, test data of each time can be quickly stored, different test parameters of each time do not need to be considered, and data of different tests of the same parameter can be quickly compared. column12: Agile design method based on auxiliary frame collision and dynamic stiffness
column13: The invention relates to an agile design method based on auxiliary frame collision and dynamic stiffness, which relates to the technical field of automobile chassis, and comprises the following steps of: determining an auxiliary frame hard point, obtaining a part arrangement scheme of an auxiliary frame by utilizing a topological optimization tool, and importing finite element simulation software to carry out grid division; analyzing to obtain the collision performance of the whole vehicle and the dynamic stiffness value of the auxiliary frame under the mass constraint of the auxiliary frame, adjusting grid data parameters, performing iterative analysis in different combination modes, determining a solution set of the dynamic stiffness and the collision performance, screening out an optimal solution from the solution set, and determining the dynamic stiffness and the collision performance of the auxiliary frame. Importing parameters of the grid data in the optimal solution into finite element simulation software for verification and analysis, determining whether the grid data meets performance index requirements or not, importing the grid data parameters meeting the performance index requirements into three-dimensional software, performing reverse data design according to boundaries of the grid data, generating three-dimensional data of the auxiliary frame, and determining whether the three-dimensional data of the auxiliary frame meet the performance index requirements or not. The problem that collision and dynamic stiffness of an existing auxiliary frame cannot be considered at the same time is solved, and the method is suitable for design of the automobile auxiliary frame.

column12: System and methods for calibration of an array camera
column13: Systems and methods for calibrating an array camera are disclosed. Systems and methods for calibrating an array camera in accordance with embodiments of this invention include the capturing of an image of a test pattern with the array camera such that each imaging component in the array camera captures an image of the test pattern. The image of the test pattern captured by a reference imaging component is then used to derive calibration information for the reference component. A corrected image of the test pattern for the reference component is then generated from the calibration information and the image of the test pattern captured by the reference imaging component. The corrected image is then used with the images captured by each of the associate imaging components associated with the reference component to generate calibration information for the associate imaging components.

column12: Equipment manufacturing industry APP development framework and method
column13: The invention relates to an equipment manufacturing industry APP development framework and method, and the framework comprises a data model which is used for storing user information and application information data; the user interaction module comprises a visual design sub-module and a back-end interaction module sub-module which are respectively used for carrying out visual page design, sending front-end user operation to a back end and returning an operation result to the front end; the user management module is used for performing addition, deletion, query and authority control management on users of the industrial APP; the authentication module is used for carrying out user login verification and application permission verification; the application function module is used for transmitting a result back to the front end after the back end automatically executes the command transmitted by the front end; and the middleware module comprises a super computer resource calling sub-module and an industrial internet platform docking deployment sub-module used for providing an interactive API (Application Program Interface), and is used for realizing interaction between the industrial APP and components outside the industrial APP. Compared with the prior art, the development efficiency of the industrial APP is improved.
column14: UNIV SHANGHAI MARITIME;;SHANGHAI SUPERCOMPUTER TECH CO LTD
column15: ZHANG QINGLEI;;LIN JIAWEN;;DUAN JIANGUO;;ZHOU YING;;DING JUNHONG;;CHEN XIAOLONG;;WANG XIAOBO

column12: Automated videogame testing
column13: An automated testing framework and associated tools for executable applications such as games focus on integration testing, wherein users create data-driven tests by using test modules and configuration data as building blocks. The tools facilitate cooperation between coders and non-technical Quality Assurance (QA) staff in creating automated tests, by simplifying the user interface for configuring tests. Components of the tools simulate user interactions with the application under test, for example, gamepad button presses. The tools are also capable skipping portions of gameplay or other interactive activity and directly jumping into a desired game mode during automated testing, and other functions.

column12: Virtualization of ephemeral organization structures in a multitenant environment
column13: Apparatuses and techniques to utilize a scratch organization as a unit of virtualization. Potential hosts for a scratch organization are evaluated. The potential hosts include at least the first group of hardware processing devices and a second group of the plurality of hardware processing devices to provide remote client computing environments. A target host is selected from the potential hosts. The scratch organization to be hosted by the target host is generated. Data is loaded from a test source that is not the subject organization into the scratch organization. One or more test operations are performed on the scratch organization using the loaded data with the target host. The scratch organization is destroyed on the selected host after the one or more test operations have been performed.
