column12: Drawing die and design and manufacturing method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a drawing die and a designing and manufacturing method thereof.The drawing die comprises a female die, a male die and a blank holder, the female die is matched with the male die to form a cavity used for forming parts, and the blank holder is located between the female die and the male die and used for being matched with the female die to press a blank; drawing ribs are arranged on the female die and the blank holder, each drawing rib comprises an inner rib and an outer rib, and the inner rib and the outer rib are in smooth connection through a transition section; the design and manufacturing method comprises the steps of data analysis of the drawing process, design of the drawing process, design of drawing machining data, design of a drawing die structure, machining and assembling of a die and debugging of the die. By designing and transforming the draw bead structure and the manufacturing method, the material utilization rate is increased, meanwhile, the insert structure is adopted to replace the draw bead area, and the rigidity of the manufactured part is improved.

column12: REAL-TIME ENTITY ANOMALY DETECTION
column13: Methods and systems for analyzing request to access resources and determining a resource access policy are provided. The resource access system can train, store, evaluate, and deploy machine learning models that learn to output a trust score associated with a resource access request, the trust score relating to the request's legitimacy. A resource access system can receive a request for a resource from a requesting entity. The resource access system can determine an entity profile using request data in the request. The resource access system can request data from the request to determine whether the request is normal or anomalous. Using a policy engine, the resource access system can determine a resource access policy, such as allowing or denying access to the resource.

column12: Simulated use detection mechanism for ground harrow dust collector
column13: The utility model discloses a simulation use detection mechanism for a ground harrow dust collector, which comprises a machine table, a limiting assembly, a conveying assembly and an electrifying assembly, the limiting assembly and the conveying assembly are both arranged on the machine table, the electrifying assembly is arranged on the conveying assembly, and the electrifying assembly is connected with the ground harrow dust collector in a simulation use state. The initial position of the ground harrow dust collector is fixed and limited through the limiting assembly, and the transmission assembly drives the electrifying assembly to electrify the ground harrow dust collector for a simulated use test. According to the utility model, the use state of the ground rake dust collector is simulated and current detection is carried out to obtain related data of the use state of the ground rake dust collector, and the unqualified ground rake dust collector is found by comparing the related data with preset parameters, so that defective ground rake dust collectors are effectively prevented from flowing out of the market, the yield of the ground rake dust collector is ensured, and the production efficiency is improved. The practicability is high.
column14: DONGGUAN HUITU AUTOMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: Method for delivery of an encoded EMS profile to a user device
column13: The current invention describes a method and system for imposing a dynamic sentiment vector to an electronic message. In one embodiment of the invention, the method comprises of receiving a text input comprising message content from an electronic computing device associated with a user. The message content is further parsed and comprised in the text input for emotionally-charged language, assigned a sentiment value, based on the emotionally-charged language, from a dynamic sentiment value spectrum to the text input. Additionally, based on the sentiment value, imposing a sentiment vector, corresponding to the assigned sentiment value, to the text input, the imposed sentiment vector rendering a sensory effect on the message content designed to convey a corresponding sentiment.

column12: Brain graph-based test method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention provides a brain graph-based test method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of receiving a test result adding request corresponding toa target test case, wherein the test result adding request comprises a test result, test personnel information and system time, the test result is generated when a tester tests a to-be-tested system by using test cases in a brain graph; adding the test result to the brain graph, wherein the brain graph is of a tree structure comprising at least one test case, and each test case object comprises aplurality of nodes; and inserting a test result, test personnel information and system time into the brain map object data corresponding to the target test case. According to the embodiment of the invention, the recording of related data during user operation is realized, and then the test data of each test case in the brain diagram can be traced and counted.

column12: Scalp electroencephalogram spine wave detection method and system
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of electroencephalogram signal processing, and particularly relates to a scalp electroencephalogram spine wave detection method and system. The method comprises the following steps: S1, carrying out preprocessing operation on collected original scalp electroencephalogram signals; s2, detecting candidate ratchet waves by adopting a self-adaptive template matching method; s3, extracting a 1s fragment at the peak position of the candidate spine wave detected in the step S2, and extracting a positive sample and a negative sample from the candidate spine wave to form a balanced data set; s4, training a CNN (Convolutional Neural Network) model by utilizing the constructed balanced data set; and S5, testing the trained CNN network model by using test data, counting four basic parameters of a confusion matrix, and measuring the recognition performance of the model. The method has the advantage of being capable of improving the electroencephalogram spine wave recognition rate of the patient.

column12: Data configuration system, data update system, and data configuration method
column13: [Solution] A terminal device having a storage unit that stores configuration data, and a first and a second provisioning server are connected over a network. The terminal device includes an operation unit for rewriting variable data, which is a part of the plurality of configuration data. The first provisioning server stores all the configuration data. The second provisioning server stores fixed data, which is the plurality of configuration data excluding the variable data. The terminal device accesses the first provisioning server in an initial state in order to obtain all the configuration data and store the same in the storage unit. The configured terminal device accesses the second provisioning server in order to obtain the fixed configuration data.

DOCUMENT CREATION DEVICE, METHOD AND PROGRAM
column13: To create a document to effectively make a user aware of their health condition.A document creation apparatus includes a first acquisition unit that acquires health data indicating a user health condition, a second acquisition unit that acquires at least one of consciousness data indicating user health consciousness, environment data indicating an environment related to user health, or knowledge data indicating a knowledge level related to the user health, a determination unit that determines a type of the user health based on a position of a point corresponding to the data acquired by the first acquisition unit and the second acquisition unit in a space spanned by one or more bases, the bases being one or more vectors having the health data as a value, and at least one vector of a vector having the consciousness data as a value, a vector having the environment data as a value, or a vector having the knowledge data as a value, and a creation unit that creates document data for a document to be presented to the user according to the type.

column12: Oil well working fluid level calculation method based on XGBoost network
column13: The invention discloses an oil well working fluid level calculation method based on an XGBoost network, and belongs to the technical field of petroleum engineering, and the method specifically comprises the following steps: collecting historical data of an oil well in an oil field block, firstly carrying out correlation analysis on the data, then carrying out data preprocessing, and finally obtaining input and output data of an XGBoost network model; an XGBoost network model is constructed, and model training is carried out; checking the generalization ability of the model by using test set data; and carrying out real-time monitoring calculation on the working fluid level based on the trained XGBoost network model. The method has the advantages of high calculation speed, low economic cost, high representation precision, no need of considering geological static parameters and the like; meanwhile, the model can calculate the working fluid level depth of the oil well in the oil field block, a large amount of time-consuming calculation is not needed, a large amount of time is saved, the working efficiency of the oil field is improved, and the actual engineering requirements of the oil field can be met.
column15: ZHAO HANJUN;;SHI JUNFENG;;WANG CAI;;ZHANG KAI;;FAN LING;;WU JINLIAN

column12: Lithium battery residual life estimation method
column13: A lithium battery residual life estimation method comprises the following steps: S1, reading related data of a lithium battery, performing normalization processing, and taking health factor data after dimension reduction as input of a model; the health factor data comprises medium-voltage-rise charging time, constant-current charging time, constant-voltage-drop discharging time, constant-current discharging time and time when the lithium battery reaches the highest temperature during charging and discharging in the charging and discharging stages of the lithium battery; s2, system hyper-parameters and optimization functions are set, and weights in all systems are initialized; s3, training the model by using the training data; s4, performing RUL estimation on the trained Bi-LSTM-AM model by using test data so as to test the performance of the method; according to the method, aiming at the precision influence of the factors such as the capacity recovery effect, the abnormal environment influence and the load sudden rise on the battery capacity recession prediction, the charging and discharging data, capable of indirectly representing the capacity recession factor, of the power battery is deeply excavated, and the estimation precision of the battery residual life can be further improved.

column12: Processing quality monitoring method based on dynamic PCA-SVM
column13: The invention discloses a processing quality monitoring method based on a dynamic PCA-SVM (Principal Component Analysis-Support Vector Machine). The method includes: aiming at the time sequence correlation between non-uniformly sampled processing process data and quality data, extracting a time sequence dynamic relationship between the processing process data and the quality data by utilizing a dynamic time window; adopting a PCA method to carry out preprocessing and feature extraction such as denoising, dimension reduction and correlation elimination on related processing process variables, and improving the quality monitoring efficiency; aiming at poor quality monitoring accuracy, false alarm and missing alarm caused by a non-linear and high-dimensional complex association relationship between the processing process and the quality, taking principal component characteristics of the processing process and the quality data after dynamic PCA extraction as samples, training an SVM classifier, carrying out SVM model testing by using test samples, and finally, obtaining a machining process quality monitoring model with relatively high generalization. According to the method, the noise in the original process data is reduced, and the accuracy and the calculation efficiency of the quality monitoring model are further improved.

column12: Methods, systems and computer program products for commissioning field devices in a control system
column13: The invention enables commissioning of field devices within a control system by implementing the steps of (i) detecting a connection event comprising a field device interfacing with an I/O port that is communicably coupled with the server, (ii) retrieving from a memory of the field device that is interfacing with the I/O port, a first field device identifier corresponding to the field device, (iii) retrieving from a non-transient memory database communicably coupled with the server, field device configuration data associated with the I/O port, wherein, the set of field device attributes includes a second field device identifier, and at least a segment of the second field device identifier is different from a corresponding segment of the first field device identifier, (iv) generating one of a translated first field device identifier and a translated second field device identifier, based on predefined translation data, (v) comparing the translated first field device identifier with the second field device identifier, or comparing the first field device identifier with the translated second field device identifier, (vi) generating a connection check output decision based on an output of the comparison, and (vii) optionally, initiate a connection check output event based on the connection check output decision.

column12: MACHINING METHOD FOR 5G SMALL-CELL BASE STATION POWER AMPLIFIER MODULE PCB HAVING STEPPED GROOVES
column13: The present invention belongs to the technical field of PCB machining, and provides a machining method for a 5G small-cell base station power amplifier module PCB having stepped grooves, comprising the following steps: S1, process design; S2, V-CUT molding machining data design; S3, V-CUT machining; S4, V-CUT deburring; S5, routing design; and S6, size and appearance inspection. On the basis of the process capability of equipment and the characteristics of materials, the machining flow comprising hybrid lamination, V-CUT for aluminum substrate and deburring for quality improvement is designed to ensure that the aluminum-based power amplifier module PCB having stepped grooves can be machined in batches, the appearance is burr-free, board-cutting is easy for clients, and the size and quality meet the design requirements.

column12: Hierarchical time sequence model extraction method based on HSM
column13: The invention provides a hierarchical time sequence model extraction method based on an HSM, belongs to the field of integrated circuit chip time sequence models, and aims to solve the problems of accuracy and analysis efficiency of time sequence analysis caused by tedious data files in a chip design process. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring key data designed by the digital integrated circuit and identifying the key data; generating an analysis environment of the integrated circuit according to the analysis environment; extracting parasitic parameters of the digital integrated circuit and reversely marking the parasitic parameters into the digital integrated circuit; extracting a super-large scale time sequence model; and merging and optimizing the time sequence models of the common type extracted from the time sequence library. According to the method, the module time sequence is calculated and extracted, and the time sequence interfaces are divided and combined into one time sequence model file, so that the number of the time sequence model files is reduced. And under the hierarchical design of the chip, the operation time and memory occupation of the tool can be reduced, the time sequence model design integration level of the wiring tool can be improved, and the design period of a digital integrated circuit is shortened.

column12: MEMS MICROPUMP TESTING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column13: The invention provides a MEMS micropump testing method and system. The method includes building a control model based on a least-square support vector; determining the magnitude of the pressure in a reservoir component relative to a preset first and second threshold in combination with a pressure value index to obtain a determination result; reading the determination result and controlling accordingly the reservoir component to be in or out of communication with the replenish component and the meter; and obtaining testing data for the under-test micropump based on variation in the liquid in the meter. The replenish component and the reservoir component assist in MEMS micropump testing so that a small volume and flow rate of the output liquid can be tested. The volumes and flow rates of the output liquid from the MEMS micropump at different pressures can be tested by controlling the pressure in the reservoir component.
column15: WANG YONGGUANG;;CHEN YI;;BIAN DA;;ZHAO XIAOYAN;;GUO YONGXIN;;ZHAO YONGWU

column12: Mobile phone microphone management method and device
column13: The invention relates to a mobile phone microphone management method and device, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the management of an authorization request for a microphone and a storage unit, and preliminarily determining whether equipment can be trusted or not; when the hardware layer of the mobile phone is managed, management authorization is carried out by using the microphone and the storage unit, a communication channel between the microphone and the storage space in the equipment manager is called, and a microphone management bidirectional channel is established. And based on the microphone management bidirectional channel, after the microphone management bidirectional channel sends a microphone turn-off command, whether the microphone sends a data stream to the storage unit is detected, so that data packet capturing is carried out. And if the data stream sent to the storage unit by the microphone is detected, sending a test instruction to the management system, and determining whether the microphone executes a recording function or not by using test data. The method is not limited by an operating system of the mobile terminal, and the problem that a traditional management scheme cannot manage the mobile terminal of a non-Android system is solved.

column12: Film mulching farmland recognition and extraction method based on remote sensing image
column13: The invention discloses a film mulching farmland identification and extraction method based on a remote sensing image. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, collecting remote sensing image data in a research area; correcting the remote sensing image data; fusing the multi-source remote sensing image data; selecting representative sample points of various ground features in the research area through a visual interpretation method; drawing spectral characteristic curves of various ground features; an appropriate remote sensing index is generated or selected, and then a film mulching farmland recognition and extraction algorithm is generated; and finally, a confusion matrix is calculated by using test sample points for the generated film mulching farmland identification extraction algorithm, and then the overall accuracy OA, the Kappa coefficient, the user precision and the producer precision are calculated, and accuracy evaluation is carried out. According to the method, the film mulching farmland distribution condition can be provided for a research area with a complex underlying surface, and a basis and data are provided for knowing the local film mulching farmland distribution and the film mulching use condition.
column15: CHENG LEI;;FU CHENHAO;;QIN SHUJING;;ZOU KAIJIE;;CHANG LIWEI

column12: Coding method of test vector
column13: The invention discloses a test vector coding method, which relates to the technical field of testing, and comprises the following steps of: dividing a test file into a plurality of sub-files; performing column coding on excitation codes of P rows of test vectors in the sub-file to obtain M excitation data frames, performing row coding on function codes of the P rows of test vectors to obtain P function data frames, and obtaining a coding result of the sub-file, each excitation data frame corresponds to one test channel and comprises coding results of excitation codes corresponding to the test channels in all P rows of test vectors in the subfile, and each function data frame comprises coding results of function codes in the corresponding row of test vectors; according to the method, the test vector storage depth can be well improved, especially under the condition that the number of actually-used test channels is small, the compression efficiency can be greatly improved, and more test vector files can be stored in the limited storage space of a test machine.

column12: Regrouping screening method for group-out patients in clinical use test
column13: The invention discloses a regrouping screening method for group-out patients in a clinical use test, and belongs to the technical field of clinical regrouping screening methods. The method comprises the following steps of: previous illness states of the patients and illness states of group-in treatment are matched in the form of structured data, and the matched illness states are transmitted to a server; the server calls and matches a test database according to the structured data of the patient, and completes a regrouping test of the patient under a test matrix rule; after a result is matched, test data meeting conditions and patient data information are transmitted back to a doctor; a doctor screens out a proper test scheme according to a test center, drug types, test stages and the like in combination with the condition of the patient and feasibility and recommends the test scheme to the patient; based on the test matrix rule, the calculation accuracy of the similarity of the patient and the user is effectively improved, the relatively high matching degree of the group entering condition and the recommendation quality of the treatment scheme can be kept, and the recommendation quality of the new patient is also relatively high.

column12: IMAGE DATA CLASSIFICATION METHOD, DEVICE AND SYSTEM
column13: The present disclosure relates to an image data classification method, device and system, and relates to the field of computer technology. The method includes: inputting test image data into a neural network model trained by using an original training sample set for classification, and determining an image type to which the test image data belongs and a membership probability of the image data belonging to the image type; establishing an easy-to-classify data set, according to test image data with a membership probability greater than a first threshold; adding test image data in the easy-to-classify data set that has a classification accuracy rate less than or equal to a second threshold and a correct classification result to the original training sample set to generate an augmented training sample set; and using the augmented training sample set to train the neural network model so as to determine an image class

column12: Method for determining direct chain control law of fly-by-wire helicopter
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of helicopter fly-by-wire flight control systems and relates to a method for determining direct chain control law of a fly-by-wire helicopter. The method comprises the following steps: determining parameters required by a direct chain control law , wherein the fixed parameters are the operating lever range of each channel, the variable pitch range of the operating surface of each channel, the pitch angle of the variable pitch reference position of each channel and the stroke range of each actuating mechanism, and the calculation process parameters are as follows: the transmission ratio from the operating lever to the operating surface of each channel, the transmission ratio from the operating surface of each channel to the actuating mechanism and the coupling coefficient between the channels; establishing a direct chain control law simulation model according to the direct chain control law parameters. According to the method for determiningthe direct chain control law of the fly-by-wire helicopter, a relation model among all channels is built through Simulink; display is visual; design optimization is facilitated; and accurate theoretical verification can be conducted.

column12: System and method for diagnostic analysis of human body systems, organs, and cells
column13: A system and method for providing diagnostic analysis of a physical condition of a human body. A signal generator, an emitter, a receiver, and processor(s) generate a baseline signal. In some implementations, the emitter may emit the baseline signal through cells of the human body over scanning points for a predetermined amount of time, and a receiver detects reflected signals that have propagated through the cells of the human body. Some implementations include determining, by the one or more processors, a power spectrum density (PSD) of the reflected baseline signal and a spectral variance in the PSD of the reflected baseline signal relative to the baseline signal. Some implementations may compare the spectral variance to one or more predetermined spectral variances corresponding to one or more conditions of the human body and determine the condition of the human body, based on the comparison.

column12: Design device for cloud data
column13: The utility model provides a design device for cloud data, which comprises two side plates which are vertically and oppositely arranged, the tops of the two side plates are symmetrically, vertically and fixedly connected with supporting plates, the tops of the two supporting plates are fixedly connected with a horizontal placing plate, the placing plate is provided with vent holes, and the vent holes are communicated with the supporting plates. A dustproof net is fixedly installed in the ventilation holes, a fan mechanism capable of moving between the two supporting plates is arranged below the containing plate, a design plate is connected between the two side plates in a sliding mode, and inclined lap joint blocks for lap joint of the design plate are symmetrically arranged on the opposite sides of the two side plates. When cloud data design is carried out, a user can adjust the position of the fan mechanism according to different notebook computers, a good auxiliary heat dissipation effect is achieved for the notebook computers, the design plate and the lap joint block can be in lap joint in an inclined shape, and more use requirements of the user are met.

column12: Man-machine interaction risk assessment method under multi-agent architecture
column13: The invention discloses a man-machine interaction risk assessment method under a multi-agent architecture, and the method comprises the steps: abstractly describing an information flow transmission relation among a pilot, an airborne technical system and an environment in a multi-agent mode based on a man-machine interaction process of an airplane cockpit; establishing internal structures of a pilot intelligent agent, an airborne technical system intelligent agent and an environment intelligent agent, and determining input and output parameters of each intelligent agent; determining whether the pilot can successfully establish probability distribution of situation awareness in different cognitive stages such as perception, understanding and planning by taking the failure of a key componentas a triggering condition, and calculating probability distribution of wrong actions of the pilot due to human errors based on a Bayesian method and Monte Carlo simulation; analyzing the consequenceseverity possibly caused by different behaviors adopted by the pilot, and calculating the risk level possibly caused by the different behaviors. Technical means are provided for aircraft cockpit man-machine interaction risk assessment, and the method has important significance and application value for aircraft cockpit man-machine interaction design and airworthiness certification.

column12: Method and apparatus for generating information
column13: A method and an apparatus for generating information are provide according to embodiments of the disclosure. A specific embodiment of the method comprises: acquiring to-be-analyzed information according to a target keyword; and inputting the to-be-analyzed information into a pre-established sentiment analysis model to generate sentiment orientation information of the to-be-analyzed information. The sentiment analysis model is obtained through following training: acquiring untagged sample data and tagged sample data; generating tag information corresponding to the untagged sample data using a pre-established tag generation model, and using the untagged sample data and the generated tag information as extended sample data, the tag generation model being used to represent a corresponding relationship between the untagged sample data and the tag information; and obtaining the sentiment analysis model by training using the tagged sample data and the extended sample data.

column12: Process processing method for outer negative plate of PTH square groove of printed circuit board
column13: The invention discloses a printed circuit board PTH square groove outer layer negative negative plate process processing method. The method comprises the following steps of designing engineering drilling belt data, arranging a guide hole at each of four corners of a square groove, and enabling the guide holes to be tangent to two right-angle sides corresponding to the square groove; arranging a circular hole in the square groove, wherein the circular hole is tangent to four sides of the square groove and intersects with the guide hole; a strip-shaped groove hole being formed in each of the four sides of the square groove so as to remove redundant rim charges; designing an outer layer circuit film; outputting engineering drilling belt data and outer-layer film data; drilling being conducted, specifically, a guide hole, a round hole and a strip-shaped groove hole being sequentially drilled according to engineering drilling belt data, and a PTH square groove being obtained; copper deposition; dry film circuit. According to the printed circuit board PTH square groove outer layer negative sheet processing method provided by the invention, the engineering drilling belt data design process is optimized, and PTH square groove burrs are effectively reduced, so a dry film hole breaking problem is solved, the PTH square groove outer layer negative sheet process is realized, and the circuit board processing cost is further reduced.

column12: Real vehicle road function testing device and method for ADAS intelligent driving assistance system.
column13: The invention belongs to the field of intelligent driving testing, and relates to a real vehicle road function testing device and method for an ADAS intelligent driving assistance system. The testing device comprises a power supply, a high-definition camera, a Mobileye camera, a laser radar, a switch, a GPS, a computer host and a display; the high-definition camera is connected with the switch through a network cable, and the switch is connected with the computer host; the Mobileye camera is directly connected with the computer host and is used for detecting the distance, speed and TTC time information of a target vehicle; the laser radar transmits collected data to the computer host through an Ethernet line, the computer host performs synchronous processing, and the laser radar is connected with the computer host through a CAN line to transmit CAN signals; the GPS antenna is connected with the computer host, and obtains road, weather and position information in real time through a 4G network; the testing method comprises a testing road design method, a testing content design method and a testing device design method. The problem positioning accuracy is improved; the performance of the ADAS system in different scenes is fully tested; and the test coverage is improved.

column12: Systems and methods for applying 4Rx capable UE tests to an 8Rx capable UE
column13: Systems and methods provide solutions for testing an 8Rx capable UE using test cases for 4Rx capable UEs. An example method establishes a connection from a first Tx source and a second Tx source to each of 8Rx antenna ports. The connection duplicates a fading channel from both the first Tx source and the second Tx source to each of the eight Rx antenna ports, and adds independent noise for each of the 8Rx antenna ports. One test scenario uses 4Rx supported RF bands by connecting four of the Rx ports with data from a system simulator, and the other four Rx ports are connected with zero input. Same requirements specified with 4Rx capable UEs are applied. Another test scenario uses 8Rx supported RF bands and applies lower dB SNR requirements than those specified for 4Rx tests.
column15: TIAN SHUANG;;CHERVYAKOV ANDREY;;BELOV DMITRY;;CUI JIE;;TANG YANG

column12: Self-supervised action recognition method based on cross-modal time sequence contrast learning
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of video processing, in particular to a self-supervised action recognition method based on cross-modal time sequence contrast learning, which comprises the following steps of: generating RGB (Red, Green, Blue) frames and optical flow data from an unlabeled video sample, and obtaining different amplified views of input data by adopting different data enhancement methods; encoding features of different views are obtained through an encoder, and a double-path self-supervision action recognition network is established; further capturing global semantic dependence of a video sequence through contrast learning of instance discrimination, modeling time sequence motion characteristics between local segments through a local time sequence contrast learning task, and obtaining a preliminary model of independent training of two branches after initialization training; performing cooperative training based on cross-modal self-supervised action recognition and a local time sequence contrast learning method to obtain a final model; and finally, performing fine adjustment on parameters of the final model by using the labeled data, and performing effect evaluation by using test data to obtain the recognition performance of the model.

column12: System and method for a digital therapeutic delivery of generalized clinician tips (GCT)
column13: This invention relates generally to the field of electronic communications and the transmittance of such communications. More specifically, the invention discloses a new and useful method for delivering a therapeutic through an eco-system of digital content based on a user-mapped EMS. The method comprises: receiving a text input comprising message content from an electronic computing device associated with a user; parsing the message content comprised in the text input for emotionally-charged language; assigning a sentiment value, based on the emotionally-charged language, from a dynamic sentiment value spectrum to the text input; and, based on the sentiment value, imposing a sentiment vector, corresponding to the assigned sentiment value, to the text input, the imposed sentiment vector rendering a sensory effect on the message content designed to convey a corresponding sentiment.

column12: EFFICIENT SPEECH TO SPIKES CONVERSION PIPELINE FOR A SPIKING NEURAL NETWORK
column13: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on computer storage media, for converting audio to spikes for input to a spiking neural network configured to recognize speech based on the spikes are described. In some aspects, a method includes obtaining audio data and generating frequency domain audio signals that represent the audio data by converting the audio data into a frequency domain. The frequency domain audio signals are mapped into a set of Mel-frequency bands to obtain Mel-scale frequency audio signals. A log transformation is performed on the Mel-scale frequency audio signals to obtain log-Mel signals. Spike input is generated for input to a spiking neural network (SNN) model by converting the log-Mel signals to the series of spikes. The spike input is provided as an input to the SNN model.

column12: Multi-carrier network coexistence carrier communication function detection system and method
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of power line carrier communication, and particularly provides a carrier communication function detection system and method for multi-carrier network coexistence. Comprising a plurality of detected carrier communication unit detection positions, a plurality of virtual carrier communication units for auxiliary networking of the detected carrier communication units, a communication control unit, a carrier network control unit, a three-phase four-wire analog power supply, an independent carrier line and a control host. According to the technical scheme provided by the invention, the method does not depend on an actual communication environment, time-consuming links such as networking and slave node communication are omitted, the test efficiency can be greatly improved, the used test object data are directly and randomly generated by the system and implanted into the virtual module, the data accuracy is ensured, and the test quality is further ensured.

column12: APPARATUS AND METOHD CALCULAING THE AXLE LOAD OF VEHICLES
column13: The present invention relates to technology for calculating an axial load of a vehicle by using a basic device installed in the vehicle and vehicle data. According to the present invention, disclosed are an axial load calculation method for a vehicle and an apparatus thereof. The method includes the following steps of: calculating a current dynamic radius of a tire by using a current vehicle speed and wheel speed; receiving current pneumatic pressure of the tire through TPMS; using test data forming a relation between the pneumatic pressure of the tire, the vehicle speed and the dynamic radius of the tire, to estimate a dynamic radius of the tire when the current pneumatic pressure of the tire is the reference pressure; and using a map forming the pneumatic pressure of the tire, a load of a wheel and the dynamic radius of the tire, to calculate a wheel load with respect to the dynamic radius of the tire estimated in the reference pressure condition, and calculate an axial load based on the same.

column12: PCBA board production scheduling method and scheduling system based on 5G network
column13: The invention discloses a PCBA board production scheduling method and scheduling system based on a 5G network. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a PCBA board model data distributed database; according to the model of the PCBA board to be produced, the required components and the PCBs entering production, the PCBA board is produced and obtained, and weight data of the PCBA board is obtained; the PCBA boards are subjected to weight testing, if the weight qualification rate is not smaller than a set weight qualification rate threshold value, the PCBA boards with unqualified weight are removed, the PCBA boards with qualified weight are subjected to use testing, the use performance grades of the PCBA boards are obtained through testing, the PCBA boards are graded according to the performance grades, and production of the PCBA boards is completed. Through the technical scheme provided by the invention, the management from the component composition of the PCBA board to the performance grading can be realized.

column12: CONTROLLING SEGMENT LAYOUT IN A STRESS TEST FOR A PROCESSOR MEMORY WITH A LINK STACK
column13: A processor memory is stress tested with a variable link stack depth using test code segments and link stack test segments on non-naturally aligned data boundaries. Link stack test segments are interspersed into test code segments of a processor memory test to change the link stack depth without changing results of the test code. The link stack test segments include branch to target, push/pop, push and pop segments. The depth of the link stack is varied independent of the memory test code by changing the number to branches in the branch to target segment and varying the number of the push/pop segments. The link stack test segments and test segments may be placed randomly with a recursive algorithm to intersperse the link stack test segments in the test code segments and to reduce the amount of data to be saved and restored for all subroutine calls, push and pop segments.

column12: Sand dune image recognition model, creation method thereof and sand dune image recognition method
column13: The embodiment of the invention discloses a sand dune image recognition model, a creation method thereof and a sand dune image recognition method. The creation method comprises the following steps: acquiring a data set containing an original image of a remote sensing image and a mask mark image as training data; constructing a convolutional neural network model; arranging an attention gate mechanism in the model; training the convolutional neural network model through the training data; in the training process, calculating the correlation between the local features of the decoding layer and the global information of the coding layer by an attention gate mechanism, and enhancing the local features of the corresponding areas or weakened according to the correlation; and testing the trained convolutional neural network model by using test data, and taking the convolutional neural network model passing the test as a sand dune image recognition model. According to the scheme of the embodiment, a technical basis is provided for automatically, quickly, accurately and repeatedly detecting the target objects in different sand dune images without being interfered by factors such as illumination, weather, sand dune positions and types, image registration errors and the like.

column12: Spectral polarization bidirectional reflection characteristic measuring device
column13: The invention discloses a spectral polarization bidirectional reflection characteristic measuring device. A pitching rotating arm is positioned on one side of a sample supporting position of an objective table, the pitching rotating arm is rotatably mounted on the objective table, a photoelectric detector is positioned above the sample supporting position and is mounted on the pitching rotating arm, and a linear polaroid is mounted at the front end of the photoelectric detector; and the irradiation light source is slidably mounted on the zenith arc-shaped guide rail above the sample mounting position. By means of the optimally designed spectral polarization bidirectional reflection characteristic measuring device, the situation that sunlight irradiates ground objects is simulated, the accuracy of a bidirectional reflection characteristic measuring result is guaranteed, meanwhile, the pitching motion design of the photoelectric detector meets the requirement for the more accurate working angle of the photoelectric detector, and the device can meet the requirements of laboratory and outdoor tests, and is convenient to operate and use.

column32: 赵永强等: "成像偏振光谱遥感及应用", pages: 117 - 118

column12: Reusable diagnostic medical tester
column13: A multi-use testing device is disclosed that is able to test a user fluid or dissolved tissue samples for a medical condition comprising, e.g.: blood related, heart (FABS enzymes); liver and kidney function; gene mutations; COVID-19; and pregnancy status. The testing device is positioned in a bio-fluid chamber configured to store at least one electrolyte or charging fluid to create a conductive path for electrons emitted by an anode electrode and a cathode electrode to generate electricity to recharge the micro battery. The generated electricity is transferred to power the testing device. The reusable testing device further comprises a computing device configured to control the communication between a user electronic computing device and the testing device. The reusable testing device is dipped into a sample in a container and outputs the encrypted test result for wireless transmission to electronic computing devices.

column12: Excrement device with urine sugar detection function
column13: The invention provides an excrement device with a urine sugar detection function, which comprises a urine accommodating groove formed on an inner side wall of a device body, and a measuring module arranged at the bottom of the urine accommodating groove and provided with an internal space; in the internal space, a light-transmitting mirror is tightly attached to the bottom of the urine containing groove, a track faces a bottom face of the light-transmitting mirror, a driving module drives a light-emitting unit on the track to move along with the track, the light-emitting unit emits a detection light beam to a measuring face of the light-transmitting mirror, and the urine containing groove is formed in the measuring face of the light-transmitting mirror. A sensor receives the detection light beam reflected by the measuring surface, a processor is electrically connected with the light-emitting unit and the sensor, and the processor instantly generates urine sugar concentration data according to a light beam intensity signal of the sensor and a position of the light-emitting unit on the track. According to the method, the detection of the urine sugar can be quickly completed, the urine sugar concentration data can be generated, and compared with the existing method for detecting the urine sugar concentration by using test paper, the method is more real-time.

column12: Highway tunnel ventilation test device
column13: The utility model relates to the technical field of tunnel ventilation, in particular to a highway tunnel ventilation test device. The device comprises a supporting plate, a simulation tunnel, a ventilation channel, a communicating pipe, an exhaust fan, a gas detection device, an exhaust simulation vehicle and a motor. The simulation tunnel is arranged on the supporting plate; the simulation tunnel is provided with an air duct, and the communicating pipe is arranged on the simulation tunnel and is communicated with the air duct; the exhaust fan is arranged on the simulation tunnel and is communicated with the ventilation channel; the gas detection device is arranged on the simulation tunnel; the motor is arranged on the supporting plate, and the threaded rod is rotationally arranged on the supporting plate and connected with a rotating shaft of the motor. The sliding block is slidably arranged on the supporting plate and is in threaded connection with the threaded rod. The exhaust simulation vehicle is arranged on the sliding block; a blower and an exhaust pipe are arranged on the simulation vehicle body, the second connecting pipe is arranged on the blower and communicated with the exhaust pipe, and the first connecting pipe is arranged on the simulation tail gas box and communicated with the second connecting pipe. The device is accurate in detection data; design and positioning are convenient, and practicability is good.

column12: Experimental design method for equivalent scaling model of deep-sea hydraulic mine collecting head
column13: The invention discloses an experimental design method for an equivalent scaling model of a deep-sea hydraulic ore collecting head, which comprises the following steps of: determining two-phase flow similar reference numbers of the hydraulic ore collecting head, including a liquid-phase similar criterion number and a solid-phase similar criterion number; roughing a model scaling coefficient according to a site requirement and a fund standard and an actual situation; designing the structural characteristics of the hydraulic mine collecting head, and carrying out visual design under the condition that the experimental structural characteristics and the flow field characteristics are not influenced; proper materials and processing technologies are selected; and carrying out scaling numerical simulation calculation under different scales, and checking the design. The method has the beneficial effects that the ore collecting head is converted into the equivalent scaling model by utilizing the similarity theory, and hydrodynamic simulation analysis is performed on the model to obtain the collection rate, the average outlet speed and the like, so that the problems of high cost and low efficiency of building a test simulation platform according to the same scale of a prototype are solved.

column12: Method for improving accuracy of sensor outputs for measuring NOx, and system and apparatus for same
column13: A method, system, and apparatus are provided for improving accuracy of sensor readings reflecting measurements of at least one constituent in an engine exhaust. The sensor measurement is corrected or compensated for by applying to a gain correction factor to the reported sensor measurement. The gain correction factor is developed by determination of prior test sensor readings correlated with discrete sensor age levels, and with constituent concentrations to which those test sensors are exposed. By applying the determined gain correction factor to change the sensor's reported measurements, bias may be reduced and a more accurate measure of actual constituent levels is provided.

column12: Roof photovoltaic visual design method, system, equipment and medium
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of building photovoltaic simulation, and discloses a roof photovoltaic visual design method, system, device and medium, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the three-dimensional modeling of a roof photovoltaic and a building where the roof photovoltaic is located according to a building information model, and obtaining a roof photovoltaic building model; creating a photovoltaic module family according to the roof photovoltaic building model, constructing each photovoltaic module in the family, and generating a modular prefabricated photovoltaic module model library; a plurality of photovoltaic modules are extracted from the modular prefabricated photovoltaic module model library to be arranged, and a roof photovoltaic preliminary model is obtained; calculating the optimal distance between photovoltaic panel arrays according to the latitude of the roof and the array inclination angle of the photovoltaic panels in the roof photovoltaic preliminary model; and adjusting the roof photovoltaic preliminary model according to the optimal distance to obtain a roof photovoltaic visualization model. The power generation loss of the photovoltaic power station caused by component shadow shielding is reduced, and the rate of return on investment of the power station is effectively improved.
column14: CR POWER TECH INSTITUTE CO LTD

column12: Online learning performance evaluation method and system based on data decision, computer storage medium and equipment
column13: The invention discloses an online learning performance evaluation method and system based on data decision, a computer storage medium and equipment, which can evaluate the learning performance of the whole process of learning of students, change the traditional mode of evaluating only by using test scores, change the one-sided evaluation mode, achieve the effect of comprehensively evaluating the learning performance, and improve the learning performance evaluation efficiency. Learning performance evaluation is carried out from multiple aspects, the learning performance evaluation accuracy is high, the school and the teacher can analyze the whole process of learning of the students, and learning growth of the students is facilitated.

column12: Executable Logic for Processing Keyed Data in Networks
column13: A method implemented by a data processing system for processing data items of a stream of data items, including: accessing a specification that represents the executable logic, wherein a state of the specification for a particular value of the key specifies one or more portions of the executable logic that are executable in that state; receiving, over an input device or port, data items of a stream of data; for a first one of the data items of the stream, identifying a first state of the specification for a value of the key associated with that first one of the data items; processing, by the data processing system, the first one of the data items according to one or more portions of executable logic that are represented in the specification as being associated with the first state.

column12: Sparse training in neural networks
column13: A computing device, comprising: a computing module, comprising one or more computing units; and a control module, comprising a computing control unit, and used for controlling shutdown of the computing unit of the computing module according to a determining condition. Also provided is a computing method. The computing device and method have the advantages of low power consumption and high flexibility, and can be combined with the upgrading mode of software, thereby further increasing the computing speed, reducing the computing amount, and reducing the computing power consumption of an accelerator.

column12: Method and device for calculating design parameters of same-type transformers of multiple converter stations
column13: The invention discloses a design parameter calculation method and device for a multi-converter-station same-type transformer, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the transformation basic data of a rectification side and an inversion side, and calculating the short-circuit impedance of the rectification side and the inversion side; determining a rectification side equivalent inductive voltage drop and an inversion side equivalent inductive voltage drop according to the short-circuit impedance; calculating the ideal no-load voltage of the same-type transformer; according to the ideal no-load voltage, in combination with transformation basic data, design parameters of a same-type transformer are calculated through a same-type transformer parameter calculation formula, the design parameters of the same-type transformer on the rectification side and the inversion side of the direct-current power transmission system are calculated, then the same-type transformer is arranged on the rectification side and the inversion side according to the obtained design parameters, and the design parameters of the same-type transformer on the rectification side and the inversion side of the direct-current power transmission system are calculated. Converter transformer spare parts can be reduced, repeated design of the transformer and repeated test are avoided, and equipment investment is reduced.

column12: BATTERY MODULE TESTING
column13: Testing of a battery module can be conducted using monitoring electronics attached to the battery module. Stimulus can be applied to the battery module and removed. After removal of the stimulus, the monitoring electronics can collect signals from the monitoring electronics reflecting parameters of the battery module as it relaxes back to a non-stimulated state. The stimulus can be provided by test equipment or by components of a system in which the battery module, having attached monitoring electronics, is implemented. The monitoring electronics attached to the battery module can provide autonomous recording of signals associated with the battery module that can provide data regarding the status of the battery module or one or more batteries contained in the battery module.

column12: LIBS quantitative analysis method combining wavelet transform and lightweight convolutional neural network
column13: The invention relates to the field of spectral analysis, in particular to an LIBS (laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy) quantitative analysis method combining wavelet transform and a lightweight convolutional neural network. The method comprises the following specific steps: (1) spectrum acquisition; collecting spectral data based on a laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy (LIBS) technology; (2) data set division; dividing the data into a training set, a verification set and a test set; (3) converting the one-dimensional LIBS spectrum into a two-dimensional image representation form by using wavelet transform; (4) performing down-sampling on the image; (5) modeling the image data obtained in the step (4) by using a lightweight convolutional neural network (L-CNN), and determining model parameters based on evaluation indexes of the verification set; (6) reestablishing a regression model by using the training set under the optimized model parameters; (7) verifying the generalization performance of the model by using test set data; and (8) estimating the element concentration of an unknown sample by using the established regression model. The finally proposed LIBS quantitative analysis method combining wavelet transform and the lightweight convolutional neural network can be practically applied to ore dressing plant on-site monitoring of the ore pulp grade.

column12: Low-illumination graph enhancement method under visual degradation condition
column13: The invention provides a low-illumination graph enhancement method under a visual degradation condition, and relates to the technical field of image data processing, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, extracting the contrast of a darkest region from an input image; s2, embedding the input image pair into a multi-layer network; s3, separating a high-frequency reflection component from the input image; s4, improving the network delay and minimizing the calculation complexity by using the maximum channel of the high-frequency reflection component; and S5, under the guidance of the high-frequency reflection component, the structure, the texture and the strong boundary are reserved through illumination adjustment, and an enhanced graph is obtained. The method is high in feasibility, the high-frequency reflection component is separated from the input image, the maximum channel of the high-frequency reflection component is used for improving the network delay and minimizing the calculation complexity, the purpose of improving the visual quality under the degraded visual condition with the minimum delay and calculation complexity is achieved, the method does not depend on pairing, prior or large-scale careful data design, and the method is easy to implement. The method has superiority and applicability.
column14: ZHEJIANG YUNPENG TECH CO LTD;;UNIV ZHEJIANG NORMAL

column12: MANAGED-NAND REAL TIME ANALYZER AND METHOD
column13: A testing device comprises test interface circuitry, probe circuitry, and initiate state machine circuitry. The test interface circuitry is configured to receive NAND signaling when operatively coupled to a M-NAND memory device under test and to operate the M-NAND memory device under test to receive memory access requests and to provide status or data at the same rate it receives memory access requests. The probe circuitry is configured to detect memory operations of the memory device under test. The finite state machine circuitry is operatively coupled to the probe circuitry and is configured to advance through multiple circuit states according to the detected memory operations; and log memory events of the memory device under test according to the circuit states.

column12: Online verification system and method synchronized with helicopter task design
column13: The invention belongs to the technical field of test flight databases and comprehensive application systems, and discloses an online verification system and method synchronized with helicopter test flight design, and the system comprises a database module, a test flight dynamic process design module and a test flight dynamic process operation module. Wherein the database module is internally provided with tasks, data, design tools, an expert database and resources required by the test flight dynamic process, and the digital model management table; the test flight dynamic process design module can organize different tasks of the database module according to a certain logic and input an association relationship with other data of the database to form a complete test flight dynamic process, and then the complete test flight dynamic process is delivered to the test flight dynamic process operation module for operation; and the test flight dynamic process operation module operates according to the designed test flight dynamic process. By means of the system and method, experts can directly participate in test flight task design, interact with designers in real time and jointly promote task execution, and the efficiency and quality of task design are improved.
column15: GU WENBIAO;;PAN CHUNJIAO;;YU HANWEN;;ZOU JING;;YE XINMIAO

column12: System model construction method and system simulation method for low-orbit constellation system
column13: The invention provides a low-orbit constellation system-oriented system model construction method and system simulation method, and belongs to the field of low-orbit constellation system simulation and efficiency evaluation. According to the construction method, lightweight simulation modeling is carried out on functional entities of a space section, a ground section, an application section and an environment section, models constructed in the space section comprise a constellation configuration model, an attitude and orbit control subsystem model and a satellite load model, the ground section comprises a main gateway station model and an auxiliary gateway station model, a large-scale terminal model is constructed in the application section, and a large-scale terminal model is constructed in the environment section. The environment section comprises a satellite-ground microwave channel sub-model and an inter-satellite laser channel sub-model, and model interaction design is carried out to form a satellite-ground integrated overall model architecture. According to the method, the modeling precision of the functional entity is ensured, the lightweight requirement of simulation modeling is met, the complexity of system modeling is reduced, the relationship between the model precision and lightweight is balanced, and simulation verification and evaluation are performed on the correctness, rationality and effectiveness of the architecture design of the constellation system.
column15: WU ZHIQIANG;;GAO XINYU;;JIA ZHENHUA;;ZHU XIAOHUI;;LI SHAOYANG;;QIAN JINXI;;HAN XIAO;;QIAN ZHIPENG

column12: SAR image small target identification method based on Center Net2
column13: The invention discloses an SAR image small target recognition method based on Center Net2, and belongs to the technical field of radar remote sensing and target recognition. The method comprises the following steps of: 1, training and manufacturing a test data set; 2, training parameters are set, and data of a training set are utilized, and a Center Net2 network is used for training; 3, detecting the Center Net2 network model trained in the step 2 by using test set data; and 4, inputting the acquired SAR image into the Center Net2 network, using a model weight file obtained by training as the weight of the network, outputting a target detection frame, category and confidence information after the image is subjected to network detection, and displaying the target detection frame, category and confidence information on the SAR image. According to the invention, a target detection algorithm of an anchor-free mechanism is applied to SAR image small target recognition, a target detection task is converted into estimation of key points, and the detection precision and the detection speed of the small target are improved.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR FACILITATING THE MANAGEMENT OF ENERGY PRODUCTION OR PROCESSING FACILITIES
column13: A method for facilitating the management of one or more energy production or processing facilities includes receiving an alert corresponding to an operational anomaly associated with the process equipment, interrogating a data structure linking together and organizing a plurality of distinct data sources, selecting a subset of data sources from the plurality of data sources identified as associated with a potential cause of the alert based on the interrogation of the data structure, statistically analyzing data sourced from the selected subset of data sources, identifying the potential cause of the alert based on the statistical analysis, and recommending a corrective action to resolve the identified potential cause of the alert using the plurality of distinct data sources.

column13: A sensor with a mechanical waveguide may be characterized using test ultrasonic signals to generate a baseline signature, and the baseline signature may later be used to detect faults in the sensor.

column12: Plastic slide fatigue test device
column13: The invention provides a plastic slide fatigue test device, which belongs to the technical field of plastic slide fatigue detection and comprises an overlapping table, a fixing unit, a test unit and a recovery unit. According to the test unit, the situation that the slide is broken and damaged for a long time when children with different weights use the slide can be simulated, the situation that the slide is broken and damaged for a long time when children in two common use postures of lying and sitting up use the slide can also be simulated, the simulated situations are various in type and accord with the actual use situation, and the test unit is convenient to use. Test data are increased, and the credibility and accuracy of test results are improved; the interval adjusting unit and the testing unit are matched to carry out regional targeted fatigue testing on the slide to be tested, and the use situation that a child slides in the middle of the slide and close to the edge of the slide is simulated.

column12: Cardiovascular intervention instrument availability test simulation system
column13: The invention discloses a cardiovascular intervention device availability test simulation system, which comprises a blood vessel simulation system and a simulation DSA system, the blood vessel simulation system comprises a blood vessel model system and a simulation pump system, and the simulation DSA system comprises a simulation DSA imaging system and a simulation DSA motion system. The cardiovascular intervention instrument usability test simulation system can simulate the flow direction, flow velocity and pressure of blood flow in a blood vessel model, and is very close to a real scene of a human body; meanwhile, the simulation DSA system processes the image through an image processing unit, the blood vessel model in the image can be filtered out, after the simulation contrast agent is injected into the blood vessel model, only the blood vessel model section injected with the simulation contrast agent is displayed, and the requirement of fully simulating the actual use scene in the usability test is met. The cardiovascular intervention instrument usability test simulation system can avoid radiation hazards, is high in safety and is close to a real clinical scene.

column12: Nitrogen purity analysis device
column13: The utility model discloses a nitrogen purity analysis device which comprises a nitrogen analyzer and a test end, and the test end is connected to the outside of the nitrogen analyzer; the test end is connected with the nitrogen analyzer through a data transmission line, the data transmission line is sleeved with a flexible conduit and a probe, one end of the flexible conduit is connected with the nitrogen analyzer, the other end of the flexible conduit is connected with the probe, the probe is provided with a dustproof device, and the dustproof device is connected with the probe. The probe is prevented from adsorbing dust for a long time to influence the test precision; a clamping mechanism is arranged on the outer wall of the nitrogen analyzer and is used for fixing the to-be-used test end. By arranging the dustproof device, the probe is well protected when the test end is not used, so that the probe is prevented from being exposed for a long time and adsorbing dust, and the test precision is prevented from being influenced.

column12: Unmanned ship navigation precision real ship test method and system
column13: The invention provides an unmanned ship navigation precision real ship test method and system, and the method comprises the steps: 1, carrying out the arrangement, installation and fixation of a test device, and calibrating the precision, timestamp and steering angle zero position of the test device; 2, carrying out a test according to a preset route and navigation parameters, and controlling optical tracking equipment to recognize and track a target on the unmanned ship; 3, measuring and recording the navigation data of the unmanned ship by using test equipment; and 4, after all voyage tests are completed, comparing and analyzing a plurality of groups of GPS track data under the same timestamp and the distance value measured by the distance measuring equipment, and finally obtaining the accurate voyage precision of the unmanned ship. According to the invention, the GPS and the optical measurement result are integrated, the test precision is improved, the optical test equipment is not influenced by the GPS signal receiving quality, and the test efficiency is improved.
column14: SHANGHAI MARINE ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT RES INSTITUTE CHINA STATE SHIPBUILDING HEAVY INDUSTRY GROUP COR

column12: Phased array ultrasonic wedge parameter calibration method
column13: The invention relates to a phased array ultrasonic wedge block parameter calibration method. The method comprises the following steps: setting the sound velocity of a workpiece as the sound velocity of a standard test block, setting initial parameters of a wedge block, and setting a fan-shaped scanning strategy; a refraction angle is determined and selected by selecting a waveform display angle for one or more times, and different workpiece internal acoustic path distances are obtained by using test blocks of a plurality of transverse hole reflectors with different depths; and/or measuring the horizontal distance from the front edge of the probe to the transverse hole; and determining the sound velocity of the wedge and/or the size of the wedge according to the sound velocity of the standard test block, the initial parameters of the wedge and/or the horizontal distance. According to the method, the wedge block parameter model can be calibrated only by adopting independent positioning measurement data with limited times, and the target of calibrating all detection data can be achieved.
column14: WUHAN ZHONGKE INNOVATION TECH CO LTD

column12: Method, system and equipment for efficiently generating test case and medium
column13: The invention discloses an efficient test case generation method, system and device and a medium. The method comprises the following steps that a plurality of to-be-edited test cases are obtained; performing the same test logic definition operation based on the plurality of to-be-edited test cases to obtain case writing keywords; in response to a test case generation demand, obtaining test data corresponding to the test case generation demand, and generating a to-be-used test case according to the case writing keyword and the test data; according to the method, the test logic and the test call can be separated, the same test logic is defined as a keyword, different test cases are quickly edited on the basis of a template architecture of the keyword, the same test logic can be edited once, the logic is timely changed in the later period and only needs to be modified once, and the test efficiency is greatly improved. The editing efficiency of the test case is greatly improved, and the design and maintenance cost of the test case is reduced.
column14: INSPUR FINANCIAL INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

column12: Age-related macular lesion image classification method and device
column13: The embodiment of the invention provides an age-related maculopathy image classification method and device, and particularly relates to an age-related maculopathy image classification method and device based on a convolutional neural network, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a color fundus image; performing contour screening on the color eye fundus image to determine a retina region; dividing the images for confirming the retina area into a training set and a test set, and preprocessing the images; the data of the training set is utilized to train an HCSP-Net model, and the HCSP-Net model is formed by adding a Transform module based on a self-attention mechanism on the basis of a CSPDarknet53 network; and testing the performance of the HCSP-Net model by using test set data. According to the embodiment of the invention, a new classification method combining the convolutional neural network and Transform is provided, the age-related macular lesion images can be accurately classified, and the recognition rate is improved.

column12: TESTING AN ARC DETECTING SYSTEM
column13: A testing arrangement is provided for an arc detecting system that comprises at least one optical detector (42) at a piece of electric equipment, where the testing arrangement comprises at least one light source (74) and a testing unit (60), where the testing unit (60) is configured to control the light source (74)to emit a test light (TL) to the optical detector (42) with steps of increasing luminance starting from a minimum test level and continuing towards a maximum test level, investigate if the optical detector (42) detects the emitted test light (TL) and determine that the arc detecting system is operational if the optical detector (42) is able to detect the test light (TL) at any of the used test levels.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR IDENTIFYING A ROOT CAUSE OF AN EVENT
column13: The present invention concerns a method and a system (110) for automatically identifying a root cause of an event occurring within a monitored system (120), wherein time series data representing temporal evolutions of a physical quantity value measured for one or several components (121-129) of said monitored system (120) are acquired and processed for detecting said event, and queries are successively and automatically generated for searching in a semantic database, and using statistical properties of the time series data, causal factors for the detected event, wherein said causal factors are then used for determining, from said semantic database, the root cause of the detected event.

column12: Vent hole identification and positioning method based on Adaboost algorithm
column13: The invention discloses a vent hole identification and positioning method based on an Adaboost algorithm, and the method comprises the steps: putting a detection robot with a visual detection function into a generator chamber, and collecting the video images of an elliptical vent hole, a single-row circular vent hole and a double-row circular vent hole through two cameras at the abdomen; processing the acquired image; the method comprises the following steps of: carrying out Brenner gradient calculation, Tenendrad gradient calculation, Laplacian gradient calculation and variance calculation on an acquired video image frame by frame, and carrying out normalization processing on the Brenner gradient calculation, the Tenendrad gradient calculation, the Laplacian gradient calculation and the variance calculation; carrying out image recognition; marking the image; if the ventilation hole is about to enter or exit from the visual field or only 0.3-0.7 mm of the image is arranged on the edge of the image, the camera continuously collects five images, and then the ventilation hole is positioned according to the label; establishing an SVM-AdaBoost model, importing training set data into the model for training, testing the generated model by using test set data, and visualizing the training precision of the model; and calculating a training error of the weak classifier to obtain a final classification judgment standard.

column12: Infrastructure enabling intelligent execution and crawling of a web application
column13: In particular embodiments, a method comprises accessing, by one or more computing systems associated with a social-networking system, a structured document of a network application, the structured document comprising structural information and content comprising one or more embedded scripts, resources, or identifiers for the resources. The method further comprises processing the structured document to generate a model representation of the structured document, executing at least some of the content of the structured document and logging multiple snapshots of the model representation of the structured document as the model representation is generated in response to one or more interactions initiated by execution of the content. The method further comprises creating a behavior model of the network application based on the multiple snapshots of the model representation of the structured document and determining, based on the behavior model, compliance by the network application with one or more requirements of the social-networking system.

column12: Public building broadcasting system design method and device
column13: The invention provides a public building broadcasting system design method and device. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a space structure constraint model according to a public building structure; respectively combining the sound design parameters and the spatial structure constraint model in the plurality of sample design schemes to obtain a system simulation model; performing acoustic simulation on each system simulation model to obtain acoustic characteristic parameters representing each sample design scheme; performing statistical modeling according to each sample design scheme and the corresponding acoustic characteristic parameters, and constructing a regression model; and determining possible design schemes meeting the design indexes according to the regression model, and selecting an actually adopted design scheme from the possible design schemes. According to the scheme, the regression model is established through a large amount of scheme evaluation, and the optimal scheme determined in the sub-public building structure is estimated through the regression model, so that the broadcasting system scheme is optimal as far as possible, and the potential of acoustic optimization of the broadcasting system is explored.
